1b1(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya a mo ga pA sha ka la pa ra tsa// bod skad du/
1b2(mdo): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhid mo'i rgyal po/
1b3(mdo): bam po dang po / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
1b4(mdo): dpa' thams nad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
1b5(mdo): po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 2di skad
1b6(mdo): bdag gis tho sa pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri po ta la na s+ya na ras
1b7(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang/ shing sa la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka drang / mya ngan 'tshang dang /
1b8(mdo): ka []a te mug ta ka sna tshogs mang pos legs par brgya nad pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgyad stong dang
1b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sa la bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te
2a1(mdo): gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas pas na/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis dbang
2a2(mdo): du mdzad nas/ chos stodad par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
2a3(mdo): lhang sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i rang bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
2a4(mdo): snying po zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par lta bar de bzhi na gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas
2a5(mdo): 'di ltar bdag gi dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po las bso/ gas pa lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu brgya stong / phrag mang po/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
2a6(mdo): 'dzin tu stsal nas/ bdag gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa las sogs te/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob pa rabagyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang
2a7(mdo): sa phyogs gang du/ snying po 'di myod pa'i sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po las sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong srung ba dang / sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das
2a8(mdo): gang na don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du bkur bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la dge ba'i
2a9(mdo): rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyand par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa 'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa 'am/ 'phags pa la skur da pa 'debs/
2b1(mdo): pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ mnar myed par gzhol ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par 'gyur zhing / ma 'ongs pa na sdom
2b2(mdo): ba thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das rezhi gi de nyid kyis zhag cig smyung ba bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod bgyis na/ tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang / gtug pa dang / bsald par 'gyur ro// rims
2b3(mdo): nyin cig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyan bzhi pa dang / de bzhin du rims nyin bdun pa 'am/ myig nad dam/ rna nad dam/ sA nad dam/ so dang / mchu'i nad dam/ lce dang dkan gyi nad dam
2b4(mdo): snying nad dam/ sto nad dam/ ro rgyab dang / rkyed pa'i nad dam/ na lag dang / nying laka ki nad dam/ gzhang 'brum 'am/ pho ba'i na da dam/ tshad pa 'am/ lag pa dang / rkang pa'i nad dam/ sA nad
2b5(mdo): dam/ klad pa'i nad dam/ sha bkra chen po 'am/ sha gzi gu 'am/ mdze 'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'brum bu 'phra mo 'am/ lkog pa 'am/ mtshan mar rdol ba 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjed byed dam/ byang
2b6(mdo): dam/ gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba dang / rde ga pa 'am/ skrod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na lus kyi gdung ba 'am/ seMs
2b7(mdo): kyi gdung ba 'am/ rmyi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyi/ yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi
2b8(mdo): 'am/ rigs bzhi las gang dag sgyu dang g.yos/ bdag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/ 'dzind par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid/
2b9(mdo): kun chub par bgyid/ sems can gzhan la yang sgrogs par bgyid cing / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi na khung du gtad de/ rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems dpar bgyid de/
3a1(mdo): sku rad pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rnam par myi rtog pa dang / kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / gos pa ma mchis
3a2(mdo): pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor de 'dis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyid na/ de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal stond par mdzad par 'gyur zhing
3a3(mdo): nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro// glegs bam du bgyis te/ khyim na 'chang bar bgyid na/ rje dpon gyis skrag pas sam/ bdag gi ngor ram gzhad dag da tsam gyi rgyus/ nyan par bgyid na/
3a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus/ de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'i/ bcom ldan 'das dper na/ skyes pa 'ga' zhig gis tsan dan nam
3a5(mdo): ga phur ram/ gla rtsi zhig la khros sam yongs su smad de rdol brdegs nas/ bdag nyid la byugs na/ tsan dan nam/ ga phur ram/ dagla rtsi de 'di snyam du/ 'dis bdag la khros sam yongs su smad pas/
3a6(mdo): dri mnam par myi bgyi'o snyam du myi sems kyi/ gzhan du na de nyid la dri gda' bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ dadu/ bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang gang su 'ang
3a7(mdo): rung bas gzhad dag tsam gyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang sgyus mchod par bgyid na yang / de nyid sems can dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba lags so// gang dang gang du skye bar
3a8(mdo): 'gyur bar tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dri gda' bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu
3a9(mdo): mo 'am/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du yar
3b1(mdo): gyi ngo'i ches brgyad la/ smyung ba bgyis te/ gzhan myi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa
3b2(mdo): gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams 'byung na yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur
3b3(mdo): skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang / dbang po sbas par 'gyur ro// de'i don rnams grub par 'gyur ro// de'i don grub pa yang chom rkun gyis myi 'phrogs te/ zhugs kyis myi tshig/ chab kyis myo 'tshal/ rgyal po'i
3b4(mdo): mthus dbrog par rngo myi thog par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te/ ser bas ma lags so// chab kyis 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rlung dang chab kyis 'jigs pas
3b5(mdo): ma lags so// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhing gi phyogs mtsha/ mas dang / steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na/ gnod pa thams
3b6(mdo): cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang mdangs dbrog par rngo thog par myi 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'thad par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar
3b7(mdo): myi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung na yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// de la myi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ byad kyis 'jigs pa ma lags/ mkha' 'gro ma'i sa 'jigs pa ma lags te/
3b8(mdo): de la nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// mye dang mtshon dang dug gis 'gum par myi 'gyur ro// de la yang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed
3b9(mdo): pa'i phyir/ gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ de phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag thob par 'gyur lags
4a1(mdo): gzhan yang chos brgyad thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon gsum du zhal stond par 'gyur ro//
4a2(mdo): bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// lta ba 'khrul bar myi 'gyur ro// lag pa myi g.yob pa dang / rkang pa myi g.yob pa dang / gshang gci ma mchis pa dang / khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro//
4a3(mdo): dran pa shi nad tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// khas phub du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa myibs par 'gyur ro// de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smond pa der skye bar 'gyur
4a4(mdo): zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// chang dang / sha dang / snyun dong dang / kye'u dang / sgog skya dang / 'dres pa pa dang
4a5(mdo): lhag rol dang 'di rnams khyad par don tu gnyer bas spang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang / sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa dang / mthu ma mchis pa 'tshal
4a6(mdo): bar bgyis nas bsgrags par bgyi'o// slob dpon gyi dpe 'khyud myi bgyi'o// 'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing 'phra dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnas
4a7(mdo): kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so// byang chub zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab lags la sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni thabs lags te
4a8(mdo): chos 'di gnyis sems cadan rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du kho nas thob pa lags so// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na/ 'di ltar bdag gis snying po 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan
4a9(mdo): sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang / gzhan yang sdig pa myong pa rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bsgrags par 'gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa s+yad ras gzigs
4b1(mdo): dbang phyugs 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa da de'i dus la bab par shes na/ khyod spros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yid rang bar mdzad zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus na byang chub
4b2(mdo): sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtsig kyi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gamo sad to// bcom
4b3(mdo): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i
4b4(mdo): don tu bdag la gsan du gsol/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /
4b5(mdo): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad sa phyag 'tshal lo/ dang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus phyag 'tshas so// byam
4b6(mdo): pa las sogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mas cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed
4b7(mdo): byadakri ma sogag sums / blang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying chen po dang ldan pa 'dugs brgyan das gzigs dang thugs byags so//
4b8(mdo): // tsun tsa mra rgyags pakra rba ni// ngasu / marban/ mdag su rig/ ma / kyi / ba // 'o / mgam ngam ngas/ sa kas/ kai li ki
4b9(mdo): zung dam dang / bung tu ba rgya/ du' dral/ 9/ ki ki / @#/ pa bsung dum dang/ gang / gang ga / bas/ sa hA sa na
5a1(mdo): bi tsi la/ e ta ta/ e ta ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma ha pa shu pa ti be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi ho/ hU hU hU hU/
5a2(mdo): AM kA ra pra mA be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ro/ dU ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra d+ha ya ka/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti man ti ta/ sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bAn
5a3(mdo): so ma/ a did t+ya/ ya ma ba ru na ku be ra/ bra m+men dra/ ri shi/ de ba ga te/ a ba bya rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ sa nad ku ma ra/ rung dra/ bA sa ba/ bish+tsa d+ha na da/ de ba ri shi na ya ka
5a4(mdo): ba hu bi bi d+ha/ b+he sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ dU ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra kA ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa r+ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra d+ha ya ka/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ka ti/ ba lo ka ti/
5a5(mdo): lo ka shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun tsa// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa s+yan ras gzi/ kas dbang phyug bdag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa
5a6(mdo): thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig/ bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyal po dang / chom po dang / rkun po dang / me
5a7(mdo): dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongs su tha rad par mdzad pa// ka na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku N+ya ku N+ya/ tsa ra tsa ra/ a ni dri ya/ ba la bod d+hang ga/ tsa rur ar+ya sad t+ya/ sam pra ka sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da
5a8(mdo): ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mon d+ha/ ka ra/ ma hA ta mon d+ha ka ra/ bi dI ma na shad/ pa ra myi ta pa ri pu ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta TaTaT/ []/ To To Tau TaM/ n+ya6/ e ne ya tsa ra ma/ kri ta pa ri ka ra/
5a9(mdo): e h+ye hi/ i gi ra ma/ he bA ra/ ma hA b+hu ha/ ga na b+han dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta maT/ bi gud d+ha/ bi ki ya bA si ma ma ha ka ru ni ke/ ke ta yang / nyo pa bA ti rad na mo ku ta mA sA dA ra/
5b1(mdo): sa zad nya/ shi ri si kri ta ma ku Ta/ sA yA dA ra/ ma ha pU ta ka mA swa/ kri ta/ ka ra ta sa/ d+han sa mA d+hi/ bi mo kA/ a pra ka ma bya/ ba hu swad ta san ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ sa rba kar ma a ba ra mi nga/ sho d+ha ka/
5b2(mdo): sarba bya dI pra mo tsa ka/ sarba a sha pa ri pu ra ka/ sarba sad tA sa mA shA sa ka ra/ na mo stu te swA hA/ grags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyid na/ mtshams myed pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur
5b3(mdo): zhing / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par bgyid do// mtshams bcad pa la mi/ a ka ru'i bdug pa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ chab bam/ yungs kar dang seng ldeng gi phur bu las bsogs pas so// rims thos
5b4(mdo): cad la ni skud pas so// nad thams cad la ni mar ram/ 'bru mar chab wa bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o// byang dkrol ba la ni mtshon kyis so// ston pa la ni srung ba'i skud pas sam tsha chus so// dug bas
5b5(mdo): pa la ni sa 'am chab kyis so// myig nad la ni skud pa dkar pos na ba la gdags par bgyi'o// so na ba la ni shing ka ra bi ra'i so// shing gis so// mtshams gcad pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la
5b6(mdo): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings nas/ phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyis na/ mtsham sa chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// thams cad bsrung ba ni skud pa
5b7(mdo): 'am/ chab bam thal bas so// gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so// rims nad thams cad la ni skud pa dkar pos so// g.yan pa dang / khyi jo dang / ldog pa dang / 'grin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni
5b8(mdo): sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling bsregs pas so// myag nad la ni dri chu 'am/ shing pa la sha'i chu 'am/ shing ngar gyi chus so// rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyis so// 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang /
5b9(mdo): sku rad pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te kha bshal bar bgyi'o// dpung dang yul dang rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor rnams bsrung ba la ni/ bum pa gang ba bzhag la gtsang mas kos gtsang ma
6a1(mdo): bgos pas/ mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas/ klag par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// des yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te/ sems can thams cad la bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// yams kyi
6a2(mdo): nad dang gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / glags lta ba rnams la ni tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ snying kar byug par bgyi'o// mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad
6a3(mdo): bas par bgyi ba la ni rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so// khyim srung ba ni pad ma'i sbyin sregs kyis so// sems can thams cad sbyang ba dang 'byung pos 'jigs pa dang / gdon thams cad las srung ba la ni/ tsan dan
6a4(mdo): gyi sbyin sregs kyis so// dza ya dang / byi tsa ya dang / na gu li dang / g+han d+ha na gu li dang / ba ru Ni dang / tse'i dra ba ru Ni dang / a b+ha ya ba ni dang / a ni dra ba ni dang / 'ag+han d+ha pri yang gu dang / rgya spos dang /
6a5(mdo): tsag kra dang / ma ha krag kra dang / bi sU kran ta dang / so ma ra dzi da pa/ su nan da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ nor bur bgyis nas/ skyi bo 'am/ dpung pa la gdags
6a6(mdo): pas bsrel bar bgyi'o// khye'u rnams la ni mgul par ro// bu mo rna mas la ni sta zur nas te/ dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / bkra myi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsrel na/ thams
6a7(mdo): cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// dug dang mes myi tshugs lags so// dug gis gnod pa skyed par myi 'gyur ro// skyes na yang gnod pa skyed par myi bgyid cing / myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon rnams zhi bar
6a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// rlung dang / 'brug dang / ser ba gcad pa dang / char kyi rgyun dang / ser ba bzlog pa la ni shing ka ra byi ra'i lcug mas te/ las thams cad bgyid par 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub/
6a9(mdo): pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de nas bsgrub par 'tshal na/ cho ga ni ras laM lhag ma ma yin pa'i mtshon cis sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
6b1(mdo): gi gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tsugs dang / e ne ya'i pags pa dang / phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'drir bstsal par bgyi'o// re
6b2(mdo): nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog dkar po'i sil ma bkram la spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad bzhag par bgyi'o// sna brgyad pa 'am/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa 'am
6b3(mdo): gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang / khrag dang ma 'dres pa bsham shing drangs la a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug ste/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// nyin zhag gcig gam/ nyin zhag gsum du spyang ba bgyis nas
6b4(mdo): zas dkar gsum 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos na/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do//
6b5(mdo): sdong gros sam/ myig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ myig la ba skus na/ de nas myi gda' bar gyur da nas/ nam mkha' la ma/ chi bar 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i
6b6(mdo): ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyurar ro// de ni bsgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad paka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa s+yan ras
6b7(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
6b8(mdo): pa la mngon par bstod do// // don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs s+ho// / de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad la phyag 'tshal/
6b9(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ske nga sa la btsugs te/ nyi ma'i 'od zer
7a1(mdo): star 'od zer stong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pas btud de/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/ 'dzum
7a2(mdo): ba'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i mthus yid la byed pas rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang / snying brtse bas don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bla na myed pa de kho na nyid grub pa mchog/
7a3(mdo): sbyin thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor
7a4(mdo): de kho na nyid chen po'i snying pos 'phags pa snying por gyur pa/ de khon nyid grub pa dam pa dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po rim par phye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par gros ni/
7a5(mdo): dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang bsgrub pa gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'a/ ngas kyi spyan sngar bsgrags par bgyi'o// s+tha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
7a6(mdo): dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang / rig sngags grub pa'i sde'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'di ra yang bsgrags par bgyi'o// gang yang dbang phyug dang / dbang
7a7(mdo): byug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / swa dang / gshin rje dang / chu zla dang / lus ngan dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / rgyu skar dang / rigs sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo/
7a8(mdo): rnams kyi mdun tu de kho na nyid kyi snying po/ snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa dngos grub sgrub pa phrags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje
7a9(mdo): chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'di lta ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ka ti/ pA sha hr-i de swe/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dA rma da tu/ ka b+he/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma ha pad ma b+hu dze/ dA ra dA ra/ ma hA pA sha d+ha re/ ba ra
7b1(mdo): ra ba ma/ ral+li/ sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti ma na Nita/ sha rI laM/ ta ra ta ra/ bi pu la te dza d+ha re/ b+ha ra d+ha rA/ Shad pA ra byi tA/ pa ri pU ra Ne/ ka la ka sa/ ma ha thA ma mA/ be sha dA re/ ma la ma la/ sarba pA pA
7b2(mdo): a ba ra Na/ ma hA ki li bi la la/ nA ga me/ dru ru d+hu ru/ bo dI sid ta/ bu shud de/ pU ru b+ha nu/ pad sa le/ sa ma ba nun/ ku be ra/ na ma sI te/ hu ru hu ru/ pra mA/ biSh+Tha/ ma he shwa ra/ ku mA rA/ nan di ke/
7b3(mdo): shwa ra/ i shwa ra/ ma he shA ra/ de ba pu tra/ ban di ta/ na ma s+thi te/ bI bI b+ha/ ma ni mo'u li d+ha re/ a mA tA bA dzi na/ ma ku ta/ d+ha re/ di bya/ ma ni/ ka na ka/ badz+ra bi dUr+ya/ ma ra ka ta/ pad mA rA ga/ an
7b4(mdo): dra nI la/ di bya mug ti ka/ a sang krita/ sha ri ra/ shre ta/ da nyo pa bI ta/ d+ha ra dza ta/ ma ku ta/ man Di ta/ na ba tsan tA/ dzi ta/ pad ma dA ra pad ma/ A sa na/ pad ma d+hu dza/ tri lo tsa na/
7b5(mdo): tri shU la d+hA ra/ pA sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi shig ta/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba pA ba/ brag ma na ka ra/ ma hA ka rU ni ka/ tu ru tu ru/ sa rba ba ra dA ya ka/ b+ho d+hi bo b+hi/ sa rba ta bA ka ta/
7b6(mdo): a bko ki ta/ bo rI man d+hA/ a so ka te/ lo ke rbA ma/ shwa ra/ ma gci dA ma ni d+ha ra/ bin du pa/ ma ga so'u rtsa/ dan/ ma hA ka ru Na ki/ bu drA bu d+hAd+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo dA ya/ ba ga
7b7(mdo): sarba ta thA ka ta/ a ba lo ki ta ka rbe/ ma hA bu rgya te pa/ rAng/ pra ba ra/ sid+h+wi ka ra/ sa rba d+ha~M hA \u0f7f/ sarba sa tad swA ba ra/ sarba du la/ phra mo tsaka/ ma hA kA ru Niki/ na mo sU te swA hA/ bcom
7b8(mdo): ldan 'das bdag gi 'di ni mad du byung ba/ rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'o// dor yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'o// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi snying po'o//
7b9(mdo): 'phags pa byar ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o// gzugs sna tshogs chen po'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind rnam par 'phrul pa/ phyag stong mnga' ba/ dbu stong mnga' ba/ s+yan stong gis rnam par
8a1(mdo): gzigs pa/ phyag rgya stong gis byin gyis brlabs pa/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i bye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang / mnyam pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du rjes su zhugs pa
8a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'jug pa/ byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar ba/ bdad/
8a3(mdo): la sogs pa'i ma rungs pa thams cad kyi bdud 'joms pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ dmyal ba thams cad sel pa cho ga zhib mo thams cad grub par mdzad pa/ cho ga sgrub pa thams cad
8a4(mdo): kyi mchog/ sa bcu chen po la so sor 'jug pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la rjes su 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang ba sku rad pa dang / byin kyis brlabs kyis byin kyis brlabs pa don yod
8a5(mdo): pa'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa thob par mdzad pa/ don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam par sprul pa/ don yod par sems ca// na rgya mtsho snyed yang dag par 'dzind pa don yod par sems can sa bon
8a6(mdo): la so sor 'jog pa/ don yod par byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa ra 'phrul pa 'jug pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma sa cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ yongs su sgrogs pa/ don yod par
8a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur gyi sprin rab tu 'byed pa/ don yod par sems can thams cad myi 'jigs pa'i khyim du 'dzud pa/ don yod par sbyin pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug
8a8(mdo): yongs su rdzogs pa/ don yod par lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang
8a9(mdo): chos gos sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod pa'i tshe yongs su rjes ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu brgyan pa/ sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par lta ba/ don
8b1(mdo): yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba chen po bskyed pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / grub pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi rnam par/
8b2(mdo): 'phrul pa/ bstan pa/ don yod par dbang phyug sgrub pa/ don yod par rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo yang dag par ston dpa/ don yod par grub pa mthong
8b3(mdo): pa/ don yod par cho ga mthong ba/ don yod par che rab tu 'phel ba/ don yod par snyan par grags pa rab tu stond pa/ don yod par 'khor ba las rab tu sgrol ba/ don yod par skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs
8b4(mdo): su sgrol ba/ don yod par mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ don yod par bzla/ sa brjod dang / cho ga rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par rig 'dzind 'khor los sgyur ba/
8b5(mdo): thob pa yang dag par stond pa/ don yod par lha'i gnas dang ga/ zhal myed khang sum cu rtsa gnyis las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis/ de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs
8b6(mdo): pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i phyag gis ra gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par rmyi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga
8b7(mdo): rang bzhin gyi lus sha nad tu dri ma dang bral zhing / yongs su dag pas dri ma myed pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyi rang bzhin mdun na mchis na mchis par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad
8b8(mdo): du grub pa rtsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol par 'gyur ro// ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongs su skyong bar bgyid do//
8b9(mdo): de lta bas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor da pa dang bcas pa na
9a1(mdo): khang pa rtsegs ma legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri mchog la/ 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag myed 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos stond pa blta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags
9a2(mdo): 'chang des legs par bkru ste/ gtsang mar gyur da pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dang ba dang / zhe sa dang / bla mar bgyi'o//
9a3(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor da pa'i/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / lhab lbub dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o//
9a4(mdo): tshes brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun tu nyin cig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
9a5(mdo): tshig gzhan myi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis/ nas/ ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun tu mchis nyal bar bgyi'o//
9a6(mdo): mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o// ma ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du rus ska dang / gu gul me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas bslang bar bgyi'o//
9a7(mdo): dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ don yod khams gsum rnam par grags// gdug pa'i rgyal pos bla na myed// gang phyir gdugs pa tsam gyis ni// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
9a8(mdo): rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su/ bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro// dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang
9a9(mdo): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mya dang / myi ma yin pa rnams la/ dri chen po'i mchod pa dang / 'dug pa chen po'o mchod pa bgyis
9b1(mdo): par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can gang dag gis gdug pa'i dri tshor na/ de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam/
9b2(mdo): yongs su gdugs par 'gyur ro// 'bab pa dang / 'bab mo dang / mu ge dang / tshod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / 'jug pa dang / rmyi lam ngan pa dang / sems kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'che ba dang /
9b3(mdo): gdung ba dang / yid kyi bde ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / cha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// byad dang
9b4(mdo): g.yengs byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / dug dang dbyi ka dug dang / dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang brjed byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bza' nyes dang / gnod sgrib
9b5(mdo): dang / gnod bltas thams cad gdug pa'i dris bros par 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyur/ dgyes par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la/ zug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par myi 'gyur ro// 'dug pa'i
9b6(mdo): rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o// 'di ltar ches bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bam rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum gyi gtor
9b7(mdo): ma ci 'byor dpa dbul bar bgyi'o// snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po stong po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du nam nangs kyi bar du mchis nyal
9b8(mdo): bar bgyis te/ rmyi lam du dbyig dug gi mdzod mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal myed 'ang dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ rdzing bu dang bcas/ gnas dang bcas/ khang pa rtseg ma dang bcas
9b9(mdo): gzhal myed khang dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag myed byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / khang pa brtsegs
10a1(mdo): pa na bzhugs la/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
10a2(mdo): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag myed de yang / rigs sngags 'chang de la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing legs so zhes bgyi ba yang rtsol bar mdzad de/ kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rag
10a3(mdo): sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du skrun pa dang / khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam
10a4(mdo): par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags rnam pa par phye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te legs so legs so// khyo da rigs sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur da cig/ khyod 'di
10a5(mdo): nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te/ tshe rjes nas nga'i sangs/ rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyuraro//
10a6(mdo): zhes phyag g.yas pa glad pa'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i rdos grub thams cad stsol cig/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa ma yin no zhes bdag nyid
10a7(mdo): na zhes bdag nyid sad nas dka' bar mthong ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / 'dod
10a8(mdo): pa thams cad kyi mchog rtsol bar 'gyur ro// gzugs kyi ri mo de 'bar zhing 'od gzer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang thob par 'gyur
10a9(mdo): skye bo dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// dge slong dang bram ze rnams las don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa
10b1(mdo): chen po bla na myed pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas tshegs bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la ci 'byor da pa'i yon dang bcas pa'i mchod
10b2(mdo): ston stsal par bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid longs spyad par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la lta ba dang / lha rnams la lta bar 'tshal ba na de'i tshe gdug pa'i rgyal po la dgun
10b3(mdo): pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas bdug pa tsam gyi mod la zhal stond par 'gyur zhing / dge ba 'am myi dge ba thams cad
10b4(mdo): dam/ nyams pa 'am/ bri ba de thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// ci tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang / bskrad pa'i/
10b5(mdo): don dang las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o// oM pad ma d+ha ra/ a mo kA dza ya de/ tsu ru tsu ru/ swA hA/ don so/ da pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngagaso
10b6(mdo): A pa dam pa sha d+ha ra a mo kA ba ra da san co da ya hUM/ de bzhin ga shegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
10b7(mdo): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa las stsogs pa bskul ba'i gsang sngags te/ gdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs na/ chab dang nyungs kar bsres la/ lan nyi shu
10b8(mdo): rtsagacig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ phyogs bcur gtor na thams cad bskul ma bgyis par 'gyur ro// oM tre log kya ya A bA han/ A mo ka pA sha/ pad ma bi lo ki ti/ a ya tu/ bru pa ne su ra/ su ru su n+ya/
10b9(mdo): byi ma se hUM/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te/ ku kul gyi 'dug pa la lan brgyas brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur gtor bar bgyis te/ thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa lan/
11a1(mdo): A~M pad ma pU dza ma ha pa sha d+ha ra ni man tra yA myi/ a mo g+ha pa la yan tu bu pa swa mu ru mu ru/ hUM// de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
11a2(mdo): thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs las bsogs pa s+yan drang ba'i gsang sngags te/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / chab dang / me tog dang / tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te
11a3(mdo): thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM pad ma a mo gA badz+ra a tiSh+Tha na ku ru ku ru swA hA// sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ chab dang yungs kar lan
11a4(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ sa la gtor na dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de thams cad bsrungs pas ni rdo rje sra ba'i sems su 'gyur//
11a5(mdo): dgra rnams kyis myi mthong ba dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren da/ pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za da/ nga/ brjed byed dang / ro langs dang 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs
11a6(mdo): thams cad kyis myi mthong ste/ rnam pa thams cad du myi mthong bas rdo rje sra bar 'gyur ro// o a mo g+ha pa sha pad mo tu ra sing ha sa na tu Ti si ri si ri/ hUM/ ga dan ni gsang sngags te yungs
11a7(mdo): kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te sa la gtor na/ pad ma chen po'i gzhal myed khang gi gdan du byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i
11a8(mdo): bdan du byin kyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/ rigs sngags 'chang grub pa'i
11a9(mdo): pad ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma hA ka mu na pad ma a mo gA pa sha dri D+ha badz+ra sa tiSha ta pU ru b+hu ru/ b+hu ba na d+ha re swA hA/ dkyil 'khor mtha' das khyim dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang /
11b1(mdo): gtsug lag khang dang / bsti gnas dang / 'chag sa dang / phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas gsang ba'i phyir/ dri chab dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi ste/ gnas su
11b2(mdo): gtogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro// nyes par bgyis pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas bsang ba'i/
11b3(mdo): gsang sngags so// A~M pad ma a mo g+ha pa zhe na sa man ta/ da sha su dig shu si ma b+han da ya/ tu ru tu ru hUM/ lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bkri ste/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas rjod
11b4(mdo): bkris nas/ phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o// lnga pa ni dbus kyi bzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du/
11b5(mdo): mtshams chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// AM a mo kA/ man 'ad la b+han d+ha ya sa man te na pad ma ma ha pad me dU ru dA ru sA/ hA// dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ yungs kar la lan brgyaH
11b6(mdo): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang steng du yang gtor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang / log 'dren
11b7(mdo): dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar myi 'gyur ro// sems can bdug pa dang / lha 'am/ klu 'am/ bdug pa gang su yang rung ba de dag thams cad
11b8(mdo): zi lad kyis mnan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa dang / bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// A a mo g+ha pa ri shud de
11b9(mdo): sho da ya sa man te na d+hi ri d+ha ri/ shud d+ha srad tA ma ha pad me hUM/ 'dis pa'i rnam lnga la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag gtsug lag khang ngas/ dkon pa 'am/ bya skyibs
12a1(mdo): sam/ tshang tshing ngam/ 'chag sa 'am/ gnas sam/ tshal lam/ nags tshal lamaH/ skyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ brang sa 'am/ skyabs sam/ khang pa la gtor na/ stong
12a2(mdo): pa 'am myi stong pa 'am/ 'dam rdzab dang / myi gtsang ba dang / phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas la stsogs te/ rigs ngan thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag par
12a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// gnas gtsang mar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la dbang bskur na bza' nyes pa dang / 'goms nyes dang / gnod bltas dang / gnod sgribs kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag
12a4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// myi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// bsnyen na ma bgyis pa ni/ bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro// de nas lha thams
12a5(mdo): cad bsrung ba dang / bskyabs dang / sra ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khya/ ba 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu sga dang
12a6(mdo): lus ngan las bsogs pa bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i sla da du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro//
12a7(mdo): tshig brtsan par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chad pa las stsogs pa thams cad las yongs su tha dad par 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na/ 'thab pa dang /
12a8(mdo): thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / myi ngas dang / yams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin bdag nyid la dbang bsgyur ram/ reg
12a9(mdo): par bgyis na/ rigs sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par byed pa dang / las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang tu mchi ba de dang der
12b1(mdo): cher mchod par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyis myi zlog par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin gzhal myed khang rgya chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po/ rmyi lam du mthong ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po thob par
12b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i'akhor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// rtag tu
12b3(mdo): gtsang ma spyod pa gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur ro// rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rtsold par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
12b4(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed rmyi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing / shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi zhams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM pad me sa ra sa ra/ tish+tsa tish+tsa
12b5(mdo): ma ha/ a mo gA sa ma ya swa hA/ gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gigasang sngags so// oM bi pu la pad ma a mo gA sa ra pra ba ne/ tu/ ku ru ku ru swA hA// 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so//
12b6(mdo): A a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma ha pad ma b+han d+ha re hUM/ slob ma'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo gA pad ma she khye tu ru tu ru/ tish+tsa badz+ra pa ne d+he swA hA/ s+yai gtsug bcing ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
12b7(mdo): so// oM a mo gA pad ma dza lod kwi pa bI r-i b+hI ri hUM/ chab bteg pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa ga cig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha bA ke Ta sam 'bra' ra pad ma/ a sa ne dza la ba ti ku ru ku ru hU~M/ bum pa'i gas
12b8(mdo): sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyang bzlas so// oM pad ma pra sa ra a mo g+ha byi ma le bA ra bA ra swA hA/ chab kyi rgyun kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad me su pad me pu na ka re d+hi ri d+ho re bo mi se sA
12b9(mdo): hA/ lag pa'i gsang sngags te/ lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/
13a1(mdo): bsgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thams cad du bgyi'o// AM a mo g+ha bi ma le/ 'dzi ba ha gra sa sho d+ha ni pad ma ko ma la 'dzi ba hA/ sang sho d+ha ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi ma le swA hA// lce sbyang ba'i
13a2(mdo): gsang sngags te dri che ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ kha bshal na lce'i dri me thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// pad ma dang ku mu ta'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar lce mnyen par 'gyur ro// so dang dkan dang mgul
13a3(mdo): pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// au a mo g+ha g+han d+ha ba ti su ru su ru/ pra s+phu ru dipe bya gan d+he'i pad ma pra b+he sA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis khar stsal pa'i ril lu tsan dan dang / na la dang / spri ka dang / ud pa la dang / gur
13a4(mdo): kum dang / gla rtsi dang / lhan cig sdang ba bgyis la phye ma zhib mor btags tre/ ri lu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la/ gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ zangs kyi snod du stsal
13a5(mdo): nas bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe/ khar stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig bsdad par bgyis na/ rtag tu pha nas ud pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'a gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam du the tsom myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thas
13a6(mdo): cad dang / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' 'ang dgyes 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro//
13a7(mdo): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po gnyis pa'o// / bzlas pas bde bar 'grub par 'gyur bas/ don yod
13a8(mdo): rig pa tha na byed// rigs sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyis pas// dus kun rul dri spang bar bgyi// 'grin pa bad kan sngabs dag dang // de bzhin kun 'jig myur du ni// kha nas spa'i dri dag 'byung // su la tshig
13a9(mdo): dag smras pa ni// de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur// lha rnams dbang du mchis pa dang // bde rdzogs bdag po dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lha de bzhin du// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
13b1(mdo): dag dang // zla ba nyi ma nyid dag dang // thams cad dbang du gyur da nas mchis// 'di ni She na mur bgyid na// tshig ldan lce'i rtse mo la// mchis pas tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur// rtag tu myi myin dbyangs 'gyur te//
13b2(mdo): dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par spangs// tshig bcad stong ni klags pa dang // sngon klags pa ni nyams myi 'gyur// hUM zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang // lba gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa'ang mchis// pata zhes bgyis pas
13b3(mdo): gdug pa dang // dgyegs dang log 'dren rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po sha za dang // brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba la// thams cad mod la 'byer 'gyur zhing // khas bub tu yang 'gyel bar 'gyur// rilu
13b4(mdo): kha na phogs na ni// dus kun du ni mkhas par 'gyur// grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te// thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur/ tshig mnyen 'jam zhing snyan par 'gyur// ri lu 'di ni bcang bgyis na//
13b5(mdo): don yod pad ma dri ma myed// rilu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur// AM ma la byi ga de pad ma byi ba re/ san tsa ra ba tsa re sA hUM/ amo gA si de d+he sho drA ya hUM/ na ga pus pa shun pa dang / u shi ra dang / tsan
13b6(mdo): dan dang / pad ma ge sar dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / spang spo sa dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum dang / pra bun da ri ka e la dang sa ma ga dang / su kra dang / su gan d+hi ka/ 'di rnams cha mnyam par
13b7(mdo): bgyis te zhib tu btags nas/ gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i che ba dang / bsres pas khrus bgyi zhing 'tshal lam/ chab dron pos khrus bgyi ba 'am/ 'tshal bas shi nad tu zhus bgyis pa gtsang ma dag
13b8(mdo): pas/ bag cha' ma mchis par bton bcas gyis/ sngon gyi drag po'i las rnams dang // gnod gdon kun 'joms grub pa dang // rang kun dam par nyams pa dang // 'dod chags na sdang gti mug gi// sun pa
13b9(mdo): myi bzad spang bar 'gyur// bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mdo la ni// dri ma kun zhi som nyi myed// dpal gyi lha'i bzhin du 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// kazi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar// zla ba nyi ma
14a1(mdo): bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pas ma// sus ni lha'i bzhin du 'gyur// myi gtsang ba ni gsang bar 'gyur// ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par gyor gyin tshangs spyod 'gyur// thub kyi
14a2(mdo): bud pa kho nar 'gyur// tshangs par myi pyod tshangs spyod 'gyur// mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang // rtag tu bro nad ma mchis 'gyur// lus la lha'i dri nems 'byung // pad ma ku mu mnyen pa'i lus// sngon gyi drin der
14a3(mdo): sngangs te// lha'i tsan dan dri dag ni mda' rkyang gang du som nyi myed// rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang // bdenas ni sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang // lha myin gdug pa log 'dren dang // bdug pa'i
14a4(mdo): bgyegs kun mthong myi 'gyur// myi bzad dgra rnams kyis kyang myin lus nyid sbyang ba bgyis nas su// bzlas brjod pa'i bsgrub pa ba gyi// legs par bsgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde bar
14a5(mdo): 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun// de ba/ zhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan// dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du mchi// ci 'dod
14a6(mdo): yid la bzlas pa'i// rtag tu don yod 'grub par 'gyur// thog mar lus spyang cho ga bgyi// de nas gsang sngags legs par s+yad / au a mo g+ha pad ma lo tsa ne dib bya drish+tsi pe ri shud d+he/ su ru su ru pad
14a7(mdo): ma a ka kI b+hu ru bru ru/ sa man ta bya ba lo ki ma swA hA/ sdong gros 'gyi'u 'ang rgya mtsho'i dbu bas ha tra/ ud pal snang ci lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la/ gsang sngags sum stong sa brgyad bzlas pa'i myuge sman 'dri/
14a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs/ 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis kun pas bkra shis shis 'di kyig rad kun 'joms par bgyid de/ gsar lam bzang po mi/ yid du myi mchi sa
14a9(mdo): nyid mthong myi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par lta nam yang mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// gtum po 'joms pa gtum po dang // lhag ma spangs pa 'goms nyes dang // bza' nyes gnod sgribs gnod sbyin dang /
14b1(mdo): srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dang // thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu// myi sdang bar ni the tsom myed// myig gis bzang po mthong ba dang // myi las bzang po mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba srid du rab sbya ra pas//
14b2(mdo): rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// myig yongs su sbyang ba'o// AM b+hud d+hu b+hud d+hu bi pUd d+ha/ pad ma a mo gA myi khi ba ra ba ra ba ra de swA hA/ rigs sngags 'dis 'gyi bu wang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
14b3(mdo): don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod brgyad pa'i tshe
14b4(mdo): yang 'di klags te/ phral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis te/ thig le ngalan gcig bgyis pas/ 'phral ba'i steng na skar ma'i dbyings de lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro// bdug pa thams cad dbang 'gyur
14b5(mdo): mchis / gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang // srin po bgyegs dang log 'dren nyid// thams cad 'jig 'gyur the tsom myed// sems can bdug pas bdug bsams kyang // phyir zhing bzod par
14b6(mdo): myi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te// me la phye ma leb bzhin no// rtag tu rgyal po skye bor bcas// 'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang // blon po che dang mdun na 'don// btsun mor tshogs
14b7(mdo): banas dbang du 'gyur// dge sbyong dang bram ze dag/ thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur// rgyas rigs dmangs rig nyid dag ste// thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur/
14b8(mdo): rigs sngags lha na thams cad dang // gang dag dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste// de dag thams cad dam tshig gi// rjes su sgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bsrung ba bgyid 'gyur zhing // rtag tu grub pa bla
14b9(mdo): myed rtsol// thig le 'ad bkyis grogs myed rgyu ba dag/ chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yon can dang // g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// kun las bsgral bar 'gyur te som nyi myed// seng ge stag
15a1(mdo): dang dom dang ni// glang chen khro ba myi bzad dang // wa dang bdug bca sa srog chags dang // so gdug sbrul 'gro gnas nas ni// gang dag srog chags bdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te//
15a2(mdo): nam yang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// ser ba mye dang tshig pa dang // char pa myi bzad mtshon nu byed// mkhas pa thig sa 'chang ba'i lus// khyim rib pas kyang non myi 'gyur// mkhas pa rigs sngags 'chang ba'i don/
15a3(mdo): thams cad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur// shi nad tu ma grub gsal bar yang // 'grub par 'gyur te the tsom myed// bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'chang gyis bdag dran par bgyid cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
15a4(mdo): po dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rigs sngags 'chang de'i mdun du bdag mchis nas/ yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs pa
15a5(mdo): bzhin stsal par bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par ba/ kyi'o// don yod pa grub pa rjes su stsal par bgyi'o// bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o//
15a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gal te rigs sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par bgyid na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rjes
15a7(mdo): su ka nang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis sbald par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rigs sngags 'chang bsgrub pa dang bral bar 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis ma nongs so// de lta bas na rigs
15a8(mdo): sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo la bsgrub pas/ gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dgos pa de dag thams cad the tsom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags ba
15a9(mdo): te/ oM a mo gA ko sha da ra sa ra pra sa ra hUM/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te/ gzho nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o// oM
15b1(mdo): a mo kA pra ba ra na mu ru mu ri dpe bya ka shi ka ma sam b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swA hA/ gos kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu na gcig bzlas so// oM a mo kA pra sa sA rgyang zhi pa gyi/ bo d+ha No pad me swA hA// gos bteg
15b2(mdo): pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dibi byo ta ka sum bru ta/ a mo g+ha ba ru na ce re b+hi shin ts+yai hU~M/ khrus kyi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mra ta a mo g+ha pad ma a sa ne pa
15b3(mdo): ri la Ni/ tsu ru tsu ru/ swA hA/ nye reg gi sngags te/ lan nyi shu ma gcig bzlas so// oM a mo gA rag kA Ni ku ru ku ru swA hA/ bdag srung ba de yungs kar dang cha ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ rang gi
15b4(mdo): sus la dbang bskur ro// sbos mo g+ha sa ma ya ma ha pad me ti/ tiSh+ThahUM/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te san bdun bzlas so// oM sa rba da tra ma mo ku bA ti ti/ \u0f7frakA ka du hU~M/ slob ma dang klogs
15b5(mdo): bgyid pa bsrung ba de thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas/ 'phral bar thi ga le bgyi'o// oM trai log kya pad ma a mo g+ha kra ma ne mi li swA hA/ gom pa dor ba'i sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gazlas
15b6(mdo): so// oM pad me ma ha pad me sa ra sa ra sa man te na pa ri be sha ya a mo kA pa she Na hU ru hu ru swA hA/ tshon skud sA lnga la lan bdun bzlas te/ bkri bar bya'o// oM bi tsid tra a mo gA ba stan na rang gi bi shud d+hA ya
15b7(mdo): ki Ni ke No hU~M/ ba dan gyi ka sang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// AM a mo gA sha ra badz+ra dun da tha ra tha ra swA hA/ mda'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi pu la a mo gA ma ha dA ra bye bud de/ si ri si ni sA
15b8(mdo): // rta babs kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// su dag der zhugs na mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// smin
15b9(mdo): na ba tse rjem mo ga pus pa pa la sa ta ki ne pu mas pa ra bar hUM/ bus pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te lang bdud 'azlas so// oM ma mo gA 'ad byis dag ta nga/ a tishwa ta di'i bya gan do sa sA mnas man ted dzas dzas swA nA~M/
16a1(mdo): pog por gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas/ IM dza la ba ti red na g+ha ta/ si ri na tu ti tu ti swA hA/ gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// au dibi bya b+ha tsa na a mo g+ha pad ma
16a2(mdo): pa re pu ru ya hUM/ kham por kye gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo gA sam bu ra ni dro na gAn d+ha pa ti swA hA/ theg le'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sa ra ni sa ra ya a mo g+ha b+ha dza ne ma dA ma de ni
16a3(mdo): hUM/ lan bdun bzlas so// IM dipe bya a ba lo ka ni bi d+hi dza ya tu sa man te na sa ma ra ne swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste so sor dbye bar bgyi'o// A~M na na pra sa ra na/ a mo gA mud ta dza la dza la swA hA
16a4(mdo): phyag mtshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlas so// A~M a mo g+ha rad na/ su tra dA re/ ki ri ki ri swA hA/ thagi skud kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor ram/ ri mo bri ba'i
16a5(mdo): ras sam gzhan gzhi ci yang rung ba las yang gdab par bgyi'o// IM bi pu la ba re pra be sha ya a mo g+ha pad me hUM/ sgo'i che dbye ba ste/ sgo re rer yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// AM su pa b+ha ga ti
16a6(mdo): su mang ga la dA ra ba ban ti au dbi bya b+ha dza na a mo gA pa sha na ba na ba re/ gi ri gi ro hUM AM saM bu na/ rub bya dbi bya b+ha dza ne a mo g+ha pad me swA hA lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// swo bi bo d+ha ru ma ha ro pa ka ra na tsa la
16a7(mdo): tsa la a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// IM di bye kAn dA rbu sa ri ni e mo gA ba le d+ha ra dA ra swA hA/ mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// IM gAn d+ha s+pha ra ni sa man ta a mo k+ta pra
16a8(mdo): s+phu ra hUM dwi'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// au nir ma la ka ya sho d+ha ni d+hibi bya gAn dA pra bu ra ni pu ra ya hU/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// AM gAn d+ha tsu na pra bu ra ni/ tsu ru tsu ru sA
16a9(mdo): hA/ dri phye ma'i kesang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// AM ra sa ra sa gra pa ti sarba byi d+ya a dI shwe te sam pu ra ya hUM/ gtor ro// sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// I
16b1(mdo): dpe bya b+ho tsa na sam bu ra ya bi pu la b+he swA hA/ kha zas kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// o tri shug kla bo dza na pa li pi puM la ra sa gra pa te su ra pra su ra hUM/ zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma 'am
16b2(mdo): gzhan la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// AM bA la ba ti sa ra bi t+ya dpe bya ba na spa ti ta ra ta ra/ tu ni swA hA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// I daMbe bya ku su mod pa la na na pus shwa pa ri sha ni b+he ba
16b3(mdo): swa hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// au ba bo d+he la ta pa sh+ma pa kun thi pa nas spa ti a ha ra sam pu na kum b+he swa hA/ me tog btog pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// AM ma ha du pa me ga pa ta
16b4(mdo): la stan tshe da ya sa man te na hUM hUM swa hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// IM a tha rad pa ni dza la dza la de mu She swA hA/ me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bi da ma
16b5(mdo): ni ke na ka rad no dza la b+hu sha Na ma ni ma ni a mo g+ha ma ni sA hA/ cha zhing ba/ rgyan pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// A pad ma ka re bi ma la na kha ang gu li sa ma sa ma sarba ta tha ga ta a ti shI te s+thA
16b6(mdo): thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// A a rba gu no pra na ta shi ro b+han d+ha na yA na ma ska ro mi mi li mo lo tu ri ni sA hA/ phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// au
16b7(mdo): dka di ki a bi bi na da na pra sa ra tu hUM/ bskor ba'i sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha yu d+ha dza la ti pa ni pra dza la pra s+phu ra hUM/ thal mo'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// AM daMng
16b8(mdo): bya a mo g+ha bi pu la s+pha re ma du ra nir g+ho sha ru te/ na ra na ra hUM/ dril bu'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// au ra shI dza la sa man te na a ba b+ha sa ma ya ma ha ma ni red na
16b9(mdo): shi khe swA hA/ mar me'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM dru ru dU ru sa ba ta ya shi kra dza be hUM dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ ku gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM dush+ma sad tA tri
17a1(mdo): b+ho dA na sa ma sa ma ya ba re swa hA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM ba tsi tre ma ni bi b+hu la pra bar rta ni hUM/ bgrang 'phreng gi ge sang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad
17a2(mdo): bzlas so// AM bi tsi tI rad no/ dza la dib bya/ ku su ma ba re pu shwA ra ti sA hA/ me tog 'phreng ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so/ au dipe bya lo tsa ni/ a mo gA pra ba re/ sarba byi de r+ya a tish+tsA ta
17a3(mdo): sid dA shud d+ha bi lo ga te swA hA/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// AM a mo g+ha pad me sa man te/ shu b+ha ne ta ra ta ra gad tsha sa ba banas swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags
17a4(mdo): telan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// au dpe bya sam bu ra ni/ na ga bi lo ka ni hUM/ khar sil gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// AM pad tra pu ra ni/ pu ra ya/ a mo
17a5(mdo): kA ba ti/ sa man ta pra b+he swa hA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags// te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// au dur b+ha sang s+pha ra/ byid d+ya/ a tiSh+Thi te pra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ ri shi pu tsi te sA hA/
17a6(mdo): nA ba ting ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// AM dzi la d+hu ma dza la shi khi re shrI ga ra rbe swA hA/ sbyin bsregs kyi gas nga sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad mi
17a7(mdo): ni pad ma sa ne ba ra pra ba re/ na ga bu pa ne swA hA/ AM kha ga tsi ra ni ka ma ga ma ya pa da pra tsa ri ni hUM/ lend pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas/ AM sa rbad tra a mo g+ha bi shai ka ma ha tsu Da bi ma le/ a b+hi
17a8(mdo): shin tsha tu man pra ba ra pra Ni b+hu tse pad ma dA tse swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// rig sngags 'chang gyis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga bsgrub/
17a9(mdo): pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas/ cho ga bsgrub na dgos pa rgya chen po 'byor da pa'i mthu 'di dag dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs
17b1(mdo): dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal myed khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ro brgyad dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang /
17b2(mdo): ro sna tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gtor ma bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal myed pang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
17b3(mdo): sems dpa'i gzhal myed khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
17b4(mdo): po rnams dang / so so'i gzhal myed khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang / kha zas kyi mtsho ga ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dgongs pa'i/
17b5(mdo): rnam pa thams cad dang / de kho na nyid bsgrub pa'i ji skad gsung sa pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang / gsang sngags bsgrub pa rnams bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis grub
17b6(mdo): pa bla na myed pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sa sngags 'chang gis las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis
17b7(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun tu bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas/ bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sdig pa dang / sgrub pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig
17b8(mdo): par bgyi'o// yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga zhi ba mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar da
17b9(mdo): pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba'i chen po'i dbang bsgyur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de kho na nyid yang dag pa bsgrub pa'i grub pa stsal
18a1(mdo): par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsald par bgyi'o// shi nad tu rgya che zhing bag tsha ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang
18a2(mdo): bkur sti chen po'i'i'ajig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang / dpal gsald par bgyi'o// 'di la yid gnyis dang / som nyi skyed par myi bgyi zhing / dngos po gzhan du yang yid la myi
18a3(mdo): bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur da pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o//
18a4(mdo): bden par smra ba dang / bden pa la dga' ba dang / snyan pa smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmyigs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing / phyag rgya dang / gsar
18a5(mdo): sngags kyang bzlas par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa bgyi'o// sangs
18a6(mdo): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis na sa/ mngon gsum du bcang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phag
18a7(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te/ mdun tu nA'i bting ba bting nas/ dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ gzhan myi smra bar bzlas par bgyis te/ 'di ni gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub
18a8(mdo): pa'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur da cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pas/
18a9(mdo): sems pa dag pa/ lag na pad ma sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ byin gyis brlabs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
18b1(mdo): sbyin dang / srin po lha myin gsang ba pa// 'jig rten skyong dang / tshangs pa dang // drag po khyab 'jug gzho nu stsogs// gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du// zla nye kun 'gyed gzho nu dang //
18b2(mdo): de bzhin dbang phyug chen po dag/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur// sgrol ma bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur// de bzhin pha rol phyi nad bcu dang // 'grin sngon de bzhin gos kar nan//
18b3(mdo): de bzhin pad ma gar gyi dbang // rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni// lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang // lha mo khro gnyer ma ma kyi// dpe' myed pho nya mo dang ni// 'jigs myed dpal dang dbyangs can dang // pad ma
18b4(mdo): kon ti ud pa la/ pad ma'i so can de bzhin du// ti se'i na rtse mo na// 'phrog ma 'byung po'am dag dang // de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu// mthu chen ji bzhin rig 'dzin dbang // rdo rje 'chang chen de
18b5(mdo): bzhin du// bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang // sum cug/ nyis gnas lha dag ni// gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam// gyis// de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de
18b6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing / ston par mdzad do// de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog rtsol bar 'gyur// rtag tu
18b7(mdo): mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan stong pa/ phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzind pa lta 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// bram ze cha lugs don song zhags// mthong bar 'gyur
18b8(mdo): te som nyi myed// mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rgya mtsho'i gleng dang ni// mgon po zhal ni bcu gcig dang // de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang // mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang // da bzhan
18b9(mdo): gzugs pa brgyad 'thag dad+ha// de bzhin gzigs pa bsam kyi khub// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// sbrums lA bu'i ting 'dzind dang // phyag rgya bcings pams gyis ni// mgon pos thams cad tho nga
19a1(mdo): par mdzad// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams// rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag myed// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor pa// mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs/
19a2(mdo): rgyas zhing ni stong dag ni// chu bo gang ga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam
19a3(mdo): gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba chen po'i rnam pa gzhan mthong ste// nyin cig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje bdan// de dag rmyi lam snang bar mthong 'gyur bar// de la yid
19a4(mdo): gnyis som nyi myed// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshung ba'am mtshams myed lnga// mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'phags pa la// kha zer nyid dang dam chos bslu ba/
19a5(mdo): dang // rgyal bas gsung spong mnar myed gzhol ba dang // myi bza da dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang // bskal pa 'bum phrag sto dang po thams cad 'grol// phyag rgya gsang sngags bzlas pa
19a6(mdo): tsam gyis sam// thos sam mthong ngam mying ni bzung bas kyang // sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi myed// don yod zhags/ snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang // 'jig rten 'gon dang mtshungs te
19a7(mdo): khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang ga'i// bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs//
19a8(mdo): don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags mthong na bsod nams phung chen gyi// bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// de'i tshe yang rnam par 'phel 'gyur bas// de ni dpag tu myed par
19a9(mdo): som nyi myed// de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur da nas// gtsang ba'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang // yo byad bsgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang // rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang // sna
19b1(mdo): tshogs bdug pa rab tu 'dug bgyis shing // dpung pa lag pa lha'i spos kyis byugs// gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i stan bshams par// dkyil mo krung bcas nas ni byams sems dang // snying rje'i lhag bsam/
19b2(mdo): de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // shi nad tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi zhing // rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson// shi nad tu rig pas tshig gzhan myi sma
19b3(mdo): bar// shi nad tu rig pas bsrung ba'i cho ga bgyi// shi nad tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus// bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang // sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig rjes mthun 'gyur nas de nas
19b4(mdo): ni// phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi ste/ lag pa pad ma'i tshul du bzhi ngag la// sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te/ mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying kar bzhag go// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i
19b5(mdo): rgyal po'i snying po'i rtse ba'i phyag rgya ste/ byang chub snying po'i bar du stsol par bgyi'o// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i ge/ sang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha bi kur bi ta sa man ta
19b6(mdo): a ba lo ka ya man ste yad tA/ a dI Sh+Thi ta a mo g+ha pad me tsa ra byi tsa ra san tsa ro hUM hUM/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par lta ba/ don yod pa rgyas pa pad ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal
19b7(mdo): pos shi nad tu 'phra ba'i rdul dang / mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
19b8(mdo): de dag gi sku las 'od gzer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi yid la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos/ phyag gser gyi kha
19b9(mdo): dog lta bu brkyang nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyi brlabs pa stsold par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang
20a1(mdo): dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / khyab bdag dang / kun 'gyed gzho nu la stsogs pa/ lha rnams bsrung ba dang / skyobs pa dang / sbed
20a2(mdo): pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mod la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / ma chad pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur ro// de'i grub pa yid du
20a3(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so// don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa pad ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcang / 'dzub mo gung mo rnams pad ma
20a4(mdo): lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la/ sen mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstand te/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor brtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzind pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha pad ma mang ku sha sa
20a5(mdo): ma yan gri na gri na d+ha ra d+ha ra ma ha sad tra hUM/ phyag rgya bcings te btsi/ ngas ma thag tu 'am/ bzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshe/ gas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs
20a6(mdo): so zhes bgyi ba stsol par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dges pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dges pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /
20a7(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyal po'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol par 'gyur zhing / yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags/
20a8(mdo): tshig grub pa stsol par 'gyur ro// de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'dzind pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjes su
20a9(mdo): 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i 'argya 'o phyag rgya dpangs tshig 'tshal dpar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
20a10(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu/ blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil pad ma ltar bgyis la/ 'dzub mo la gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing / 'the chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni/
20b1(mdo): ba' phag rga na// pad ma 'chang la 'dug pa dang // me tog las stsogs dri rnams dang // 'phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang // ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni// gtor ma mchod pa yon tu 'bul// bum pa gang ba dri tshogs dang // tshon skur/
20b2(mdo): sna lnga tshon phye'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la// phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog/ 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// thams cad du ni don yod mchog/ go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya 'di// pad ma'i phyag gis byin
20b3(mdo): gyis brlabs// gung mo nor bus bkres pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni/ bag tsha ba myed pa'i pad ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni grub pa dam pa lags so// spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+ha pad ma ma
20b4(mdo): swad tA/ a ya tu ma ha man d+ha la bi ri bi ri bi ri pad ma pU dze swA hA/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol ba btab pa'i gas bsngags te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang phyag na pad ma ko
20b5(mdo): btab dgug// lha rnaMs kun dpe de bzhin du// dkyis 'khor gyi lha nas dkug/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa/ la'ang 'du// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha myin de gzhin
20b6(mdo): du// nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste/ de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing // bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi myed// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la/ lag pa'i the'u chung rnams par
20b7(mdo): ma'i mtshams su byas te/ gung mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni// grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing dang // dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba'i// bsrung ba la ni bag tsha myed// phyag rgya 'di ni
20b8(mdo): bcings tsam dang // gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis// dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu// mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // bsrung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dri d+ha pad ma b+han
20b9(mdo): d+ha sa man te na/ ma ha si man dag shan tu man tsu ru tsu ru hUM phata// de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// grub ldan sems can kun sman pa// don yod pa'i phyag rgya ni// khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan// rdo rje thal
21a1(mdo): mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par bzhag ste/ srin lag gdengs nas sor mo rnams yid bskums pa ni/ don yod sna tshogs rgyal po'i// pad ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags// phyag rgya 'di ni las
21a2(mdo): kun dang // 'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang // dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs// phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang // gsang sngags dam pas bsrung bgyis nas// rigs sngags 'chang ba 'jug par
21a3(mdo): 'gyur// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i rnam par thar da pa'i/ dkyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// au badz+re badz+re/ a ti shI ta par me bi shu ru pa dA re/ d+ha ra dA ra hUM/ pra bi sha tu stai yad dA ga tan d+hi ri tu ti swa hA/
21a4(mdo): phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu// g.yo bar 'gyur bar som nyi myed// phyag na pad ma'i lus 'bar nas// mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
21a5(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag tu lta zhing ma dun na mchis// sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang // mtho ris de sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams ni//
21a6(mdo): gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas sgo nas// gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do// bde can 'jig rte/ na khams dag gi// skon gnas pa sgo 'byed do// phyag rgya 'ang na
21a7(mdo): tsam gyis// gnas kund tu ni 'jug par 'gyur// phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrog/ nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal
21a8(mdo): bcu drug rnams las thard// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// myi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang // nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal ba'i sgo na bcad par 'gyur// myi bzad 'jigs las bsgral bar
21a9(mdo): 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di na mthong tsam gyis// mtshams myed lnga ni bgyis pa dang // sdig pa kun las rnam par thar da// sems can kun la rtag tu sdug/ de bzhin gshegs kun byin kyis rlob// phyag rgya 'di nyid the bol
21b1(mdo): rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste// gung mo pad ma'i rel pa'i tshul du bgyis te/ spyi bo'i ril pa la bzhag pa ni/ pad ma'i rel pa'i phyag rgya lags te/ don yod pa'i lag pa zhes bsgrags te/ sems can thams cad la
21b2(mdo): sman pa'i slad du/ gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// au a mo g+ha pad ma dza le byi sho d+ha ya hUM/ bi ri bi ri me le swA hA/ phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis// bkus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags ni// kargya
21b3(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su// phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs myed pas// rtag tu bkus pa'i mod tsam gyis// myi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur// mya gtsang spyad pa gtsang bar 'gyur// myi gtsang skyod pa gtsang ba dang //
21b4(mdo): tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// myi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur// bsod nams phung pos lha'i bzhin 'bar// zla ba nyi ma ba bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug/ gsang sngags
21b5(mdo): bla na myed pa 'grub// grub pa don yod zhags pa'i// don yodade nyid grub par 'gyur// lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te// bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi myed// mgon po 'phags pa s+yan nas
21b6(mdo): gzigs// sems dpa' mchog sbyin dag pa po// mchog sbyin rgyu nad tu thams cad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing // che 'phel rtag tu nad myed 'gyur// de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur// thams
21b7(mdo): cad du ni las grub ste// gnod pa kun las rnam par gros// sgrib pa rnams las rnam par thard// thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog/ khrus kyis rnam pa 'di dag ni// don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no// kag
21b8(mdo): gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan// srin lag gnyis yid tsam bskums pa ni/ pad ma'i nor bu lags te/ kun nas kyang ni mnyam par bzhag/ phyag rgya ting 'dzin da lta bu 'di// dkyil mo krung bcas mchis nas
21b9(mdo): phyag rgya 'di dag bcing bgyi zhing // mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas// bcings pa tsam gyis mod nas ni// dkyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur// kun nas go char gyur da nas ni// bgegs dang log
22a1(mdo): 'dren thams cad dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas// lha myin nam mkha' lding gis myi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu// de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros// bshes/
22a2(mdo): myed pa ni las 'grub pas// bzlas pa'i las la som nyi myed// sa mo kA badz+ra tri dI pa e na ra hU~M/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar swA/ 'dzub mo dang ku mo bkug nas/ the bong pad ma kha bye bskar bgyis/ don song/
22a3(mdo): dbang phyug rgyal po phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// oM pad me shwa ra/ a oM kA ba ra da/ b+hi ri b+hai ro swA hA/ 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod
