22a4(mdo): nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems dpa' bsam pa rtse gcig pa sa bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ dus
22a5(mdo): gsum du rgyu nad tu gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang / ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin ka/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
22a6(mdo): kyis/ rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol par 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rigs sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do// mgon po 'phags pa
22a7(mdo): s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun tu mchis par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur
22a8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yongs su dag pa 'thob
22a9(mdo): par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi modado la/ yon tan phan yon nams thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ phyag rgya lan
22b1(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas/ zhag cig spyang ba bgyis te/ bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol
22b2(mdo): te/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no zhes/ dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rigs sngags 'chang kyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ tshur
22b3(mdo): shog bu gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang / sbyin no khyod rjes su bzung zhing byin kyis brlabs pas/ nga'i bu rigs sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur da cig/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub
22b4(mdo): pas/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rgyal po la brten par gyis shig/ snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la dgongs par gyis shig/ khyod 'di ni
22b5(mdo): ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gyi kha mas bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / khyod pad ma'i nang du/ rdzus te skyes nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing / mtshan dang dpel
22b6(mdo): byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa byang chub snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar tshig gzhan myi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad pa zlas brjod bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang na/ nam mkha' la mchi
22b7(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ne
22b8(mdo): dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod rgya chen snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpung pa bskums pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis/
22b9(mdo): mchi zhing slar ldog par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la phyag rgyas mopa bcings ma/ tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sbru ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyis rnam par rol pa
23a1(mdo): pa/ don song ba'i myig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / sna'i bu dang / drag po dang / dbang po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gzho nu dang /
23a2(mdo): gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan las stsogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba/
23a3(mdo): de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzlas 'arjod bsgrub pa 'bul lags so// 'bum bzlas brjod pas 'jig rten las 'das pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs
23a4(mdo): pa thams cad mngon gsum du snang ba mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying pos thug gi bar du phyir myi ldog par byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par
23a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings te/ dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ se mas can thams cad la brtse ba dang / 'byung po byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
23a6(mdo): lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar lan drug brgya bzhi bcur bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / dran
23a7(mdo): ba dang blo gros dang gzi brjidade lus la 'jug par bgyid do// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la pha rol da tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ra mo'i sku gzugs de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags/
23a8(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmyi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad
23a9(mdo): yongs su bsal ba dang gtugs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa rnams kyi dam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// //
23b1(mdo): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po gsum pa// thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la/ rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste/ khar gtad la srid lag gnyis phyir
23b2(mdo): bgyid cing / gung mo pad ma lta bur bgyis te sngags 'di brjod do// oM tu su tu ru pad me a mo kA sid dI hUM/ phyag rgya 'di ni don yod grub// las rnams grub dang ldan pa'i// 'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa 'as// kun/
23b3(mdo): rig myur du grub par 'gyur// srur tu ston pa stsol 'gyur te// rnyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog/ mchog kun rab tu stond par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa// sgrib pa thams cad las ni
23b4(mdo): nam par grol// bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel/ kwa shis sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// lha rnams rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bcing bzhi nad du bcing // rtag tu sems ni btan por bgyi/
23b5(mdo): 'dzub mo dag ni yid bskums nas// snying po dag ni rab tu brkyang // don yod pa'i pad ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag kyang dang snying po gsungs pa dang / pad ma dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang / don thams cad sgrub pa'i gsapa
23b6(mdo): sngags de dag gsungs nas/ de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ oM a mo g+ha hr-id ya/ pad me d+ha ra d+ha ra pad ma d+ha ra/ ma ga man dz+wa la hI ya hUM/ snying po phyag rgya 'din bcings pa yis// pad ma 'chang ba'i don yong
23b7(mdo): snying po'i// grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi myed// thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag/ de ni 'grub par 'gyur te som nyi myed// shind tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzung // shi nad tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// shiri
23b8(mdo): tu 'akrus pas kos gtsang bgo// gtsang ma'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing // sems can kun la bser gyur nas// rtag tu bla ma gus par sgom// rtag tu gi nang tu dang bgyi zhing // pad ma'i phyag la dka' bar bgyi// myur
23b9(mdo): du las grub myur du ni// pad ma 'chang dang sangs rgyas thob// myur du 'jig rten dbang phyug thob// myur du sems can kun phan ldan// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang ba tsam gyis/ khar pad ma'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa bsgyur ras
24a1(mdo): 'dzub mo gyen du sgreng the bo yid tsam bkug la/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo rnams pad ma'i tshul du bzhag la/ the bong yid tsam bkug ste/ gung mo don yod pa'i zhags par bgyi ba ni/ don yod pa zhi ba chen
24a2(mdo): po'i myag/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/ gsang sngags 'di brjod do// au pa gu pa ti be sha d+ha ra sha ta sa ha sra rash+mi pra ti man di ka ya a ka ra sha Ni/ san tse da ni/
24a3(mdo): pU ru b+hu ru/ a mo ga pa sha sid d+he hUM/ phyag rgya 'dis gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nA/ lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bdeg cing / sra
24a4(mdo): yad rang gi gnas su bzung zhing / kasang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ lan bdun du yang bdeg go/ don yod rgyal po bzlas pa ni// baHma ba mchog tu dag pas bgyi// bzlas pa tsam kyi mod la ni// don chem
24a5(mdo): zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub thams cad dgug pa dang // mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa sna chog/ sa dag/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin// mod la grub pa bla/
24a6(mdo): myed dang // mod la thams cad 'gug par 'gyur// lha dang klu de nga gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha myin nam mkha' lding // myi 'am ci de nga lto 'phye che// rigs sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir// thams cad de'i
24a7(mdo): mod la 'du// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dag/ de nyid gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang la phyag bkyi'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa
24a8(mdo): spyan ras gzigs// mchog sbyin gyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur// yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ rang bzhin mod la stond par mdzad// gang dag mnar myed song ba dang // sems can mtshams myed lnga bgyid dang //
24a9(mdo): gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang // gang dag dam chos spong ba dag/ phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug gam// bcings pas mod la sdig pa kun// 'jig 'gyur mod la 'dren pa mthong // phyag rgya bcings pa tsam
24b1(mdo): gyis ni// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam dang // rjes su zlos par bgyid pa dang // rigs sngags 'chang ba mthong ba de// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang ni// mngon tu mthong bar
24b2(mdo): blta bar bya// tshe rabs brgyud par bskal pa ni// brgya dang stong du bsags pa'i// sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa gang // phyag rgya bcings sam mthong tsam gyis// de kun 'byung 'gyur som nyi myed// thal mo lhan cig dam du sbyar
24b3(mdo): te/ mkhas pas pad ma'i tshul du bgyis la/ 'dzub mo nor bur bgyis te gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste/ lag pa skye bor brkyang nas/ spyi bor dbang bskur ba stsol
24b4(mdo): pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// AM ste yad d+ha/ nu ga ta/ a bi[:]shi ne tsa tu/ sar pa tre yad d+ha/ a bi She kAM pad ma ma ni su pad me/ a mo g+he sarba ta tha ka ta a d+hiSh+Thi tai hUM/ 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis/ rags
24b5(mdo): sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bsku/ ra bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/ phyag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po
24b6(mdo): chen por 'gyur ro// rigs sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi rtsi bo gcag pu'i gnas su 'gyur ro// spyi gtsug
24b7(mdo): rdo rje'i pad ma bcing // rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo brkyang // 'dzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi// rang gi gdon gyis khro gnyer bzhin// khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// las kun bsgrub par bgyid pa'i// thams cad 'grub
24b8(mdo): bgyid phyag rgya ste// kun grub dam pa'i gsang sngags pas// 'di dran grub pa kun kyi mchog/ A~M kro d+ha ra dza d+ha ma ha a mo g+ha/ han ha na/ sarba duShA Na hUM/ phyag rgya 'di dran tsam gyis kyang // mthu chen po'i gsang sngakra/
24b9(mdo): kyis// bdug pa kun ni rnam 'jig ste// ri rab kyang ni snyil bar bgyid// phyag rgya bcing ba bgyis pa'is// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// sems can bdug dang bdug pa'i klu// bkyegs dang log 'dren
25a1(mdo): gdug pa ste// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// thams cad dbang du gyur da nas mchis// lha dang myi dang dge sbyong dang // bram ze rgyal rigs gang lags pa// thams
25a2(mdo): cad dbang du gyur da nas ni// mchis par gyur par som nyi myed// rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam bzhag la// mthe bo mnyam du bteg nas ni// gung mo 'as ni gung mo nyid// yid tsam bkug nas bsgreng bar bgyid// 'di ni pad ma/
25a3(mdo): chen po'i// lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ste// grub pa bla na myed pa'i// thams tsA kyi ni dam pa lags// thal mo pad ma'i tshul du sbyar// mthe bong nyid ni brkyang bgyis la// mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni// dkar sha ma chen
25a4(mdo): mo phyag rgya ste// 'di ni kun grub bra na myed// rdo rje'i tshul du thal skya ra dam bcings shing // shes rab can gyis g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la// khro gnyer bzhin ni de bzhin khro ba dang // phyag rgya chen po kun
25a5(mdo): 'dod rab tu sbyin// lag pa gnyis kyis thal sbyar brkyang nas ni// gsang ba de brkyang gung mo bskums nas su// mthe'u chung brkyang / nas lcags sgrog pad ma'i// tshul du snying ka'i gnas su bzhag par
25a6(mdo): bgyi// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/ dkyil 'khor kun gnas lha dag dang // dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad tshogs shing 'du ba dang // kun gyis bsrung bgyid
25a7(mdo): mom nyi byeng // phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni// thal sbyar pad ma'i tshul du bzhin byas te// steng kar bzhag pa'i gnod sbyin po nya mo'i// 'di ni phyag rgya legs par legs par bsgrags// dang por rdo rje'i n+d+ra
25a8(mdo): tshur legs bcings la/ gung mo lhag ma skum zhing the bong bzhag/ pad ma tshul gyi bzhin dran sgrol bdun gyi// grub pa kun kye bu myed phyag rgya 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing nyon mongs kun// rad kun nye bar ni
25a9(mdo): bar som nyi myed// don yod pa'i grub pa bla na myed kyi// cho ga zhi ba mo thams cad rab tu 'grub// lag pa gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje'i tshul du pad ma bcings// 'dzub mo bskums par bgyis nas ni// mthe bong
25b1(mdo): yang ni dgug par bgyi/ 'di ni rta 'grin phyag rgya ste// cho ga zhib mo'i dam pa lags// pad ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar// 'dzub mo 'khrud la kung mo ni// lcags kyu'i tshul du bsgreng bar bgyi// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya
25b2(mdo): 'di// rgya mtsho slong gi kha lta bu// de rde ba pa nyid kyis gsungs// 'di ni mas rnams bgyid pa po// grub pa kun gyi bla na myed// phyag rgya 'di ni 'dub mo mthe bong rnams// grags sgrog lhag ma bskums nas ni// pad
25b3(mdo): ma'i tshul du snying ka'i gnas// su bzhag pa ni 'grin sngon gyi// 'di ni dogs myed lag kun phyag rgya lags// lag gnyis pad ma'i khu tshur te// g.yas g.yon du ni bzhag nas su// kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du bzhag/
25b4(mdo): byams pa'i myi gnyis bgyid pa ni// zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya ste// de bzhin kun gyis myi thub pa'o// the bo mnyam par bsnyam bgyis la// sor mo rtse mo bskum pa dang // 'dzub mo gnyis nas ni pad ma'i tshul// rigs pa'i dbang
25b5(mdo): phyag phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i tshul du 'dzub mo bskum// g.yon pa brkyang ba dbang chen gyi// phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms// lugs sgrog dam du bgyis nas/ di//
25b6(mdo): lag pa gnyis pa brgya nas kyang // snying kar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni rgyun tu gshin rje lags// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// sor mo bsgreng ba'i bor to bkug/ g.yas pa snying kar bzhaganas su
25b7(mdo): mthe bo dang ni mthe'u chung dkug/ 'di ni mu lha'i phyag rgya ste// klu kun 'gug pa mchog lags so// lag pa gnyis ni bsdam bgyis la// sor mo phying ka log tu sbrel// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dang // snying ka'i gnas
25b8(mdo): su bzhag bgyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi// gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyid// lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor yang // 'the bo 'dzub mo bkug bgyis la// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// 'dzub mo khyed tu
25b9(mdo): bsgreng ba ni// 'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad du ni las bsgrub pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa'i// mthe'u chung ni bkug bgyis te// drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis s+ho/
26a1(mdo): lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings pa// blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste// lha myin thams cad 'gums pa'i// khyab 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// g.yas pa byi tse bu rar bgyi// g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du/
26a2(mdo): bgyi// mthe bong mthe chung bskum pa ni// 'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa// 'di ni drag po'i phyag rgyar gsungs// g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas su// 'dzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni// bkur rtan khu tshur banangs
26a3(mdo): nas bzhag/ sor mo rnams na brkyang bar bgyi// drag po rgyun tu blta bgyid pa// de bzhin lha'i sde dpon gyi// gzho nu phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// gyen tu lag pa gnyis bsgreng nas// sor mo gsum naM brkyang bgyis
26a4(mdo): te// mthe bong 'dzub mo bkug pa ni// 'od zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid sor mo gsum// bkug nas sor mo gnyis ni brkyang // skar ma'i tshogs kyis mdzes gyur da pa/
26a5(mdo): 'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// gsang sngags chen po'i phyag/ rgya 'di dag ni// las dang don kun grub pa bsgrub par bgyid// sdig pa thams cad spong zhing nyon mongs kun// nyams par bgyid ning
26a6(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad 'byang // las kun zad par bgyid cing don yod pa'i las sgrub don yod grub pa 'grub par 'gyur// AM pad ma ta re ta ra ya/ pad ma b+hu tse hUM/ AM ma ha pad me she tang ge/ hu ru hu ru swA hA/
26a7(mdo): au b+hi ku Ta pid me ta ra ta ra hUM/ AM pad me paN TA ra ba si ni/ kun Da kun Da swA hA/ AM a mo kA pad ma ba ra de sid d+hu sid d+h+ya tu hUM/ AM sarbad tra gA myi ni/ a pa ga ya/ ro dr-i Ni hUM/ au a mo g+hi Ni ti re ta ra ya/ pa ma
26a8(mdo): b+hu dzai hUM/ AM da ru ta ru la pad me a mo g+ha hUM/ IM ba ta pa mu khe ni krAni ta ya du sh+lan hUM/ AM pad me ni la kan Ne shA ra/ pU ru b+hu ru hUM/ AM so'u mya ba da ne pra si da sha sa ya hUM/ AM pad me sha ri se d+ha ya hUM/ au a mo g+he sha ri hUM/
26a9(mdo): A~M sa ma ri te re ta re hUM/ A~M yag kA di ba ti/ mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM a mo k+She pram mA ra te hUM/ A~M ri shi bi ra te/ a mo kA b+hu dzaM hUM/ AM a mo g+ha ra dza pad ma na b+he sa ra sa ra sa man ta/ pU dze hUM/ rud tra tu ti mo li swA hA/
26b1(mdo): oM shaka ti d+he re/ a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/ sa ha sra ki ra ne hUM/ ru ti swA hA/ oM so ma pra b+he hUM/ de bzhin phyag rgya gsang sngags gsungs pa yang // phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags tha dad bsgrub// gsang sngags 'chang kyis ji skad gsungs
26b2(mdo): pa'i las// rtag tu kun bgyid mdor na thams cad bgyid// gtsang ma s+yad pa gtsang ma dag/ legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// dri zhim dri 'os dpung pa dang // lag pa yan lag byugs nas su// phyag rgya lan ne bcas
26b3(mdo): pa na// gsang sngags lan re bzlas par bgyi// phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang // gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mod la ni// brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'bum// phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa dpyas/
26b4(mdo): pas na// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstan pa dang byind kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis legs par
26b5(mdo): bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod kan sa gcig pur 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig/ pur 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rim par phye ba dam tshig
26b6(mdo): thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'a gyur ro// don yod rigs sngags 'chang grub par 'gyur ro// tshig brtan par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros bag tshal[]chis par 'gyur ro//
26b7(mdo): bre gros thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dam pa spel bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgra dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba dang /
26b8(mdo): gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad 'pham par bgyid par 'gyur ro// rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren dang /
26b9(mdo): lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur da nas
27a1(mdo): mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// tshe ring por 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// skon kyi dri ma dang
27a2(mdo): ser sna dang / phra dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// legs par dran zhing lus shi nad tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzig
27a3(mdo): dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byind par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu tshur khyod 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shig/ ces shi nad tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro//
27a4(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul pa'i phyag rgya'i rtags ni brjod par bgyi/ 'khru gang kho na'i
27a5(mdo): tshad dag gi/ dkyil 'khor lham pa bri bar bgyi/ gang zhig mtho/ nga ba'i mod tsam gyis// dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur// sI/ ga pa kun las grol ba dang // de nyid dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// rgyun
27a6(mdo): tu gang gi cho ga yis// rtag tu go cha bgos par 'gyur// go cha'i go na 'bar ba dang // mdzes pa rtag tu stsol par 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo la gas grub ste// gsang sngags bla myed thams cad grub// phyag rgya'i
27a7(mdo): dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis // gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis gdon kun kyang // 'jig par 'gyur te som nyi myed// gnod pa kun las grol 'gyur te// rang kun las kyang de bzhin no// pa
27a8(mdo): rol dpung ngam rang dpung ngam// myi thub pa'i dgra kun las// rtag tu legs par rgyal bar bgyid// rtag tu gnod las bsrung ba dang // dus kun tu yang 'grub par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang rnams bde bkyi phyir//
27a9(mdo): de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // 'phags pa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang gi// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag/ dgos pa kun gyi rjes mthun par// gang dang gang du bkod pa dag/ de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur
27b1(mdo): pad ma kha bye zhes bgyi ba// pad ma 'dab mas mdzes pa dang // kun nas 'khor ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng // rnam par rtog pa myed par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung // 'di dag thams cad 'bras bu rtsol// rdo rje rtse
27b2(mdo): gsum rdo rje'i mda'// dkyil 'khor pad ma rdo rje dang // pad ma'i 'phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan// pad ma rab gnas pad ma gnyis// rtag tu pad ma legs par bgyid// pad ma'i khu tshur de bzhin du// pad ma'i 'dzub mo pad ma
27b3(mdo): bsgyings// pad ma'i lcags kyu thal mo sbyar// pad ma'i lcags sgrog pad ma'i gzeb// rtag grub pad ma sems dpa' dang // nor bu pad ma rdo rjer gsungs// don yod pad ma de bzhin du// pad ma'i ral gri pad ma'i dril//
27b4(mdo): rtse gsum zhes bgyi rtun shing 'chang // nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug/ de bzhin zhags pa bdun 'dzin dang // chu srin 'dzin dung 'khor lo phyed// byi dza bu ra rtag tu se'u// zla 'dzin da nyi ma 'dzind pa dang // tho ba 'dzi nad dang
27b5(mdo): chems 'dzind dang // me tog phur ma bgrang 'phreng dang // rdo rje rtse lnga/ don yod zhags// don yod grub pa de dka ste// thams cad pa/ da ma'i steng du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri be// gang dang gang
27b6(mdo): du dgod pa ni// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham// 'di dag kyang ni bri bar bgyi// kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bkye// nor bu'i rgyan kyi sa grub par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni// ra ba'am
27b7(mdo): cig par bgyis pa 'am// ci ying rung ba de dag ste// de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni// rtag tu sdig pa thams cad spong // mnar myed gnas su gtog pa dang // mtshams myed pa ni lnga nyid de//
27b8(mdo): thams cad skad cig gcig gis 'byang // sems can dag pa dran bgyid na// phyir myi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// sems dpa' sa bcur rab tu gnas// 'di ni phyir myi ldog pa'i// gnas lags dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni//
27b9(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang mchog sbyin ni// rtag par rgyu nad tu skye bo lag na thogs// gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// rgyun tu mchog sbyin 'jig rten dbang // rtag tu mngon gsum mthong ba'i// de dang
28a1(mdo): mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// gsang sngags sum cu rtsa lnga'i tshig// rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub// de'i dus rnams kun tu yang // ngan 'gror mchi bar myi 'gyur ro// rnam grol dkyil 'khor myur/
28a2(mdo): mthong ba// myur tu sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'od dpag myed kyi sras po'i// thu bor 'gyur bar som nyi myed// 'jig rten 'gon gyi thugs zhal nas// skyes sras rtag tu thu bor 'gyur// 'dren pas 'di ni chos nyid
28a3(mdo): dang // chos las skyes pa lung ston 'gyur// kang ka'i klung gi sa ya bye ba brgya stong dang // mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro//
28a4(mdo): tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi sug par phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur da na/ phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang zhing
28a5(mdo): che ba ma mchis par bsgrags so// de la gsang sngags ni/ au a/ mo kA man dza li mi la tsi lo hUM/ au a sha ya kA Na byi ge te hUM/ au/ a b+ha ya ba ra de ti hUM/ AM sarba ta tha ga ta ya/ a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ d+hi ri d+hi
28a6(mdo): ri hUM/ pad ma hri ya/ mu Shi hUM/ AM bi sa ra bi sa ra/ sarba ma lan ta ra dza ya hUM/ IM sang ku sha/ a mo kA a ka raM sha ya hUM/ AM ka paHya tu ru tu ru hUM/ AM a mo g+ha shang ka li/ mi li mi li hUM/ AM a mo
28a7(mdo): gAtsid dA ma Ni kA ra tu ni tu ru d+hu/ oM a mo g+ha ma Ni/ tsi li tsi lo hUM/ A~M badz+ra tu Ti tsi lo hUM/ oM a mo g+ha hr-i ta ya/ tsa ma tsar shud d+ha skad tra hUM/ oM g+ho na pa ti/ tsi Ti mo To hUM/ oM byi d+ha'ang ka tsin d+ha ya/ shun trun hUM/ au tra
28a8(mdo): ma la pa ri zhud d+he/ bI Ti b+ho To hUM/ AM su ru su ru hUM/ oM ma Ni ma Ni hUM/ AM pu shA pa Ti dzi ya hUM/ AM b+ho ti tsidi ta pa sha/ dA ra d+ha ra hUM/ AM pad ma pA na b+hi shud te hUM/ AM badz+ra ba zhe b+ha ba tu/ mu ru mu ru hUM/ AM tsin ta ma
28a9(mdo): Ni/ pa sha ba ra dwe hU~M/ A~M tsaka kra pA kA sa nir kA ta ka/ dU ru d+hu ru hUM/ au tri ku li pA sha/ bi lo ka sa ta ra ya hUM/ A na kA pa sha ban d+ha ya/ kad d+ha ya d+hu sh+ma dgan pa sha pa ta ya hUM/ IM dza sod bA ba da ra da ra ya hUM/
28b1(mdo): tsan tra bi me le/ b+hi sho d+ha ya/ an d+ha ka ra ra shrI ba re hUM/ au sha bo d+ha ya hUM/ AM AM ba dza ya pu na pa re hUM/ IM pha lod b+ha be tu ri hUM/ au pu Na man Na le dza ya hUM/ IM sa ha sa ra shI kau ri ne hUM/ A~M sarba duSh+pan pra ha ra sha sa ya
28b2(mdo): hUM/ oM ma ni bsho da yA ma la bi ma le/ hUM/ AM pu shA pa ti su g+han d+ha pa re hUM/ A sha ta sa ha sra ku ni tai/ kA na kA Na hUM/ IM badz+rad kle pa su tsi mu Sha/ tsiTi tsi Ti hUM/ au a mo g+ha sa pra ti haT ba sha haste hUM/ oM swarba tra/ a mo/
28b3(mdo): g+ha sid d+h+ya sa d+ha ya hUM/ lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang // de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dag/ lan cig bzlas pa tsam dang ni// phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas kyang // sdig pa thams cad mod la 'joms// myur du sangs rgyas
28b4(mdo): nyid thob 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grub// don yod zhags pa nam grol ba'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya 'di// nor bu rin po che dang / me tog dang / pad ma dang / ril ba/
28b5(mdo): gyi blugs dang / nor bu'i 'phreng ba dang / bgrang 'phreng dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyug to dang / mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / rtseg/ sum pa dang / rtse gsum kha gdeng dang / mtshon ti rgyag dang / rdo rje dang
28b6(mdo): dgra sta dang / rtse gsum pa gnyis dang / nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / ma tshon shu li dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / mtsho na cha dang / be con dang / dbyug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum
28b7(mdo): dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / sbrul dang / ljon shing dang / byi ru dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta yu ba sngon po dang / lag pa dang / gtsug phud dang / nor bu sgron ma dang / 'od dang / 'od
28b8(mdo): zer dang / gtun shing dang / 'phyang mo nyug pa dang / dgra sta dang / snod zlum po dang / bum pa dang / brag dang / ri dang / lhun po dang / sbrul 'khyil ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / ru sbal
28b9(mdo): dang / g.yung rung 'khyil pa dang / rigs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rigs sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rtse gsum dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ral kri dang / gri dang / pad ma'i phreng ba dang / rtse gsum dang / mu
29a1(mdo): sun di dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi dang / mche ba bzhi dang / zlum po dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dung dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / nor bu'i drung dang / pad ma'i dung /
29a2(mdo): dang / u rda dang / gos dang / seng ge'i gdong dang / shang shang de'u dang / ka la bying ka dang / ngang pa dang / gzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang / gding gzhi dang / dkyil 'khor gzhi dang /
29a3(mdo): rtse gsum dang / bum pa gang ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad ma bzhi dang / pad ma gsum dang / rgya mtsho dang / me tog phur ma dang / glegs bam dang / ri dgas kyi g.yang bzhi dang / rdo rje
29a4(mdo): dang / lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rta babs dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / 'khar sil dang / so mangs dang / kha khyer dang / ska rags dang / rtug phud dang / mchod phyir thogs pa dang / phreng
29a5(mdo): ba chen po dang / gru gsum dang / kun nas rdo rje ste/ phyag rgya mtsho/ na cha 'di dag ni 'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin/ rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di// don yod zhags pa'i cho gar dran//
29a6(mdo): ras sam gos sam rtsig pa 'am/ ci yang rlu la 'di bgyid pas dogs myed lags bsal legs 'byor da pas// mtshon bsal kun ka pad mar bzhag/ phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bar bgyi// thams
29a7(mdo): cad srog las byung bas na// don dang las rnams kun stsol cing // phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phrog/ de ni mod la 'bras bu ster// 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun// phyag rgya 'di ni byin kyis brlabs// sangs
29a8(mdo): rgyas kun dang zhag kya'i// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs// de lta bas na mkhas pas su// rtag tu kun nas brtson bcangs na// sangs rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur te// sras kyi thu bor som nyi myed/
29a9(mdo): phyag rgya rim phye dam pa 'chad pa gang // 'jig rten mgon po'i sras kyi thu bor 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba'i// rnam par grol ba'i snying po bla na myed// phyag rgya dang ni gsang sngags dam pa dag/
29b1(mdo): 'di 'chang ba la myur tu 'grub par 'gyur// de nas don yod pa las thams cad dang // rjes su mthun pa'i zhags pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste/ de nyid bsgrub pas ji lta bu'i// cho ga'i cho ka bsgrub pa bzhin// so so so sor 'tshal ba
29b2(mdo): de dag kun ni rtogs par bgyi// de nyid bsgrub pas ji lta bu'i// mtshan nyid gzugs ni ji bzhin pa// de nyid bsgrub pas zhags pa ni// skud pa lnga las grub 'gyur te// gsang sngags 'dzind pas mod la ni// 'grub par 'gyur/
29b3(mdo): te som nyi myed// ras skud pad ma'i skud pa dang // arka kha ce dang dag gi// skud pa shun pa'i skud pa ste// skud pa 'di dag bkal nas su// da kho na nyid kyi cho ga dang // cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas zhags pa ras skud kyi rgyu las blangs te/
29b4(mdo): tshad bzhin bkal nas/ rtag tu spyang ba bgyis pa/ legs par bkrus pa gos gtsang ma can// tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
29b5(mdo): mdor na/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o// de/ nas shi nad tu mnyam par bzhag pas// brgyad sgril du bkal te/ don so rgyas po'i thil mo sbyar da pas/ pad ma kha bye ba thogs pa/ rag pa'i
29b6(mdo): thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lus phyed pa/ sor bzhi'i ched bgyi'o// bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa ka sum du bgyis te/ nges pa'i gzugs dang / khro gnyer gyi bzhini dang /
29b7(mdo): khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/ rdul lam gser las bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshad 'khru bcu drug pa/ zhags pa'i thor to gcig rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / skyu ru ra lhan cig sbrel ba gdags par bgyi'o// de nas
29b8(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga 'am/ ches brgyad la legs par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ zhag cig mchis te/ dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
29b9(mdo): bgyis te/ tshig gzhan myi smra bar zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas/ de'i steng du zhags pa bzhag par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhag/
30a1(mdo): pa'i phyag rgya dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ba dan bzang po la stsogs pas mchod par bgyi'o// a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du
30a2(mdo): ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mar me yang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan
30a3(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la yang ci 'byor da pas mchod par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis/ zhags pa de'i mdun du dkyil mo krung bcas te/ ma 'khrugs pas gdugs rtse'i bar du mchod pa
30a4(mdo): bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod re re bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor zhing / stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba'i bar du gzugs re re mchis par bgyi ste/ rdo tsa thog pas gdugs rtse'i bar du
30a5(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchod par bgyi'o// kha zas ngan pa spang bar bgyi'o// lhag ma dang / spags pa spang bar bgyi'o// gos ga/ datsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar
30a6(mdo): bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i 'grub na ni/ me'i kha dog tu/ 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa grub na ni/ kha dog sna tshog bar 'a bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i
30a7(mdo): lus de yang 'bar bar 'gyur/ sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zhags pa 'di 'grub kyis khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems bla
30a8(mdo): na myed pa zhug shig/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa phu'i khongs su rtogs pa/ yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/ 'or te 'jig rten pa sgrub na ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
30a9(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams shing smon pa bzhin lag pas 'phangs nas/ gsang sngags kyis thams cad sgrub par bgyid de/ thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// phyogs kang dang gang du
30b1(mdo): 'phags pa de logs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi ste/ mod la bsam pa thams cad 'aklub par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams myed pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ mnar myed par mi che ba zhi ka na 'ang/
30b2(mdo): de'i legs par grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par myi bgyi'o// khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
30b3(mdo): myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchi bar 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po
30b4(mdo): dad / btsun mo'i'ikhor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro// 'jig rte na thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro// gang gi don tu zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don de 'grub par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhags
30b5(mdo): pa la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'a phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgyegs dang / lo// ga 'dren dang / gdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas
30b6(mdo): baninges par 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshal na lo 'am/ lo brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// nam byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed nas/ de'i tshe don yod pa'i
30b7(mdo): zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ phyir bkrol bar 'gyur ro// dpung kyi nang du 'phangs na/ dpung rnams zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su 'phangs nas/ mtshon dang /
30b8(mdo): go mtshon dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / mu sun di dang / 'khor lo dang / thag mdung dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha dang / ya lad thams cad zhags pas bcings
30b9(mdo): par 'gyur ro// chab dang / yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa la gdugs cag bzhin 'byor da pas mchod par bgyi'o// gang gi don tu bsams pa de dag
31a1(mdo): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sad pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 'on te myi snang ba bsgrub par 'tshal na/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te/ g.yas pa
31a2(mdo): dang / g.yon pas gong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pas bzung nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mya gda' bar 'gyur/ brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas
31a3(mdo): brjod bgyis na/ nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag 'bum gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/
31a4(mdo): lo bye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro/ stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol kyi zild kyis mya non par 'gyur ro/ char pa 'tshal pas mchod pa bgyis na/ dza tsam gsol ba btab
31a5(mdo): pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches pa dgag pa/ 'i slad du mchod pa bgyis na/ char dgag par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes
31a6(mdo): cad dang / myi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas/ rigs sngags 'chang legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gtsang mas gos gats+tshangam bgos la/ lag par zhags pa blangs te/ gnas mthon
31a7(mdo): por 'dzegs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa bcings te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas/ zhags pa 'phangs na/ de dag thams cad dran pa nam
31a8(mdo): gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mya mdza' ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang /
31a9(mdo): gnod pa thams cad dang / myi ngas chen po dang / mu ge'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ha chang char che ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba myi bzad pa'i
31b1(mdo): 'jigs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya khor yug du mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/ don yod rgyal po
31b2(mdo): mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod kyi/ gsol ba yang bgyi'o// mchod pa dang / gsol ba bgyis pa tsamo gyi mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par myi bgyi'o//
31b3(mdo): cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ las bgyis pa rnams kyis cho ga de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// des na skad cig de'i mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba
31b4(mdo): dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la mchog du brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// dkon mchog gsum la gus par
31b5(mdo): bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang / bla mar yid la bsgom par bgyi'o// myi yang ba'i spyod pa gtsang / bar bgyi zhing / yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du bsgom par bgyi'o//
31b6(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga bsgrub pa/ yid pa zhin gyi nor bu byang chub 'gug par bgyid pa'o// de nas zhag sa pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga bsgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/ rigs sngags
31b7(mdo): 'chang de kho na nyid sgrub pas phug tu 'jug pa'i bsgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog/ phug tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / myi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / lha'i
31b8(mdo): gnas su 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / 'og myin gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / zang la rgyu ba dang / nyi ma'i
31b9(mdo): gnas su 'jug pa dang / zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i gnas rgyu skar kyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / ril rgyu ba dang / 'bab chu chen por 'jug pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig
32a1(mdo): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa tshegs chu ru dang / bsul pa chu dus 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par myi bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'tshab
32a2(mdo): gnang mar gyur da pas/ legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ rtsang ma de 'o na nyid la gus pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// byams pa'i
32a3(mdo): sems la mnyam par bzhag nas/ snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid kyis tshes bcu gsum nas/ brtsams te zla ba nya'i bar du gsal ba/ shi nad tu bkra shis pa la dus gsum du 'byor da pa'i rna ba rnams kyis mchod par
32a4(mdo): bgyis la/ rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i// dus gsuM du rgyun tu bzlas brjod bgyi// nyin bar dus su lan gsum ste/ mtshan mo'i dus su lan gsum bgyi// 'khor lo zhags pa bla myed ni// skud
32a5(mdo): pa gsum las bsgrub bgyi ste/ ras skud pad ma'i skud pa dang // a/ rka'i skud pa gsum gyur da tu// de ni legs par mtshan bzhin du// 'khru ni sum bcu rtsa drug bgyi// 'khor lo rnam pa
32a6(mdo): gsum las bgyi// rgyar ni sor bzhi'i ched lags te// snying por bces shing mu khyud bcas// kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dag/ kaser dang dngul dang zangs las bgyis// chos bstan legs
32a7(mdo): par brgyan pa'o// stan bzang po'i sten la bzhag par bgyi// spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi/ sil ma bkram nas bum pa gang // de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun tu chos kyi
32a8(mdo): stan bshams pa bgyis pa'i steng du/ 'khor lo'i zhigs pa bzhag ste/ mchod pa bgyis la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ches bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nyon
32a9(mdo): zhag gcig mchis par gyur da pas tshig gzhan myi smra bar/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi zhing / bdug pa rnam pa gsum po/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul
32b1(mdo): rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun na chos kyi stan mchis pa la/ mngon tu phyogs te mchis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ yungs kar re re bzlas brjod bgyis
32b2(mdo): pas/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar zhing / 'khor lo nam mkha' la mchis nas/ 'bar zhing ldang bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang kyi lus kyi stod dang
32b3(mdo): spyi 'o nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ri mo'i gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i'akhor lo'o zhags pa'i cho ga chen po 'di
32b4(mdo): ltar bsgrub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis la/ don yod khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis zhags pa
32b5(mdo): blang par bgyi'o// lag pa g.yon pa 'khor lo phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing ba/ ra bgyi zhing / g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'o/ tshul la brten nas blangs te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
32b6(mdo): brjod nas phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun du bskor bar bgyi'o/
32b7(mdo): de phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyi mod la rigs sngags 'chang / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i dbang bsgyur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dam pa chen po grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong gi
32b8(mdo): gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rkang pa spyi bo blangs nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur te/ rags sngags 'chang gi rkang pa spyi bo blangs nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur te/ rigs
32b9(mdo): sngags 'chang ci bka' stsal pa de bgyi'o// zhes ci bsgo ba'i don de dang de thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran gyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du las bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gang gi gnas
33a1(mdo): su 'jug par 'tshal bas 'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par 'gyur bas zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i lag pas brang bar bgyi'o// phug gi sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o//
33a2(mdo): don yod pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o// zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mod la gnas kyi phug sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / phug dang /
33a3(mdo): 'bab chu chen po dang / rtseg ma dang / 'bab chu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lam myi bde ba thams cad bsal ba dang / bcom pa dang / bshig par 'gyur ro// gtan pa dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul
33a4(mdo): 'khor dang / lcags sgrog rnams dum bu dum bur chad cing gyes para'agyur/ nyams par 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyur ro// shi nad tu dag dri ma myed pa/ shi nang tu rgya che ba'i gzhal myed khang 'byor dpa
33a5(mdo): rnam par 'phrul pa dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che chog/ sa kyi bkra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal myed 'a
33a6(mdo): mthong bar 'gyur ro// me tog sna tshogs kyi ra ba shi nad tu dri zhim po 'i gzhal myed khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngag sa 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang / 'khor lo phyag rgya'i tshul
33a7(mdo): mngon tu bgyis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam kho nas/ gnas mchog de yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul ba dang / g.yo ba dang /
33a8(mdo): ldeg pa dang / 'ur 'ur chem chem ste/ lha'i 'od gzer gyi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas don yod pa'i rnam par dag pa dri myed pa zhes bgyi ba'i sman
33a9(mdo): bud myed kyi gzugs lha'i rgyan kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i gos kyi rgyan kyis klubs pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ lha'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba ba tsi pu ra thogs pa mchi bar 'gyur ro// sman bud
33b1(mdo): myed kyi gzugs 'chang de mthong ba tsam kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam pas/ gzi brjid thams cad dang / stobs thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis don sod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhikra/
33b2(mdo): pa ma dun tu bcang bar bgyi ste/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ka'i 'jid nyams par 'gyur/ mthu chung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bud myed de rgod pa dang / oM zhes bgyi bas gnan par
33b3(mdo): bgyi'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ khas phub tu 'gyel nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chab de la reg par myi bgyi'o// don song rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ de nas myig tshugs kyis blta bar
33b4(mdo): bgyid na/ rigs sngags 'chang gis zhags pas bzhu bar ba gyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i che ba 'byung ste/ blang bar bgyi'o/ byug par bgyi'o// kun tu byugs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la/ mchi
33b5(mdo): bar 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung gis phung po nas 'dzeg par 'gyu/ ra ro// myag la byugs na phyogs bcur thams cad du ga/ togs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
33b6(mdo): kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhi la myed khang dang / gnas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / gang dag bzhugs shing bzhes la/ 'tsho ba dag ji ltar lag 'thil na mchis
33b7(mdo): de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gang dag 'das pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa dang / gang dag da ltar byung ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / gang dag ring srel
33b8(mdo): snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la kun nas byugs te/ des byugs pa tsam gyis
33b9(mdo): pags pa'i mdog lho'i gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro// ska sngo la cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// myig lha'i ud pa la sngon po mdog 'dra bar 'gyur ro// tshe lha la biskal pa brgya stong du 'gyur ro// rigs sngags
34a1(mdo): 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo brgya bzhi bcu dang / myi 'am tsaM'i bu mo dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi bu mo gang ga'i klung gi byes
34a2(mdo): brgya stong phrag 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang / yid la brnags pa tsam gyis/ lha'i zas kyi mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i btung ba
34a3(mdo): chen po bdud rtsi'i ro bro bo dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying por thug gi bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong mdun nas rgyug par bgyid do// ngag thams cad dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren
34a4(mdo): thams cad bcom pa dang / nyams pa dang / gtubs pa dang / shags pa dang / 'tshal ba dang / gyes pa dang / phye mar bgyis par 'gyur ro// yang na sman gyi bud myed de'i ske kun bton te/ ska rags
34a5(mdo): su bgyis nas bcing bar bgyi'o// gang tu bcings pa de yang rin// po che sna bdun tu 'gyur ro// gang tu zhugs pa thams cad du myi sna// nga bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad gnas 'cha' bar 'gyur ro//
34a6(mdo): klu thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / myi 'am ci thams cad dang / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'khor de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du de'i phyi bzhin du
34a7(mdo): rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal zhing / slar yang ldog par 'tshal na/ sman gyi bud myed de dang gtam myi bgyi reg par myi bgyi bar lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas
34a8(mdo): gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas gnas thams cad na gnas pa'i bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad phyir byung nas mdun na sdod par 'gyur te/ kha cig gi lag na ni bum gang ba'o//
34a9(mdo): kha cig ni lag pa na ni gdugs so// kha cig ni lha'i gos thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i nor bu rin po che thogs so// kha cig ni dri dag go/ kha cig ni me tog dag go/ kha cig ni 'phreng ba dag go/ kha cig ni rgyan dang
34b1(mdo): swa ba sbub sna tshogs thogs so// kha cig mi byug pa dag go// kha cig ni dro'o phye ma dag go/ kha cig ni spros chu rin po che sna bdun gyi sdod bkang ba dag ko/ kha cig ni lha'i me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ pad ma dang / ku mu
34b2(mdo): da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man 'ju ka dang / man d+hu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / a ti mu ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang /
34b3(mdo): ka da pa dang / sna ma dang / su ti dang / klu'i me tog dang / ko da dang / g+han d+ha bar shi ka'i me tog dag thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i bdug pa tsan dAn kor shig dang / sbrul gyi snying po'i bdug pa dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ska dang
34b4(mdo): ta ma la'i lo ma'i bdug pa thogs so// kha cig gi lag pa ma ni ma byabasil ya ba thogs so// kha cig gi lag pa na ni ral gri'o// kha cig/ ki la ka pa na ni me dung zung ngo / kha cig gi lag pa na ni rdo rje dang / dgra
34b5(mdo): sta dang / mnga' bo che dang / mdung dang / gtun shing dang / mdung / rtse gsum pa dang / gzong kha gnyis pa dag go// kha cig ni ko cha dang / ma ya da bgos nas bsrung ba'i phyir kun nas 'du zhing ma
34b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// kha cig ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod dang / ser gyi sdod dang / rdul gyi snod dag thogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogasakyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / bkang nas
34b7(mdo): thogs te de dag thams cad rigs sngags 'chang la 'bul bar bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang gis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas yid la bgyis pas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang
34b8(mdo): phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang yid la bgyi'o// mchog tu rtse ba yid la bgyis pas tshig gzhan gyi smra bar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi zhing / lam drang po nas 'dug par bgyi ste/ seng ge'i khri la mngon tu mchis nas/
34b9(mdo): don yod 'khor lo zhags pa thog mar seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag par bgyi'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po bzhi pa
35a1(mdo): de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang rang nyid mchis nas/ steng du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bgyi zhing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa la yang phyag bgyi'o/
35a2(mdo): des na ngag thams cad 'pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro// gal te 'og tu phyag bgyis nas 'khor los rigs sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo bcad par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang mchis ma thag tu gnas/ rnam
35a3(mdo): pa drug tu g.yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rol mo'i che s+yad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'bud par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang gzhal myed pang chen po
35a4(mdo): nas/ dbu rgyan dang / cod pan gyis rigs sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do// dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi char dang /
35a5(mdo): gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi me tog dang / rdul gyi/ me tog dang / lha'i me tog bkra ba sna tshogs kyi char lha'i rgyan gyi/ char 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu mo rin po che sna bdun
35a6(mdo): kyi snod du bdud rtsi'i bcud 'tshal te mchis nas 'bul bar bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang gis blangs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis reg
35a7(mdo): par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lha'i lus rnam par dag pa thob nas/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro// skra lhag par sngo ba dang / myig ud pa la sngon po ltar lha'i myig
35a8(mdo): yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshe'i tshad bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du 'gyur ro// gal te phyir ldog par 'tshal na/ de'i bcud kyis len mchog las ci tsam 'tshal ba blangs te/ lha'i cha ba tsan dan gyi dra dang ldan pa'i/
35a9(mdo): nang du zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur zhing / ci ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong ba ni/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso bo gcig pur
35b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// ci ltar 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rigs sngags 'chang 'di yang mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'das
35b2(mdo): reg na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i ge ser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// rtsig pa 'am/ ri 'am/ ka ba 'am/ ljon shing ngam/ snod dam/ bum pa 'am/ rdza bo 'am/ gos sam/ bong pa la reg na/ de dag thos
35b3(mdo): cad 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i ge ser yongs su dag par 'gyur ba nas dgos pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang klu mo 'am/ lha mo 'am/ myi 'am ci mo chil na/ rigs sngags 'chang de gtsang ma gos
35b4(mdo): gtsang ma bgos nas legs par khrus bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi'am/ bco lnga la 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis nas/ nyan zhag cig
35b5(mdo): gnas par bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi/ stan legs par brgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du bzhag par bya/ gyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste/ de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan
35b6(mdo): myi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas bzlas parjod bgyis pa zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang zhags pa de yang sbrul bzhin du yongs su 'khyi
35b7(mdo): la 'khor lo ni/ gdengs ka'i tshul du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ myi 'am ci gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ spra mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'a
35b8(mdo): du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te/ gnas kyi nang du zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs ma thag kho nar slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ ci lta bu'i don yad la bsams pa'i don de zhags pa
35b9(mdo): bcings nas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i nor ram/ dbyig gam/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bye du r+ya 'am/ shang ka shi la 'byu
36a1(mdo): byi ru 'am/ sa le snyam 'am/ dul lam/ gos sam/ chas sam/ rgyan nam/ gzhan yang gnas myed khang cis bu 'byod da pa can dag dodan tu gnye na nags pa 'phang bar bgyiste/ dethams cad 'dren
36a2(mdo): par bgyid do// gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de dang der ji ltar yid la bsams pa de nyid shi nad tu gsal bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dngos po gzhan du myi 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/
36a3(mdo): rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ rje'u rigs kyis ci dang ci bsams pa 'grub par bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ bud myed dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i myong nas brjod de zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la
36a4(mdo): rdzan pa kha sa la cing ba nas 'dred par 'gyur ro// tha na yi dag sa dang bya dang seng ge dang / b+hag dang gra po che dang / ma ge/ yang 'dren par bgyid do// gang gi phyi bdas brjod de g.yul 'gyid pa 'i na bu 'phangs nas/ de ya ba zhag sa las bcings nas mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du thos cad 'grub par bgyid do// zla la dang/ nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na/ zla ba dang
36a5(mdo): nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ zla ba dang / nyi ma'i mngon gsum du zhags pa 'phangs nas slar yang drang bar bgyis/ zla ba dang / nyi ma zhags
36a6(mdo): pas bcings nas drangs par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las babs nas rags sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyid do// 'on te zla ba dang / nyi ma'i
36a7(mdo): gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas blangs te/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pa dang / rigs sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur nas/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i stan la ci srid du 'argal
36a8(mdo): bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing / slar bde ba dang / ma smad pa dang / ma smas pa dang / legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro// nags khung du 'jug par 'tshal na/ cang ma legs par zhus bgyis pas/ gos gnang
36a9(mdo): ma bgo bar bgyi zhing / nags khung gi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal myed khang gi klu thams cad
36b1(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs zhig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis
36b2(mdo): don yong pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'azlas te/ lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o// zhugs pa tsam kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / dbus kyi nags kyi mtha' na rin
36b3(mdo): po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha lachi ba dang / rnyog pa ma mchis pa/ shind tu gsal ba/ lha'i tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa/ hacang myi grang / hacang myi dro ba reg na bde ba/ ro dang ldan pa bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te/ 'di ltar don yod
36b4(mdo): rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzing gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mo da la bud myed rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo lus phyed phyung nas/
36b5(mdo): lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan cing / rin po/ che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang ba thogs te/ rigs sngags 'chang la/ dbul zhing skye bo smad de 'dzem pa dang / bcas pas rigs sngags
36b6(mdo): 'chang la smras pa/ rje btsun rigs sngags 'chang khyod ma bzhes pa ra gnas su zhugs shig/ rigs sngags 'chang gi grub pa'i tshig ka sum brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten pha rol kyi don dang / rigs
36b7(mdo): sngags 'chang nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub ste/ bdag nyid kyis ma dang sring mo dang / mngag gzhug ma zhes gar bde bar brjod la/ de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste/ sring mo kho bo la 'jig
36b8(mdo): rten pha rol kyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o// de yang rigs sngags 'chang khyod rang gi gnas su snoms te zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug
36b9(mdo): par bgyi zhing / dod yod pa'i rgyal po'i stong po bzlas so// de nas gnas chen po mchog rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal myed khang lnga'i dril bu er ka'i dra ba dang / gser dang / gos dpyangs pa dang / dar gyi chud 'phyangs dbyangs
36'a1(mdo): gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te/ rigs sngags 'chang 'jig rten pha rol kyi don tu nor bu rin po che chen po bzhes shig ces 'bul bar bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang
36'a2(mdo): gis stan bshams pa'i steng du zhags pa legs par yongs su bskyil te stan tu bting la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de zhags pa'i steng du bzhag cing / me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po
36'a3(mdo): bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas pa tsam gyi mdo la/ zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che chen po de las yang 'o ma'i che ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i
36'a4(mdo): cha ba de las blangs te/ sbyor bcu lan bdun du rig par bgyi'o// 'o// ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhi nga yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// don yod snang ba nor bu gzhal
36'a5(mdo): myed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas/ sa bcu la gnas te phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na/ myed pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan
36'a6(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin da sgyu ma lta bus rnam par 'phrul ba thob par 'gyur zhing / shi nad tu yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang ba zhen gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba/ rigs sngags
36'a7(mdo): 'chang gi mdun tu mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa'i skye bor bzhag ste/ rang gi rigs sngags 'chang gi bu thu bor khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo zhes dbugs 'byin dpar
36'a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ 'on te sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs/
36'a9(mdo): khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid thob ste/ grol ba'i lam zhes bya bar bsgrubs// 'on te rigs sngags 'chang nyid don tu gnyer na/ de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol par 'gyur te/ blangs la bu mo de nyid kyi skye bor bzhag
36'b1(mdo): nas/ A~M zhes bgyis pas gnan par bgyi'o// AM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas/ phyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la bu mo de'i myig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis
36'b2(mdo): blangs te nye reg bgyi'o// nye reg bgyis btsas kyi yod la rigs sngags 'chang gis 'khor lo sbyar bar 'gyur ro// sna cung zad mam 'khyil cing lag pa na 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs te/ nam mkha' sa mchis par 'gyur
36'b3(mdo): sgra nung zad tsam la khyal cang lag pa na 'khal lel zhags pa zags te/ nam mkha' la mchis pa 'gyur la// rigs sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo drug khri nyis stong
36'b4(mdo): du 'gyur zhing / skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// 'on te/ gsang sngags 'chang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga slong na de'i tshe dri lta bur 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang gis bdag gi sgra 'di sngam
36'b5(mdo): shig/ gcig/ de'i tshe bud myed des sgra'i ral pa bdon nas/ rig/ sa sngags 'chang la dbul pan/ sgra thams cad blangs te/ dum bu gsum du bkum nas/ srad pu nyi gu rtsa gcig bkal te/
36'b6(mdo): la btags pas ni/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du myig 'bru la stond par 'gyur/ 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad nad par 'gyur ro// bden pa ci ltar 'tshal bzhin stond par 'gyu
36'b7(mdo): mgul du btags pa ni/ myi gda' bar gyur nas/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur das/ mchis par 'gyur ro//
36'b8(mdo): dpral ba la btags pas ni/ skra dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ glang po che bcu'i mthu stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ phas kyi dgra bo dang /
36'b9(mdo): mdza' ba dang / gdug pa thams cad kyis myi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro//
37a1(mdo): lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni/ gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing / bdag gi nor bur 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sko la thal mos
37a2(mdo): lan gsum brdabs na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / bud myed pa dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i deng bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur
37a3(mdo): nas mchis par 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa bya dang / gcan zan dang / ri dgas dang / gdug pa dang / gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par
37a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// baR+Ya g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ tshal lam/ gser rama?/ ri 'or ram/ phug gam/ dgon pa 'am/ bsti gnas gang du zhugs te/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la/ nor thams cad dang
37a5(mdo): sman thams cad dang / lha thams cad rang gi gzugs su mngon pa/ sum na mchis par 'gyur ro// byin pa g.yas pa dang / rkang / pa la btags pas ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang 'gyur
37a6(mdo): na/ chu klung chen po'i cheb kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta spros kyang ci 'tshal// byin pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni/ nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas/ dub pa ma mchis par slar ma
37a7(mdo): ldog par 'gyur ro// brla g.yon pa la btags nas/ dur khrod chen por zhugs nas/ dur khrod thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad dbang du gyurd nas mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags
37a8(mdo): 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na/ rigs sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pas bum pa gang bzung zhing / lag pa g.yas pas bud myed de bzung nas gnas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// gnas mchog de'i
37a9(mdo): dbus na/ rdzing me tog gi chal par bkram pa bgyis te/ rdzing der gnyis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o// bkrus shing reg pa tsam kho nas 'khor rigs sngags 'chang zhags pa dang / 'khor los sgyur
37b1(mdo): ba'i rigs sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis yongs su bskord cing / che bskas pa khrir 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// nags kyi gnas kyi
37b2(mdo): gzhal myed khang bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don tu gnyer na ni/ bu cig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur/ 'bras dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / chas dang / nor
37b3(mdo): bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / rdul yongs su bsgrub par bgyid do// sring mo zhes bgyi bas ni dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar 'gyur zhing / yan lag spong bar bgyid do// nyi ma re re zhing
37b4(mdo): rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur/ lha'i gzhal myed khang 'byor da pa stobs par bgyid/ lha'i khyim dang / gzhal myed khang stobs par bgyid do// mngag gzhug ma
37b5(mdo): zhes bgyi bas ni/ gang dang gang du ma ngags pa de dang der mchis pa/ ra 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gno da sbyin gyi gnas sam/ srin po'i gnas sam/ 'byung po'i
37b6(mdo): gnas samagazhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i bsgrub pa rnam pa sna tshog sa yid la bsams pa bzhin du bgyid do// nags bsgrub pa'i cho ga/ 'o// / de nas rigs sngags 'chang thang la
37b7(mdo): rgyu bar 'tshal na/ gtsang mas khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gnas dben pa'i gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bris la/ dri sna tshogs kyis byug/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma
37b8(mdo): bshams lag ngas ka ru'i bdug pa sregs te/ nub gsum du mchis nas/ 'khor lo zhags pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod rgyal ba nyi'i zlas brjod bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
37b9(mdo): nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdud 'bras par bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na skyes pa dag po chen po tshul gyi sdug pa/ mche btsigs pa sna gyen du 'greng ba/ mgo 'bar ba/ rgyag
38a1(mdo): dmar ba/ mchu dang lce dmar ba/ sen mo dmar ba/ ska dmar baHskra sngo ba/ dpung pa ma khrang zhing brtan pa/ gsus 'phyangs so// mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa/ sbrul ltar lce
38a2(mdo): sbyar ba/ stag gi sham thabs bgos pa lag pa na dgra sta dang dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam byung nas phyogs bcur blta bar bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis skrag par myi bgyi ste/ brtan par gyis
38a3(mdo): la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas/ 'khor lo'i zhags pas 'phangs te/ mgo bo bcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o// byugs pa tsam gyi mod la bdag
38a4(mdo): nyid kyi lus myi chod pa dang / myi shigs pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// myig gnyis phyung la/ rang gi myig phyis nas/ myig la bskus na/ lha'i myig du 'gyur ro// rkang brus te byugs na/ tshe bskal
38a5(mdo): ba bcur 'gyur zhing / zos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtshor 'gyur/ ba/ skal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyu/ ra ro// snying phyung ste 'tshal na nam mkha' la mchi'o// khrag
38a6(mdo): gas snying kar thig le bgyis na/ myi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lce bcad na ral grir gyur da nas/ dgra thams cad rlag par bgyid do// gal te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgyan
38a7(mdo): brgyad zhags pa dang / 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sa la 'ardabs par bgyi ste/ lan gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang / de'i 'og tu zang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyuraro/
38a8(mdo): ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par bgyi ste/ zhugs nas slar mchi zhing dgos pa gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang / thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad la dbang du gyur pa nas/ gnas par 'gyur ro// 'on te
38a9(mdo): nam mkha' la mchi 'tshal na/ gyen du bltas na/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs mar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ ma stong rgya rgyad gro te// stong sa brgyad bzlas na/ bdag nyid la byugs te lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' la
38b1(mdo): mami zer 'gyur zhing / nam ma'a' ko 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na/ lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lnga'i mgul pa nas bcings par bgyi zhing / don yod rgyal po'i snying po san stong
38b2(mdo): brgyad bzlas nas/ lha bcings pa gang lags pa de'i myong nas brjod na/ sA de babs nas rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rigs sngags
38b3(mdo): 'chang ci zhig gi don tu gnyer ba de snoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gis lha'i gnas su 'gro'o zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal te gzhan bsam pa zhig sa 9/ mchog thams cad stsol par bgyid do/
38b4(mdo): de nas lha'i gnas nas mchi ba na/ lha'i gnas lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis laka pa na thogs te/ nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// ci srid 'tshal ba lha'i gzhal myed khang chen por long spyod par 'gyur ro// 'on te
38b5(mdo): myi 'tshal na lha'i gnas nas slar yang babs par 'gyur ro// kan na ci ltar rang gi blo gros dang / yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa tha/ mas cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad du grub par 'gyur te/
38b6(mdo): de la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par myi bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhe gas pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang pad ma 'i zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal bas/ rigs sngags 'chang de rtsad ma
38b7(mdo): legs par bkrus te/ gos gtsang sa bgo bar bgyi'o// nub gsum mchis sam/ nub lnga mchis sam/ nub cig mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ ras kyi sku
38b8(mdo): bAkram/ pad ma'i skud pa bye du n+ya'i kha dog lta bur tshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bkyi zhing / khru nyi ku rtsa gcig par bkal te/ de la yang pad ma bgyis te/ rin po che sna gsum gyi 'dab ma 'bye ba siragazhi pa'i tshad kyi pad ma
38b9(mdo): kyi 'dab ma dang / dbus kyi 'dab ma dang / bye du rgya'am/ oM ni dra ni la 'am/ ri po che ka rka ti ka las bgyi zhing / mu tig gis bskor bar bgyis te/ de nas zhag sa gdags par bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor te/
39a1(mdo): gcig la pad ma'i phyag rgyas gdags par bgyi'o// de nas legs par brgyan pa'i chos bstan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o// ba'i lce bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri'i pad ma bsam
39a2(mdo): bar bgyi zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyi gdan bshams pa la bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog sil ma bkram zhing / a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mchod yon
39a3(mdo): gyi snod kyang bzhag par bgyi'o// pad ma'i zhags pa de yang chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag par bgyi'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rigs sngags 'chang gis dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ don yod
39a4(mdo): zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te/ bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas de'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs
39a5(mdo): dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// zhags pa de la yang mchod pa bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ do// na yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas
39a6(mdo): khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin mtshan gsum du bzla sa brjod dang mchod pa bgyi'o// de nas pad ma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing / kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so/
39a7(mdo): legs so zhes bgyi ba'i cho ga 'byin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i dkyil mo krung gis
39a8(mdo): mtsha se nas/ myog myi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzum pas snying rje chen po yid la byed pa bsgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du bltas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum
39a9(mdo): bzlas par bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun tu mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas/ legs so zhes
39b1(mdo): bgyi ba rtsol bar 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang ba'i bu snying las skyes pa'i thu bo/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod pa'i mchog byas
39b2(mdo): pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi mchog dang grub pa'i mchog ste/ khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i snying po grub cing / khyod kyis pad ma'o zhags pa'i chen po grub kyis/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog khyer cig/ khyod kyis yid kyi
39b3(mdo): banag pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni grol/ khyod skyo ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mya bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las ni thar da/ khyod dmyal ba chen po myi bzad pa
39b4(mdo): bcu drug las ni yongs su grol/ 'jigs pa chen po myi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni yongs su thar da/ 'di nas phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas/ sdug bsngal myi bzad pa las shi 'phos te/ rigs sngags
39b5(mdo): 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams pa de bcan du pad ma las zhus te skye bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyi gang ga'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i
39b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa'i tha sod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni sden/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni byas/ khyod rigs sngags 'chang chen
39b7(mdo): por ni lung bstan/ dmyal ba dang / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa myi bzad pa thams cad las ni grol gyis/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog khyer cig/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin
39b8(mdo): de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kis pad ma'i zhags pa'i de blangs te gnas te/ gnas gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// nam dgos pa de'i tshe zhags pa blang bar bgyi
39b9(mdo): ste/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// pad ma na 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
40a1(mdo): nas sems can nam/ lha gang gi mying nas brjod de/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun na mchis nas/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad rtsold par 'gyur ro// de nas
40a2(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang byang chub tu lung bstan pa don tu gnyer bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang rtsa mas legs par zhus bgyi ste/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag cig mchis par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
40a3(mdo): 'das shag kya thub pa la mchod pa chen por bgyis nas/ pad mA zhags pa'i de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to ya cig gis ni rang gi mgul du btags la/ don yod rgyal
40a4(mdo): po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun tu bzhugs nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gi/ skye
40a5(mdo): bor bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ lung stond par mdza/ da yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par/ 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang sdig pa tshe rabs stong du bstsags pa thams cad
40a6(mdo): gtugs par 'gyur ro// lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur da na sa/ lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing phra dog dang ser sna spangs par 'gyur ro// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i
40a7(mdo): mngal du gnas nas/ lha dang myi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// mchod par 'os pa dang / bla ma'i gnas su yang 'gyur ro// nad rnams dang bral bar
40a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ legs pa'i lam stond par mdzad par yang
40a9(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun tu mchis nas/ dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing / lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid do// de bde bas shi nad tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas lus 'do
40b1(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// bor ba tsam gyi mod la bskal pa mnyam pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe' byad kyis smras pa'i lus pad ma las rdzus te skye bar
40b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag
40b3(mdo): rdzogs par g.yar thon du bgyis nas/ sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur da pas phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang / gnas
40b4(mdo): mchog dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thug ka bar du mchi bar 'gyur/ ro/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ mtho
40b5(mdo): ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang gi gnas/ gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ gnas sam/ khang pa 'am/ dag/ gon pa'i gnas sam/ 'khor kyi 'khyams sam/ 'chag sa 'am/ khang
40b6(mdo): pa sgeg ma 'am/ skyil po cang ma byi dor legs par bgyis pa'i sa phyog/ sa su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi 'byes pa/ khru gang ba 'am/ khru do pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi lham pa/ A kun nas cha 'byes pa/
40b7(mdo): sa dang sbyar ba'i wA bes shi nad tu legs par byi dor bgyis la/ rtswa sngon po mnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag go ma dbye ba'i thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po la pad ma rgya chen po kye/
40b8(mdo): pa'adab ma brgya pa tshor snga brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing / 'byes par bgyis la snying po na rin po che kar ka ti ka las bgyi'o// pad ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la/ grwa bzhi nas kha khyer
40b9(mdo): sor bzhi'i ched du bgyi'o// pad ma'i bar gyi zur zur du ud pa la sngon po legs par bris la/ 'khyer gyi phyi rol nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mchos bskor bar bgyi'o// lho'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal myed 'a
41a1(mdo): kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ chab la me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod pa/ bya sna tshogs gnas 'cha ba/ ngang pa dang / gzhad dang / dur pa dang / shang shang de'u dang / ka la bying ka dang / bya'i tshogs
41a2(mdo): kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'cha bar bgyi'o// mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / sna tshogs
41a3(mdo): 'khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol nas lag pa dang thal mo'i phyag rgya bris/ sgo bzhi rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la pad ma'i ba dan bzang po bshams te/
41a4(mdo): de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag myed dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob bzhag par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma dang / dri
41a5(mdo): dang / byug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o// ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// gtor ma dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o// yon chab kyi snod dang mar me'i phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o// pad ma'i
41a6(mdo): zhags pa 'od dpag myed kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// ragis sdug/ sa 'chang rtsang mas gos rtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyis nas/ ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la/ zla ba nya la nyin cig
