41a7(mdo): mchis par 'gyur bas/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag mar brtson par bgyi/
41a8(mdo): snyi rjes mchog tu rtse bar bgyi bas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ci tsam nathun tha ma la 'od dpag myed 'bar bar 'gyur nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
41a9(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang g.yo bar 'gyur nas/ lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis skya rengs shar tsam ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa'o
41b1(mdo): dpag myed gser spangs pa lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun tu bzhugs nas/ phyag g.yas pa'i rigs sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byind par
41b2(mdo): mdzad cing / yid kyi brdeg pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas/ myi gda' bar 'gyur ba dang / shi nad tu rnam par dag pa dri ma myed pa'i snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i gnyid thob nas/ 'di ltar nyal ba tsam 'am/ myig bac+doMs
41b3(mdo): pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gzhal myed khang dang gnas dang / 'jig rten yul ljongs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang / bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur
41b4(mdo): lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de chos stond par mdzad pa yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad da bugs 'byi nad par bgyid pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang / rnam par
41b5(mdo): 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mthong bar 'gyu/ ra lags so// / 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas ni yos te/ 'di rten kyi 'ams 'de can dunapa las nyam par skye bar 'acug skye 'i gyi dran par gyur te/ kye bathun mong rjes su na
41b6(mdo): de sad nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ la ga pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas/ nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// lo khra ri 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa grub pa rnams dang / rigs
41b7(mdo): sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor khri brgyad stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pad ma'i zhags pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rigs sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa bsgrub par 'a
41b8(mdo): na/ shing shun dang / ras skud dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal te/ 'khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la/ tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyis te/ rtse lnga pa 'byung po'i las
41b9(mdo): stsogs pa'i mgo dang / sbrul kyi ska rags kyis bcings la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dra ba'i phreng bas bkri ba bgyis nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mas gos gtsang ma
42a1(mdo): bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyi'o// ba'o rnam lngas nye bar bgyi'o// nA'i stan bting nas ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun tu lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa mnan nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
42a2(mdo): po sha bizlas so// 'khro bo'i rgyal po stong bzlas so// de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te/ de bzung na nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang //
42a3(mdo): pad ma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus pha rol kyi zild kyis myi nond par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar
42a4(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro// lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam/ 'og gar 'phangs par yid la bsams pa/
42a5(mdo): bzhin thams cad bcings nas 'gug par bgyid do// phyogs bcu 'phangs ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas/ skyes pa 'am/ dbud myed dam/ gzhan gang ci yang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings
42a6(mdo): nas/ myur du 'gug par bgyid de/ som nyi myi bgyi'o// gal te lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ myi 'am ci'am/
42a7(mdo): 'byung po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ myur du 'gug par bgyid de/ som nyi myi bgyi'o// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ mar gyi ngo'i ches bcu
42a8(mdo): bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgyegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/
42a9(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las tha radwa par 'gyur ro//
42b1(mdo): zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te/ dur khrod du zhugs nas kyi snang bar 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad kyi sgo bye bar 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor mchis
42b2(mdo): ra/ ro rje'i zhags pa brdabs nas/ phug thams cad kyi sgo dbye bar 'gyur zhing / 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bu bachag par 'gyur ro// lam ngan pa dang / myi ngan pa dang / myi ma yin pa dang / 'bab tu
42b3(mdo): dad pa dang / sbrul dang / dbugs gdug pa dang / srog chags kon sa dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags su gtogs pa thams cad myi gda' bar 'gyur ro// myi drang po dang / las drang por ci sbyar rang gi kan
42b4(mdo): sam/ myug lag 'ang ngam/ khang pa zhig tu zhugs nas/ dge des pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i zhags pa las thams cad bgyid pa bsgrub
42b5(mdo): pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rigs sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa bslab par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des nor bu btsal bar bgyi ste/ rdo rje'am/ bye du r+ya'am/ shel rang 'gyu
42b6(mdo): ngam/ mar gad dam/ in dra ni la sor mo'i tshogs pas lhag tsam shi nad tu phyis pa/ shi nad tu yongs su dag par bgyis pa/ gser gyi me tog gi tshul du bgyis pa/ mu tig gis bkris pa/ ke sar 'phye ba/ tsam pa/ 'e
42b7(mdo): me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon rtsi 'byes pas kha bsgyur ba/ shi nad tu tshad la bab par bkal ba khru nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ sor mo gung mo'i ched tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la/ thor to gcig shes
42b8(mdo): su nor bu 'am/ gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mas bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par bkrus nas/ ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri moSha/
42b9(mdo): gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la/ grwa bzhire bum pa gang ba bzhag cing / pog por gyi snod bshams nas/ a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul
43a1(mdo): bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma dang / dri dang / rol mo'i cha s+yAd dag
43a2(mdo): dgod par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// btung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang sbags pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o// don
43a3(mdo): yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri cig stong bzlas nas/ lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la gnan no// lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang / de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan
43a4(mdo): stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la
43a5(mdo): mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag myed de/ pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la yang mchod pa rgya/ cher bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis ches bco lnga'i1
43a6(mdo): la nyin zhag cig smyung bar bgyis te/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul bar bgyi'o//
43a7(mdo): de nas dkyil mo krung bcas te mtshas nas/ nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas brdeg par bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / cher g.yos par
43a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ki ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang gi
43a9(mdo): mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rigs sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu'i zhags pa blangs na/ sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang
43b1(mdo): phyag lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed dang / de bzhi gshegs pagag kyi thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byar
43b2(mdo): ras gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po sku gser gyi kha dog gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol par 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog dang / 'dra ba brgya
43b3(mdo): ba'i phyag gis rigs sngags 'chang gi mgo bo'i skye bi ro bzhag nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don
43b4(mdo): yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par dag pa grub bo// khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na myed pa grub ste/ rigs sngags 'chang kyi 'dod dgur bsgyur ba thams cad de/
43b5(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i grub pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs nas/ rigs swa/ gas 'chang gis 'bad myi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don
43b6(mdo): yod pa'i zhags pa grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par byed pa la ltos shig/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs
43b7(mdo): la ltos shig/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shig/ 'on te bde ba can blta bar 'tshal lam/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod par
43b8(mdo): 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril
43b9(mdo): bu dang / ba dan dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyan dang / gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i myug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbu'o//
44a1(mdo): yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog bzung nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i sta bas la bcug
44a2(mdo): te/ 'di lta bu'i yid la bgyid pa chen pos ci lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas/ dor yong rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o// ya de bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen po don yod 'ang
44a3(mdo): bzlas nas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse
44a4(mdo): bar bgyis nas/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam lnga pa'o//
44a5(mdo): dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang
44a6(mdo): da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba da 8/ yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas kyi mchog
44a7(mdo): dka' ldan na gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la stsogs pa tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa 'od dpag myed la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag
44a8(mdo): 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug las
44a9(mdo): stsogs pa'i lha'i bu'i gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba/ s+yan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// / tad ya tha/ AM ma ha pad ma tsin dA ma Ni/ ma Ni ma Ni/ a mo g+ha ma Ni/ su ma Ni/ ma ha ma Ni/ sarba ta
44b1(mdo): tha ka ta/ ang lang ka ra/ ma sa a mo kA ma Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saN tsa ra/ Ni Sha Na me hA ra sa ga pad ma g+hu dza/ ba ra Na/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ ma ha byi na nu pa d+ha ra/ pra ba ra sa ha n+to di sad tu/ pad ma d+ha ra pad ma/ sa sa na
44b2(mdo): pad ma ma ku ta/ ma la d+ha ra/ pad ma go'u ra/ pad ma a lang kri ta Ta tsu sa ha sra ne tA/ man da b+hu ta/ pra ha ra na/ mud tra bi b+hu Shi/ ta sa ha sra b+hu dza/ dza ya dza ya/ sha ta sa ha sra rash+mi pra ti man Di ta/ sha ri ra/ ba ra b+ha/
44b3(mdo): bitsi de tA/ a ba ra na d+ha ra ma ni ka na ka/ batre be du s+ya/ ma ra ka ta/ in tra na le pad ma ra ka b+hu na te sha ri ra/ rtse mi tsho ri/ bai tsid tA/ tsa ra na/ ma ha bo d+hi swad tra ba da pra m+ba/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra ru pa d+ha ra/ pad me sha ra/
44b4(mdo): lo ke shwa ra/ ya ma ba ru na/ ku be ra ri shi ga Na/ ku ma ra/ se na pa ti be sha da ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+ha ro/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma had bU tu be sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta tha ga ta/ a bi shi ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ka
44b5(mdo): ban/ pu ra ya ma shan ta ra ya ba ra na/ shwa sa ya swad tAn/ tar dza/ ya du shwAn/ pa ta ya biki nan ma ra ya/ tr-i po sha ma lam/ sa/ ra sa ra/ pa bam hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sid d+h+ya sadi d+yA/ ma
44b6(mdo): ha tsine d+ha ma Ni/ a mo gA pa sha d+ha ra/ sa d+ha ya sa d+ha ya/ bi pu la sid d+hi / ma ma pra yang tsha ma ha ka ru ni ke/ b+hud d+hu b+hud d+hA/ bo d+ha ya bo dA ya/ sam bo d+ha ya/ ma ha pa shu pa ti be sha d+ha ra/ a nan bai kuR+sha ba
44b7(mdo): na/ rid d+hi san d+ha ri na ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ka ga ne bi pu la bi ma na/ san d+ha ri sha ka/ na mo stu de bi pu la pun n+ya/ kau ka d+ha ra ma ha a mo g+ha sa di d+he/ hUM hUM/ a bi sha ni tsa tu man/ bi pu la ki ti ke re swA
44b8(mdo): b+hu ba swA hA/ b+hu ba b+hu ba swA hA/ a mo g+ha bi pu le swA hA/ ma ha tsin ta ma ni sidi d+hi swA hA/ sarba sid d+he ba ra de swA hA/ oM bi pu le shwa ra/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma ha tsini dA ma ni/ ma ha a mo g+ha sidi d+he hUM phaT swA hA// / don yod
44b9(mdo): nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rigs sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na/ nam mkha'i rdos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro//
45a1(mdo): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po stond par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed dang / tshogs
45a2(mdo): dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal myed khang mchog dang bcas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi gnas mtha'
45a3(mdo): dag tu mchod pa'i cher gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// bde ba can gnas pa de dag thams cad dang / de bzhin
45a4(mdo): gshegs pa tshe dpag myed des/ rigs sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing / mchod pa'i cher chen po de
45a5(mdo): yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngags 'chang nam mkha/ 'alas babs par 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'ab/ bas par 'gyur ro// 'on te myi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na/
45a6(mdo): nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mtshog don yod rgyal chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'a khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor
45a7(mdo): los sgyur ba'i rigs sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro// 'on te babs na lo khrar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra
45a8(mdo): bar mchod pa dang / gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi rtse bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang babs nas/ rigs sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur/
45a9(mdo): sems can thams cad la bu cig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu bsrung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// thos bsags pa'i rgya
45b1(mdo): mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor pa dang bcas pa/ rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags
45b2(mdo): pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ni dang / lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang / bcas
45b3(mdo): pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal lam/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba 'am/ dge ba'i rtse ba chen po bskyed
45b4(mdo): par 'tshal ba'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud kyis len kyi mchog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi
45b5(mdo): dge 'dun thams cad la stobs par 'tshal ba 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ nga po dang / chen po gtugs par 'gyur/ yongs su grol bar/ 'gyur ro// gal te tshig gzhan myi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad
45b6(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyid cing / smyung ba lan cig bgyid de/ bzlas brjod bzlas nas/ de bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyi las kyis
45b7(mdo): snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par myi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad ma
45b8(mdo): bzhin du gos par myi 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro// bsten pa tsam 'am/ cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis pha rol
45b9(mdo): tu phyi nad pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa bcu'i rjes su mchis par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid thob
46a1(mdo): par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par bskyed pa thams
46a2(mdo): cad kyi rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar myed par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// chung ngu na rigs sngags dur khrod du zhugs nas/ gum pa'i rus pa 'am
46a3(mdo): gum pa'i sha 'am/ gum pa'i ro rul ba 'am/ chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba 'am/ rtsig pa'i ro mo la rigs sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur da na/ sems can de gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba/
46a4(mdo): de dang de nas mod la thar da nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par myi bgyi na/ gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal gang rigs
46a5(mdo): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma/ 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjes su 'dra/ nga ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar bgyid/ brjod par bgyid
46a6(mdo): klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems par bgyid/ bsgo ma par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'dra ri 'a jug par bgyid na/ de nges par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
46a7(mdo): byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po thob par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bcangs na mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang rjes
46a8(mdo): su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di nyid re shig kun chub par bgyis nas/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgon pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos
46a9(mdo): kyang ci 'jas/ med sa rigs sngags 'chang don yod ying bzhin nor bu'i nags pa bslabs nas yid la bsams te/ bsams pa'i las thams cad 'phyis na thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// dgos pa dang 'gyid /
46b1(mdo): thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon gsum du mthong das/ sung bstan pa bzhin du don song nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin du sa par bgyis/ 'dis mi
46b2(mdo): gnyis su myi bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la lag pa g.yas pas dor bu blangs te/ lag pa gsod pas sngags kyu grangs nas/ mya gdal bar gyur nam/ kam dka' ba re
46b3(mdo): 'jug par bgyi ste/ mtshan mo yA nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyi par ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
46b4(mdo): myi'am ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri sul kyi phug dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du myi mngon par zhugs nas slar yang ldog
46b5(mdo): par 'gyur zhing / ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// myi nam sa kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa/ dang / nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ 'on te rig
46b6(mdo): sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/ zla ba yar gyi de'i ches brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// gtsang ma'i gnas sam
46b7(mdo): phyogs su ba'i lci ba ste/ ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o// gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dgram zhing bum pa gang bas brgyan cing / spos sna tshogs kyis smos
46b8(mdo): pa'i bdug pa bzhag par bya'o// de nas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun tu stan bzang po bshams ste/ sha nid tu mnyam par bzhag pas zhags pa sbrul skyil ba'i tshul du zlum por bskyil nas bzhag par bgyi'o/
46b9(mdo): dbus su nor bu bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o// dod sod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi gu rtsa gcig bzlal brjod pabyor
47a1(mdo): de nas don yod ya di bzhin nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de'i 'og tu tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ska'i 'dug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi/ zhags pa dang de thams cad nor bu'i ra
47a2(mdo): nas rnga bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ra ba 'am/ lga ba 'am/ gyur ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' sdib ba'o/ myi 'am
47a3(mdo): tsirnga ba 'am/ 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa ra ba 'am/ tshe ring brda ba 'am/ se nyams pa rda ba 'am/ che 'phos pa ra ba 'am/ rgyal srid da ba 'am/ grong 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/
47a4(mdo): grong khyer 'thob pa 'am/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye du n+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / rdul dang / gos dang / lhab sbub dang / rgya rnga ba 'am/ nor sbyar/
47a5(mdo): bA smra ba 'am/ myig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ ga/ ter smra ba 'am/ 'bru smra ba 'am/ bud myed 'phrog pa 'am/ delas 'grub pa 'am/ gsang sngags 'grub pa 'am/ dbang du
47a6(mdo): bgyi ba 'am/ ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang na rda ra 'gyur zhing / dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba de thams cad rnga bar 'gyur ro// lo 'am/ lo phyed dam/ gnod pa 'am
47a7(mdo): 'tshe ba 'am/ sems sam/ myo ngas sam/ myo ngas chen po 'am/ phyugs ngas sam/ kor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang kau dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa chen
47a8(mdo): po de dag thams cad me long kyi dkyil 'khor la ji lta ba bzhin du rnga bar 'gyur lags so// gang bsams shing gang gnyer ba 'grub pa 'am/ myi 'grub pa 'am/ dge ba'am/ myi dge ba thams cad rnga bar 'gyur
47a9(mdo): te/ de la the tsom dang / yid gnyis dang / som nyi myi bgyi ste/ dngos po don gzhan du myi 'gyur ro// char myi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu bzhaka na ci tsam 'tshal bar char kyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro//
47b1(mdo): ha cang char ches na nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po chad par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char kar nyi ma la bstan na/ nyi ma la babs nas mchog thams cad rtsolod par 'gyur ro// zla ba ches pa la bstan na/ zla ba/
47b2(mdo): ches pa babs na/ 'dod dkur thams cad kyi mchog thams cad kyi mchog rtsol par bgyid do// chu klung chen por bstan na/ rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nags khung du bstan na sman kyi rdzas thams
47b3(mdo): cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de lend par 'gyur ro// ri phug tu bstan na/ sman thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o// 'bru'i phung po la bstan na/
47b4(mdo): 'bru thams cad du 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i ki nas sam/ nag po chen po la bstan te/ s+ya bo'i gtsug tu bzhag na/ nag po chen po'i mi
47b5(mdo): mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mche/ sa nas/ dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang / las thams cad/ bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i mngon gsum du bstan na/
47b6(mdo): yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ btsun mo la'i'akhor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / bye du r+ya dang / shang ka zhi si dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / rdul
47b7(mdo): dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur da nas/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du bsnyed bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du/
47b8(mdo): zhags pa 'phangs te/ don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na/ ci ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gzhal myed khang 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan sgreng
47b9(mdo): ba'i ma mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs kyi khor dbang bskur la/ khyim kyi steng ngam/ khyams su bdag la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyi/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o//
48a1(mdo): dod mang rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'tsho bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shum gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// mnas dod yod med pazhin nom bu'i gzungs pan
48a2(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod pargya'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang nas/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin char du 'bab par 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhag lcug las btsogs pa
48a3(mdo): me tog dang / 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge'i dkon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang / gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa
48a4(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus 'bab par 'gyur/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la myi 'jigs pa stsalang par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / sha khon thams cad las
48a5(mdo): thard par 'gyur ro// bdug pa nas gcan zan 'khro bo thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// sem sa can thams cad mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro// yid kyi ba
48a6(mdo): pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// // don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa chen po bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas rigs sngags 'chang ral kr-i dang / zhags
48a7(mdo): pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las ral kri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis l-i/ lag zungs kyi rdo rdul las bgyis te/ gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o// shing shud kyi skud
48a8(mdo): dang / ma ka'i skud pa dang / 'che dang kyi skud pa lhan cig tu zhu bcu drug byung ba shin tu tshad la bab par bkum pa'i bsgrub pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngogs
48a9(mdo): 'chang gyis/ legs par zhus bgyis te/ rtsang mas gos rtsang ma bgos te/ zhags pa dang / ral gri mnan la lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste bzung bar bgyi'o// 'khros pa'i 'khro gnyer kya
48b1(mdo): bzhin gyis dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug ki ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du 'the bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brkyad bzlas par bkye'o// bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad
48b2(mdo): tshan nas/ ral gri/ 'bar bar gyur nas/ rigs sngags 'cha padam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rtse bo 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi/
48b3(mdo): mthus zil kyis non par myi 'gyur ro// lo khri brgyad stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa bzung la g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste/ 'khros pas hU~M zhes bgyi bas mnan na myi rnga bar gyur
48b4(mdo): nas myi rnga ba dang / 'gas pa dang / ral gri grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rtse bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// che mo zhi thub par 'gyur ro// 'on te rigs sngags 'chang 'thos pas
48b5(mdo): raSha gri bskor na/ bgyegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gdug pa thams cad dang / 'byung po thams/ cad kyi rigs sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// yul gyi dbus su lan
48b6(mdo): cig bskor na/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe/ mtshon cha thams cad gtu bas par 'gyur/ rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/ thams cadaphyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na
48b7(mdo): dur zhod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba'i thams cad kyi rigs sngags gtubs par 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad sbyongs par 'gyur ro// lug gi sgor bskor na 'khrul 'khor dang / glegs mams thams cad bkrugs
48b8(mdo): 'gyur ro// brtan pa thams cad tubs par 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i myi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur/ zas par grags par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du/
48b9(mdo): ci lta 'tshal la bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// / ral gri bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rigs sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des s+ho/
49a1(mdo): pa lnga las bsgrub ste/ tshon rtsis la bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin tu gtubs pa/ bsgrub par shi nang tu 'os pa las bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me tog pa/
49a2(mdo): ra sa'i me tog dang / sdong gros dang / pad ma ke sar dang / na ga pus pa dang / shing a rka li 'o ma dang lhan cig tu sbyar ba der btsag stsal te/ dus gcig tu lhan gcig mnyam du btags shing spyi bor sogs pa/
49a3(mdo): sprul te/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ sbrul 'khyil pa/ mgo bo gsum gyi gdongs ka can yongs su 'khyil pa gser gyis g.yogs pa/ legs par sbrel ba ni zhags po'i mtsho
49a4(mdo): lags so// rigs sngags 'chang gis legs par zhus bgyis la/ rtsang ma gos cang ma bgos nas/ b.liM lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te/ dris mchod par bgyi'o// me tog gi
49a5(mdo): sil ma dang / bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// ba dan gyis kun nas brgyan par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ stan bzang po bshams te/ de'i steng du klu la zhags pa bskyil nA
49a6(mdo): bzhag par bgyi'o// sbrul kyi 'go ba'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogs su bstan no// dkar gsum gyi rtor ma bzhag par bya'o// mchod yon dkar po'i snod dang / bdug pa rnam pa gsum
49a7(mdo): po can dan dang / a ga tsu dang / d+ha ru ska rnams bsreg so// 'bras yos dang nyungs kar bkras pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa n+dan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngod gsum du bzhags/ mchod pa rgya che
49a8(mdo): bgyis te/ rigs sngags 'char gyis dkyis mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o// thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po/
49a9(mdo): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i nyungs kar re ra nas/ sbrul gyi 'go la gtor bar bgyi'o// bsgrub pa thams cad tshang nas na/ rgyund tu sbrul na 'bar bar 'gyur/ stan las zhags pa g.yo ba na/ sor bzhi tsam kyi tshad tsam
49b1(mdo): tu/ stan las gyen du 'phang bar 'gyur/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang kyis bzung nas myi rnga bar gyur nas/ klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na/ klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro// rig
49b2(mdo): sngags 'chang kyis zhugs te/ don yod rgyal po bzlas nas/ sbrul gyi zhags pas lan gsum du bskor bar bkye'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chab
49b3(mdo): mngon tu smra bas rigs sngags 'chang zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzung ste/ bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gyis klu'i skyon
49b4(mdo): de myi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / sgo kles dang / brtan pa thams cad gtubs shing bcag par 'gyur ro// zhugs pa tsam gyi modol klu'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo mdzes ma/
49b5(mdo): rgyan thams cad kyis klubs ma mdzes ma mchis nas/ rin po che/ li 'phreng ba thogs te rigs sngags 'chab la dbul bar bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chad kyis blangs nas spyi bor bzhag ste/ bka
49b6(mdo): pa tsam gyi mod la klul bu mo nam mkha' la 'phur nas/ nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma gzags nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gyis zer nas btung bar bgyi ste/ tshe lo nyi khri thub par 'gyur ro//
49b7(mdo): skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol da gnon par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags
49b8(mdo): 'char kyis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing kar byi ra'i lkug ma la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ kang dang gang gi mying nas drangs shing yid la bsams pas/ mong du thams cad 'grub pa/
49b9(mdo): 'gyur ro// char gyi 'bab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char kyi rgyun chen po 'bab po// char ha cang che ba'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas
50a1(mdo): mthon por bzhag na/ char ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyur ro// grang ba'i rlung ngam ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su nang par sngar klu la zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor na/ dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug/
50a2(mdo): tu ser ba 'bab par myi 'gyur te/ grang ba'i rlung dang / ser ba drag po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// lo khyud kor tshang bar mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// nyan cig bzhin don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu
50a3(mdo): rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bsdogs la/ lag pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyis na/ nyin cig bzhin zhal zas dang / btung ba 'dod dgur thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas/
50a4(mdo): skye bo stong stong tshal ma stsol par 'gyur ro// de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyur ro// sbrul kyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la lag pa g.yon pas klu bzung nas/ dpyad
50a5(mdo): dam ston ka'am/ srin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nam mkhal la 'pha/ ngas na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / le tog gang ci yang rung ba bzang
50a6(mdo): po shin tu smyind pa dang / kha zas shin tu bzang po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro// gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor la/ 'khro bo la rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis
50a7(mdo): nas/ klu'i gzhal myed khang dang / gos dang lha ba lbu ba dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro// gal te rags sngags 'chang gyis lan nya shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cang / 'khro bo'i/
50a8(mdo): rgyal po bzlas 'arjod bgyis nas/ de'i tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal myed khang dang bcas par sa'i steng du ltung bar 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngags 'chad kyis rgyal po'i btsud mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi
50a9(mdo): bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa bzhag la nyungs kar la don yod rgyal po stongs brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis ras/ bsnun la de nas sbrul gyi 'gas pa thengs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi phyogs gapa lags pa der lhag par zhen/
50b1(mdo): pa bskor na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas ci srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// gsul 'byed pa na 'gro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhags pa lus kyi dbus su/
50b2(mdo): 'gangs na/ sbrul gdug pa myig bgrad pa sde bsgyur ba kyig mye mdag lta dmar la/ 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi modado la dpung kyi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcu pa 'byer bar 'gyur ro// gzhan ya
50b3(mdo): ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i don de lta de lta bu thams cad bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur ro// / sbrul kyi zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhags
50b4(mdo): pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ 'bri'i rtsing pa dang / rtsod pa chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang / lugs las mdung rtse gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i
50b5(mdo): snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'kho dro rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin zhag gcig mchis la legs par zhus bgyis te/ cang mas gos cang ma bgo bar
50b6(mdo): bgyi'o// zla ba yar gyi po'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig gis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs nas/ 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'byung
50b7(mdo): po thams cad kyi bdag po lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal myed kha thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// 'gas pa lag par legs nas/ dur khrod na gnas pams cad mdun du mchis ta/
50b8(mdo): gnas kyi sgoms cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing / khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces mi 'tshal de bgyid par 'gyur ro// ro'i mgul du btags nas/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra/
50b9(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing // ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// bkrol na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi mgul du btags te/ 'kho bo la rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs na/ gnod sbyin de yang mdun tu mchis nas/
51a1(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka' stsol cig dang thams cad bkye'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chad kyis khyod na srid 'tsho'i bar du 'khro bo'i mngag bzhug pa'i las kyis ces smras pa/
51a2(mdo): bgyi ste/ de nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ de nas nyin cig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo mchis/
51a3(mdo): nas rigs sngags 'chang gyi mdun tu mchis te/ rigs sngags 'chang la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing / rigs sngags 'chang ci zhig don tu gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gis khe bo la ma dang /
51a4(mdo): chung ma dang / sring mos bsgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig/ bsgo bar bkye'o// gal ta mo zhag tu bgyid na/ bu cig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su
51a5(mdo): sbyor bar bgyid do// chung ma zhig du bgyis na/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang / bdag por 'gyid cing / de dang lhag par dag par brtse bas phye bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro//
51a6(mdo): gas te sring mo zhig tu bgyid na/ yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa zas cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// dgos pa thams cad bkyi de par 'gyur ro// thams cad rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur/ ro//
51a7(mdo): nyin cig bzhin lhab lhu ba dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams stsol bar bgyid do// nyin cig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo 'i don tu 'gug par bgyid do// rnam thos kyi mgul du btags te/ 'khros pas drangs
51a8(mdo): nas/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de rnam thos mchis nas/ nyin cig bzhin du dong rtse stong gsol bar 'gyur/ gser stong so sad par 'gyur te/ des nyin cig bzhin sbyin pa'ang stsal
51a9(mdo): bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la/ 'the bo'i rgyal po lam bdun bzlas brjod bgyis ma/ 'phos pas lag pa g.yas pa'i sa sug gis 'ardeg par bgyi'o// nag pa chen pos smra phyung //
51b1(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang skrag par myi bgyi bar slar yang 'khros pas brdegs par bkye'o// de nas mdze ma zags pa dang / rigs sngags 'chad kyis mchi ma bzed de thig le bgyis na/ myi gda' bar gyurang nas gter
51b2(mdo): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis yang thal mos brdegs par bgyi ste/ de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyug pa rigs sngags 'chang kyis byugs na/ nam ma'al la mchis nas/ gnod
51b3(mdo): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ nag po chen po rang kyi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad spos par bgyid cing / ma
51b4(mdo): mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid para' gyur ro// / mdung rtse gsum pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//
51b5(mdo): de nas zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo cho ga de kho ma nyid 'di bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na myed pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i// rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa/
51b6(mdo): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzind kyi// cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te// laka pa stong dang myig stong dang // mtha' yas pa'i phyag/ rgya bstan// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs// khams gsum
51b7(mdo): dag tu bstan pa ni// gdul bya gdul phyir gzugs bstand to// gsang ba 'di'i gzugs bstan pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rigs sngags grub pa bla myed pa// de nyid zhags pa bsgrub
51b8(mdo): phyir ro// de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jig rten pha rol rjes mthun pa// sangs rgyas nyid dod gnyer ba dang // de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang // bde can lta bar 'tshutshal ba dang // de nyid 'jig rten
51b9(mdo): 'das pa'i// 'jig rten dpapa'agom mthong 'tshal ma// mchog tu gus par bgyi ba'i// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis// de nyid gus par dad pa dang // shi nang tu dang pa nyid du bkye/ grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal pa
52a1(mdo): la// sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bstand te// sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga mchog/ don yod grub pa 'jig rten 'das// don yod 'bras bu dam pa po// don yod
52a2(mdo): kun tu grub pa 'thob// sangs rgyas kun kyis byin kyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten 'gon// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa// don yod 'jig rten gyi 'tshal ba// mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur//
52a3(mdo): don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun myi 'chad// de lta bas na kun bsgrims te// bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas// ci ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin// rjes su mthun par ri mo'i gzugs//
52a4(mdo): rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs lta zhing // zhags pa gzugs ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin 'khro ba'i rgyal po dang // rigs sngags rgyal po de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang // sbyin bsreg rlung lha chu lha dang /
52a5(mdo): 'khri bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang // lha dang klu yang stond pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha myin dr-i za/ dang / nam mkha' lding dang mya 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs
52a6(mdo): kun tu// 'jig rten mgon po mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzho nu dbang phyug lha dang na// dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang // zla
52a7(mdo): gzugs rgyu skar tshes grangs lha// 'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan // sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas// gdul ba'i don du grol ba'i lam// sems can nas
52a8(mdo): la bstan pas na// de bas som nyi nyid myi bgyi// mchog tu dad par bgyi ba lags// ci ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams// ci ltar mthur pa bzhin du sgrub// ci ltar mthun pa'i ri mo'i gzugs// ci ltar mthun pa
52a9(mdo): zhags pa bsgrub// gnas ni gang du 'os pa dang // gang du sems ni dgar 'gyur ba// goms pa gang gis phyag rgya dang // gang gisadakyil 'khor char dbye ba// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang mgon// kun
52b1(mdo): tu smyos pa 'dren pa'i mo// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba'o// don yod pa'i grub pa thob// don yod dgos pa thams cad dang // grub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// mchog nyid la la b.reg par 'gyur// !/ zhags pa dang /
52b2(mdo): ri mo bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i las dang / dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin bsregs kyi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sleb pa thams cad 'jig
52b3(mdo): par bgyid pa// dgra thams cad 'joms pa/ bkyegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu
52b4(mdo): drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa myi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa// myi mdza' ba rnams 'joms pa/ pha rol pa kyi dpung bzlog pa'i mchog/ nad thams cad 'joms pa/ mongs
52b5(mdo): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ke'i dkon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yama?/ sa kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'joms pa/ lha'i bde ba 'dren par
52b6(mdo): bgying po'i mchog/ de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas bsgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na myed pa'i mchog thams cad grub pa bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shi nang
52b7(mdo): tu rnyed par dka' ba lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba// klu rnams dka' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyid mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
52b8(mdo): dka' bar 'gyur ba/ dus kun tu shi nad tu mnyam par bzhag pas/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas
52b9(mdo): pa bsrung ba'i don tu/ thams cad tu rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba lags so// de nas rigs sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas/ gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas/ sbyin bsregs pagyi ste/ rtsang ma'i/
53a1(mdo): sa phyogs sam/ cacom mchis dben par ni/ zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / drag shul dpyod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi// don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms/ rgyas pa
53a2(mdo): rgyas pa thob 'gyur te// thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pas/ gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang // skrag pas sdug pa drag shul
53a3(mdo): myong // gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i sbyin bsregs ste// gsang sngags bsgrub pa bla na myed// 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol kyi// sbyin bsregs kyi ni las bkye'o// mye lha lha dang klu dag dang // de bzhin rig pa
53a4(mdo): 'dzind pa'ang dgug// khung brkos des pad ma'i tshul// pad ma'i rtag tu bri bar bgyi// cho ga ci bzhin khung nad kyi// pad ma la ni ke sar bri// gru bzhi 'am ni zlum po ste// de lta bur ni brko bar
53a5(mdo): bgyi// legs par byugs shing shi nad tu gnag/ sha nad tu sbas/ shing tshad la dbab// tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag kyang // shi nad tu bkra' shis dag la bgyi// bkra shis phyag rgya chen po'i
53a6(mdo): bzang po gtor ma'i las bgyi'o// gdug pa mye tog las bsogs pa// bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod// thog mar me lha bkug nas nas ni// de nas sbyin bsregs las rnams bgyi//
53a7(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyurd pa// legs bkrus rtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// gAng sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi// de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi// bdag bsrung tsug tor bcang ba dang // gzhan
53a8(mdo): bsrung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // de bzhin grogs bgyid bsrung ba dang // rgyun tu a rka'i shing sbar te// dri'i shing rnams nyid dag dang // mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul me ston bkye//
53a9(mdo): de nas mye'i lha dkug go// / oM na ma a ga ni dza la/ ma ha dza la/ d+yod sA b+ha ma Na Na/ sarba bing a hu ti/ pra hu te/ rag ni rang du shwA dza la/ d+hu ma sha sa/ a nI sha mu kha ti yA/ ra smai ra ba a ga ni shu bid tu ta
53b1(mdo): na mu Shan te/ sarba de ba na/ sa rba yag kA ma ha byi r+ya ma ha dza ba ma ha pa la nir ma rin shan/ sarba da ha na pra phu la/ a ka sha sa muka ka ta kas sh+tsa/ a ba pra sang ka shan/ maN Ta la bu dza to/ ma ni ta sa rbad dab bya ru pa
53b2(mdo): bi sha rang / a ba ha na/ sarbad tra gan/ de ba hu ta/ sha na hu ta/ sha na ta ma si bi d+ha ma kan/ an d+ha ka ran/ mug ta ra/ sh+li na pri yang ku gan d+ha pa la ha ra/ ra sa ra sa/ a gra dza/ su ka y+Ya su ti ka shAsh+tsa/ mr-i ta san
53b3(mdo): rigs/ thi so b+hak+Sha s+'u m+b+hak+sha Sh+ma k+te tsa \u0f88\u0f90k+Sha bA stA ni/ se ba kas/ bA sma sa ma rba d+ha da tun d+hu ma ma gus/ nga sa se/ pa ka sid d+ha ra/ swa kra tsas rba da dza pra d+ha pa rig/ sa cad lnga ni ma y-in Ni/ nad tu sme pa/
53b4(mdo): na/ mun tsa saM/ dra tri sha/ b+ha ba no de ba a ga ni/ mu Sha de ba ta/ a ru tsi ru/ dza ba la ba d+ha/ ka ma han ta/ a tha ba ra No/ ba de ban bi sha ra da/ a lan tu sad shi gA kar ma sa da ya/ tang
53b5(mdo): drata/ mA~M dza la dza la/ ti kA swa ma yan/ hu ru hu ru/ hUM phaTaswa ha// / gsang sngags 'dis ni sman bdun du bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi// ku gus nyungs kar ma
53b6(mdo): spar ba/ spar bdun spar bas me la dbus// mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang // de bzhin spar ba'i spar bas so// dri rnams dang naM byugs pa dang // gdug pa rgya chen dbul bar bkye// de bzhin
53b7(mdo): 'bras bu sbar bas dbul// de nas chab kyis bsang ba bgyi// ce ltar lha rnams rims bzhin du// nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bya// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis su// sbyin bsregs las ni yang dag brtsam//
53b8(mdo): bri shing shin tu dag pa dang / thugs su du bar dang // sna ma'i me tog rnas pa dang // ka di ga nyid dag dang / pangs sud pa la sang shing / de bzhin ji da'i can dan dang / bya chub ljo shi shing dag dang // de
53b9(mdo): gzhan kang dri gda'i shing // 'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang / shamyi zhi ba'i las lags pas/ mchod yon de bzhin rtswa dag deng // de dag gis ni me sbar nas// sbyin bsregs kyi ni las bgyi'o// 'bras yos
54a1(mdo): can dang phye ma dang / a ka ru dang du ru swa// kun tu ru las sogs pa dang // du ru skar bcas sprig dang // spang spos mi yang gu blangs te// de dag lhan cig spyang bsregs shing // ma ram pa sa pa
54a2(mdo): lhan cig badz+ra// don yon rgyal po gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brkyad bzlas la me la dbul// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad
54a3(mdo): tshang ba dang / nam phyed na mye lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shi nad tu gnas pa langs nas/ phyogs bcur lta zhing kun tu brtags nas/ rigs sngags 'cha ba la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol par 'gyur te/ rigs
54a4(mdo): sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tshim par byas pas/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin bsregs kyi cho ga grub kyis/ mchog slongs shig dang thams cad sbyin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gyis
54a5(mdo): ci lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams bslang bar bgyi ste/ ci ltar/ bslangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol par bgyid do// de nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gyis mchod yon gyi snod dag dbul zhing /
54a6(mdo): gtor ma dbul ba'i las kyang bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kyis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin bsre gas bgyi zhing / 'bras bu'i shing sbar nas/ don yod zhags pa'i
54a7(mdo): snying po lan stong rtsa brkyang bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brkyang tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas/ dngul gyi gnod pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ pus mo nub tsam du 'bul bar
54a8(mdo): bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang gyis blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chad kyis lus las mye 'bar ba li 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de 'tsha
54a9(mdo): na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rigs/ 'chang gyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i snying po cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i
54b1(mdo): dkyil 'khor kha ton tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te snod myi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsregs bgyis na cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang kyi gzugs kyis
54b2(mdo): mdud dum chis nas/ rigs sngags 'changs dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ rigs sngags 'du legs so le gus so// rigasu sngags lam khyod kyis sbyin pazlogs kyi chog de bsgrubs zin gyis mchog spongs
54b3(mdo): shi ka dang / sbyin no zhes de'i tshe rigs sngags 'chad kyis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa/ de'i tshe thams cad stsolang par bgyid do// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs
54b4(mdo): te/ rang gi lag nas rigs sngags 'chang la sros par bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang kyis blangs nas/ zas kyi gong du de bang bar bgyi'o// 'tshal bcas kyi mod la nam mkhal la rdzu 'phrul
54b5(mdo): gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// lus las me'i phung po 'bar ba'i Sha/ dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i rigs 'dzidang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro//
54b6(mdo): 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po drug pa// / kang ka'i klung ki bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngags 'chang ba'i
54b7(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi rigs sngags 'chad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// gang ka'i klung gi bye bzhi zag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi byem dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal myed khang ded yod rab tu gnas
54b8(mdo): pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal myed khang ri dang tshal dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ka dang / sbrul gyig dang / lo ma dang /
54b9(mdo): rtsa ba dang / sru gur bcas pa'i kha cig ni gser gi me tog/ kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog/ kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go// gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sA lang dang / ta ma
55a1(mdo): dang / tsam pa ka dang / stug ma'i me tog dang / ta la dang / gAn d+ha par shi ka dang / sna ma dang / yu ti ka dang / ta ra na dang / ku ba bya ka'i me tog dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / snyed mos tshal dka'
55a2(mdo): bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal myed khang gyis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal myed khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dga' ba dang / yid du mche bar 'gyur ro// lha'i chu klung dang / 'bab chu dang / rdzing lha'i tsan
55a3(mdo): ngan gyi dri'i chab kyis yongs su kang ba de la/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal myed khang dang / lha'i pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i chab kaser gyi phye
55a4(mdo): ma legs par brda lad pa'i gzhal myed khang dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lha'i bu mo dang / mya'am rtse mo'i tshogs dang / dri za mo'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za
55a5(mdo): dang / klu dang / rigs 'dzin dang / myi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor da cing / lha'i 'byor da pa'i gzhal myed khang la/ gas par bstabs pa'il gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid pa
55a6(mdo): dka' bar bgyid pa/ dga' mgur pyod par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas/ byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'dadra' ba'i bar du
55a7(mdo): tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do// de bzhin du grub pa bla na myed pa chen po/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi
55a8(mdo): gong du bsgrubs pa'i cho ga shi napa tu rnyed par dka' lags so// phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gces
55a9(mdo): pa thams cad las mngon gsum du chos nyan pa mos par 'gyur ro// de'i 'od gzer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'phags pa rgyan
55b1(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bkyis bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par bsku
55b2(mdo): po'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kha ton nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so// klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas/ rtag par rgyun tu mchis par
55b3(mdo): 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyurd nas mchis par 'gyur ro// 'og myin gyi gnas kyi lha rnams r-ikra
55b4(mdo): sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin du rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyu nad tu yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i re bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gzhal myed khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag spun kyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
55b5(mdo): de bzhin du gos dang / lha ba sbub dang / rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan/ ba'i gzhal myed khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de las sdog/ sa pa sbyin bsregs kyi cho ga don yod pa bsgrub pa dag 'byung bar
55b6(mdo): 'gyur ba'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te bskal pa chung ba sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mame na/ pa byad na mtshas sa/ de snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyas srid kyi dbang phyug thob
55b7(mdo): bar 'gyur te/ lha dang myi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// reg pa tsam gyi mongs tshel lha'i lo brkyang zhi ba'i stong thob par 'gyur ro// de la phyis kyang nang 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa rnams
55b8(mdo): kyis nyon mongs par myi 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / gyi mnga' dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
55b9(mdo): rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sems can thams cad ltan
55b10(mdo): 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// tshig brtsan zhing don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro// 'phags
56a1(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dran pa shi nad tu nye bar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dus bgyis nas skal ba mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba/
56a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mche bar myi 'gyur te/ phyir yang ma'i mngal du skye bar myi 'gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
56a3(mdo): cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mtsho bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le bgyis na thams cad du myi gda' bar 'gyur ro//
56a4(mdo): me lha rtag par rgyun tu dran pa bgyis pa tsam gyis rang kyi gzugs kyi sa mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad gsol bar 'gyur/ ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod
56a5(mdo): dgongs pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rags sngags 'chang des 'bra/ sa dang ku la ma shar bsres te bsgral la bsgongs nas/ mar dang 'bru mar dang / sha ka ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig brdzes nas
56a6(mdo): bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu shing ka ra bi ra'i me sbar nas bsgongs pa re ra la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ me'i nang du sbyin bsregs bgyi ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brkya
56a7(mdo): sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis nyungs kar dang / me tog ji snyed pa dang bsres te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me'i dbus su stsalang par bgyi'o// 'bras yos dang /
56a8(mdo): nyungs karas 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas/ rigs
56a9(mdo): sngags 'chabs rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bskongs pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis/ lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po longs shig ces stobs par bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gyis zas bskongs
56b1(mdo): pa'i snod de blang bar bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam gyi 'o na sna bcud kyis len par gyur pa nas/ nam mkhal la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zapa'o khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// pakas pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro//
56b2(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chad kyis 'khor los sgyur ba drug khri brkyang stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// mye lha gnas gzhal myed khang dang bcas pas dbang du mchis
56b3(mdo): nas/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
56b4(mdo): phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang bcas pa/ cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton tu gnas pa 'di nyin gcig bzhin shu lo Ta/ stong klog kam/
56b5(mdo): 'chang bar bgyid na/ tshe brdzes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba/ can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad ma la rdzus te skyes nas skye badran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed par gyi
56b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/ myi gangada' ra
56b7(mdo): gyurang nas/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// bud byed gang zhig bu'i ched du bas bskongs pa 'tshal na/ bu gzugs
56b8(mdo): bzang ba mdzes pa bsta na stug pa/ kha dog babang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas/ yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa dang mkhas pa dang / bstan chos thams cad la bag chab ma mchis par 'gyur ro//
56b9(mdo): de nas skye bo 'bum zas sbal bar 'tshal na/ lo ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ gnas kyang mar gcom sbyangs par shing kar byi ra'i lcug mas dkrugs cing / don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags/
57a1(mdo): brjod par bgyi ste/ de nas 'khro bo'i rgyal po cha ba dang nyungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ gtor bar bkye'o// de nas zas spongs pa cig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas/ 'o thug ki nang du su sad to//
57a2(mdo): de nas char bgos te/ thog mar dkon mchog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags
57a3(mdo): pa Shajam dpal la dbul bar bgyid do// de'i 'og tu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang bkren pa dang /
57a4(mdo): sdug/ 'phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / slongs mo ba rnams la rab tu saHlad par bkye'o// ci tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du saHlad kyang / snod de kang ba 'am bri bar gyi mngon zhing de bas par bya
57a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nang/ thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dam/ phas
57a6(mdo): kyai rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par myi 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lus mnyen
57a7(mdo): cing 'jam par 'gyur ro// nga ro lha ltar mnyen zhing snyan la/ dga' bar bgyid pa myi ma yin pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu ci srid 'tsho'i bar
57a8(mdo): du de yang dag par stobs par 'gyur ro// tshe brdzes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bka nas/ de gnas mthon por blag pa myed pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor/
57a9(mdo): kyi steng du bzhag nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o// phul ba tsam gyi mdo la chu bo kang ka' bye ba 'bum phrag brgya stong kyi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
57b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa re re 'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i sgra'i bas bsgongs pa dang / lha li 'o zug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me/
57b2(mdo): to/ sel ma bkram pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /
57b3(mdo): bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis stobs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
57b4(mdo): de dag thams cad kyis rigs sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon spyo dbar mdzad do// gang gi phyir yon sbyangs nas skal ba dang / thun par tshe 'di nyid dang gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gru
57b5(mdo): ro// grub pa chen po'i gser kyis 'byor par 'gyur ro// ma/ dzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin// gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub
57b6(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad lha 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis de la bsrung ba dang / bskyabs pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur lo// de nas rgyal po btsud mo'i 'khor dang / dpung gi tshogs la
57b7(mdo): lag pazhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des legs par zhus bgyis te/ gtsang las gos gtsang sa bgos nas/ 'o drug mar dang bsres pa 'dis sa brgya rtsa brgyad snun
57b8(mdo): bsregs bgyi'o// smyon shing dang / a rka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gyis me sbar bar bgyi'o// sbyin bsregs lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang
57b9(mdo): pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyurd nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub gsum du bgyis na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas pa dang / 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyu rad nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub sngar bgyis/
58a1(mdo): na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldang dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi ma lags pa thams cad dang / myi thams cad 'khor
58a2(mdo): dang bcas par dbang du gyu rang nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub bdun du bgyis na/ reg 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub thams cad du bgyis na/ brgya byin las bsogs te//
58a3(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nas dbang du gyur da te/ tsaM srid 'tsho' bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro//
58a4(mdo): zla ba nya ba nas brtsams te/ mar gyi po'i tshes nyi shu gsum 'am/ ka nam stong kyi bar du dus gsum phu la na nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsre gas bgyis la/ a rka'i shing kyi yamra sreg shing gyis me sbar nas
58a5(mdo): gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzig/ sa dbang phyug gis mdun du mchis nas/ rigs sngags la/ chang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol par bgyid de/ rigs sngags
58a6(mdo): 'cha pa legs so legs so// nga mnyes par byas kyis// rigs sngags 'chang smos shika dang / mchog sbyin ste/ gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no// gter smras pa'am/ nor bsgyur ba smras pa'i
58a7(mdo): zhid sbas pa 'am/ nam ma' las 'gro ba pa'am/ mye snang bar bya ba'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ cho ga zhab mo 'grub pa de dag thams cad sbyin do// rgyal po nyid das/ blon po nyid dam/ yul bdag
58a8(mdo): dam/ phyug po nyid dam/ grong rdal 'thob pa 'am/ gos 'thog pa 'am/ ba lang dang / ta dang ma he dang / rnga mo dang / sug 'thob pa 'am/ nopo 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no//
58a9(mdo): mkhal sa 'gro ba'am/ myi snang bar bya ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin da 'thob pa 'am/ gzungs 'thob pa'am/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa 'am/ nor bslang ba 'am
58b1(mdo): rigs 'dzin grub pa nyid dam/ ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ nags su 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba de dag thams cad
58b2(mdo): sbyin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis ci ltar yid la bsams shing smras pa/ de dag thams cad sacoyod par bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la/ dr-i myed don yod lta ba zhes pagyi ba lus
58b3(mdo): yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi rnams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// pad ma'i ze ba'i dbus nas lus te pad ma las skyes nas/ skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don
58b4(mdo): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par gros pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil lar rim par bye ba dang bcas pa/ cho ga'ib mo mtha' dag dang bcas
58b5(mdo): pa 'di rdzogs te/ byang chub kyi snying po la yug gi bar du kha ton tu gnas par bgyi'o// de nas la chu'i sbyin bsregs kyi cho ga bsgrub pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des
58b6(mdo): bas las la tu stong sa brgyad bkyes la/ de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyang bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas legs par zhus bgyis te/ ma
58b7(mdo): masta gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// de nas la tu mar dang bsres te/ sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// shi nang tu rdzi zhi ma po'i shing kyi lam sreg shid kyi me sbar bar bkye'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me'i dbus nas kye
58b8(mdo): 'i byung nas/ snod k+ta'i sargyas bkang nas dbul par babyed do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kyis sungs kams sa na bdun bzlas te/ khye'u de 'i yul gtor ro// 9 'u des rigs sngags 'tshabs sa
58b9(mdo): pa/ rigs sngags 'chang ci zhig don tu gnyer rigs sngags 'chang kyis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig/ ces brjod par bgyi'o// des smras pa rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyil tu khyer cig dang / 'dis khyod kyis
59a1(mdo): dgos pa dpag tu myed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no// rigs sngags 'chab lo zhig/ 'di khyod kyis grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kri/
59a2(mdo): snod gang ba de blangs te/ khye'u la yang khyod kyis kho bo'i grogs gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// khye'u yis smras pa dgos pa thams cad grub pa'i grogs bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gang gi tshe/ dgos pa
59a3(mdo): byung ba de'i tshe/ gu gul dang / tsan dan lhan cig bsres la/ mar dang nyungs kar du sbyar nas/ don yod lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas te bzlas brjod bgyi'o// arka'i shing gis me sbar ro// sbyin bsregs bgyis pa
59a4(mdo): tsam gyi mongs/ bdag bkug pas mod la mchis nas/ dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bkye'o// las thams cad bkye'o// dza~M sri da mtsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur gyis mchis shing / bkur bsti s+yad pa
59a5(mdo): bgyi'o// bgyegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sprin dang / srin po thams cad bzlog par bkyi'o// de nas r-i/ gas sngags 'chang kyis la tu de la reg nas bgyis pas/ nam
59a6(mdo): mkha' la 'phur nas rigs sngags 'chang gis rigs sngags zas cad zil kyis gnon par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor lo/
59a7(mdo): sgyur ba sa la phrag gnyis dang / bye ba zag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe'i tshad lha'i bskas pa drug zhi 'gyur ro// grwa cung bang 'khyi sa par yang 'gyur ro// la tu srung bzed kyi ring du stsal te/ 'phas
59a8(mdo): ba~M kyang ras gzigs dbang thug sa mdu d+ha pa gnas/ don yodargyas po 'tsho thos dbang bkru g+he/ de nas dege sbyong dang / zlus ze dang / rgyala'i gsu dang / rde'u shes dang / dasangs rigs dang / spros pa dang / bung
59a9(mdo): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la su sad par bgyi ste/ longs spyod du su sad kyang bas par myi 'gyur ro// slar zhing slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tsa srid du lhung bzed nal tu mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te/
59b1(mdo): dri med du skye bo 'bus 'bus yang zhing 'brel che bar smras kyang gtubs par myi 'gyur ro// lartul don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas bdod bgyis nas/ de'i srog tu men pa des pa shes sa par sngor 'grus
59b2(mdo): ro// la rgyal ldan bdun bzlas 'arjod bgyi ste/ klu'i gnas su 'phangs ma/ de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur pa nas mchis par 'gyur te/ bsgon char gyi 'bab
59b3(mdo): ga'i bsgo ba bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do// ci bsgo ba bzhin 'gyid par 'gyur ro// gca pa mches da bsgo ba bzhin gan pa char chen po 'gums par 'gyid // rlung dang / grang ba dang / cha ba dang / ser ba thams
59b4(mdo): cang bsgreb tsas kyis gcod par 'byed do// mug gi skams tu su lan bdud 'azlas brjod pagyis das/ zug gi zhor bsku sa/ zug gi sgothams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// 'bral 'khor dang //
59b5(mdo): gtan pa dang / sgo glegs thams cad dus bur bcag par 'gyur ro// / gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir phyung nas/ rigs sngag/ sa 'chad kyi mdun tu mchis te/ bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur
59b6(mdo): ro// rags chang tshang gi dbus su 'phangs na/ nags tshang tshang gi gnas kyi sgothams cad bye nas/ sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// la rgyal lan bdun/
59b7(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dur khod chen po'i dbus su 'brangs nas/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyi dang / srin po dang / bcas pa'i gdus kyi rgobams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyi dang / srin po dang / 'byung
59b8(mdo): thams cad sgren mor gyur nas/ thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing / ji srid mtsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// mam byung ba sa yongs kyi / la ya we sa rjod rgyas te/ lag gnyis sul du su la
59b9(mdo): la gos dkar pos re g.yogs nas/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar dang chab la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na/ tsaM dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lo nongs pa dang / nad dang /
60a1(mdo): gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / pha rol kyi dpung dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang / myi ngas dang / yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'o//
60a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba 'am tshe zung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// dus ma lags par 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor bskya
60a3(mdo): ba'i gtam mam/ zheng gi gtam mam/ myig 'phrul kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// myig/ 'phrul 'grug
60a4(mdo): pa smra bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / mya rnga bar bgyid pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / rims ma ngag pa dang / dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// sku zab
60a5(mdo): smra bar 'gyur ro/ nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro// 'phel ba smra ba/ ra 'gyur ba nas/ bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas
60a6(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gis chab kyi khar sal / la tu blangs na ro 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas parjod bgyis nas/ rgyal po'i sgor bstan na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo
60a7(mdo): 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na/ grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du gyurang nas
60a8(mdo): mchis par 'gyur zhing / nor chen po 'du ba 'grub par thob par 'gyur ro// mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bkye ste/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag par gsal na/ dpal lha mo chen
60a9(mdo): mo'i dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsold cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'ug ma'i nang du stsal te/ mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyi ste/ ci tsa
60b1(mdo): du bsrel pa de srid du myi rda' bar gyur nas/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang na shing gcig gam/ 'bab chu gcig par la tu la 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ dbang
60b2(mdo): bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ma thams cad dbang du gyur da nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su pyod pa dang / ci srid 'tsho
60b3(mdo): 'bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan nyi shu bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po'i chen po'i skye bo'i gtsug tu bzhag la/ 'khro ba'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/ chab dang nyungs kar gyis
60b4(mdo): dbang bskur bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ mngag bzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la hu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa ste/
60b5(mdo): nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas mchog/ thams cad stsolod par 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid par 'gyu
60b6(mdo): ro// ya tul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'phe gas pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ 'bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na/ ci srid du lhung bzed nal tu
60b7(mdo): mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi dkyil
60b8(mdo): 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gis rigs sngags 'chang ba la yon
60b9(mdo): sbyong bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// la tu ya lan brgya brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ 'the bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur la/ lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ ma zab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o//
61a1(mdo): de nas a rka'i lam sreg shing gis me swA ma la/ la tu de me yab kyi dbus su bzhag ste mar dang / sungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsis bsres pas// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa/
61a2(mdo): brgyad tshang ba dang / me lha me'i rang bzhin gyis gzugs kyis byung nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tsham par byas so// bdag dga' bar gyur da to// rigs
61a3(mdo): sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis/ rigs sngags 'cha ci ltar yid la bsams shing 'dod pa smros shika dang / mchog sbyin no// rigs sngags 'chad kyis ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog
61a4(mdo): brjod par bgyi'o// me lha des kyang thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas/ mchis par 'gyur ro// las thams cad 'grub pa stsold par 'gyur ro// me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs nas/ 'od zer stong 'phro ba
61a5(mdo): rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te/ chab nas 'byung ba bzhin no// lag pas mye rnams 'tshug par bgyid do// 'bar/ bzhin du klad pa'i skye bor bzhag na/ sgra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshag
61a6(mdo): par myi bgyid de/ mye'i dbang du mchi bar myi 'gyur ro// 'bar bzhi na du g.yar kyi nang du bsrel na cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mya 'gyur ro// lus la bab na ci ltar tsan dan bzhin du bsal zhing bde bar 'gyur
61a7(mdo): ro/ ka gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bkyeng par 'gyur ro// gos kyi mtha' mar phum po bgyis na 'tshig par myi 'gyur ro// chab kyi nang du stsal na/ 'gum par myi 'gyur ro// sbyin bsregs thams cad kyi cho ga so
61a8(mdo): so 'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du grub pa dgos pa sros par 'gyur ro// dgos pa gang drang gang du bskos pa de dang der dgos pa 'grub pa smos dpar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gsang sngags dang /
61a9(mdo): dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga grub pa thams cad lung 'bog par 'gyur ro// du ba dang / rlung dang / me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag chang stong du mchis shing / slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston
61b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du grub pa su sad par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod me 'bar ba// bla myed 'bar bzang bsgrub 'tshal na// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang / kazi brjid/
61b2(mdo): nyi ma dang mnyam pas// phyogs bcu 'khor 'khor yug gi// kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid// bsgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'tshed pa bla na myed pa 'grub// bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags// nor bstsu/
61b3(mdo): smra ba bla na myed// gzhan 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa// grub pa bla na myed pa lags// ci ltar nyin bzhin mtshan 'da' bas// nyan par kyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan cig dgos pa bsgrub pa na// legs par las
61b4(mdo): bgyis nor bu dang // rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la/ gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang // gtsang mas spyad pa bsgrub pa dang // don yod chu dang mye dang ni// mo'i shing rnams
61b5(mdo): brjod par bgyi// me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste// de dag thams cad gcig yungs pa'o// yam sreg cho ga bla na myed// can ngan dang ni seng ldeng dang // bi tang kar bi ra dang // a ka
61b6(mdo): s+ya spyug a dang // shir sha ka rna ka ri dang // 'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing // p+la ka sha dang ni sna ma dang // gAn d+ha bar shi pad ma'i// rtsa ba dang ne lo mar bcas// pad ma dkar po ku mu ta// ud pa la/
61b7(mdo): me tog lo ma ma/ bi tsa pu ra bis pa shing // sid du ba ri tsam ba ka/ dr-i ka pi tsu ma re tsa// sa ha pa la tsi tra ka// shing de kun ka bsdus pa'i// ya ma sreg shing kyis las bgyis te// yungs kar mar dang zho dang
61b8(mdo): ni// sbrad rtsi 'bras yos spyir bsregs bkye// babang po'i bas las srang gsum dang // mtshal las nyis 'gyur kar kus kyang // srang gcig can dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu ldong gros srang gcig ste// de dag
61b9(mdo): bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang // de bzhin lung ni nyis 'gyur dag/ zhe ka dag ni bkang nas su// me lab dbus su gzhug par bgyi// sbyin bsreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du// sha na tu mnyam bzhag legs gsal pa/
62a1(mdo): rtsabs sang mar gyod pa'i// kos 'cha legs par zhus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri'i sa bskos pas bgyi// ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang // me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod// bzlas brjod kyi de sbyin bsresa?/
