62a2(mdo): bkyed// stong rtsa brgyad ni chang ba dang // de nas A bshos gtor ma dang // me tog gdug pa mchod yon snod// dbul te 'o mas bdag ma dkum// 'o mas zhig zhi bar bgyid// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kyis bzlas
62a3(mdo): brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas// yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kyis/
62a4(mdo): zhi ka de la mchod par bkye'o// de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu'am/ rdul kyi sgrom bur zhig nas nor bu de blangs te/ sbom bu der bzhag par bgyi ste/ yang bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'di yang dza/
62a5(mdo): yod par 'bar bamathu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nyid mo/ ke ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nam 'tshed pa'i dus
62a6(mdo): kyi tshe nor bu de bzhag na'ache ba dang / sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe/ zab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ sreg blugs kyis sbyin sregs bgyis na/
62a7(mdo): me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa'i rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par zhus bgyis
62a8(mdo): pa kos gtsang sa bgos pa ga la yang dang kro mtshon bsdams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'ide kyi po'i gtsug tu bzhag nas/ gcig pu gsul kyi dbus su bzhugs nas// de nas skyes pa de me/ 'bar ba gcig
62a9(mdo): sum 'gyur ro// de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha ros kyi dpung rnams 'pham par gyur nas/ phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar 'gyur ro// phyi nas lam 'gal yang pha rol kyi dpung dang / dgral 'jigs pa 'dra
62b1(mdo): bar myi 'gyur ro// pha rol kyi dgra dang myi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// lag pas nor bu bzung nas/ phug gi gnas su zhugs na gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas/
62b2(mdo): pa thams cad mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas/ lag pas nor bu bzung ste gnas kyi nang du zhugs na/ chab thams cad kyi phyir myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas klu thams cad
62b3(mdo): mdun na mchis nas bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro// dbang du gyur da nas ji srid mtsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro// bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// lo tog dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / nags
62b4(mdo): tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// snyan cing mdang sa dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / myi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro//
62b5(mdo): sems can gang dag gis yang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la longs pyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan ches mang po dag gi dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ro//
62b6(mdo): nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po la ga sa so// de nas don yod snang bas rnam par lta bas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/ rang gi gzugs su
62b7(mdo): blta bar 'tshal na/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang mang mas kos mang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// lus legs par bkrus ste/ spros chab kyis byug par bgyi'o// shing a rka'i yam sreg shing kyis me sbar bar
62b8(mdo): lo// nyungs kar dang / a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar sbyar bas/ stongs brkyang sbyin bsregs bkye'o// de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bsreg krugs
62b9(mdo): kyi spyan bsregs bgyis na/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ci ltar yid la
63a1(mdo): bcir cing / bsams pa'i mchos stsos dpar bgyid ngo // de das rigs sngags 'ang gis ci snang yings bgyis zhing / bsams pa'i mchog snyam pa dang de'i 'og tu 'phyags lnga sbya mag rinapa/
63a2(mdo): dbang byug gis thams cad so par bgyid do// / de nas kyig sman bsgrub par 'a a na/ rigs sngags 'chang des legs pa zhus te/ gtsams gos gnangs bgo bar bgyi'o// nu na
63a3(mdo): ba bkyes te/ des 'angs kyi ba ma tog bgyis la/ de nas myig smad so'i bi ra dang / srung ba nyis 'gyur du bsres pas dkang bar bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brkyang bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zab kyi dbus su bzhan
63a4(mdo): par bgyi'o// de'i steng du u shing ra dang / nyungs kar dang / tsamangan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas lan stong rtsargyad sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// shing a rka'i me sbar bar bkyi'o//
63a5(mdo): yan stong rtsa brkyang tshang ba dang / de nas myig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhig tu btags la/ ldong gros dang / ka pur dang / kla mer bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa
63a6(mdo): snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ don yod snying po'i rigs sngags rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni/ thams cad 'gugs pa legs par sbyar te/ de nas don yod
63a7(mdo): rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo // de nas myig sman kyis byugs na/ nam mkhal sa 'phur nas// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro//
63a8(mdo): skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskaldad pa khri 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// pral bar thig le bgyis na mye gda' bar 'gyur ro// myig la bskus te tshig gzhan myi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun
63a9(mdo): mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyur ro// nor 'du ba 'grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjod kyi dus su myig
63b1(mdo): la bskus na/ bkyegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis myi mthong bar 'gyur ro// byas kyang bsregs bgyid par myi 'gyur ro// bar chad bgyid par myi 'gyur ro// bde brgya bsgrub pa'i
63b2(mdo): cho ka dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro// myig la byugs te/ skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na/ de dag thams cad dbang du gyur da te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lha basbub dang / rgyad pal po
63b3(mdo): 'grub par 'gyur ro// bud myed kyang myi 'dzums par lta bzhin du bdag nyid dam nor dbang du 'gyur ro// myig la byugs te dgon pa chen por zhugs ma/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan zan gdug pa dang /
63b4(mdo): sbrul dang / dbyig dug dang / sbrul gyi dug kyi 'jigs pa khams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ bde legs su slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'bab mo dang / mod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad
63b5(mdo): la myig la bskus na/ smra ba rnams kyi bla na myed par 'gyur// thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa// 'i nang du mchis nas/ myig la byugs na/ thams cad las
63b6(mdo): rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la myig bskus na/ gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rims zhag cig pa dang / zhag
63b7(mdo): gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la myig la bskus na/ rims thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// dug myi bzad pa 'tshal ba la myig bskus na/ dug ma mchis par 'gyur
63b8(mdo): ro// gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la myig bskus na/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las za rad par 'gyur ro// myig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro// glad pa phyed bro 'tshal ba lA yang mya
63b9(mdo): bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa'o srin po'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyis zin pa la myig bskus pa tsam gyis tha rad par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos 'khros pas bsad par 'os pa gang du yang rung ba khrid pa myig
64a1(mdo): bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'atha rad par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i myig la bskus na/ rang gi gzugs kyis dus nas mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad sposad cing dgo/
64a2(mdo): pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyurd nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo'i myig a bskas te/ myig myi gzugs par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ dpal
64a3(mdo): lha mo chen mo mchis nas/ dgos pa thams cad dang / 'bru rab tu mang po stsol par 'gyur ro// nyes pa'i tshe myig la bskus te nyas na/ skye lam bzang po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras
64a4(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong ba stsold par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad bcold par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro// myig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na/ mchod pa chen po
64a5(mdo): 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan kyi myig bskus na/ rtag tu mchog stsol par 'gyur/ ro// rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'gyi wang dang lhan cig
64a6(mdo): sbyar te/ myag la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas/ dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// don chen po grub par yA
64a7(mdo): 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo'i dang / blon po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyurang nas/ thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyad kyi myig bskus na/
64a8(mdo): gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mye ro'i myig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyis zi nad pa thams cad kyi myig la bskus la dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsapa
64a9(mdo): sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing / lan 'gal sa slar pas kyis nod par myi 'gyur ro// bkres pa'i myigs bskus te grong du zhugs na/ bza' ba dang / btung ba'i ston mo spyod kyis grub cing 'thob par #
64b1(mdo): ro// 'asod snyoms pa'i myig la bsdus te bsod snyoms la mchis na/ khabs sna tshogs mang po dang / sod pas po ma 'chos par 'gyur ro// spre ba dang / ling tog dang / ba rib dang / chu zur dang / mtshan mo 'thob pa/
64b2(mdo): dang / g.yal ba dang tshag po dang / myig gi rdzi ma rung ba dang / myig sle bo de dag thams cad 'i bar 'gyur ro// myig dang thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro// lha'i myig dag pa 'dab bzangs dang mtshungs pa dang / 'da' ba
64b3(mdo): kyi mthong ba thob nas/ thams cad kyi snying du stug pa dang / dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang / don grub pa yang thob nas dbang phyug bla na myed par yang 'gyur ro// de nas nor dang 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan
64b4(mdo): dang / rgyan 'phyang thams cad dkrug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / don yong rtse'i sgra dgug pa'i sbyin bsreg rgya chen po brjod par 'akye'o// / grub pa kun gyi bla ra myed// don kun bsgrub pas mod la ni/
64b5(mdo): mkhas rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid// dbang phyug bskal papa phun sum tshogs// modo nyid 'o nar thob 'gyur ba// tsam du yang myi 'gyur zhing // yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags
64b6(mdo): so// rtsang mas rtsang ma'i gos dag dang // legs par bkrus pas las bsgrub po// sbyin bsregs bla na myed 'phel ba// 'di ni rgya chen bsam myi khyab// ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas// 'dab ma me tog/
64b7(mdo): 'bras bur bcas/ a rka'i shing dang p+lag shing dang // yam sreg dag gis me sbar la// sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas// 'bras yos til dang nyungs kar dang // zho dang sbrang rtse mar dang ni// nyungs kar
64b8(mdo): ngag dang bsres pa yis// sbyin bsregs stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyi// 'kho bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba chang ba dang / de nas dzin yod sngags kyu'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po lar brgya
64b9(mdo): brgyad bzlas nas/ ku gul dang / skye rtse'i 'bras bu dang / mar du sbyar bas sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang // de'i tshe bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gnas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi
65a1(mdo): rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro// gos sna tshogs dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / me tog dang / dri dang /
65a2(mdo): 'greng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug gi 'byord pa chen po thob par 'gyur zhing // ci srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba yar kyi po'i tshes brgyad
65a3(mdo): la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas/ myig la bskus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya bcings
65a4(mdo): te/ de nas myig la myig sman kyis bskus na/ nam mkhal sa rngu 'phrul kyis mche bar 'gyur ro// myig sman grub pa'i rigs sngan/ sa 'chang thams cad kyi rtsa bo/ rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur
65a5(mdo): ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir// 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// myi ka sman 'das myig la byugs nas// / nyon mo ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing / myi
65a6(mdo): gda' bar yang 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na/ thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa don
65a7(mdo): yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal mod/ bam po bdun pa// / myig sman 'dis myig la byugs nas/ ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/ lha rtse bo de dag myig myi 'dzus
65a8(mdo): par lta bar bgyid pa la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas ma mo dang / gtso bo'i lha thams cad mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad sacosad par 'gyur ro// ci srid 'tsho
65a9(mdo): 'a bar du las thams cad bsgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i dgo ces kyis yongs su bskor cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// rtag par rgyun tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir
65b1(mdo): gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'di 'ang bsgrub pa'i sbyin sregs kyi chog brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa yis// rigs sngags 'chang ba med myong zhing // lha dang lha min mchod pa
65b2(mdo): dang // bsgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang // dbang du 'gyur ba dam pa dang // mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang // gyi snang ni nang tu rnyed dka' dang // mod la bug tu 'jug pa dang // nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang /
65b3(mdo): de sul dag tu 'dug pa dang // bang das la ni rgyu ba dang // klu gnas mchor ni 'dug pa dang // de bzhin du klu pa bskas dang // chu 'grus 'grub pa bskyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang // nang kun ni/
65b4(mdo): par bgyid pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/ gsul ngor gsus las rgyal bgyid do// rtag tu ngan kun bam/ bar bgyid// gdod rigs kun ka char gcod cing // rims rnams
65b5(mdo): thams cad bzlog par 'gying // sngon kyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing // sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// dbang phyug gro sa cing skal pa bcol// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyid/
65b6(mdo): 'drab pa 'thab mo rtsod pa dang // 'byed pa rab tu'i bar bgyid/ bcing ba dag ning sgrog dang / 'od sgril lugs smog phye mar klog/ rgyal po gdug pa 'thos pa yis// gsad par 'os pa selang bar/
65b7(mdo): ban// bltar 'di la bste na pa sa// myi bdag bu stug bzhin smra zhing // kyi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang // gnas kun mchis par mchod par 'os// lus can steng du d+hakaH
65b8(mdo): sdug/ rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i// rtag tu gan chen dag tu 'gyur// dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni// rgyal rigs rje 'u rdzogs dang dus rigs dang // bud rtsed kun dang de bzhin du/ skyes pa khye'u za mo
65b9(mdo): rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// 'gi wang bla na myed pa'o// 'di la gang dag rtag bsten na// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste// mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod par bgyid// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che//
66a1(mdo): nyin dang mtshan du bsrung ba dang // rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so// gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang // klu'i rgyal po mthu chen dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang // grul bum myi myin lto 'phye che//
66a2(mdo): dri za sA myin nyid dag dang // nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te// de dag thams cad bsrung ba'i// ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu// rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur// 'ag 'ang grub pa dam pa po// de ltar stobs
66a3(mdo): dang ldan pa lags// de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba yis// rtsa 'gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas// rtsang ma'i ni kos bgo ste// 'og wa legs par bsgrubs nas su// dmar po chen po nyid dag dang // gur gum
66a4(mdo): ngag dang mnyam sbyar la// zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun tu// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas// rgya dar kyis ni kha dgum mo//
66a5(mdo): de nas seng sdeng kyi shing dang / arka'i shing gyi yam sreg shing kyi me sbar la// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / gu gus dang / 'bras dang / til dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar du
66a6(mdo): bsres te/ san stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// lan stong brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo ya sa zhi ba dang / zal pa blangs te snod kyi nang du saHla nas/ de nas slar yang lan brgya
66a7(mdo): rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro// de nas bral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis na/ nam mkhal la 'phur nas/ rigs sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po
66a8(mdo): 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing / skra cung zad 'byil par yang 'gyur ro// lo dgu wa~M dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing / gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed
66a9(mdo): par 'gyur ro// bral ba la thig le bkyes na/ myi gangadal bar gyur nas/ gnas thams cad du zhugs na/ gnas thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo
66b1(mdo): thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ci srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// myig/
66b2(mdo): la bskus na ci ltar nyan par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// sa'i phug dang zang kyi sgo bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi gnas su zhugs nas/ zang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/
66b3(mdo): skam yang mchis par 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ khyim dang gzhas myed khang ci lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhas myed khang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
66b4(mdo): chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur pa nas mchis par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ci ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag la thuH
66b5(mdo): te/ g.yul ngor 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na/ ya lad dang / go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ btsun
66b6(mdo): mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur da nas mchis par 'gyur ro// gang la tshig smras pa de thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang la bslangs pa de thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// gang la bsgo bdebs
66b7(mdo): nga pa no ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// khar 'chos nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang / der skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur da nas mchis par 'gyur ro//
66b8(mdo): lam pa g.yas pa la byugs na/ su la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyeg dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du myu rad nas/
66b9(mdo): bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// 'dzub mo g.yas pa la skus na/ ser ba dang / srin dang / 'brug gi dus su srin la mngon gsum du bstan te/ bsngags na grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar
67a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu zil kyis mnan par 'gyur ro// char ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon gsum du bstand pas/ ha cang ches pa gcod par 'gyur ro// char gyi
67a2(mdo): 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag 'thil la byugs nas/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ de'i mod la klo'i rgyal pos char kyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyur ro// gal te mod la char
67a3(mdo): myi 'bebs na/ de'i tshe sam lngar brdegs pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyis char kyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe char pa myi 'bebs pa de'i tshe klu thams cad la glad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te
67a4(mdo): lan bdun bsnun na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad tshul ma yin pa'i sku ga bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rigs phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zi nad pa thams cad
67a5(mdo): kyi myig la bskus na/ bskus pa tsam gyi mod la/ gdon brgyadakhri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// / rims kyis thebs pa/ rnams kyi bral ba la thig le bgyis na/ rims nyin gcig pa'i//
67a6(mdo): nyan gnyis pa 'am/ nyon gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis zi nad pa thams cad la zhus bgyis na/ mod la nad thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro//
67a7(mdo): sha bkra dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu rnams las tha rad par 'gyur ro// lba ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / shu ba mched pa dang / 'brum bu 'phra mo mtshad
67a8(mdo): pa la byugs pa tsam gyis tha rad par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zi nad pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis myi gdug par 'gyur ro// dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad sa 'tshal ba tsam gyis pa rad par 'gyur ro//
67a9(mdo): ljon pa dang / sman dang / dbu chu dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / 'jang na ba dang / chad pa dang / gcin srin sri ba dang / gsung pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rtug skam la bsros nas 'a
67b1(mdo): pa tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyis lan 'gal yang gnod pa bgyid par myi 'gyur ro// tshogs mar 'gyi wang ki ri lur ba byas te/ phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas/ sa ka pa g.yas pa la yang byugs te/ sgo
67b2(mdo): bas mos brdegs na/ phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// bka tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi ste/ slar cung zad kyang bkyegs babyed par myi 'gyur ro// gnas de na gnas pa kang lags pa de dag khams
67b3(mdo): cad dbang du gyu rad nas/ mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// dgos pa bsgrub pa chen po thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// rkang pa gnyis la byugs te me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na/ me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du
67b4(mdo): mchis nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ rigs sngags 'chang la rigs sngags 'chang bdag gi gzhal myed khang gi gnas su zhugs shig/ rigs sngags 'chang gi bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par brgya'o//
67b5(mdo): zhes smras pa na/ de'i tshe rigs sngags 'chad kyis bgyi ba ci mchis// pa de bsgo bar bkye ste/ thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/ glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan
67b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// baR+Ya gnyis la byugs na tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyad du 'gyur ro// byin pa la byugs na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol da tu rgal bar 'gyur ro// mgrin pa la byugs nas/ nags
67b7(mdo): lung du zhugs na/ nags khud kyi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas sman kyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// se ma pa mas kyad/ rgya man du/ zes dang/ ri yul dang / sman
67b8(mdo): gzhong du zhugs nas/ skad rngag po la gsum gdod par bgyi ste/ ri sus dang sman gzhong gi gdas klas ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas gnas pa gung lags pa de dag thams cad rang gi/
67b9(mdo): gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur na pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de na \u0f7f dang / shing gel ba dang / nags chang tshing kyi sman gyi rjes ga lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur
68a1(mdo): zhing / gang dag bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la/ bcud bsrung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ci ltar 'tshal bar bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos/
68a2(mdo): apa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// snying kar thig le bgyis nas/ snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la grub par 'gyur ro// stol thig le bgyis na
68a3(mdo): kha zas dang btung ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rtsib logs gnyis la byugs na/ ci ltar bsams shing don tu gnyer ba yi gos rnams
68a4(mdo): thob par 'gyur ro// skal tshags la byugs na ci ltar yid la bsas pa'i mal dang / stan thob par 'gyur ro// rna ba la byugs sam/ gnad dang gnad rnams kyi gnas su byugs na/ ci ltar bsams pa
68a5(mdo): rgyan dang / lcab lhub thob par 'gyur ro// mjug ro la byugs na rta'i bzhon pa thob par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan myi smra ba ra' gyi wang ri lu re re la don yod
68a6(mdo): rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang mo la tshig sa su bcad pa stong klags na 'dzind par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas/ klags na 'dzind par
68a7(mdo): 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro// zhag bcu bzhir bgyis na myo 'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na/ thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por
68a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// ka la bying ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rno ba'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig saHla na/ bya rog lta bu dang / mo sham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// btson rar stsal
68a9(mdo): pa dang / shing sgrog dang / lcags sgrog dang / gtan pa dang / khong sgril la byugs na/ byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur chag par 'gyur ro// 'thor bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcu bzha'am/
68b1(mdo): tshes bco lnga la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la 'khro bo'i rgyal pos rab la dbang bskur nas/ 'akyai tshad gyi ri lu dang / spos chab bsres pas zhus bgyi'o// zhus bgyis pa tsam gyi
68b2(mdo): mod la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nub gsum du zhus bgyis na gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang bsgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par
68b3(mdo): 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / mya mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis mya tshugs par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyi thams cad du 'jigs pa mya 'byung zhing yongs su thar
68b4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mya 'gyur ro// 'gyi wang gyi ri lu til mar dang bsres te/ kha gdong la byugs na/ rgyal po'i mdun du mchis na bu bzhin du
68b5(mdo): par du 'khyung nas/ dga' ba chen po thob pa dang / rgyal po 'khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lus thog/ zag tu byugs na gsad par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon kyis
68b6(mdo): phog par myi 'gyur te/ dum bu dum bur chag par 'gyur ro// mda' 'phangs na lus la/ 'bab par myi 'gyur zhing / gzhu chag par 'gyur ro// 'gyi wang gyi ri lu mgul du btags na/
68b7(mdo): 'brog dgon pa dang / r-i dang / nags tshang tshing kyi bgreng dka' bar zhugs na/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / myi dang myi ma lags pa dang / gcan zan
68b8(mdo): gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ myi gda' bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na/ thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thams
68b9(mdo): cad du mchod kanas chen por yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po rtsi ba myed pas pha rol zil kyis gnon par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ skyes pa dang / bud myed
69a1(mdo): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du gyur da te/ thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// dgos pa mang po chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// byin
69a2(mdo): pa g.yas pa la btags na/ dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mche bar 'gyur ro// 'akyi wad kyi ri lu khar bsrel la lag pa g.yas pas nyungs kar kyis don yod lcags kyu bzlas drangs te/ tshig gzhan myi s+ya/
69a3(mdo): smra bar gnas mthon por 'dzegs te/ phyogs gang du bsags pa'i skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der nyungs kar gyis gtor na/ mod la bkug par 'gyur te mchi bar 'gyur
69a4(mdo): ro// gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na yang gdon myi 'tshal ba re zhag gsum gyis mchi bar 'gyur te/ yid gnyis myaM bgyi'o// lag pa g.yas pa'am lag pa g.yon pa la 'gyi wa pa ts+ya
69a5(mdo): ril lu btags na/ gang du reg par nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyeg/ dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / shang kau sha la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / rdul dang / gos dang / lhag lha ba de dag thams
69a6(mdo): cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ mi 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro// byan tshad du zhugs nas tshang bar kyi skor thal mos brdabs na/ 'chad pa dang bcod po la kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/
69a7(mdo): gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// spos 'tshong kyi tshong 'ang du mchis na/ tshong khang kyi yo byad thams cad mche bar 'gyur ro// chang 'tshod kyi sgor thal mos brdabs na/ chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar
69a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// bang ba'i sgor thal mos brdabs ra/ 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas/ 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyis na/ bu ram gyi khu ba dang / sha kha ra'i glegs
69a9(mdo): bu thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro// grong khyer kyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mos brdabs na/ grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid bsrog par 'gyur ro// dgra bo'i
69b1(mdo): sgor btab na bskrad pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// mtshon cha mkhan kyi khyim du 'phangs na/ mtshon cha dang go cha rnams rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor btab na/ phas kyi rgol ba dang /
69b2(mdo): myi mdza' ba dang / sems can gdug pa thams cad bcing ba dang / rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// dupal byugs nas bus nas/ sgras gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang /
69b3(mdo): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / byad dang / dug sbyar ma dang / duka dang / rad las yongs su tha rang bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi skor bus na/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / myi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi
69b4(mdo): 'gyur ro// phyugs lhas su bus na/ 'o ma sems cad 'phrogs par 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// ra lug gi lhas su bus na/ ra luka gi 'om phrogs par 'gyur te/ kar 'chal
69b5(mdo): ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du bus na/ thams cad sgren mor gyurd nas/ gos thams cad dgu ga par 'gyur ro// rdza rdal byugs te khyams mthon po'i steng
69b6(mdo): du bdungs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad bcing sa pa dang / bshig par 'gyur te tshugs par myi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya'o ra khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro//
69b7(mdo): grong khyer ram/ yul 'khor dag tu bus na nad dang / sems kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tsha ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'bab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar

69b9(mdo): can thams cad dang thun mong ba/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa/ nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i
70a1(mdo): dkon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed thams cad rlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o// rigs
70a2(mdo): sngags 'chang rtsang mar gyu rad pas legs par khrus khakyis te/ spros dri zhim pos lus byugs la gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ spos dri zhim pos bsgos pas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag

70b8(mdo): la khor yug tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bsgrub pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi dang dpung dang bcas te/ yongs su sbyong ba dang / bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang
70b9(mdo): sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / srung ba dang / yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'in rtag par rgyun tu bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang /
71a1(mdo): sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po rgyal po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i dbang po 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor zas/
71a2(mdo): cad kyis yul de legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gzi byin rtso lad par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra 'or yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong
71a3(mdo): dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / rmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i
71a4(mdo): las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gags pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro//
71a5(mdo): phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshigs thams cad yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur/ ro// sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byi nad pa ston
71a6(mdo): par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su bsku nga ba'i don du nyi ma dang zla ba rgyu skar kyi tshogs dang / bcas pa legs par 'byor da par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs
71a7(mdo): dbang phyug rtag par rgyun tu skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byind par 'gyur ro// yongs su bsrung ba dang / yid kyi dag pa thams cad yongs su
71a8(mdo): rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang du lta bar 'gyur ro// de nas des sbyin bsregs kyi thal ba dang / dri chu'i skyo ma bgyis te/ phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na/ mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis
71a9(mdo): par 'gyur ro// nad kyis gzi rad pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nad thams cad la thig le bgyis na/ rims nad thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// dri chab dang thal bas
71b1(mdo): khrus bgyis na/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btson pad mchis pa'am phyag sbas na mchis pa'i gos la bskus na/ ral par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa
71b2(mdo): dang / dug gis myos pa khams cad la bskus ma gdunag par gyi 'gyur ro// / me dgug pa'i sbyin glegs kyi choga'o// rdzogs s+ho//
71b3(mdo): de nas par sa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khoma'i dang / pad ma rigs 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i 'gas pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyis 'khor cho ka'i ba mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par
71b4(mdo): bkye ste/ 'di ni ma bsgrubs par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs rgyu skar babang po dang // shi rang tu bkra shis mchog dge la// legs par zhus bgyi gos snang bgo// byams pa'i sems la/
71b5(mdo): mnyam par gzhag// sems can kun la brtse ba dang / snying dam pas brgyan pa dang // dron yong zhags pa rigs sngags che// grub pa bla myed cho ga'i rgyas// klags pas las nas
71b6(mdo): thams cad dag// 'grub par bgyid do som nyi byed// 'jig te/ bla ma'i snying po dag/ de bzhi gang dag tug brjod na// suHcan rtag tu mchon sbyin kyi// kyas na pa ma rag tu 'gyur/
71b7(mdo): ltar gang ga snyed kyi// sangs rgyas bye bu zag stong la// bsod nams srung po 'i zag ste// dge ba'i rtsapa rdzogs pa dang // sangs rgyas bya ba bgyi mar 'gyu'o// smang bu bgyis ras banas 'dzid
71b8(mdo): mkhas pa'i myis ni brjod bgyid pa// dge slong ba dang dge slong ma// dge bsnyen po smos de bzhin du/ bde ba can du myur du mchi// sdug bsngal myi bzang rtsong 'gyur ba'o// nyon mongs pa las tha rad par
71b9(mdo): 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub dag/ ma thong bar 'gyur te som nye myed// de nas dor yod pa'i 'gas pa'i snying po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin su// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod
72a1(mdo): k+She ni las bgyis na// rigs sngags 'chang byas de nyid 'gyur// dron yong 'gas pa'i gzugs brgyan kyi// mdun du lci ba'i dkyil 'khod kyi// chu ba'i 'or 'oms sur+tha/ ma
72a2(mdo): kar po zhib mo yis// gru bzhi lham par theg gdab po// ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag// dbus nas ngos bzhir gnyis su dbab// tsan dan dkar pos bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor mchog la pad ma dag/
72a3(mdo): 'dab brgya gur kum kyis gtor cing // pad ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu// ma zhom pa'i bum pa ni// spos chab kyis ni bkang ba'i// nyungs kar ldan pa bzhag par bgyi// a ka ru'i gdug pa dbul// bum
72a4(mdo): pa kang ba'ang dgod par bkye// me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi// mchod yon sdod kyi gzhi gzhag go// rigs sngags 'chang ba rtsang gyu rad pas// rtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi/
72a5(mdo): legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang / gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang // dkar gsum zas mi 'tshal nas su// dus gsum du ni zhus bgyi'o// dus gsum bzlas brjod
72a6(mdo): bgyi ba ni// don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag// dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi// mngon gsum dkyil mo krung bcas te// bzlas
72a7(mdo): brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su// bgrang 'phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi// 'dzub mo dang ni 'the bo dag// brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba'i// yid kyis byams sems mnyam par bzhag/ ting 'dzin brtan pas
72a8(mdo): lus snyoms par// legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta// tshig gzhan gyi smra bzlas brjod ba kyi// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya
72a9(mdo): bcings te// phyag bgyis na sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// brtan pa' sems kyis skrag par mya brgya'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug
72b1(mdo): don yong 'gas pa zhabs mthong ba tsam du bres la/ tsaM tsam na lathe bo'i rgyal po san bdun bzlas so// lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ sa chen po g.yo zhing sma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags
72b2(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug ki bral ba nas 'od zer byung nas/ kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dka' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / sho nad tu rab tu dkal bas spu'i
72b3(mdo): zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du blta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngo g.yas pa
72b4(mdo): nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myig bsgyur bar bgyi cing / shi nad tu legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas/ rags sngags 'chang gyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
72b5(mdo): dag pa thob nas/ lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan pa/ ro 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba sa ya phrag stong la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
72b6(mdo): thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// lus 'dzem pa dang / shi na tu gzhon sha chags pa dang / mnyen par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil ba dang / mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig sa
72b7(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// myig yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur te// lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / gnyer ma dang skra skya bo spangs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la lta ba dga'
72b8(mdo): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind 'thob par 'gyur ro// ci tsam gdugs rtsen 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs stond cing / dbugs 'byind par mdzad de/ lag pa g.yas pa skye bor bzhan
72b9(mdo): nas mchog thams cad bcosad par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchi ba'am/ myi rnga bar bgyi ba'am/ lho'i myig thob pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta ba'am// ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'am/ gzungs rab
73a1(mdo): tu thob pa dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa'am/ gtsug lag smra ba'am/ gsang sngags smra ba'am/ zos pa 'dzind pa nyid dam/ gter smra ba'am/ nor bsgyur ba/
73a2(mdo): smra ba'am/ myig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am// phug tu 'jug pa'ama?/ klu'i gnas su 'jug pa 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dgug pa'am/ srin po dgug pa 'am/ ro langs bslang
73a3(mdo): ba 'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ r-i la rgyu ba 'am/ grong khyer du 'jug pa 'am/ sman blta ba'i phyir 'jug pa'am/ ral gri'i rigs sngags 'chang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang nyid dam/
73a4(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa'am/ yul gyi bdag po nyid dam/ dpung chen po rab tu gzhom pa dang / bskrad pa 'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag
73a5(mdo): thams cad soHlad par 'gyur ro// dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol par 'gyur ro// ji ltar gang 'tshal bar yongs su skyong ba ra 'gyur ro// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byung bar 'gyu
73a6(mdo): ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sems can thams cad la lta ba/ sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// myag sman bsgrub par 'tshal bas der zla ba
73a7(mdo): yar kye po'i tshes brgyad la/ ldong gros kyi myig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du swaHla te/ tsan dan kyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ legs par khrus bgyis
73a8(mdo): te/ gos rtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dkyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o//
73a9(mdo): 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun tu bzlas par bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo su yang rung bas 'phags pa'i lam yan las
73b1(mdo): brgyad kyi snyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ zangs kyi sdod 'bar ba dang / rlangs pa dang / dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas myig la byug+sa
73b2(mdo): na/ nam mkhal la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs grub thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / rigs sngags 'cha
73b3(mdo): 'khor los spyar ba chen por 'gyur ro// mug gi gnas bye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tsha
73b4(mdo): ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon dang / myi dang / myi ma yin dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mya mdza' ba thams cad myi gda' bar 'gyur ro//
73b5(mdo): tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la cheg gzhan gyismra bar 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun tu dkyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas lan stong ma brkyad bzlas
73b6(mdo): brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis yod la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ lha'i bdag nyid kyis rA bzhin gyi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis na/ lag pa g.yas pa
73b7(mdo): gyi bor bzhas pa dang / dri myed 'phags kyi lto ba'i tshe 'phrul zhes bkye ba'i ting nge 'dzind 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa khams cad kyi gzigs pa'i byid kyi rlabs bkod pa lung dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba
73b8(mdo): rdzu 'phrul thob nas/ tshe'i tshad lha'i bsgrasad pa stong du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
73b9(mdo): rgyas 'od dpag myed kyis ngas pa'i chos kyis gtam gleng bar mdzad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du/ lha'i gzugs mdun na/
74a1(mdo): mchis par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// pad ma snang ba'i gzhal myed 'ang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa rtseg ma ligazhal myed khang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra
74a2(mdo): ba'i bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des spos chab des bum pa bkang nas/ lan khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa s+ya na ras gziH
74a3(mdo): dbang phyug gis mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyurd par zhus bgyi'o// zhus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur/
74a4(mdo): ro// tshe lho'i lo khrir 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad
74a5(mdo): bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam mam/ sems bskyed pa tsa ma gyi mod la/ gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams cadababs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// bden pa 'am
74a6(mdo): myi bden pa 'am/ yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa'am/ skal ba dang myi ldan pa'am/ byung pa 'am/ ma byung ba 'am/ 'byor da pa dang / rgyas pa dang /
74a7(mdo): bde ba dang / lo legs pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// de las bstsogs te las bgyis pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur ro// yang na
74a8(mdo): 'jig rten thams cad so sor bsgral ba thams cad 'tshal lam/ thams cad dbang du gyur da nas bzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshan rje'i
74a9(mdo): 'jig rten las tha rad par bgyi bar 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'tshal lam/ don yod pa'i zhags pa
74b1(mdo): 'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so bzhin du/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/ ral pa'i thor tshugs
74b2(mdo): dang / raM dgas e ne ya'i pags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dkyil mo krung ngam/ 'greng ba drung nor bzangs pus mo g.yas pa phab pa g.yon na/ 'gro ba
74b3(mdo): 'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba/ khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag myed kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste/ ro'i steng gyi pad ma
74b4(mdo): l-i stan la mchis par bkye'o// gtsang mas gos rtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du zhus bgyis nas/ nyin zhag gcig mchis te/ rigs sngags 'chad kyis pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bkye'o// chab
74b5(mdo): dang nyungs kar gyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// snying rje chen pos gdungs pa'i snying kyis blta bar bgyi'o// gal te 'di lta bu'i cho gas myi bgyid na/ blags pa tsam gyis
74b6(mdo): mod la yang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho ga lta smos kyang chi 'tshal// yang rigs sngags 'chang kang zhig klang ka'i klung bye ba zag brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i
74b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam// lta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems cad thams cad dge ba la
74b8(mdo): ba rab tu gzhag par 'tshal ba 'am/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma'am
74b9(mdo): rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo'am/ gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyi ste/ des ci 'byor da pa'i gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o// de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan
75a1(mdo): te/ gzhag la gur kum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/ grwa bzhi cha 'byes par li kris thig gdab par bkye'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad ma'i 'phreng ba brgya'o// pad ma'i 'phreng ba'i dbus su
75a2(mdo): ril bA s+ye blugs dang / bkrung 'phreng bzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o// spos chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o// mchod
75a3(mdo): yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi'o// pog por lnga nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o// dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par brgya
75a4(mdo): 'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gyi mdun du dkyil mo krung bcas te mchi sa nas/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bdag nyid
75a5(mdo): la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// 'gro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmyigs pa yid la bgyis na/ phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag
75a6(mdo): bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya btsongs te/ bzlas brjodabagyi'o// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang / sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas/ 'bar
75a7(mdo): bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon gsum du stond pa nye bar stond par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyurd nas/
75a8(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan brtsam brgyad pa lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na/ grub pa chen po'i rtags stond par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa 'argyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag ba
75a9(mdo): dam// yinas ldanas 'chang kyi kyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'idzid dbeg par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs sngags 'chang bar 'gyur/
75b1(mdo): ro// nyi ma rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad stond par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgyaH/
75b2(mdo): brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya reng 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas/ pad ma dri ma myed pa zhes bgyi ba'i zhags pa stsol par 'gyur ro//
75b3(mdo): grub pa thams cad stsol par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'od dpag myed kyang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na/ de ni
75b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa druka khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa las sogs te dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'a
75b5(mdo): ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / skyed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// sdig pa
75b6(mdo): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam pa brgyad pa//
75b7(mdo): de nas ci 'byor pa'i gseram las/ 'phags pa 'argyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la/ de nas zhal gar phyogs su bstan du te/ bzhag la kur kum kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
75b8(mdo): legs pa dbyes pa byas te/ li kris thig btab la dkyil 'khor kyi dbus pad ma bri/ pad ma'i 'phreng ba'i dbus su/ ril pa 'bring ka ra bgrang 'phreng br-i/ me tog sna tshogs bkram la/ bum pa spos chus
75b9(mdo): bkang ba/ me tog ci 'byor da pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi bzhag/ mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bya zhing / pog por lda nas a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o// spos sna bcu drug dang ldan
76a1(mdo): pa'i tis mar gyi mar me bsdus ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dr-i dang / 'phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// 23/
76a2(mdo): rten dbang phyug la mngon tu 'phyogs te/ dkyil lo krung bcas la don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro// 'gro ba'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
76a3(mdo): pa thams cad yid la byas te/ yid kyis phyag byas la/ lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing /
76a4(mdo): bdag nyid snying dgal la 'bar bar snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs/ pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar stond par mdzad do// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral pa'i gseb 'bar zhi
76a5(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni/ dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma stond to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste/
76a6(mdo): rigs sngags/ 'chang kyi s+ya ber 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags
76a7(mdo): 'grub par 'gyur ro// zo rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal stond par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad stond par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par
76a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni/ skye rengs shar ba'i dus kyi cha/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad mo'i dri ma myed pa zhes
76a9(mdo): bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// rgyal ba 'od dpag myed kyang legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// gang la 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skur
76b1(mdo): bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa las btogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu nas/
76b2(mdo): rtag tu lus ston 'dod par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur
76b3(mdo): ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas dngul las 'phags pa brgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rngon pa du gzugs snga ma bzhin byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor dang / can da
76b4(mdo): dkar po'i dri chab kyis bkang ba bzhag par bya zhing / mchod yon da kyi snod lnga bzhag par bya'o// me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing / tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags pa
76b5(mdo): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa nyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / gdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu bzhag par bya'o// 'khri bo'i rgyal po lan
76b6(mdo): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ rigs sngags 'chang rtsa ba mas gos rtsang ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcang ngo // bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ dkyil mo krung du 'dug
76b7(mdo): la lag pa g.yon pa'i 'dub mo brkyang ba pad ma'i tshul du byas sA/ bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brkyang ba'o// lan brtsam brkyang chung ba dang / shar phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grags par 'gyur zhing /
76b8(mdo): bdag nyid dka' bar snang ngo // rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyurd te/ mying brjod pa sa dpag chang stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bgyi bci bachis zhes zan bzhin du 'gyur
76b9(mdo): ro// gang bsgo ba de byed pas gyur ro// de nyid tha sar 'gyur zhing / cher mchod par 'gyur ro// brgyam brkyang lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgan/
77a1(mdo): rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha las stsogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba de byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor kanod sbyin kyi tshogs dang
77a2(mdo): sabacas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma'i lha dang nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug
77a3(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas/ klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po
77a4(mdo): dga' bo dang / nye dga' yas stsogs pa'i bar thams cad dang dang du byas par 'gyur ro// zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la/
77a5(mdo): tsan dan dmar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog dmar po bkra ma la/ gdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas bdug par bya zhing / mar kyi mar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o// mchod yon gyi snod
77a6(mdo): bzhi bzhag la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// 'khri bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gci rje su dran par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar
77a7(mdo): bkye'o// ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmyigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o// phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas ba/
77a8(mdo): bar bya'o// sems can dmyal ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yaM dgas kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad yid la bya zhing / snying rje'i sems kyis blta
77a9(mdo): bar bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brkyad tshang ba dang / phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing skra grags par 'gyur la/ dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur
77b1(mdo): ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing / bcom pa dang thal bar klags par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar zug gi bar/
77b2(mdo): du/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// lus kyang mtshan babang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can gang dag gis ma thong ba de dag thams cad phyir gyi ldog par 'gyur ro//
77b3(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni/ sa'i 'og gi sems can mun nag pa snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mthus mun nag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'od gzer 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
77b4(mdo): yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / dga' ba dang / 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar zug gi bar du kun
77b5(mdo): nas mthus 'phags pa dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind 'jo ba par 'gyur ro// bskal pa thub par 'gyur ro// shi nas bde/ ba can gyi 'jig rten kyi 'khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
77b6(mdo): kyi mthar zug gi bar du de nyid kyi zhabs drung du gnas par 'gyur zhing mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan kar po dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye
77b7(mdo): ma zhib sor byas te/ yang legs par btags te/ kun tu ru dang / swa sI pog dang / kAn d+ha ra swa dang / chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/ sha khar btab la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa myed ras gzigs dpa
77b8(mdo): phyug don yod zhags pa sor bzhi pa 'i'atshad du byas te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e ne ya'i phags pas/ bzhugs pa phyugs bdag gi tshe lugs 'dzind pa/ phyag bzhi gcig
77b9(mdo): na pad ma thogs/ gnyis pa zhags pa thogs/ gsum pa gsal shing thogs/ bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa/ gdan pad ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/
78a1(mdo): g.yon du dri myed 'gro bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og du ni 'khri bo'i rgyal po'o// kong du ni 'od dpag myed do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mas kos gtsang ma bgos ste/ dus gsum du khrus bya zheng/
78a2(mdo): gos sum phrugs bgos la/ tshes brgyad nas bco lnga nya'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing / tshon sna lngas bri bar bya'o ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
78a3(mdo): su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rigs sngags kyi lha pus mo btsugs te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lho bre bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i cha dbyes par bya'o//
78a4(mdo): dkyil 'khor 'khor yug tu pad ma bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir spos kyi dkang ba gzhag par bya'o// sgo bzhir dri dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag go// dkar gsum kyi gtor ma dang / mchod yon
78a5(mdo): kyi snod brgyad bzhag go// mya tog sna tshogs bkram par bya zhing / a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// spos sna/ brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi me bltam par bya/
78a6(mdo): 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du shar phyogs su bstan la mchod pa bya'o// ras kyi tshon skud
78a7(mdo): sna lnga pa srad du zhu bcu drug pa/ zor to gcig tu gser kyi yang myag zor to gcig tu mu tig gi chun kor btab ste/ sbrul 'khyil pa bzhin du bskyil la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ rtsang mas gos gtsang ma
78a8(mdo): g.yogs par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon tu phyogs te/ dkyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bcing ba byas la bdag bsrung ngo // 'kho bo'i rgyal po/
78a9(mdo): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gyis bzhin 'dzum gyis rgyas par byas la/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ myi smra bar
78b1(mdo): nyungs kar 'bru re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ ras kyi srad pu'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
78b2(mdo): khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis yong la/ dgos pa thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa dam pa grub pas 'jam
78b3(mdo): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi srin chen po
78b4(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spos des dpag tshad tsam du khyab par byed do// gang la dri ma nam pa tsam gyis nang thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa
78b5(mdo): thams cad dang / byad dang / dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba/ rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus thams cad dri ma myed par 'gyu/ ra ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zha/
78b6(mdo): ba de blangs la/ kab tse bzang po'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba po'i tshe rtsang mas zhus legs par bya ste/
78b7(mdo): blang bar bya zhing dgos par bya'o// nyin re zhing dus gsum du mchod pa bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang de yang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / lus yongs su dag pas sngon gyi rigs sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan ces
78b8(mdo): rtse zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bskal pa mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad ma'i snying po la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang
78b9(mdo): thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po mthar yug gi bar du/ che bskal pa brgya phrag stong grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsas kyis/
79a1(mdo): mtshams myed pa lnga las sogs pa zang par 'gyur ro// snga ma'i me tog la lan bsurtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa 'argyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/ brgyam brgyad tshang ba da
79a2(mdo): ngam cul po dang / blon po dang / btsun po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur te/ rang nyed nor dang bcas/ dbyig dang bcas/ 'bru dang bcas/ zan po dang bcas/ zan mo dang 'acas te/ las byed par 'gyur ro//
79a3(mdo): sna mo'i me tog rnyad de bsdus la/ gla rtsi dang / pr-i yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / kur kum dang / spang spos dang / sa ma ka dang / spr-ig ka dang / na la dang / bo la dang / nyungs kar rnams zhib tu
79a4(mdo): btags pa'i phye ma char po'i chu dang sbyar pa'i ri lu ni/ dug dad pa'i mchog pad ma zhes bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang dpal du byed/ nad thams cad seld pa dang / rims nad thams cad
79a5(mdo): seld par byed do// brtsog shu dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / phol myig dang / lhog pa dang / de thams cad la ni bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsung ngo // nad de
79a6(mdo): thams cad la zhus byas na sdig se la to// zhes thub pa gsung ngo // tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do// thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na/ thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud myed rnams
79a7(mdo): dga' ba dang / dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// byad 'joms shing dug dang / dbyig duka dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba dag kyang de bzhin no// zas za ba dang / zhus byed pa na/ thig le'i
79a8(mdo): byug pa rtag tu byas na/ de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar ba rad par 'gyur ro// zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo // klang pa'i nad kyi 'bad pa la ni thug par bya'o// rtsig na ba la ni rtsig sman gyi bur mas so//
79a9(mdo): mo ra ba la ni kham yur ro// lto na pa la ni chu dron po dang / rtsib logs na ba la ni mar dang thug go// yan lag dang nyi sa gan pa la ni bsku bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba la ni lag 'dis bsgrubs so// nad tshabs po chen las ni
79b1(mdo): sku mnye nga zhus gnod sbyin gyi gdon zasal ba la ni snga nas gtang ba'i sas bya'o// bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyas khebs pa la ni mchogs ma thig ye bya'o// ste na las ni
79b2(mdo): chu don dang / san ma bsres pas so// khyim zhi bar bya ba la ni 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar kyis zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad du lan nyi shum gcig 'azlas nas so// 'bab pa dang cod pa rnams la ri ba lang kyi
79b3(mdo): bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkras ste/ dri rus bkang ba ba'i bzhag cing / 'o mas bkang ba ba'i dang / mchod yon pa'i dang / pog por bzhi bzhag ste/ a ka ru dang / du ru sgras bdug go// ku gul la lan rje
79b4(mdo): shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o// 'kho bo'i rgyal po nyungs ka ra la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o//
79b5(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu gcig bzlas na 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi
79b6(mdo): dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gsate brgya byin rang dang / lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na/ rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin dkug par 'dod na/ pad ma
79b7(mdo): salan brgyas brgyad bzlas te/ brgya byin gyi gying nas brjod la/ 'phags pa ldan ras gzigs dbang phyugs le re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri ras kyang dbul lo// ku kus dang / mar dang / nyungs kar la lan bcas
79b8(mdo): bzlas te ga shi ba ar ka'i mer snga ra la/ tshes bcu bzhi'i nyal sbyin bsregs bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / brgya byin lang+ga'i dbang po 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams
79b9(mdo): cad dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de de ni sems kyi bzod do// tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / tshangs
80a1(mdo): pa rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug ste/ mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// yid la tsaM 'dod pa bsgrub par byed do// gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te/ khyab mjug la bdug cing chu dang nyungs kar/
80a2(mdo): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ spyi bor gtor na khyab 'ju ga rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to// hi ran n+ya ka' shi pu yang sbyin par byed/
80a3(mdo): cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po zhal mthong bar 'dod na/ rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyungs kar la lan nyi shu gcig bzlas nas/ s+yai bor gtor
80a4(mdo): ro// ku kul gyi bdug pas bdug cing / a rka'i tshu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo //
80a5(mdo): de nas dbang phyug chen po'i rang kaM gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cadadabang du 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do//
80a6(mdo): mchog kang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag po chen po dkug por 'dod pas/ gu gu la la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing / yungs kar la lam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing / nas
80a7(mdo): po chen po'i steng du gtor na 'khrugs par gyur da te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi gan+d+ha
80a8(mdo): thams cad kyi sgo bya bar 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de byed do// thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing lngas thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// kyai smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu ma re bzlas na/ mtshan mor
80a9(mdo): lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i sga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dr-i za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myo 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mr-i dang myi ma yin
80b1(mdo): ba dang / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mas thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad rang gyi gzugs kyi rtag tu mdus mnye bar gnas so// mtshan mo yongs kyang par gzhal myed lang thams cad sbyin par bya/
80b2(mdo): ro// gtsangasas gom gtsangs bgos te/ nas legs par byas nas 'dren par gAzhing / byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos lhag par
80b3(mdo): dmyigs te/ bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// / de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba/ 'ahA/ rgyas pa/ drag shul pyod pa/ srung hA/
80b4(mdo): rang thams cad ses pa/ byang 'jigs pa dbang du byed pa/ spyan bsregs kyi cog bshad par bya'o// khyim bsrung bar 'dod pas/ a rka'i lam sreg shing dang / pad sa dang / nyungs kar bses
80b5(mdo): pa las sbyin bsregs brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ don yod pa la'o// gas pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la 'kho bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas 'arjod byas na/ khyim che
80b6(mdo): po bsrung bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag/ thug thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims nad thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad/
80b7(mdo): sa par dag gdod pas cad dang / mu ke'i gnod pa dang / myi ngas dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i myi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba
80b8(mdo): byed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phye bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mya 'chad par sku ston bzhed par 'gyur ro// sbyin bsram
80b9(mdo): ga mar dang / nyungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul dang yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / yul gru dang / re zhod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rgyan ras gzikra
81a1(mdo): dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nyal me tog dkar po dang / gan da pri yang ku dang / rgya spos rnams nyungs mar dang bsres te/ spyan bsreg stong rtsa brkyang byas nas/ rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo/
81a2(mdo): ali 'khor dang bcas pa dang / yul kru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rta dang glang po che dang / ba lang dang / ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// shing a pa ma rga'i yam sreg shing dang / zho dang
81a3(mdo): sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa dang / me tog dkar po rnams las lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs byas na/ yul gru stong thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzags dbang phyug gi s+yan sngar zho dang / sbrang
81a4(mdo): rtse dang / mar dang / bsres pa dang / pad ma'i sdong bu'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs byas na/ mtshan mo zad pa dang / de na ra brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro// me tog ku/
81a5(mdo): mu ta dang pad ma'i sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dpa'adab mar bcas padang / nyungs kar bsres te/ shing sang ldeng kyi me spar la sbyin bsreg brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs byas na/ log 'dren zas
81a6(mdo): cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// zla ba yar kyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la spyad ba byas te/ rtsang mas zhus legs par byas la/ gos dkar po bgos te tsan dan dang / pri yang ku'i shing dang 'bras yos dang / mar
81a7(mdo): dang nyungs kar bsres pa'i sbyin bsregs stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ nam phyed kyi dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas/ zong lnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi po'i tshes bcu bzhi lo nyen zhag cig smyung ba byas te/ rgya
81a8(mdo): mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gya 'gram du song la/ shing bil ba'i me sbar te/ bil ba'i me tog dang / mar bsres pa/ stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs byas na/ de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
81a9(mdo): 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nam byed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o// gdong du myig blta bar ni myi bya'o// yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dang /
81b1(mdo): rkang pa'i drung drung du snod bor nas btud de/ rigs sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kyis 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba
81b2(mdo): de tshe nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgya da bzlas brjod byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar kyi po'i tshes bcu bzhi la
81b3(mdo): kang na gter yod pa der song ste/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la/ sna ma'i me tog dang / 'dab ma dang /
81b4(mdo): nyungs kar dang / mar bsres pa rnams las spyan bsregs stong ma brgyad byas te/ chu dang nyungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la dbabs nas/ de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung
81b5(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o// ba ru ra'i shing gyi me s+phar la til dang 'bras yos dang / mar bsres pa las spyan sresa?
81b6(mdo): stong rtsa brgyad byas nas/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpung gi yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / bcas pa dang / dbyig dang gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/
81b7(mdo): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// nyungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad ma'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg stong ma brgyad byas na/ yul thams cad dbang
81b8(mdo): du 'gyur zhing bud myed dang / dA skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mod dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras bu la lan tsha dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin bsregs byas na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten du 'gyur ro// a ka sti
81b9(mdo): 'i shing gyis me spar la sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / a rka'i me tog las sbyin bsregs brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ nyan re zhing di na ra brgya thob par 'gyur/
82a1(mdo): ro// pas sha'i yam sreg shing dang / 'bras yos las sbyin sregs stong sa brkyang byas na/ gser brgya phrag stong thob par 'gyur te/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha' byas na yang
82a2(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ches bco lnga zla ba ltas spung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ chu klung chen po'i nang du rnyed pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ nyungs kar la lan nyi shu
82a3(mdo): gcig bzlas nas/ 'khros pas chu klung de la 'dab par bya'o// de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas/ rin po che mang po dag sbyin par byed na/ blangs la/ phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya zhing / 'pham
82a4(mdo): ba spyan ras gzegs dbang phyug la yang mchod par bya'o// tshes bco lnga la zla ba nya la smyung ba byas te/ nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras ko zegs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas/
82a5(mdo): a pa margo'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / sra rtsa pog bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ rang gi mying kyi/ sa sbyin bsregs byas na/ sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las
82a6(mdo): grol bar 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang myi mdza' ba thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// shing a rka dang til mar dang / nyungs kar
82a7(mdo): dang / gu gul dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / nyungs kar dang / tsan dan dkar po bsres pa las sprin sregs brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/
82a8(mdo): rgyas pa dang / mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhal ka ra bya ra'i me tog dang / lan tsa rnams bdun bsres pa dang / shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing gi yungs mar la bsgres pa drag shul pyod pa bya'o// char
82a9(mdo): mya 'bab pa'i tsha pad ma dang / tsan dan dang / nyungs kar dang / mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ sbyin bsregs brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas 'khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na/ ci srid 'dod pa de
82b1(mdo): srad du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// thal ba de blangs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkhal la gtor na ha cang che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// sprin
82b2(mdo): la mngon tu phyogs te gtor na rlung dang sprin dang / ser ba rnams 'byung bar gyi 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi sde gnan pa ni til dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa ni/ sa bon bdun gyi sbyin
82b3(mdo): sreg gis so// phug bsgrub pa ni shing ar ka'i sbyin sreg gyis so// ar na'i lo ma dang / mar bsres pa'i spyan bsreg byas na/ phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur ro// nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu ta dang / rgya spom
82b4(mdo): dang / nyungs kar dang / mar bsres pas nags kyi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur zhing / sman kyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas bar 'gyur ro// shing la la sha'i mye sbar te/ na le sham brgyad stong/
82b5(mdo): sbyin sregs byas na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun ma 'dugapar 'gyur ro// snga ma'i me tog dang / kar ni ka ra'i me tog pa
82b6(mdo): ud pa la'i rnams mar dang bsres pa las/ sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na zla ba nya ba dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing / lus la 'od gzer btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// a shwad zas
82b7(mdo): yam seg shing byas la shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / ar rga dang / tsan dan dang / nyungs kar dang / nas dang mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus mtshams gsum du sbyin sregs nyi shu ma gcig byas na/ rgyal po btsun mol
82b8(mdo): 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na/ 'bras so ba dang / nyungs kar dang / lan tsa'i sbyin sregs bgyis te/ thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags
82b9(mdo): pa bcing bar bya zhing / 'the bo'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o// / sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i rgyal po ches
83a1(mdo): po'i ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar myed pa'i mthar thug pa dang / mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa byang bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya ste/ ras 'khru do khru bzhi lham pa kha tshar ma bcad pa sna byed pa/ tha
83a2(mdo): ran bzang ba shin tu dkar ba/ shi nad tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan myi smra ba'i dka' thub can/ bsnyen gnas la gnas pa/ rtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ bas dkar gsum za ba/ dus gsum du khrus byas pa
83a3(mdo): lhag ma ma yin pa chen rtsi snod gsar par bzhag ste/ pir sar pas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhengs pa'am/ bzhugs pa'am/ dkyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis
83a4(mdo): brgyan pa/ e na ya'i pags pa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal zhi ba s+yan bye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag myed bzhugs
83a5(mdo): pa zhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshas kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad ma'i tshul du bya'o// phyag gnyis zur du kun tu zhal kyi phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gnyis bzlas
83a6(mdo): brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ 'dzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste/ pad ma 'i tshul du byas la/ bar na bgrang 'phreng 'dzind par bya'o// phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gcig na rtse
83a7(mdo): gsum/ gnyis pa na pad ma/ gsum pa mngon yod pa'i zhags pa'i glegs bam/ bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa/ zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga pa dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pa na ril ba kyi thugs/ bdun
83a8(mdo): pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod/ brkyang pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi snod thogs par bya zhing / 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ sku me tog sna tshogs bkram pas mdzes par bya'o// ri bo ta la'i khang pa
83a9(mdo): brtsegs pa/ shaM nad tu 'byes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ khre 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ pad ma'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje
83b1(mdo): li 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang chu shing kyi yal gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon logs na zlab sa pam rigs kyi bu dag la me tog sna tshogs mang po sogs te// btso
83b2(mdo): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// ri blang ma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mngedzes par bya zhing snying po dang ldan pa ma sngo mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyams kang zhing rgya srin sa kA ra dang / ngang ba dang / gzhad dang /
83b3(mdo): shang de'u dang / dur bas brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i ri de'i steng du pad ma'i ba dan dang / seng ge'i khri bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o//
83b4(mdo): g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyad pa bya'o// nang kyi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// g.yas su 'phags ma sgros ma lus btud te 'dzem pa dpa
83b5(mdo): pa bya'o// g.yon du dri myed 'grol lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang / nor bzangs pus mo btsugs pa bya'o// pad ma'i snying po dbu/ sa kyi gnas su 'khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can lag
83b6(mdo): bzhi pa/ lag na mtshon cha thogs pa de zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / rtse gsum pa dang / pad ma'o// pad ma'i stan la dkyil mo krung phyed bcas pa/ lus cung zad du 'dug pa/ mgo'i steng
83b7(mdo): g.yas g.yos su drang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yos su rdo rje'i zom chen po lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang /
83b8(mdo): 'i tshogs dag bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang / ri'i bar du brgya byin dang tshangs pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su rgyal po bzhi go cha bkos pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu pad ma'i rigs ma lag pa 'brel pa bya'o// lha
83b9(mdo): mo dpal chen po dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / 'dzag byed ma dang / mtshan mo 'a lha mo dang / sa 'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo bya'o// dbang phyug ga drung du 'khro gnyer can bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i drung
