84a1(mdo): du kos dkar mo'o// ri dang pho nya'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig ma'o// ri'i khor yug gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing / ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs dang me tog gis brgyan cing mtshe'u mdzes
84a2(mdo): sapa me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / seng ge dang / stag gis gang ba dang / klu'i phru gu dang / grul bum dag bya'o// g.yon du gsang ba pa lnga bya'o// 'og tu klu'i rgyal po chen po lnga bya'o// thams cad brag
84a3(mdo): ga stan dpalag na rin po che'i me tog gi phur ma thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bya'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rigs sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs te/ lag na
84a4(mdo): me tog dang pog por thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// steng gi bar rim du thub chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag myed dang / shag kye'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po bya'o// ras kyi sku
84a5(mdo): gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar myed pa bstsags pa dang / mtshams myed pa lnga'i las byas pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'jig
84a6(mdo): par 'gyur zhingang/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa rnams lto ci smos// dad pas mos pa rnams dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don tu
84a7(mdo): gnyer ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon mang po dag tu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung kyi bye ma bye ba khrag zhig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
84a8(mdo): 'gyur zhing / de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / ras kyi sku gzugs mthong na/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di
84a9(mdo): mthong ba tsam gyis/ 'phags pa brgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing / sku yang stond par 'gyur ro// nyams dag pa tsam gyi mod la sku stond par 'gyur zhing / mchog thams cad sbyid par 'gyur ro//
84b1(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// rad kyis segs pa dang / nang rabs chen pos ka'i rang pa dang / nang lnga rdzogs dang / sdug bsngal brgya stong dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba
84b2(mdo): kyis mongs nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ba na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs
84b3(mdo): ba dag kyang mthong ba tsas kyi mod la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang / bkur bste chen po dang / sel snyad dkrol ba mang po dang / gdugs dang / rgyas
84b4(mdo): mtshan dang / ba dan kyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/ gro khyer chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i pho zang ngam/ gtsug khang ngam/ ljongs sam/ khyim 'am/ grong du zhugs na/ ras kyi
84b5(mdo): gzugs bzhugs pa tsas kyi mod la/ 'thab pa dang / rmod ba dang / 'thab mo dang / zhag zhug dang / mu ka'i dkon/ pa dang / mya ngas dang / rang kyi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung
84b6(mdo): 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skyem byed dang / grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde ba dang 'o
84b7(mdo): legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / myi mang po bde ba mang por 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang / yid bde ba mang por 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di mthong ba tsam gyis
84b8(mdo): thams cad bde ba can gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong phrag bdun bcu tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// pad ma'i 'od rdzi ma skyed cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bya
84b9(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma thob pa khob par 'gyur ro// pad ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags 'chad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro//
85a1(mdo): // / ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub pa'i cho ka dang / cho ga zhib mo'o// / de nas don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsha
85a2(mdo): pa par bya ste/ chu klung kyi 'gram 'am/ pad ma'i mtshe'u 'am/ ud pa la'i mtshe'u 'am/ mye tog skyed mos tshal lam/ 'bras bu'i kun dka' ra ba 'am/ khang bzangs sam/ sa gzhi dag cing sa gzhi yongs
85a3(mdo): su sbyangs pa/ rtswa dang shing bal dang / ska dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang / phyag dar kyi phung po gya mo dang / shing dang / bong pa dang / gseg ma dang / thod pa'i rus pas gang ba rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi phyogs na/ mtshe'u
85a4(mdo): dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang phyogs su 'bab pa dang / nye ba na chu yod cing shi nad tu mdzes pa dang / lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / shar phyogs kang na ljon shing gyis mdzes par
85a5(mdo): byas pa gang na nyams dga' ba dang / kha dog dang / gzo byin du/ ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas/ chu dang / nyungs kar la bzlas/ te kun tu gtor ro// sa gzhi de lta bu sbyar da pa'i ni mchog yin no//
85a6(mdo): 'khro bo'i rgyal pos nyungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas
85a7(mdo): byas par 'gyur ro// sdang ba thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad skad cig kyang myi gnas par phyogs bzhir byer te 'ong ngo // srog chags sdang ba dang / sdang ba'i sems can dang / sdang ba'i gcan ca/
85a8(mdo): 'tsho lo gapa yin pa de dag thams cad rag tu'i bar 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro// gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byas te/ klu bzhi snyas pa/ ngos re re zhing 'bru sum bcu rtsa gnyis gzhas
85a9(mdo): bar byas te/ cha 'byes pa/ gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la sgo bzhi dang / ta babs bzhir ldan pa 'bras kyi phye ma'i snod sna bzhi sbyar la/ de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas/
85b1(mdo): tsan dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste/ zla ba yar kyi po'i tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco sA la tshes grangs dang rgyu skar bzang po 'dams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang por ni dkar por bri bar bya'o//
85b2(mdo): gnyis par ni dmar pos so// gsum pa ni ser pos so// bzhi pa ni nam mkha'i kha dog gis so// lnga pa ni myig sman kyi kha dog gis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa myed par cha rnam par
85b3(mdo): 'byes shing gsal bar pir sar pa dang / tshon dang snod sar pas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad ma 'dab ma stong pa 'khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing pad ma'i 'phreng ba tshon kyis mdzes par
85b4(mdo): bris la/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po shag kya'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag byed dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bzhag go// g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang
85b5(mdo): phyaphyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o// g.yon du phyag mardo rje wa yab dang rdo rje/ thogs pa/ bzhin 'gro gnyer cad 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o//
85b6(mdo): 'phags pa 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang dri myed 'gro bya'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras ko bikas dbang phyug gi 'og tu/ kar shas chen po dang / kos
85b7(mdo): dkar ma dang / dkar mo chen po lag na dbyug pA dang / ril ba phyi blugs thogs pa'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma mche ba brtsegs pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba thogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs
85b8(mdo): pa lag pa ba'i pa lag pa g.yas g.yos gnyis mardo rje dang dgra sta/ g.yas pa'i gung mo lnga dang log 'dren la sdigs pa bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa phyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i ma lugs
85b9(mdo): 'chang ba/ ral pa'i bor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag myed kyis yor tshugs brgyan pa bya'o// g.yas g.yos su dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o// de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lha mo dbyangs
86a1(mdo): ldan ma dang mtshan ma'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo dang / 'bras bu'i lha mo bya'o// de'i 'og khor yug tu gshin rje dang / chu lga dang / rlung lha las bsogs pa bya'o// ral pa'i thor tshugs
86a2(mdo): kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong yang gzhag par bya'o// glar rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha rnams bgos pa gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du/ lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug
86a3(mdo): pa dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dag bya'o// phyi rol da tu tshangs pa dang / drag po dang / lha mo u ma dang / tshangs pa'i drung du lha mo dbyangs ldan ma 'khros pa'i gzugs can no// de gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa
86a4(mdo): dang / ril ba s+yai blugs bri bar bya'o// grwa gcig tu don yod pa da'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs bzhag go// grwa gcig tu shi ba ba ha gzhag go// de nas
86a5(mdo): shar phyogs kyi 'khro bo ta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i myig can gan ga go// lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po ki li ki li zhes bya ba/ rornam par 'dren pa/ lag na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa
86a6(mdo): thogs pa bya'o// nub phyogs kyi skor pho nya mo pad ma'i rigs mdzes mo lag pa mda'i rtse nas 'dzin pa bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs/ lag na rdo rje dang zhags pa thogs pa bya
86a7(mdo): bya'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ste/ dar las bcings la/ rgyan thams cad dang / me tog kyi 'phreng bas brgyan nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ba/
86a8(mdo): ste/ steng du sna ma'i me tog gi gdu bu bzhag par bya'o// can dan dang / gur kum dang / ku pur gyi chu dang / pog bor ba'i bzhag cing / a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug go// cho snga lnga'i ras kyi srad bu mchod phyir
86a9(mdo): kyi mang bu'i tshad du byas la/ gser gyi yang rtsig rtse gsum can gdags par bya zhing / bor to gcig tu me tog pad ma'i gdub 'khor rin po ches spras pa/ thum por bskyil la bum pa'i steng du bzhag sa/ mchod
86b1(mdo): pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ nyungs kams dad yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po lan stongs brgyad bzlas te/ de la gdab par bya'o// tsan dang / ka bur dang / klu rtsi'i phye mas gos la bsgo bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i
86b2(mdo): gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang / zar dkar gsum gyi gtor ma bzhag par bya zhing / gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / spos chu dkar pos bka
86b3(mdo): ba brkyang bzhag par bya'o// ro dang dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyad dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / gtor ma las sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang / dbul ba sna drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa
86b4(mdo): nams sha dang / khrag dang / snyun dong dang / ki'u dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa spangs te/ rtsa khams rtsang sbra bya'o// me trog sna tshogs kyi gcas dgram par bya zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal ma
86b5(mdo): dang / ldang lding dang / ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o// pog por sum bcu rtsa gnyis bzhag par bya zhing / gdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug par bya/ spos sna brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pal
86b6(mdo): til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor su ga tu pad ma'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya'o// rigs sngags 'changaH pams gos katsang ma bgos par bya'o// dus gsum du zhus byas
86b7(mdo): la/ gos gsum bgo bar bya// gos gtsang ma bsgrub par bya'o// 'jug pa'i cho ga byas pa nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang bskur ba'i bar tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing
86b8(mdo): 'jig rten mgon pos byin kyis brlabs pa dang / pad ma'i rigs pad ma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dngos grub la mngon tu phyogs par 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa thams cad de 'on
86b9(mdo): bzhir byed par 'gyur ro// ngas cig thams cad la dor yong bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i dkyis 'khor gyi chos la dag cig grub par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol bar ma
87a1(mdo): bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / lha dang / mya'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sprin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyis bsko bskal la dbang bar 'gyur ro//
87a2(mdo): rnal la 'byor da kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags la rten par 'gyur ro// bdeg pa dang / skyo ba dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya bas myi tshugs so//
87a3(mdo): gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi lus sam/ mgo la brgya phrag stong 'gyur du 'bab par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyis phyir zlog cing 'grol bar myi nus te/ rigs sngags 'chang des 'grol bar bya'o// de nas rigs
87a4(mdo): sngags 'chang des ri mo'i sku gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon tu phyogs par gzhag nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong ma brgyad bzlas la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya la lan brgya rtsa
87a5(mdo): brgyad bcing bar bya zhing / 'khri bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig/ bya'o// de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la 'od gzar kha dogasna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bum pa de yang 'bar la ras
87a6(mdo): kyi sku gzugs de yang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhing shas cher 'gul bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang snying dka' bar 'gyur zhing / ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar
87a7(mdo): 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so// legs so// khyod kyis 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing / khyod kyis zhags pa 'di yang grub/ khyod kyis yang ba
87a8(mdo): gyi nor bu'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang grub kyis/ khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig/ de dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa mchog grub par bum pa spos chus bkang ba de blangs la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/
87a9(mdo): rgyu skar rgyal la zhus bya 'am/ zla ba yar kyi ngo tshes grangs shes pa la khrus byas pa tsam kyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma myed cing yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur zhing / dbang po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag pa thob par
87b1(mdo): 'gyur te/ rna ba lnga yongs su dag pa dang / myig lnga yongs su dag pa dang / sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang / lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po lnga yongs su dag pa/
87b2(mdo): thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing / rtag tu sku stond pa ba'ang par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhas stonang par 'gyur ro/
87b3(mdo): rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po//
87b4(mdo): chen po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te/ sa'i phyogs der 'od ngabar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// sred myed kyi bu dang / dbang
87b5(mdo): phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gsang ba pa brgya stong phrag du ma bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur/ zhing / zhi ba dang bde legs byed par 'gyur ro// shes pa don yod pa
87b6(mdo): pa dang / shes rab don yod pa dang / zos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin pa por 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/
87b7(mdo): zhing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul dpag tu byed pa la mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// rigs sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson
87b8(mdo): 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa don yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyad sa ya phrag brgyad stong drug bcu
87b9(mdo): bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang / bkur bsta bya bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mchod rten kyi snying po dang
88a1(mdo): 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal lo// / bam po dgu pa'o//
88a2(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ bla gos 'phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
88a3(mdo): ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la an gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcoM
88a4(mdo): ldan 'das ba dag sa pad mo'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyis 'khor gyi cho ga/ rigs sngags chen po rim par phye ba/ cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo mchis
88a5(mdo): mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de dag gis yongs/ su bsgrags par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpal 'phag sa pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum pas/ bcom
88a6(mdo): ldan 'das la lta bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di smras so// / na ma stai yad d+ha nu ka ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+hu/ sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi sad tre b+hU/ na ma pra t+ye ka bud b+hur+ya/ shrA ba ka sa k+She b+h+yo ta ti
88a7(mdo): nu ga ta pra tud pan ne b+h+ya/ na ma sam myag ka ta nan/ na ma sa ma myaka pra taM pan na nan na ma sha ra dra ti pu tra ya ma ha ma ti ye/ na mo a t+ya me tre ya pra mu She b+h+yo/ ma ha bo d+hi srad tra/ a r+ya ka na ba re bya/ na ma a r+ya a mi ta
88a8(mdo): b+ha ya/ ta ba ga ta ya ar+ha te/ sa ma myag sam b+hud d+ha ya/ na mo rad na tra ya ya/ na ma a r+ya ba lo ki te sho ra ya/ bo d+ha sad tra ya ma ha sad tra ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya te b+he/ ma ha ri shi a r+ya ga Na ba re b+h+yo/ na ma s+thi tA/
88a9(mdo): aM ran a r+ya pa lo kye te sha ra mud kyi rnan a mo ga ra dza na na ma hrid yan/ ta za ga ta sa ma mu khan b+ha Shi ta na ma ha ta pa ri Sha da ma d+he/ ma ha mi da nin/ a ba rta yi ShU myi/ sa dAn du me sa rba ka r+ye shu/ sarba dA ye shu tsa me ra/
88b1(mdo): ka b+hA ba tu/ tad ya tha/ au tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ba ra ma ha/ ka ru ni ka/ si ri si li/ bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ma ha pad ma ha sta/ ka la ka la
88b2(mdo): ki li ki li/ ku lu ku yu/ ma ha shud d+ha srad tra/ e he hi/ b+hu d+hu b+hu d+hu/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ ka Na ka Na/ kai ni ki Ni/ ku N+ya ku r+Na/ ba ra ma shud d+ha srad tra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ha/ swa ma pra ba ta/ tsa la
88b3(mdo): ya/ san tsa la byi tsa la/ e ta Ta e TaT/ bA ra b+ha ra/ bi ri ba ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka/ ma pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra ha ra/ ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi hi/
88b4(mdo): hu hu hu hu/ mAM ka ra ma ha br-i mA be Shad+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi d+hi d+hid+he/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba rA/ tsar tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra d+ha/ ra shI sha ta/ sa ha sra pra ti man De ta sha ri ra/ dza
88b5(mdo): la/ ta pa ta pa/ ba ga bAn/ so ma a Ni ta ya ma ba ru na/ ka ba ra/ bra m+men dra/ ri Shi de ba ka na/ a b+hu rtsi ta tsa ra na/ su/ ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku ma ra/
88b6(mdo): rung tra/ ba sa ba/ bi Sh+Ta/ d+ha na da/ de ba ri Shi na ya ka/ b+ha hU baM bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+hA ra/ d+hi ri dI ri/ d+ha ru d+hu ru/ tha ra Tha ra/ g+ha ra gA ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/
88b7(mdo): pa la par/ ba ra ba ma/ ba ra da ya kA/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ta / ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu phu/ mu nu su ru/ mu la mu la/ mun tsa mun tsa/ b+ha ka bAn/ ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ ra ka ra kA ma ma sa
88b8(mdo): tAsh+tsa/ sa rba b+ha ye b+ha/ sa rbo ba dra be b+h+ya 9 a bkr-ik+keny+tsa/ sa rba bya dI b+h+ya sarba ba d+ha/ bAn d+ha na/ ta dra na/ tardza na radza/ tsa ro/ ha ska ra/ a ka ni/ u da ka/ ba sha/ Shas+t+ya/ pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka/
88b9(mdo): ka Ni kiM NaM/ ku N+ya ku r+Na/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in dri ya/ ba la b+ho d+hang ga/ tsa ru ra r+ya sad t+ya/ sam pra ka sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa maHma ha ta mon d+ha ka ra ba d+ha ma na/ Shad pa ra mye ta/ ba ri pu ra ka/ mi li mi
89a1(mdo): laM/ ta Ta Ta Ta/ a NaShaSha/ Ti Ti TiTi/ myan+yan+ya n+ya/ e ne yaH/ ma kri ta/ pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ I sha ra/ ma he sha ra/ ma ha b+hu ta ka na ban/ dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ ba ra pa ra/ ka ta ka ta/ ma/
89a2(mdo): sam ta/ bing shud d+ha/ bi sha ya ba si na/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ shwe ta yang nyo ba bi ta/ rad na ma ku ta/ ma la d+ha ra/ sa rbad nya shi ra si kri ta ma ku ta/ ma hang burba/ ka ma la kr-i ta ka ra ta la/ dA na sa ma d+hi bi mo ka pra kama?
89a3(mdo): bya/ ba hU sad tra san ta ti pa ri ba tsa ka/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ sa rba karma pa ra Na bi sho d+haka/ sarba bya d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sarba a sha pa ri pu ni ka/ sarba sad tra sa ma sha sa ka na mo stu te swA hA// / de nas
89a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bshad pa tsam kyis 'khor mang po ri dang nags tshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa
89a5(mdo): drug tu g.yos so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po 'byung bar 'a/ gyur ro// lho'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / man da ra ba'i me tog gi char chen po pus
89a6(mdo): mo nub pa tsam bab par gyurd to// sel snyan dang / pheg rdob pa'i sgra dag kyang byung bar gyur to// mtho ris kyi lha dag gis kyang / nam mkha' las bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang lhab sbub dag gis
89a7(mdo): char 'bab po// 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gsang ba de dag thams cad kyi
89a8(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po legs so legs so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di bshad cing / dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib
89a9(mdo): mo'i rgyal po 'di bshad pas rin po che'i char chen po bab po zhes zer ro// de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing / rtsang mas gos rtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du zhus bya zhing / zas dkar gsum za
89b1(mdo): bas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyad sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste/ mchod pa byas la/ nyungs kar 'bru sel brgya rtsa brkyang bzlas nas/ dpal lha mo la bsnun pa byas la/ tshes bcu bzhi nas
89b2(mdo): bco lnga'i bar du dpal lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro// mtshams byed pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku sto nang par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// mtshams/
89b3(mdo): bcad pa dang zhi bar bya ba la/ sa ka ru dang / can dan gyi bdug spos bsregs pa/ zal pa dang / shungs kar dang / seng sdeng gi phur bus gdab par bya'o// rims thams cad la bu mo mngams bkal ba'i mang du
89b4(mdo): la/ gdud pa nyi shu ma gcig poms/ lan nyi shu sa gcig 'dasate/ btags na rims thams cad las 'ard par 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad la ma dang til a ma la bzlas te/ blangs kyi snod
89b5(mdo): sangs rgyas la phul ba'i snga ma'i me tog rnying pa dang / pad ma ze ba dang bcas pa btab ste/ bcom pa 'di ni grub pa yin te/ zas dang skom dang / bsku ba dang / sna nas gtang ba'i las byas
89b6(mdo): te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// byang gcad na mar dang sbrang rtsi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ lus la bsku zhing tshig mas dril la lus kyi tri ma phye bar bya ste/ gong
89b7(mdo): grulas gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te mchod kyis btab na/ dug sbyar ba dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad gcad par 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// byang chen
89b8(mdo): po 'jig par 'gyur ro// bsrung ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ de bzhin du mdud pa dor ba byas na/ bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'jig pa dang / skrag pa dang / dngang pa thams cad dang /
89b9(mdo): 'byung mo'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mya tshugs so// ston pa la tsha chu 'jam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na/ lto ba'i nad 'jig par 'gyur ro// dug bsad na tshu la lan bdud bzlas te byid na/ dug zas
90a1(mdo): cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing kyi gdug par 'gyur ro// myag na pa la srad bu dkar po rna ba la btags na/ myig nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// sdang ba'i dug myi babang pa la/ suM ba la bzlas
90a2(mdo): te byug pa byas na/ dug myed par 'gyur ro// so na ba la ka ra bi ra'i so shing ngam/ sna ma'i so shing ngam/ shing pa gu'i so shing la bzlas te zos na/ so nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// mtshams bcad pa thams cad la sbrang
90a3(mdo): dang / pi pi ling ldan par byas te byug go// mgul 'gags pa la bldag pa byas na/ mgul 'gags pa thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// myig nad la spos chu dang / shing ba la sha'i chu dang / pa la sha/
90a4(mdo): me tog gis bkru bar bya ba'am/ shing dar gyi chu la lan bdun bzlas te bkrus na/ myig nad thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// na ba na ba la tal mar dang / shu taM zangs kyi snod du bcos pa las na
90a5(mdo): ba bkang na rna nad las za rad par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / mr-i snyan pa thams cad la chu la lan bdun bzlas te/ gdong bkru ba byas na thams cad las
90a6(mdo): rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpung dang stobs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor dang / phyer rgol ba dang / mye mdza' ba thams cad dang / g.yul ngo thams cad du ba lang gyi lcibs dkyil 'khor byas la
90a7(mdo): bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste/ gtsang mas kos gtsang ma bgos la/ a ga ru'i 'dug pa dbul bar bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas/ don yod pa'i 'gas pa
90a8(mdo): snying po'i mdo mchod de/ klag pa byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur te/ thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i yid du 'gyur zhing / thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// chu
90a9(mdo): des bdag nyid la kun tu gtor te tsan ngan la yan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ snying kar thig le byas te/ rtag tu dran par byas na/ mtshams myed pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// khyimar thams cad bsrung
90b1(mdo): na/ tshon sna snga pa'i srad bu la la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ seng lded kyi phur bu bzhi la btags te/ phyogs bzhir btsugs na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la tshon sna'i srad bu la las
90b2(mdo): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ gdon thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// srog chags ki ta dang / lu ta dang / me dpal rnams la ladas dang / nu ku laM dang / shing a rga'i me tog mar dang ce bsres pa las spyan sregs
90b3(mdo): byas na/ khyim bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gdon thams cad las bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// yang na las thams cad la nor bu bsgrub pa'i rdzas 'di dag bsogs la/ cha mnyam par byas
90b4(mdo): te/ thang mas gos mang ma bgos la/ snying po brgya ma brgyad bzlas pa las thams cad bya'o// dza ya dang bye dzA ya dang / ma ku nga li dang / gan dA na gu li dang / ba ru Ni dang / in dra ba ru Ni dang /
90b5(mdo): gan drA pr-i yang ku dang / ta ka ra dang / tsaka kra dang / ma ha tsaka krA dang / so ma ra dzi dang / su man dA nams phye ma zhib mor byas te/ char pa'i chus sbrus la/ tsan dan dang / kur kum sbyar ba'i chus
90b6(mdo): brlan te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa/ 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar nor bu byas te/ yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs la/ de nyid bcom ldan 'ad
90b7(mdo): kyi dbas chung du bzhag ste/ ras kyis g.yogs la grib mar bskams te/ blangs la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la lan bdun bzlas par bya zhing / 'jo bo'i rgyal po ldan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mgo bor bcus
90b8(mdo): sa/ rgyal po btsun mo 'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bra ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// lha thams cad gzi byin 'a
90b9(mdo): par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / dus thams cad du mchog
91a1(mdo): sbyin par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba thams cad kyang rtag tu mthun par byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// byad myi bzad pa dang / dug sbyar ma dang / phye ma'i duka dang / gsang sngags dang / g.yengs
91a2(mdo): byed kyis myi tshugs shing 'jig par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / bsod nams dang / bkra shis dang / dge ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur/ tag/
91a3(mdo): tu sku ston bzhed par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dus thams cad na rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang po thogs pa myed pa yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ dpung pa la btags na glang po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur
91a4(mdo): ro// 'byed pa dang / dmag thams cad las rgyal ba chen por 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang kyi cho ga zhib mo chen po grub par
91a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyis myi tshugs par 'gyuraro/ nams kyang de la rgya lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro//
91a6(mdo): byas pa rnams la mgul du btags na/ rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / bcas pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis myi tshugs so// nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'khor dang bcas pa rtag
91a7(mdo): tu rgyun myi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// bud myed rnams la ska rags sar pa btags te/ zhus byas
91a8(mdo): nas gos cang ma sar pa bkos te/ 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ skal ba babang po mchog dang ldan par byed cing / bkra kyi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ khyim thab dang rtag tu rjes su
91a9(mdo): mthun par 'gyur/ khye'u dang bu mo yod par 'gyur ro// shes rab mchog tu 'gyur/ thams cad dga' bas lta bar 'gyur/ de la bud myed kyi skyon yang 'byung bar myi 'gyur// phyi ma la de lta bu'i bud myed kyi lus kyi thob pa/
91b1(mdo): shes par bya ste/ shes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// nor bu 'di btags na thams cad du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur zhing / dug dang mtshon dang skyes myi tshugs so// dus byas pa yang skye/
91b2(mdo): bar myi 'gyur ro// nor bu 'di btags pas dug myed par 'gyur zhing / myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba skye bar myi 'gyur zhing bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang srin dang / ser ba gnan na tshul lan bdun pa zlas
91b3(mdo): te/ nam mkhal la gtor na rlung dang sprin dang / ser ba thams cad mnan pa ma 'gyur ro// bzlog par bya ba na bal po se'u'i lkug mas bzlog par bya'o// dran pa bskyed na 'phags pa pyad ras gzigs dpa
91b4(mdo): phyug gi s+yan sngar myi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la na bdun bzlas te/ nor bu chu dron las btang ba byas na/ blags pa tsam gyis tshags su bcad pa stong 'dzind par 'gyur zhing / zos
91b5(mdo): ba mang po rgya mtsho bsngags par 'gyur ro// rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bya/ bar 'dod na/ sus bsku ba byas na gang du zhugs pa der thams
91b6(mdo): cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bu mo gnyis la byugs na/ chu klung chen po pus so nub tsam kyi pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ dmag gas/ g.yul po'am
91b7(mdo): tshogs pa'i nang ngam pa re khrod dang / tshang tshing dang / ri sul dang / dkon par phyi nad pa na bsgreng ba byas na/ bde ba dang / bde legs su gal bar 'gyur zhing / chos po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang
91b8(mdo): gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pas myi tshugs par 'gyur zhing bltar myed par 'gyur ro// btson ra thams cad du song ba na/ byug pa byas na/ khong sgril dang / lcags sgrog gis bcings pa thams cad chag grugs
91b9(mdo): su 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la bskus na/ mchod cha gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// myig gnyis la byugs na/ gnyid log pa'i tshe rmyil ma chen po mye bar 'gyur zhing / ci ltar bsams shing smod pa snang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags
92a1(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku stond pa mdzad cing / thams cad bka' spos dpar 'gyur ro// de la myig nad thams cad kyis myi tshugs so// kha'i nang du bzhag na gang bslangs pa sbyin par byed cing dbang
92a2(mdo): a du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa la bral bar byug pa byas na/ byugs pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur te/ thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// lag 'phel du bskus na/ glang po che dbang du 'gyur zhing / gar btang ba der
92a3(mdo): 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bral ba'i dbus su thig le byas na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro// myed pa la byugs na/ mgrin sngon bzhin du bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / bgyi ba ci mchis
92a4(mdo): zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang sbyar te myig la bskus na/ mtshan mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dedang / srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo bye bar 'gyur zhing /
92a5(mdo): gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bran bzhi na du byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas kyi mtshor bor na/ klu chen po char kyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// char ha cang che ba'i che chu dang /
92a6(mdo): bsres te nam mkha' la gtor ma zhi bar 'gyur ro// sprin la bltas te sar ba'i rgyun la gtor na/ ser ba 'bab par myi 'gyur ro// lag pa la btags na/ kapal reg pa de 'ad myi shes par 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i
92a7(mdo): rje dpal btags te/ mye'i nang du zhugs na/ myes myi tshugs shing tsan dang bzhin bsal bar 'gyur ro// ral gri la byugs te g.yul ngor song na/ lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar gyurd nas/ pha rol gyi dpung
92a8(mdo): thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhib thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// nad chen pos thebs pa'i nang pa tshabs po tshal phye ma byin na/ nad tshabs chen po las tha rad par 'gyur ro// pho ba na ba la chu rngon la btab na mongs
92a9(mdo): yongs su kha rang par 'gyur ro// thil logs na ba la dar ba las bta' na zhi bar 'gyur ro// rang thams cad la ni zhun mar dang / ti la a ma las sbyar te/ sku mnye dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba'i rang dang / sngar thugs
92b1(mdo): pa dang byug pa byas na/ nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing / nams kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// phug ki sgo 'khor yug tu byugs la/ snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la
92b2(mdo): 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas nas zhugs na/ phug sgo chag ste rang gi khyim ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// sdang ba thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// bgyegs dang log 'dren thams cad myi
92b3(mdo): snang bar 'gyur ro// bar bcug ste mya smra bar snying po'i mdo brjod pa byas na/ lan brgya phrag stong bzlas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shing rta'i srog shing
92b4(mdo): la byugs na/ g.yul po thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// zong la gtor na rin chen pos nyo bar 'gyur ro// bu mo'i gdong bkrus na mgo yang bar 'gyur ro// snying kar thig le byas na thams cad du blta
92b5(mdo): myed par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ bdag bsrung ba/ gzhan bsrung po'o// nor bu chen po/ kang dang gapal sbyar zhing bzlas pa thams cad du
92b6(mdo): bltar myed par 'gyur ro// bkyegs dang / log 'dren rnams la/ lan bdun bzlas te byin na/ bkyegs dang / log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// byung ngan pa myed par bya na/ ras la
92b7(mdo): dkyil 'khor zlum po bris la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mye smra bar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ thang mas gos rtsang ma bgos te/ a ga ru'i bdug
92b8(mdo): pas bdug par bya zhing / spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bstam pa byas na/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la byung ngan pa thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// sdug pa dang / mye lam ngan pa dang / bltas ngan pa
92b9(mdo): dang / sgrib pa bsal na/ gser ras/ dul kyi bum pa spos rgyas bkang ba la lan brgyas brgyad 'azlas te/ thugs yang dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyub zhingapa/ 'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po nyams su myong bar
93a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad tshar gcod na/ til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sregs gis so// nad dang gnod pa thams cad bsal na tshu la bzlas pas so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar bya na/ dus/
93a2(mdo): agasum du lan gsum rtag tu bzlas pas/ dus ma yin par 'chi bzhi par 'gyur ro// bcing ba dang / lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril gzhom na/ nyan re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// rgyal po dbang du bya na/
93a3(mdo): lam po char brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// chom po dang rkun po rengs par bya' na/ ra dza ko sha ta ka'i sa bon kyi spyan sregs kyis so// mye rengs par bya na/ seng ldeng gyi shing
93a4(mdo): la bzlas te/ mer bcug nas bzlas na me rengs par byed par 'a gyur ro// chu rengs par bya na ka s+ya ka'i sa bon chu'i nang du btab na/ chu rengs par bya bar 'gyur ro// dug gzhil na rma bya'i sgo yis so//
93a5(mdo): mtshon rengs par bya na shing gnam lcags kyis tshig po'i thal ba/ la bzlas te/ gtor na mtshon cha thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin bsgrub na/ ting nge 'dzind kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas
93a6(mdo): na/ ting nge 'dzin stong thob par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa drug rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rigs sngags 'chang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des pa lar
93a7(mdo): kyi lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa cha kun tu dbye ba byas te/ tsan dan kyis mchod par bya zhing / gur kum dang / kla rtsi dang / ga pur kyis mchod nas me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs
93a8(mdo): dbang phyug la mngon tu phyogs par bzhag nas/ bum pa spos chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag la/ mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog por bzhi spos chu'i bum pa'i dbus su bzhag par bya zhing / a ga ru'i bdug pa
93a9(mdo): dbul bar bya'o// bum pa'i steng du bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gzhag par bya/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhipa/ spos kyi mar me bzhi bltam par bya mchod pa rgya chen po bya/
93b1(mdo): ba dad kyis brgyan par bya zhing / dkyil 'khor byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dkyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brkyang bya/ 'gro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brkyang bzlas brjod byas na/ pha rol tu/
93b2(mdo): phyi nad pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sku stond par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can
93b3(mdo): brgya stong mang po gdul na/ ra'i rtse mo stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// sdang ba thams cad gzhom par 'dod pas/ rdo rje 'am mdung rtse gsum la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te// don yod pa'i zhags pa'
93b4(mdo): phyag rgyas tsham ngan bya zhing / 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ 'khros pas lan brgya rtsa brkyad bzlas na/ gsor te nam mkha' la 'phangs na/ bdud las sogs pa
93b5(mdo): sdang ba thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// las thams cad 'gyu/ ba pa dang / gsapa sngags thams cad 'grub pa dang / bsam/ pa thams cad grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/ don sngo/
93b6(mdo): pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ stong nyi shu bzlas na/ grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskurd pa thob par 'dod pas/ stong sum bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas /
93b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du spos chu'i bum pas dbang bskurd par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan sku gdung dang bcas pa la/ myig gtad de khri bzlas na de
93b8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa nyid khob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs mnan te/ zhi bzlas ma/ spyan ras gshegs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bar 'dod pas
93b9(mdo): phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mnan te/ bzlas brjod lan stong byas na/ gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar byas na 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'khro bo'i rgyal po
94a1(mdo): dran par bya zhing / thams cad du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas na/ ma bsgrubs ma blags par 'grub cing / cho ga zhib mo mtha' yas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// snying rje dang / dka' ba
94a2(mdo): dang / btang snyoms dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtse ba dang / byams pa dang / shas rab dang ldan pas 'odi grub par bstand to// cho ga bgos pa grub pa mchog thams cad du grub pa thob cing / bsod nams kyi phung
94a3(mdo): bos 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thog mar 'khri bo'i rgyal po bzlas pas rtag tu mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / yul bcing ba byas te/ bsrung ba mchog tu dkon pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang rgyal
94a4(mdo): ba'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur/ zhing / go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur ro// gal te dbang bskur bar 'dod na yang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur
94a5(mdo): ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa stond par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhab mo mchog las 'khro bo'i rgya la po bshad par bya ste/ rtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgosu la/
94a6(mdo): shes rab dang / byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pas 'di grub par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstand to// / na ma sarba ta tha ka ta/ Ar+ya pa lo kya taite shwa ra badz+ra d+ha re b+hu/ AM tsa ra
94a7(mdo): tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ tse ro tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma ha pad ma hAsta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma ha s+thA ma pra ba ta/ tsa ra tsa ma/ ma tsar ti/ tsa le hA ra/ I h+ye hi/ sid+d+ha si d+h+ya/ bu
94a8(mdo): d+ha bu d+ha/ d+ha bA d+ha ba/ kau Do ko Ni/ pa ra ma shud d+ha swad tra/ ka ra ka ra/ kai ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma sa pa shu/ pai ti be sha d+ha ma/ hA hA/ hr-i hre/ hU h+ma/ oM ka ra ma ha/ pra mA pe la ng+ga ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ raSh+mi
94a9(mdo): ta sa sA sa? pra ti man ShiT/ sha ra~M ra/ pha la dza la/ ta ba ta pa/ b+ha ka ban/ so ma di d+ya/ ya ma ba ru na/ ku be ra/ pra m+ben tra/ ri li ka Na/ b+hu me ta ra na/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ rung tra/
94b1(mdo): Sh+Na ba sa ba/ d+ha na da/ de ba ri shi ma ya ka/ ma hu bi bi/ de be Sha ng+ka ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man ta ba lo ki/ bi li ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun tsa/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha na/ ta Da na/ ta rdza na/ ra
94b2(mdo): ta ska ra/ aka NaM/ su da ka/ bi sha/ sha stA pa r-i mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ ba la b+ho d+hang ka tsa tu ra/ r+ya sad t+ya saM pra ka sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma ha bi d+yan d+ha ka ra/ pra sha man/ mi li mi li/ I ne
94b3(mdo): ya tsarma pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta ma ru/ bi shud d+ha bi Sha ya ni/ ba si na/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ shwe ta yang nyo ba bi ta/ rad Na ma gu ta/ ma la d+ha ra/ sa rbad nya shai ra si kri ta/ ka ra pu ta/ d+ha na/ sa mA dAM/
94b4(mdo): bi mo kA/ a pra kam pya/ Sha da pa ra myi ta/ pa ri pu ra ka/ ba hu sad tra/ san ta ti pa ri pa tsa ka/ sa rba ma ra/ di pra du ShA pra ma rda ka/ sa rba sid d+hu sha pa ri pu ra ka/ a b+hai Shin ts+ya sa rba
94b5(mdo): ta tha ga A b+hai Shi kI ra/ b+ha ka ban ta/ a mo ra tsa hUM phaT/ na mo stu te sA ha// / kasang sngags kyi cho ga sA/ ma de lta bus las thams cad pa/ don yod pa 'i zhags pa
94b6(mdo): khro bo'i zhes bya ba grub pas mchog las thams cad pa'o// / na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma ar+ya a mi ta b+ha ya/ ta tha ga taya/ na ma a r+ya pa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sad ta ya/ ma hA
94b7(mdo): sad tra ya/ swa ha ka ru Ne ka ya/ swa mo gA ba ra da pa shA ha sta ya ma ha shud d+ha sad tra ya/ a kadaH/ b+ha ka ban/ pad ma ha sta/ ba ra da ka rang ku le/ pad ma b+hu dze/ ma ha pa shu pa ti be sha dA ra/ pra sid shaM kA
94b8(mdo): ma kad tsha/ ma be ka/ bi pra shi ta ra k+Shi/ ha sa ha sa/ e mo kA shud d+he/ sa ra sa rA/ tsal tsa la/ A kA da tsha/ a kad tsha/ ba la bam/ a ba so ki ta kA ra/ ma ma gan d+ha/ pu swa sa ma ma rdza ni/ yam pra tid tsha
94b9(mdo): sI rang na sad t+ya na/ a mo kA sid d+ha swa ha// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad dkug na/ a ga ru'i 'dug pa la lam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas so//
95a1(mdo): ma mo rad na trA yA yA/ na ma ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi sad tra ya/ ma ha sad tra yA/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ sarba kAn d+ha d+hi ba si ta/ a mo kA hU~M dza/ ba ra da ya/ sa rba kan d+ha ma s+ya bi b+hu shi ta/
95a2(mdo): pri swe/ tsan drad+ha ni ra saM pri ye/ g+han d+ha kAn d+hA mu le pa na sa ma ma pra tid tsang ra ba ra bA rA da ya swa ha// / lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// // na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma ar+ya pa lo ki ti shA ra
95a3(mdo): bo d+hi sad tra ya/ ma ha srad tA ya/ ma ha ka ru Ne ka ya/ tad ya tha/ he li hi li/ mi li i li/ ma ha pra b+ha su bi ma le/ pra sA be sha d+ha re/ su tri ba ri da/ tu ru tu ru/ bi tsing tra pu shwa ma s+ya bi b+hu Shi te/ ha raH
95a4(mdo): ra/ ma ra ma ra/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo kA hri da ya/ pra mo dan ku n+ya/ pra tid tsha ma ma push+ma ba re sA hA/ me tog la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma a r+ya pa la
95a5(mdo): ki te shwa ra yA/ bo d+hi swad trA ya/ ma ha swad tA ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ ma ha bo d+hi sa da tra ba ra de/ sma rasma ra/ b+ha ka ban sa ma ya/ sarba ta ba ka ta shA si de/ b+ha ga bAn/ a ba lo ka/
95a6(mdo): ya sa rba sad tra/ a ba lo ka ni/ a mo g+hA pa ti pa sha ha ste/ sid d+hi/ sid d+he/ sid d+ha pra te/ sed d+hAn tu ta/ byAd d+ha/ dA ma?/ sang ka/ sad t+yen/ tu ru tu ru/ sad t+ya sa ma ya/ pa la ya swa ha/
95a7(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bya ba'i rigs sngags so// na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma a r+ya pa lo gi te shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi swad tA ya/ ma ha swad ta ya/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad ya thA
95a8(mdo): d+hu re d+hu re/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ pad ma dza be/ baM ga tra ba ra de/ be ka be ga/ d+hun+ya d+hu s+ya/ sa rba bi dza pri ye/ bud d+ha/ d+ha ma/ sang ga/ sa t+ye na/ mi li mi li sra ha// gtor ma'i sngags te lan bdun bzlas te sbyin no//
95a9(mdo): na mo rang na tra yA yA/ na ma a r+ya ba lo kyi te Sha rA ya/ bo d+hi sad tA ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ a pra ti ha ta/ ta tha ga ta kanyal na ka ya/ b+ha ka ban/ a ha ra/ pad ma sa ma na/ pad ma b+hu dze/ shwe tang kai mA l+ya bi b+hu Shi
95b1(mdo): Ne/ d+hu ma d+hu ya/ thal b+hud drA d+ha ma/ sang ga sa rkye swa pa/ mar me'i rigs sngags te/ lan bdun 'azlas pas so// ma mo 'ad na trA ya ya/ na ma a nA pa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sad pA ya/ ma sa sad thA ya/ sa/
95b2(mdo): haka Tu na ka ya/ tad ya thA/ mAM b+hi rI d+hi nI/ pad ma pA ni/ a ka ma ka ma/ a mo ka tad ta/ sid d+he/ sa rba ta thA ka na/ rash+mi sa na cod te/ sarba b+hi d+ya d+ha ra bi sho d+ha ne/ a mo ka sid d+he swA hA// spos chu chu
95b3(mdo): zhim po'i bum pa la lan bdun pa bla / na bya'o// zhus kyi rigs sngags so// / na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma a r+ya pa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sad tra ya/ ma ha sad tA ya/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad yA thA/
95b4(mdo): d+hu me d+hu me/ d+hu d+hu me/ pad ma/ pad ma nir b+ha se/ shud d+he shu/ da d+ha kan tsan/ pra b+ha sa bi ma le shud d+ha ra shwe/ shu tsi shu tsi/ shuHko tsa ra sid d+he/ pad mang ka ba taM/ pra ba ra Ni swa hA/
95b5(mdo): gos kyi rigs sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// / na mo rad na tra swa ya/ nam a r+ya ba lo ki ti te shA ra sa/ zo d+hA/ sad tA ya/ ma hA sad tra ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka sa/ tad yA
95b6(mdo): sha me sha me ya/ shan ti me/ ma ma swa sta ya nang gu ru/ shan to/ si ma/ sarba pa pa/ shan ta/ shud dA ka l+ya na byi ra dze/ shan te/ bi dza ye/ dza ya si d+ha/ b+ha ka ban/ a r+ya ba lo ki te sha ra/
95b7(mdo): sa ra sa ra swa ha/ mal cha la sngags te nya la na/ rmyi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad myi mthong ngo // na mo rang na tra yA yA/ na ma ar+ya ba lo ki ti te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi swad tA ya/ ma ha sa da tA ya
95b8(mdo): ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad ya thA/ na ka pra ka ra sha ne/ dib bya dza le/ dz+wa la ba ba haM/ dza la sa k+Sho d+ha ya/ yan na ka/ dza la sa sho d+ha ni/ pad ma sa re pad ma byi shud d+he/ pa ni dza le sa sho d+ha ya/ ad man d+ha
95b9(mdo): ra d+ha ra/ sa le le swa ha/ chu'i sngags te khrus dang dab bskur ba'i chu blangs la/ lan bdun bzlas te s+yad do// na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma a r+ya ba lo ki ta sha ra ya/ bo d+hi sad tra ya/ ma ha sad tA ya/
96a1(mdo): ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ sarba sa twa hi d+ha ra ka ra ya/ a mo kA ba ra pra dA ya/ sarba sad tA man na pa na pra da ya/ de ba na kA da/ ya b+h+yo dz+ya bi dI d+hi ra sA nu pra dA yA/ sa ka la b+hu ba ne/ b+hu ba na/
96a2(mdo): byi sho d+ha ni/ san ta par ya pra bar b+he shud d+he swa ha/ dbul ba'i sngags so// na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma ar+ya pa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi swad tra ya/ ma ha swa da tra ya/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ sa rba de ba
96a3(mdo): su ra na ma skr-i te/ sa ma sa man ta/ pra pu ra Na/ sa ma g+han d+ha ba b+ha si te/ ga ka na byi shud d+he/ muka ti pra b+he/ dza ye byi dza ye/ dza ya ni ra mA lo pa Na ya ti/ pus+sa ma l+ya gAn d+ha bi sho d+ha ni/ bi sho dA yA/
96a4(mdo): sarba ta tha ka ta byi shud d+he/ pad ma byi sho d+ha ni sA hA// / me tog rnying pa dor ba'i rigs sngags so// na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma a r+yas lo ki ta shA ra yA/ bo d+hi sadA tra ya/ ma hA
96a5(mdo): sAd tA ya/ ma ha ka ru na ka ya/ tad ya thA/ d+ha ra Nin d+ha re/ d+ha ra ni ban d+he/ ban d+ha ban d+huHshuka kra bi sho d+ha ni/ shug kra mA li ling ki te/ shug kra bi sho d+ha ni/ shud b+ha bi ma le swa hA//
96a6(mdo): mA ku sha 'am ras kyi srad pu 'am/ bu mo rtsang mas bkal ba'i srad pu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsagacig dor ba byas na/ khu chu 'gags par 'gyur ro// na mo
96a7(mdo): rad na tra ya yA/ na ma a Sh+yaHlo ki ta shwa ra yA/ bo d+hi sad tA ya/ ma ha swad dA ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka yA// tad ya A/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ bi ma lo dz+wa le/ pra b+hA sa bi ra dze/ su rtsa ba ti/ dza ya pad ma mA la
96a8(mdo): d+ha re swa ha// / me'i sbyin sems kyi thal ba la yan bdun bzlas te/ kun tu gtor na bkyegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyis rnams kyang myi tshugs so// na mo rad na tA ya yA/ na mangs rgyal lo ki te shwa ra ya/
96a9(mdo): bo d+hi sad tA ya/ mA hA sad tA yA/ ma ha ka ru rbi ka yA/ tad yA thA/ dza ye dza la/ dza la ba ti/ dza ya pra bA ba ni/ na ka pra ba ni/ dib pya ba ri ni/ me li mi li swa ha// nya reg gi rikas sngags so// na mo rad na
96b1(mdo): tra ya A/ na ma makya la lo ki te shwa rA yA/ bo d+hi sad tra yA/ ma ha sAd tra yA/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad ya A/ ri ni hA ri ni/ bing ka li bi nga ka li/ hi ri hi ri/ ba ga ban/ ni tsa la/ pra tsa la/ pra ti tiSh+Tha sAn/
96b2(mdo): rak+Sha rak+Sha ma sa bud d+ha/ d+ha ma/ sangag sad bye ma sra hA// stegs bu 'am rtsa kug bting ba la lan bdun bsngags pas so// stan gyi rigs sngags so// ma mo rang na tra A ya/ na ma sa ma sa na Na la Ni ba
96b3(mdo): na/ de ba ta Na Nan mo bi d+ya de bA ta nAn+da/ sA rba ka la ba sid dA nAnA/ na sa A t+ya o ki te tA rU yA/ bo dI sad tA ya/ ma ha sa thA ya/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ e h+ye b+ha ka ba ti/ pad ma sun da ri/ ma ha bi d+yA de ba ti/
96b4(mdo): tsa la tsa la pad ma sun da ri/ be ka ba ti/ su ru su ru swa ha/ nyin re zhing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / spos chu/ pho nya mo/ pad ma'i rigs mdzes pa dang / gnod sbyin mo ral
96b5(mdo): pa gcig ma mchod nas/ bzlas brjod la lan bdun byas na/ nams kyang bkyegs thams kyis myi tshugs so// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na ma kro dA ra dza ya/ na ma Ar+ya la lo ki te shwa rA yA/
96b6(mdo): bo d+hi sAd tra yA/ ma ha srad tra yA/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka yA/ nam sa wa d+ya ku la ba da sha s+ya/ tad ya thA/ au a mo kA d+hi da ya pra b+ha bi ni/ sarba bika nA pra sha ma ti/ A hA ra/ sang ha ra/ pad ma pi
96b7(mdo): thob 'i n+te/ sa ne kA ra ka/ bi shru shi ta ka ma sa b+hu dze/ ta ra k+Sha ra/ ta ma ya ba ras/ A mo g+hA hr-i dA la/ de ye/ tI ne te/ ba ra d+ha b+hu She/ s+phar s+pha ra/ ba ka banas mata pa ka ta sa ma sa/ b+hA ra Sh+Ta / b+hu nu b+hur+tha/ tha
96b8(mdo): b+he sha d+ha ra/ b+ha~M b+hu shiT ta nu/ mra hA b+ha yA ha re/ a lo ka sa bi lo ka ya/ sa rba sad tra ba lo ki ni/ ba ra ba rA bA ra de swa ha// / las thams cad pa'i rigs sngags de/ khyang par du ni rigs sngags 'dis dkyi
96b9(mdo): 'khor gyi gnas na/ 'khod pa'i las kyi rnams bsrung bar bya'o// ma mo rang na tra yA yA/ na mongs rgya lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi swad hA sa/ ma ga sad d+ha ya/ ma sha ka ru ni ka ya/ tad ya dzA/ ma ra sa ra/ sa ma sa /
97a1(mdo): bAn d+ha b+han d+ha/ sa man te na/ a mo kA pa sha hra ste/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+hu d+ha/ da ma?/ sa kA sad t+ye na swA hA/ bral ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te yul bcing ngo // na mo ra na tra a / mam
97a2(mdo): // ngo/
97a3(mdo): ar+ya o kI ta shwa rA yA/ tho d+hi sad tA ya/ ma hA sad tra yA/ ma hA ka ru ni ka yA/ tad ya hA/ di shwa b+han d+ha ni/ a mo g+he/ A pA ti ga te/ mu ru su mu/ su mu su ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sa rba bika d+ha/ bi na shA ni/ pad sa
97a4(mdo): sa ra bi b+hu shi te/ bud d+ha/ d+ha ma/ sang g+ha/ sad t+ye na/ b+han d+ha/ a dzi ta/ ba ra de swa ha// / spyan drangs te phyi nas phyogs bcing bar bya'o// na mo ra na tra yA yA/ na ma a r+ya la lo ki te shwa ra yA/ bo d+hi sAd tA yA/
97a5(mdo): ma ha swa tA A/ ma ha ka ru na ka yA/ tad ya thA/ hi li i li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ pi'i bi ri/ ba ra ba ra/ pra ba ra/ bi ma? da na d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ kad tsha kad/ b+ha ga bAn/ a rgyal lo ki ta shA
97a6(mdo): shu ba ka ban/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo ga bad me swa ha// / me tog ci snyed pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ snyim pa nas phul na/ slar gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// rigs sngags kyi cho ga zhib
97a7(mdo): mo rim par phye ba'i cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po khro bo chen po'i snying po'i mchog bsgrub na/ bsgrub sla ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o// // cho ga zhi ba grub
97a8(mdo): grub pa che// 'tho bo'i rgyal grub grub pa mchog/ don yod pa ni grub pa'i mchog/ rigs sngags 'di ni bshad par bya'o// don yod rgyal po 'gro chen kyi// snying po dam pa bsgrub pa na// cho ga zhib grub grub pa che/
97a9(mdo): 'khri bo'i rgyal po grub pa mchog/ grub pa'i mchog ste don yod pa// rigs sngags 'di ni bshad par bya// gang brjod pa tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo'i mchog grub pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong gis gzigs par
97a10(mdo): 'gyur ba// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gyi bya ma brgya phrag stong mthong bar 'gyur ba// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba// bsod nams kyi phung po bla na myed pa// sdig pa
97b1(mdo): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba// stobs dang brtson 'grus bskyed pa// cho ga zhib mo thams cad don yod pa// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa 'grub pa// dran pa tsam gyi mod la ni// sa gzhi yang ni g.yo 'gyur la// sum bcu'i/
97b2(mdo): lha rnams g.yo 'gyur zhing // lha bcas rgya mtsho lhun por bcas// klu rnams 'dar ni yid med cing // gnod sbyin srin po 'bros 'gyur ba// lha dang lha myin g.yul 'gyed che// rigs sngags rgyal po bla myed kyis// phyag/
97b3(mdo): na rdo rje gnod sbyin bcas// dpung dang bcas shing zhon bcas pa'i// lus skyes 'bar ba'i 'phreng can kun// 'das zhing kun tu 'dar yid med// rgyal po chen po bzhi po'i// gnas mchog dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // de dag
97b4(mdo): thams cad 'dus kyu rang nas// 'jig rten dbang la skyabs 'dod zhing / bcom ldan mgon po skyabs su gsol// thugs rje'i bdag nyid skyabs su gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
97b5(mdo): chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das/ gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la grub pa don yod pa'i
97b6(mdo): snying po rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po kang gis blags btsam kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po skur du rab tu 'grub cing / dran ba tsam kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lnga'i lus kyis
97b7(mdo): lus stonang par 'gyur ba/ dngos grub dang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan ras/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o//
97b8(mdo): na mo rang na tra sA yA/ na mo a mi ta b+ha ya/ ta thA ka ta yA/ na ma aHba lo ga te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sad ta ya/ ma ha sAd tA ya/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka yA/ tad yA thA/ oM pad me pad me/ pad ma d+ha ra/ b+hai b+hu sha ta bu dze/ tsa ra/
97b9(mdo): tsar/ pra sA be sha d+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsid tra/ mo lu li d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka ra/ ka badre bye du h+ya lang kri ta sha ling/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ma yA/ ba ka ba ti/ Sha bA kA ba ti ba ran/ d+hudU ru d+hu ru/ a o gA pa sha ga ste/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ya ka/
98a1(mdo): sa man ta a ba lo ki ta/ ma ha bo d+hi sad tA/ ba ra da pad mA sa na/ pad ma go'u ra/ dzA la dz+wa la/ sarba ta Tha ka ta/ a b+hi she ka te/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka/ pa la pa la/ ma ha be ka d+ha ra/ bi kri ta na/
98a2(mdo): ya na/ dang shA ka ra la ma ha te dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi bu la dza na pa ra da/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka/ ma d+ha pa shu pa ti be sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra ba ra bu mya sau b+ha ra/ su ga ta d+hA na sa ma d+hi/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ka te/ i sha ra/ ma he
98a3(mdo): sha ra/ dush+tsa da ma ka/ ro'u dra pra la da ma ka/ kro d+ha ra dza ma ha be ka da ra/ sa ma sa ma/ mA s+tha ma prA ba ha/ tsan tra su N+ya sa ti ra ka pra b+ha/ ma la ma la/ sarba ma la b+hi sho d+ha ka/ sarba ri shi ka na/ san ta ti/ ma he
98a4(mdo): ma he/ sha ra ru pa d+ha ra/ a myi ta b+ha dzi na/ lang kri ta dza ta/ da krI ni tsan tra/ lang kri ta shi ra/ ma tha ma tha/ se rba yA kA ra kA sa b+hu na ga na ban/ dza ka ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ga na sA mA lang kri ta na kAd tra mA
98a5(mdo): lA/ sa rba bi ga nA/ bi na sha na ka ra yA/ pa ra mAM tra tsing ta ma ha ka ru ni ka/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ri pu rna man Na la/ so'u mya/ mun kha/ shad pA myi tA pa ri ra ka/ mi li mi li/ e ne yA/
98a6(mdo): tsarma ni ba sa na/ bya gra tsarmod ta rI yA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa rba ta thA/ ka ta/ A bA l-I ki ta/ tI shu lA d+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la d+ha ra/ a mo kA/ pa sha ha ste/ yA mA ba ru na ku be ra ru pa d+ha ra/ nA ke na dra ru pa/ d+ha
98a7(mdo): ra bi ma li ba shud d+ha de ha/ sA nA pA pA/ pra sha ma ka/ sarba b+ha ra na bi sho d+hi ka sarba ki la bi sha nA sha ka/ s+t+rai log kya bshang ka ra/ sa rba sad tra bi sho d+ha ka/ b+ho d+hi sad tra ba ra da/ sa rba ta tha ga ta/ A d+hi shI te/ AM pa
98a8(mdo): ma bi b+hu shi ta shud d+he/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ a ba lo ka ya man/ sa ma sa ma/ sa rba kar ma me sA d+hA yA/ a mo gA pA sha hri da yA sid d+he/ gu h+ya ni ba si ne/ ba ra d+ha hUM phaT/ na mo stu ta swA hA// / grub
98a9(mdo): pa don yod pa rigs sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma zag tu 'byung po'itshogs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren de dag thams cad khas bub tu 'gyel te/ gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur
98b1(mdo): zhing / gnas kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dka' bas pa spa/ langs te/ skrag par 'gyur ba'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab
98b2(mdo): 'jug dang / dbang chen dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / skrag par 'gyur ba'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong spa kong ba thams cad dang / rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / chu bran thams
98b3(mdo): cad dang / skra dang klu gang dag chun gnas pa thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i lha dang / lha gang dag lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa dang / rigs sngags 'chang kyi 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad dang /
98b4(mdo): rag gnas ca ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha'i l+h+wab sa cad 'azhugs par 'gyur nas/ nam mkhal la so babs te/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa'
98b5(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang mchod pa'i phyi ra/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / ud pa la dang / pun da ri ka dang / man da ra ba dang / man par
98b6(mdo): ba chen po'i char dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub tsa mo raM bo ta lar phab ste/ lha'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len cing / ha ha zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra gtor nas/
98b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad kyi don tu rigs sngags chen po 'ang bshad do// zhes ched du brjod pa chen po ched du brjod do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde
98b8(mdo): dpon chen po phya gar ro dze/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga pad ba de song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir/ mu tig gi rigs ba
98b9(mdo): stong ri g.yul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sngags 'chang chen po cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyis mchog bshad do// dor yod pa'i rgyal po rigs sngags chen po'i snying po mgon po grub pa chen pos bshad du gso/
99a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag don yod pa'i rgyal po grub pa'i mchog/ las thams cad grub pa'i bshang du gsol// de nas de'i don tu 'phags pa 'byan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
99a2(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub pa'i mchog/ cho ga dang / yo byad du bcas pa bshad pa/ ras gru bzhi pa kun nas cha legs
99a3(mdo): par phye ba/ kha tshar ma bcad pa skra myed pa/ ri mo mkhan rtsang mas zhus byas pas gos rtsad ma bgos la/ gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas mtshon lhags pa yin pa snod sar par bzhag pa la bri bar bya ste/ dbus
99a4(mdo): su 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis bzhugs shing / rgyal ba 'od dpag myed kyis brgyan pa/ zer tsugs kyis g.yas su zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ raM dgas e
99a5(mdo): ne ya'i pags pa gon pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu gsum s+yan gsum/ phyag bzhi pa/ ri'i steng na pad ma'i ba dan la bzhugs pa/
99a6(mdo): zhal dbu ma zhi bI zhal/ bzhin 'dzum pa zhal g.yas pa 'jigs su rung ba khro gnyer can/ zor tsugs 'od dpag myed kyis brgyan pa/ dbu zla ches kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yon pa 'jigs su rung ba
99a7(mdo): bzhin bsgyur cing mche ba brtsigs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag myed dbu la bzhugs pa/ phyag gcig na pad ma thogs pa/ gnyis pa rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ gsum pa don yod pa'i zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzind pa la bcom
99a8(mdo): ldan 'das zhal 'khro gnyer can s+yan gtod pa bya zhing / bzhi pa dbus 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing / 'od 'dom gang 'khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o// g.yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma mdzes bag dang bcas shang /
99a9(mdo): lus bdud par mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la myig rtod par bya'o// g.yon du pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma mdzes bka dang bcas pa/ gsang sngags kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun zhing don yod pa la zhags pa la myig rtod pa bya'o// lha mo
99b1(mdo): sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i khro gnyer can bya'o// phyogs gnyis par lha mo dkar mo lag na pad ma thogs pa bya'o// pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho nya mol
99b2(mdo): gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o// ral pa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma bya'o// kong du gnas rtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyu
99b3(mdo): dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu/ 'phags pa phyag na/
99b4(mdo): rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba gang rgyangs can/ 'khro bo'i don yod pa'i rgyal po dang smra bar bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo ta la na gzhal myed
99b5(mdo): khang dang bcas pa mngon gsum du mthong bar rig par bya'o// // bam po bcu pa
99b6(mdo): mthong btsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las tha rad par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ mtshas
99b7(mdo): myed pa lnga byed pa yang yongs su tha rad par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spong bas mthong ba tsam kyi mod la rnam par dag par 'gyur/ mnar myed pa la gzhog
99b8(mdo): ba'i mthar zug pa yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus na/
99b9(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon gsum du stond par 'gyur zhing / dbugs 'byind par 'gyur/ shi nas bde ba can kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas/ tshe
100a1(mdo): rabs brgya stong phrag lnga rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po mthar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di la ma yin te/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur na/ lhag par mang du
100a2(mdo): byed pa lta ci smos te/ de ni phyir myi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
100a3(mdo): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'am/ btsun mo dam pa gapal la zhig gis ras kyi sku gzugs sgrub par bya ba de'i s+yan sngar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
100a4(mdo): po dran par byed cing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa byed na/ des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas shing /
100a5(mdo): bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po byas pa yin no// gang zhig 'khro bo'i/ don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi s+yan sngar mya smra bar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas ste/ chus dbang bskur na des na khyod
100a6(mdo): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// snyam du da ltar shes par bya'o// gang gis don yod
100a7(mdo): bar grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i chen po'i gzungs/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar mngon gsum du thal mo sbyar te/ 'dug nas lan bdun bzlas te/ bskor ba lan bdun byas la/ chu'i mchod yon dang /
100a8(mdo): lha bshos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog phul nas phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras na/ des na khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i
100a9(mdo): zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi zhal du myig gtad de/
100b1(mdo): lag pa g.yas g.yos gnyis sbyar la snying kar bzhag pa'i tshul/ 'dis phyag rgya re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge
100b2(mdo): slong ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo dam pa gapal la zhig/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
100b3(mdo): pa brgya stong phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cho ga zhib mo 'di rdzogs par lan brgya stong phrag khri bzlas par 'dod pa dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan
100b4(mdo): brgya stong phrag khri bya bar 'dod pas/ ras kyi sku gzugs la bco ngan par byas te/ ras kyi sku gzugs mngon tu bzhag nas/ gnas rtsa zhing dben par gnas sam/ 'chag sa 'am/ dkon pa'i
100b5(mdo): gnas sam/ phug gam ri'i me mo 'am/ gtsug la ka khang ngam khang par rtsang s+phA dang / byi dor byas te/ ba sre mol lci ba le na/ sa par mnyes la ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te bskus la/ spos
100b6(mdo): sna tshogs kyi byug pa byugs nas/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi s+yan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ kur kum kyis 'khru do'i tshad tsam bris la/ gla rtsi dang / ga pur kyis mchod par bya'o//
100b7(mdo): dri chab kyis bum pa dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ ras kyi 'gul tshangs kyis bcings la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// me tog dang / bdug spos dri zhim po dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba nyi
100b8(mdo): shu wa gcig gzhag par bya/ dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o// 'o mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bya/ 'o thug dang sbyar dug dang / khan da l+ya d+ya dang / 'bras chan dang / lag pa dang /
100b9(mdo): bu ras dang / sha kha ra dang / zhun sar gyis bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya/ a ka ru nag po dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / ka pur dang / kun tu ru dang / shi ri ba sa dang / cung per rnam snod dang bzhag nas/ a ka ru'i ya
101a1(mdo): sreg shing gi sreg bya/ me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ mar gyi mar me sum bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mas kos cang ma bgos shing / zhus legs par byas/
101a2(mdo): tshes bcu bzhi nas/ bco lnga'i bar du 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/ dri chab kyis dgra
101a3(mdo): bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ de nas myi smra bar dkyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
101a4(mdo): par bya/ de'i 'og tu don yod par grub pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na/ de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od gzer bdun byung nas/ kun tu snang bar byas te/ lan
101a5(mdo): gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzig/ sa dbang phyug ga bral ba'i s+yan du zhugs par 'gyur ro// zhugs pa tsam kyi mod la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / rigs
101a6(mdo): sngags 'chang snying dka' zhing ba spu ldang bar 'gyur/ mdog mad ras yongs su dag par 'gyur// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gi sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag
101a7(mdo): par 'gyur/ zhabs gnyis las lo ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur/ phyag na pad ma'i lo ma g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rtse gsum g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes
101a8(mdo): bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu legs so// legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub kyis las thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis don yod grub kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen
101a9(mdo): po dam pa grub zhes nas/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston par mdzad do// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do// 'di ni grub pa'i mchog bla na byed pa ste/ mal
101b1(mdo): bsgrubs pa las byed pa'o// de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ me tog pad ma la brtsas brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa brgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te/ gang ga'i phying nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro//
101b2(mdo): sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul la/ yapa lan bdun bzlas nas me tog rnying pa blangs te/ gapal byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis
101b3(mdo): zin pa la byin na/ gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis zabs pa lo byin na/ nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor gtor na/ rgyal po btsun mo
101b4(mdo): li 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mye ro sreg pa'i sa steng du gtor na/ sems can de sems can dmyal ba las yo sa su grol bar 'gyur// mnar myed pa na gnas pa'i sems
101b5(mdo): can la gtor na/ skad cig de la yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ nyal ba'i sngas su bzhag na/ rmyi lam chen po mthong bar 'gyu/ ra ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku stonang
101b6(mdo): par mdzad cing / yid du 'ong ba thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa'am/ bud byed gang gi steng du gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing / grib pa bzhin gyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i steng du
101b7(mdo): gtor na zan bzhin du 'gyur ro// lha'i gzugs brnyan kye steng du bzhag na/ 'gug par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// myig sman la bsgrub par 'dod pas/ ras kyi sku gzugs
101b8(mdo): kyi spyan sngar myig sman sdong gros la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ grub pa'i rtags gsum stond par 'gyur te/ 'bar ba dang / dbu ba 'byung ba dang / dud pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas myig bskus na gyi snang
101b9(mdo): 'gyur ro// gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad mthob par 'gyur ro// bral bar thig le byas na phug thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ sgo thams cad dang / 'khrul 'khor
102a1(mdo): thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur// yan lag dang nyi lag bskus na/ nam ma'alal 'gro bar 'gyur gyi bor thig le byas na/ 'phags pa 'argyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro//
102a2(mdo): myig la byugs na khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po las stsogs pa lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed do// mtshan mo myig bskus na/ nyin mo bzhin du mthong bar
102a3(mdo): 'gyur zhing / gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khas phub na dor bar bya'o// rang gi lus la byugs na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lus su 'gyur/ gnod spyan dang / srin po las bsogs pas myi mthong
102a4(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing / las thams cad byed par 'gyur/ tshe bskal lastong thub par 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang snying kar bsku ba byas nas/ nag po chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad kyi gzugs
102a5(mdo): stond par 'gyur ba nas/ tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyu ga chen po'i gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs mang po stond pa/ ra 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma stond par 'gyur ro// ldong gros
102a6(mdo): dang / 'gyi'u wang dang / so'u bi ra ka dang / gur kum dang / kra kud la/ don yod par grub pa zhi bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ 'the bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad
102a7(mdo): bzlas pa byas te/ thams cad du myi smra zhing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi s+yan sngar btags la/ ras kyi sku gzugs la mngon tu 'phyogs te/ rtsang mas gos rtsang ma bgos la/ tshes bco lnga la
102a8(mdo): nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas na/ phye ma zhib du btags te/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'khro bo'i rgyal po dang / don yod pa'i grub pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la
102a9(mdo): 'phags pa byar ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas nas/ ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byas la/ nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo krung du
102b1(mdo): 'dug la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas na nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya ste/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas/ 'kho bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun
102b2(mdo): bzlas te/ de'i 'og tu gyis la bkrus nas/ don so dpa' mgrub pa'i gzungs bzlas pa byas na/ bslus pa rnas kyis 'phags pa rgyan ngas gshegs rabang thug ri Do tas dang bcas/ gnas byed 'ab dang ma
102b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhal myed khang dang bcas pa ri bo ta la na gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed chos 'chad pa
102b4(mdo): mthong bar 'gyur/ chos bshad pa de yang zos par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal myed
102b5(mdo): 'ang dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur zhing / chos 'chad pa'i gsung / gyi sgra de yang thos par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar rigs ngan gyi rigs/ su skye ba dang / mnar myed pa la gzhos pa dang / mtshams myed pa
102b6(mdo): lnga byed pa gang yin pa thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rjes dgongs par 'gyur zhing / rmyi lam du
102b7(mdo): stodade par mdzad do// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ lha'i lo stong pa 'tsho bar 'gyur
102b8(mdo): zhing / lha'i bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nad kyis thebs pa thams cad la myig sman 'dis bskus na/ nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing / rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// dug thams cad la bskus pa
102b9(mdo): tsam kyis dug myed par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad la kyig la bskus na gyi mthong bar 'gyur/ phyir nol pa dang / dam po dang / g.yon can dang / chol po dang / rkun po thams cad kyis kyi mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshon
103a1(mdo): gzang ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / zhag zhugs myig la bskus na/ thams cad du rgyal zhib lan thebs par 'gyur ro// g.yul po thams cad du
103a2(mdo): myika bskus na/ g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / dpung gyi tshogs rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ myig bskus na rgyal po btsun mo li 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro//
103a3(mdo): myi smra bar grong khyer du song na skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo grong khyer na gnas so cog thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// myig g.yas pa bskus na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gang mthong ba de
103a4(mdo): thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// myig g.yon pa bskus na/ rigs dran thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs/ dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ don yod par grub pa'i rigs
103a5(mdo): sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas ste/ 2/ phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'khro bo'i rgyal po/ dang /
103a6(mdo): gzugs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdza gas pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag bcu'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa la
103a7(mdo): bskyed par 'gyur/ thams cad kyis mying bzung ba byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong mnyes par byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi mngon gsum du mthong ba thob par
103a8(mdo): 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sngon gyi sgrib pas mnar myed pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan song du 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su skye ba
103a9(mdo): dran par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing / rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// phyag g.yon pa mnan te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ bzlas
103b1(mdo): pa tsam gyi mod la/ skra dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po las bsogs pa bkug par 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ don yod par
103b2(mdo): grub pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po lan bdun bzlas pa byas na/ lha dang / klu las btsogs pa thams cad kyang / las thams cad byed cing / rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro//
103b3(mdo): lte ba'i gnas su mnan te bzlas na/ klu las btsogs pa thams cad kyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu gling mtha' dag tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// snyan du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ ga dang
103b4(mdo): gang du song ba der skyes pa'am/ bud myed dam/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la gang brtsams pa dang / gang bcol pas
103b5(mdo): bzhi las de thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// dbu nas bzung ste/ bzlas na/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du dbang du byasapar 'gyur te/ thams cad la dbang bskur zhing bsgo ba bzhin
103b6(mdo): byed par 'gyur ro// thog mar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas nas bzlas pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis mnan te stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na/ sa'i 'og yan cad dbang du byas par 'gyur zhing / yas
103b7(mdo): thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ mngag bzhug thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// pad ma la stong na brgyad bzlas nas/ pad ma'i mthur bor na/ padam zad kyi shes par 'gyur zhing / pad ma dus thams cad
103b8(mdo): 'gyur ro// ud pa la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ ud pa la'i ledze'u bor / srung ba la sngon por zad ci zhes par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnams kyang nyams par gyi 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du mye tog 'gyum
103b9(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog dang / gAn b+ha ban ri ka dang / yu ti ka dang / na ba ma li ka'i me tog rnams kyang dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / zad myi shes par 'gyur ro// 'bras
104a1(mdo): bu dang me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ bskyed mos 'tshal lam/ nags tshal gyi nang du gtor na/ me tog dang 'bras bu zad myi shes shing dus thams cad par 'gyur ro// dpal chen po dkug
104a2(mdo): par 'dod pas/ spra chel las lha mo dpal chen po dkyil mo krung phyed du 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus btud pa/ lag na pad ma thogs pa/ brang rgyas pa byas la/ 'bras bu dang / me tog dgram pa
104a3(mdo): bya zhing / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / tsan dan dkar pos mchod pa byas la/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi s+yan sngar gzhag par bya zhing / sngar tsan dan dkar po las byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin byas la/ 'phags
104a4(mdo): pa/ rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs la/ a kA ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen mo la tsan dan dkar po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing / gnyis ka la mchod pa dang / bsnyen
104a5(mdo): bkur bya/ gtor ma dkar po dang / dr-i chab dbul bar bya/ mchod/ yon stong dbul bar byas ste/ rigs sngags 'chang rtsar ma/ dus gsum zhus bya zhing / gos rtsang ma bgos te/ mngon tu
104a6(mdo): 'phyogs te/ dkyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun byas la/ ji snyed pa'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / me tog la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgyan
104a7(mdo): brgyad bzlas te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i 'go la gdags par bya/ me tog gzhan gyis mchod pa bya zhing / tsan dan dkar po la brgya pa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs sngags
104a8(mdo): 'chang gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing / nyungs kar re res bzlas nas dpal lha mo chen mos bsnun par byas ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo
104a9(mdo): 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bral ba nas/ 'od gzer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa thams cad gser du snang bar 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo//
