104b1(mdo): chen po bkug par 'gyur zhing / tsaM srid 'tsho'i bar du 'da' bar myi 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal rjes su spyod par 'dod na/ nyin re zhi 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dpa dpal lha mo chen mo la dus
104b2(mdo): gsum du mchod pa bya zhing / mchod yon gyi snod kyang bzhag par bya zhing / dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya/ sbyin par bya/ longs spyod par bya/ bsod nams kyang bya zhing / dpal lha mo chen mo
104b3(mdo): dus gsum du mchod pa bya'o// dpal lha mo chen mo rab kyi gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po 'gro bo'i snying po stong ma brgyad bzlas par bya zhing / tsar dad kyi mi lu stong rtsa brgyad kyis
104b4(mdo): bdug par bya/ nyungs kar stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsnun par bya ste/ nyungs kar stong rtsa brkyang chang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgya nad pa/ lha'i nor bu dang / gser dang /
104b5(mdo): mu tig gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus snang gsal zhal pad ma 'a bye ba lta bu/ s+yan ud pa la sngon po ltar gsal ba/ pad ma bsnams pa/ bdan pad ma nor bu dang / rin po che dang / kas
104b6(mdo): mang mang po'i pad ma'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che 'bar ba'i bum pa stong phrag brgya thogs pa/ lha'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin kyi bu mo brgya stong mang po thams cad lha'i rgyadan kyis brgyan pa/ sus
104b7(mdo): gsal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba mdun na 'khod par 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang gyis 'jigs par myi bya zhing / sems dka' bar byas la/ gsang sngags 'di lan bdun
104b8(mdo): bzlas par bya'o// / na mo rang ma tra wA lA/ na ma Ar+yas pa lo ki te shA na swA/ bo d+hi swad thA yA/ ma hA sad tra yA/ ma r+tha ka ru ni kA yA/ mA hA sa mo swA/ ba ra da m+b+ha/ tad ya 9/ oM pad ma na
104b9(mdo): pad ma metra/ pad mang ge/ pad ma dA re/ pad ma pa ti/ pad ma pri le/ pad ma ko'u mi/ pad ma thi g+he/ bad ma sa na pra ti t+ti te/ a ba lo ki te pri yai/ ba ra de bar dA yI ni/ pra sI da/ pra sa da ya/ kur+tha
105a1(mdo): ku ru/ a r+ya a ba lo ki ta/ ba ra de/ hu ru hu ru/ ba rAd kyi ni/ tsal tsa la/ pad ma bi b+hu Sha ta/ bad ma pri ye/ bi tsid tra mA na da re/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM bA ra/ sma ra sa ma yan/ a r+ya a pa 'o//
105a2(mdo): gi te shwa ra ma me sad t+ya/ a d+hi Shi ta de bi/ a mo gr-I pa sha ba ra de hUM/ na mo stu te swa ha// / lan bdun bzlas pa tsam kyis lha mo dpal chen mo phyag brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chad kyi spyi bor 'jog par
105a3(mdo): 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ thugs las skyes pa/ gsung las skyes pa/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'khro bo'i dang bcas pa grub kyis don yod
105a4(mdo): pa'i zhags pa pad ma dri ma myed pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs la zhugs shing / pa'i gnas la rang kyi khyim bzhin du las su byab thams cad byos shig/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang kyis
105a5(mdo): yang rigs sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na mo a/ r+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra yA/ bo d+hi sad tra yA// ma ha sad tra yA/
105a6(mdo): ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ swo b+ha ga ba ti/ mA tre/ dza Ne tI/ ba ra ba ra/ sa ba lo gi ta pa ra da/ k+Shi ri Ni sra ba tu a ma gas ma ga ba~M bu la kau rti ka re/ pra ba ra b+hu dze/ a mo kA pA sha haste swa ha// / de'i 'og
105a7(mdo): tu lha mo chen mo nu ma gnyis las 'o ma'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i rgyun de khas zed de 'thungs na/ 'thungs pa tsam gyi mdado la/ lha'i me tog pad mA dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam pa'i lha'i lus su 'gyur/
105a8(mdo): sgra cung zad 'khyis cing 'khyil ba/ myag ud pa la sngon po lta bu dang / tshig kasal zhing myi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal tri ma myed
105a9(mdo): pa'i zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mngon gsum du 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo mang po grub par 'gyur/ tshe lo stong phrag bcu thub par 'gyur/ rgyal ba 'od dpag myed byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang thabs gcig tu
105b1(mdo): gzhal myed khang mchog na/ chos bgro ba mtho bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar yu/ nor bu chen po pad ma lta ba zhes bya ba/ don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po le 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags
105b2(mdo): mal kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe bo gcig pur 'gyur// 'phags pa sun ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mas su 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su gcig pur 'gyur// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lAm
105b3(mdo): yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / mye 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bu'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ rgyal ma ba 'i'i bu gcig par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / bcom 'grus thogs
105b4(mdo): myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ka rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye bar rigs sngags kyi rgyal po gsang pra pa'i gzungs kyi rgyal po cho ga zhib mo'i zab pa dag mngon gsum du
105b5(mdo): 'gyur/ lhathams cad kyi gnas dang / klu thams cad kyi gnas dang / myi 'am ci'i thams cad kyi gnas dang / phug dang zhud kyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo 'bye bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / zer po
105b6(mdo): thams cad sgo 'bye bar 'gyur/ thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi stond pa bla ma gcig pur 'jig rten mgon po dang 'dra ba ma mchod
105b7(mdo): pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa chen por 'gyur// dpal lha mo chen po 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin bsregs byas na/ rigs
105b8(mdo): sngags 'cha de la bu bzhin du byams pas rang nyid bsnyen bkur yongs su khyad pas yongs su myor ngo // 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang /
105b9(mdo): gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / rdul dang / lha'i nor bu chen po rin po che 'bar ba'i bar thams cad sbyin par byed do// yul ka shi ka'i gos bzang po a
106a1(mdo): mo sbyin par byed cing / lha'i bza' ba dang / btung ba'i bar dang / bdud rtsi'i mo'i bar du sbyin par byed do// gnas thams cad du song ba na yang / rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bu la/ byams pa'i
106a2(mdo): tshul gyis rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chad kyis rang gyi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho za lca lo can ji lta ba bzhin du/ rigs sngags 'chad kyi gzhal myed khang mchog tu 'gyur ro// ma
106a3(mdo): zos kyi bu'i gnas na/ 'byord pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dus kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin kyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 'chang yang rigs sngags/
106a4(mdo): 'chad kyi tshogs thams cad dang / gnod sbyin chen po gang ba'i 'khor rnams dang / rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyabapa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dpal lha mo chen po
106a5(mdo): 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rnam zos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye bas so// ngas su bskor ba nyin mtshan du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho nor bu chen/
106a6(mdo): po pad ma la lta ba'i dpal dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba/ don yod/ pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo blags pas grub par 'gyurazhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
106a7(mdo): rgyas gang ka'i klud kyi bye ma bye ba zhag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul 'phra mo snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
106a8(mdo): bu mo 'am/ dgra slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gapal la zhig gis/ lha'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang / nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang / lha'i gser dang / gser gyi me tog
106a9(mdo): dang / dngul kyi me tog mang po dang / lha'i kos dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lha'i dri dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams re re zhing 'phang du mi'i rgyal po ri rab tsam gyi phung po byas nas/ de dag de bzhin
106b1(mdo): gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa re re la tshul de
106b2(mdo): lta bus so sor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nyin re zhing lo gcig gi bar du 'bul bar byed/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i mar rgya mtsho
106b3(mdo): tsam gyis bkang ba'i mar me bltam par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// gal te don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad ma la rnam par lta
106b4(mdo): ba'i dpal dri ma myed pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di ga pa dang / bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brkyang byed pa 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan pa/
106b5(mdo): 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brlabs par 'a// gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar// 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku stond par 'gyur/ de
106b6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lu stond par 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen mo de yang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur zhing / dus kun tu de'i khyim du dpal gnas par 'gyur te/ gang na dpal lha mo/
106b7(mdo): chen mo gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gyi bye ma bye ba khrag zhig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa sa phyogs de nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/ dpal lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa
106b8(mdo): thams cad kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// lha dang / klu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang /
106b9(mdo): drag shus dpyod pa dang / las sna tshogs gzham dag pas/ dpal lha mo chen mo li mchog tu bstan ti// dpal lha mo chen mo ni thams cad kyi ma yin no// dpal lha mo chen mo mi don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o//
107a1(mdo): don yod pa'i grags pa rgya chen po sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i nam mkha'i gzhal myed khang 'chang ba'o// don yod pa'i mchog yon tan bsgrags pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// dpal lha mo chen mo
107a2(mdo): ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od byed pa gnas sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na/ dpal lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstand to// de nas rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mas zhus legs par byas pa/ dri chus kasungs shing / ba
107a3(mdo): las byung ba lngas byugs pa/ gos rtsang ma bgos pas/ kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya zhing / chang dang / sha dang / breg cong dang / sgog skya dang / kye'u rnams dang 'dres pa dang / 'bags pa nas yongs su
107a4(mdo): spang bar bya/ kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa dang / gos ngan pa dang / dri ma ngan pa can yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can ngan pa sten pa dang / ngan g.yo can dang / gsod skyen can dang / skye bo ngan pa dang /
107a5(mdo): zhel myed pa dang / snying rje myed pa dang / byams pa dang bral/ ba dang / thub chod can kyi skye bo ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya// gnas ngan pa dang / gnas rten drad pa dang / 'gong nyes dang
107a6(mdo): bzang nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa yongs su smad par bya/ gcig gis gcig 'phags pa'i khabs ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing / dri dang / bdug spos kyis bsangs te/ myi smra bar bzlas brjod
107a7(mdo): bya/ byas pa dang / snying rje dang / dka' ba'i sems dang / yid bde bar bya/ bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing / snying dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dka' ba'i sems su byas nA bzlas brjod bya'o// 'phags pa 'phyan
107a8(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen mo la rjod kyi bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / dus ci ltar/
107a9(mdo): ba'i me tog dbul bar bya ste/ gas sngags 'dis lan nyi shus gcig 'azlas te/ thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// na pa// ma mo da ma na ma sa/ rnams rgyas po so ki shan yA/ bo d+hi mam hA
107b1(mdo): ga sad tA yA/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka yA/ tad ya thA/ oM pu shwa be lo ki te/ gan d+ha sa re/ a mo kA dza la sam b+hu ri/ ta ra ta ra/ mu di te hU~M pata swa ha// / lan nyi shum gcikra bzlas te/ me tog dang / bdus pos/
107b2(mdo): dang / dri dang / mchod yon dbul lo// 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ rdon yod pa'i 'gas pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/ 'gro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas/ ma
107b3(mdo): bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / ci snyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/ spos dang ldan pa'i tis mar gyi mar me bstam par bya zhing / de nyid kyi zhabs drung du dkyil mo krung du 'dug la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs
107b4(mdo): dbang phyug la bltas ste/ snying po'i gzungs sngags lan brtsamabarkyang bzlas la/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ba byas na/ bcings pa
107b5(mdo): kyi mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sku thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu ping zhes byed par 'gyur// zo ras 'phags pa 'phyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par
107b6(mdo): 'gyur te/ yid la bsams pa thams cad bka' stso lad para'agyur/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i mchog/ thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dbugs kyang 'byind par 'gyur/
107b7(mdo): yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di la nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad zad cing mthun par
107b8(mdo): 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / dgra bo thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing / myi tshugs par 'gyur/ kwa yul ngom 'jug pa'i tshe/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po/
107b9(mdo): 'di nyungs kar le sa ma nyi shu sa gcig bzlas nas/ dmag gi nang du gtor byas nas/ thams cad rengs par byas pa dang / rdugs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'di'i snying po dang gsang sngags ni 'di yin no//
108a1(mdo): na mo rang na tA yA yA/ na mo a r+yas pa lo ki te shwa ra yA/ b+ho d+hi sad tra yA/ ma ha sa da tA yA/ ma ha ka ru ni ka yA/ tad yawA/ au a mo g+ha pa sha hrid da yA/ pad mi ni ba ra de/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra sA ri ta pad
108a2(mdo): ma b+hu dze swa hA/ snying po'i rigs sngags so// AM A ba lo ki te/ pad mi ni ba rang ki ni/ tu ru tu ru/ hUM swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i gzungs so// don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad ma rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma
108a3(mdo): myed pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na/ mtshams myed pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par mchog sbyin par 'gyur/ 'phags pa
108a4(mdo): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dus kun tu sku ston pazhed par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po myi bzad pa brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rims
108a5(mdo): thams cad dang / nad thams cad kyis myi zhugs par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la tshon snga lnga'i srad bul lam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla/ sa te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig boras ku kul gyis bdug ste/
108a6(mdo): mgul du btags na/ gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te nag po chen po dang / ma mo 'ongs te rgyas btab pa gang yin pa yang gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro//
108a7(mdo): skud pa nag pos rims nyid gcig pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan dag la ni thams cad du srad bu dkar pos gsal bar bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag zhug thams cad la 'gyi zhapal lan nyi shu
108a8(mdo): rtse gcig bzlas te yig le byas la/ thams cad du thogs pa myed par 'gyur ro// snying kar mig le byas na/ gnod sbyid dang / srin po dang / 'thung po dang / shu ga las phrogs pa thams cad kyis kyi mthong bar 'gyur ro//
108a9(mdo): lag a bil du mig le byas na/ skyes pa dang / bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gapal reg pa dbang du 'gyur ro// sbyin mtshams su thig le byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'a'om dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mgul
108b1(mdo): par byugs na/ rje'u rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/ rgyal rigs thams cad dang du 'gyur ro// bral ba'i sgra mtshams su thig le byas na/ bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur/
108b2(mdo): ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na/ dmar rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje dar la byugs na/ dpag tshad brgyar ngal ba myed par 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rkang mthil la
108b3(mdo): byugs na chu klung chen po'i pha rol tu phyind par 'gyur zhing / rgya mtsho'i bar du rgal bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/ gyad kyis myi thub par 'gyur ro// pus mo gnyis la byugs na/ me'i phung
108b4(mdo): po chen po 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar zhugs na/ tsan dad dang pu shel ci bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro// ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te/ myig la bskus na mtshan mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang ba
108b5(mdo): 'gyur ro// gter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / gal// te bskal pa stong du bzhag pa zhig na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lto bskus na ci srad du lto chus ma bkrus pa de srid du
108b6(mdo): kha zas dang btung ba myi 'dod par 'gyur ro// pho mtshan la ba skus na khu ba 'gags pa byas par 'gyur ro// ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te 'thungs na/ lus dag cing dri ma myed la rtsang
108b7(mdo): zhing pyod pa gtsang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bko nyes dang / bzal nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa dang / blta nyes su myi 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa
108b8(mdo): thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rmyi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / bkra kyi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro//
108b9(mdo): gsang sngags sbyor ba dang / gtor ba rnams 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / zag 'khrug rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang /
109a1(mdo): mdza' ba dang / pha rol kyi dpud kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lan cig sbyar te/ zo rangs kyi dus su myi smra bar byas nas zos na/
109a2(mdo): blags pas tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sbyor bzhag bdun du byas na/ bstan chos thams cad mngon tu 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas na gsang sngags kyi
109a3(mdo): cho ga zhib mo dang dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba thams cad grub par 'gyur/ zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas na/ zos pa mang po rgya mtsho bstsags par 'gyur ro// sbyor
109a4(mdo): g.yo gcig gi bar du byas na tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad na bla ma gcig pur 'gyur zhing / dka' ba dang / tshag brtsan par yang 'gyur ro// til mar
109a5(mdo): dang lhan cig bskol te mgo la bskus na skra cung zad 'khyil cing wu pa lo can du 'gyur ro// bzhin gyi daN+Di la 'khor la bskus na ston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs par
109a6(mdo): 'gyur zhing / me tog pad ma dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ lus thams cad byags na mar dpa 'dra bar 'jam po re 'gyur zhing / rka lag shin tu gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ rna ba la
109a7(mdo): byugs na rna ba ci tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ sna nas btang na klad pa'i nad do// 'acog 'jig par 'gyur zhing / snabs dang mchil ma 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ lha'i spos kyi dri mnam par 'gyur zhing /
109a8(mdo): nams kyang sid du myi 'ong ba'i dri mnam par myi 'gyur/ gnyer ma dang ska dkar spangs par 'gyur/ so rgal ba yang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/ lce pad ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ myed pa'i nad dang /
109a9(mdo): skye 'gags pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'jam tsam du byas te rna ba bkang na sim par byed cing / lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra zos par
109b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// de lta bas na 'akyilu wad kyi cho ga chen po bsgrub par bya'o// / de nas legs par grub pa/ mchog tu dge ba dge bar 'gro ba/ smyig rkang zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa/
109b2(mdo): zhags pa'i snying po lam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ 'the bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas/ don yod pa'i rgya mamo'i nor bu pad ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma myed pa don yod pa'i 'gas pa'i
109b3(mdo): snying po 'di/ lan stong sa brgyad 'azlas te/ cang ma gos kyangs bgos zhing zhus legs par byas pas/ kha zas dkar po zos la/ smyen rkang kyi ri lu lar bcug na/ ji snyed ban
109b4(mdo): ba dang / blags pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ sre pad ma dang / ku mu da'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ rtsi ma ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ de nas lha'i sgra yang
109b5(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur/ gapal smras pa de dag bran po dang / zan mo bzhin gnas par 'gyur ro// kapa la dri man ma ba de yang dbang du 'gyur/ zan dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
109b6(mdo): gyu rad pa yang dbang du byed do// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo dang / yai gas dang / sha za las bstsogs pa thams cad dang
109b7(mdo): brdad byed dang sdang ba dang / rab tu sdung ba dang / phyi ma yin pa thams cad ji des 'byer bar 'gyur zhipa/ phyogs bzhir dpas tshad brgyar dbyer nas/ zag ring po na 'khod par 'gyur ro/
109b8(mdo): phyir rgol ba dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang / ldan pa thams cad dri ngas 'byer bar 'gyur zhing / byams pa'i sems kyi dbang du 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na lag pas
109b9(mdo): glang po che non par 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro// gyad kyis kyi grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra ba'i mthu stobs stond par 'gyur ro//
110a1(mdo): mgul du btags te/ g.yul ngor song na gcig pus dpung kyi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur zhingapa/ slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// spyi bor bzhag ste rgyal po'i pho brang du
110a2(mdo): song na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / blon po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / skye bo la bkug par 'gyur/ thams cad du thogs
110a3(mdo): pa myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ lag pa la btags na gapa la reg pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu taMka dang / gser la reg pa tsam kyis zar
110a4(mdo): myi shes par 'gyur/ sa bon gdab pa dang / brda' ba byas na/ zad mye shes par 'phel bar 'gyur/ rin po che'i lag par 'gyur// 'bru'i phung po 'phel bar 'gyur/ 1
110a5(mdo): ma re re zos na dran pa dang / blon po chen po 'phel bar 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad bral bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang // bral bar 'gyur/ rims nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur/
110a6(mdo): 'bras dang / mdze dang / ldog pa dang / lu'u ta dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / phol myig la byuHsa pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur zhing / nams kyang tshungs
110a7(mdo): par gyi 'gyur ro// sbyor ba zla cig tsam du byas na/ cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags rim par bye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mchog grub par 'gyur ro// dus kun tu lus la thogs
110a8(mdo): mtshor gzas pas lus la myi tshugs so// chom rkun dang / g.yon can thams cad kyis klags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa myed par 'gyur/ til ar dang lhan cig bskol te/ klad pa
110a9(mdo): na ba dang / so na ba dang / myig na ba dang / glad pa phyed na ba la 'jam tsam blugs pa tsam gyis/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyin cad nad gang yang 'byung bar gyi 'gyur ro// gdod stong
110b1(mdo): phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad la zhun mar dang / nyungs kar bsres te bdugs na/ dus phyogs bcur 'byer zhing / nams kyang gnas kyis phyogs der 'ong bar myi 'gyuraro// rang gi yid la 'dod pa'i dgos pa
110b2(mdo): gzhan thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// de nas lha thams cad 'gug pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad s+yan 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la skul pa/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi grub pa'i
110b3(mdo): mtha' gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / brjed byed dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / skyem byed thams cad 'byer bar byed pa/ sngang
110b4(mdo): ba'i bdud rnams gsod pa/ nad thams cad zlog pa/ gdu ka po'i dug rnams bzlog pa/ mche ba'i dug dang / gnas pa'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug thams cad la thogs pa myed par grub
110b5(mdo): rims thams cad 'joms pa khyad par du rims nyin bzhi pa 'joms pa/ bzhin dag par byed pa'i gtse'o// gos bdug pa'i mchog/ gsang sngags dang / byang thams cad
110b6(mdo): dbang du byed pa'i mchog/ ka pa la rgyal po 'khros nas gshed mas mtshon gzas pa yang bdug pa 'dis bdugs na de thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// dug dang duka sbyar ma dang /
110b7(mdo): srog chags lu'u ta dang / sbrul gyis zin pa dang / srog chags ko na sa dang / gzhan yang srog chags sna tshogs dug dang bcas pa mchog tu mya bza' ba rnams dang / gal te klu 'jog pos zin na yang
110b8(mdo): bdugs pa tsam gyis dug thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// nad kun phrog pa grub pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa// bsod nams phung po che dang mnyam// grub pa lha rnams kun gyi mchog/
110b9(mdo): brgya byin sum bcu'i lha dang ni// lha byin lhan cig g.yul 'gyed che// bdugs pa 'di'i sa bdugs pa dang // lha myin de bzhin pham par 'gyur// drag po yis ni sum rtseg bsreg/ khyab 'jug gis ni/
111a1(mdo): ba liM bcings// myi 'u zung gis ni sa gzhi mnan/ lha myin dbang pos gnyi zla dang // gza' rnams 'pham byas 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// 'dren pas/
111a2(mdo): byams pa'i stobs kyis btul nga // bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyis// sdang ba'i bdud ni yang dag zad// rgya mtsho rnam par bkrug byas pas// rgya mtsho'i
111a3(mdo): gnas kun gtsar bur 'gyur// snod gcig gis ni sum cha bskams// yid bzhin nor bu chud zos pas// don kun grub pa bdag nyid ches// bdug spos 'di yis 'pham byas nas// slar ya
111a4(mdo): rang gi khyim 'ongs te// rtag tu rgyal mtshan rtse btags nas// bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas shing // nyin mtshan bdud kyi/ bar du ni// rin chen bdun kyi char pa phab// de ltar
111a5(mdo): bdug pa stobs ldan yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams// cad la dmyigs te// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung // ba/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad//
111a6(mdo): 'khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad// don yod grub pa brgya rtsa brgyad// tshig dpa yi gshin tu gsal bar bzlas// don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma
111a7(mdo): myed pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas te/ de nas gsang sngags 'di stong phrag brgya bzlas so// oM sa rba ta ya ka ta/ a ba so gi ta/ a mo ka hri da yan/ tsam tsa tsa tsar/
111a8(mdo): ma ha ka ru ni ka/ sa d+ha yA hUM/ oM bya shin tsa yA/ a mo g+ha pa sha ha ste swA hA// de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya ste/ mnyam par bzhag la las thams cad la mkhas pas bdug spos kyi mchog la
111a9(mdo): bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ bdug spos kyi rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snang ba rgya che ba/ nor bu chen po'i sprin dri ma myed pa zhes
111b1(mdo): bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs pa/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal po yin te/ thog mar de bzhin
111b2(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad la bsngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// IM sarba ta tha ga ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ ma he a mA g+ha dza ya dza ya swA hA/ de'i 'og tu bdag rang la bdugs
111b3(mdo): nade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la
111b4(mdo): 'phags pa byan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku stond par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i gzugs kyis de dang lhan cig smra bar byed de/ kapa la smra ba dang / gapal gtam byas pa de thams cad
111b5(mdo): tshe 'odi la thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu mtshan mo rang gi gzugs stond par 'gyur zhing mchog sbyin par/ mdzad do// don yod pa'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur/
111b6(mdo): 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur ro// gang dag gi lus
111b7(mdo): la bdugs pa tsam gyis thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / blon po dang bram ze mdun na
111b8(mdo): 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis shes bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// rigs bzhi 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dang / tshes brgyad la zhus
111b9(mdo): legs par byas te/ gos rtsang ma bgos la/ ba las byung ba lngas byugs pas khyim gyi phugs su dkyil 'khor byas la/ me tog dang / mchod yon gyi snod gzhag par bya/ gtor ma dkar po nye bar
112a1(mdo): gzhag par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmyigs te/ phyogs bzhir phyag byas la/ bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug pa
112a2(mdo): byas na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas mu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyis 'phra mo rnyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gang ba la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re
112a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la/ bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bdug spos chen po tsan dan sbrul kyi
112a4(mdo): snying po dang / 'go shar sha dang / ta a la'i lo ma dang / bdug spos mang pos nam mkha'i ngos khyebs par mchod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal 'khor rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum
112a5(mdo): na gnas pa'i lha brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug/ dang / dbang phyug chen po las sasogs pa 'og myin kyi gnas/ na gnas pa'i lha'i bar thams cad bdug pa'i dris rab tu dga'
112a6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar dang / skar mo'i tshogs dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad dka' bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom myi bya zhing yid gnyis bskyed par myi bya'o// skad chen pos don
112a7(mdo): yod pa'i snying po bzlas pa byas na/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa legs so bya ba'i sgra 'byind par 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang de la yang de bzhin gshegs
112a8(mdo): pa byin kyis rlob par 'gyur/ dus kun tu dgongs par 'gyur/ yang dang yang du gzigs pa'i phyir byon par 'gyur ro// bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed dang / byang chub sems
112a9(mdo): dpa' 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thugs rab tu dges par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i chen po'i dngos
112b1(mdo): grub gsol bar mdzad/ gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad la bdug pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur zhing / ha cang char chen gcod par byed cing / char myi 'bab na char 'byebs par byed do// rlung
112b2(mdo): dang / ser ba dang / sprin thams cad gcod par byed// / bdugs pa tsam kyis gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// bgyegs dang / log 'dran thams cad phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyu
112b3(mdo): ma mo'i gnas su bdugs na/ rlung dang ser ba dang / sprin thams cad gcod par byed/ ma mo'i tshogs dang / nag po chen po las stsogs pa 'gug par 'gyur zhing / dbang du gyur da nas 'dug par
112b4(mdo): 'gyur/ bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'a byed pa'i cha bdugs pa na/ dpung gyi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur/ thams cad du bdugs pa tsam kyis rgyal bar/
112b5(mdo): 'gyur/ thams cad du sbyar ba byas na kun tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i cho ga'o// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po
112b6(mdo): bam po bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rigs sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir thig le bya ba dang / gdong bkru ba dang / lus bsku
112b7(mdo): ba byas na/ ya lad dang go cha bgos pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba/ bshad par bgyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsol // don yod pa'i nor bu rgya chen po rdo rje'i zhags pa zhes bya ba'i bu/ gang
112b8(mdo): sbyor ba byas pa tsam gyis thams cad grub pa bla na myed pa/ mkhas pas mdzod spu rnams su thig le byas na/ tshogs kyi nang dang / skye bo mang po'i nang dang / dge 'dun kyi nang dang / de bzhin rig byed kyi
112b9(mdo): tshogs bzhi'i nang du skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang na/ zla ba tshes bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa myed do// lha rnams thams cad ya mtshan skye// drag po'i ni cod pan 'chang // 'jig rten mgon po'i g.yas kyi dbu'o//
113a1(mdo): dbu rgya rtse bran zla tshes bzhin// gdong bkru ba ni mchog yin te// zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// sbyin ma rna ba bral ba dag pa// pad ma kar sham shi nad tu 'jam// myig gnyis
113a2(mdo): ud palnga sngon po 'dra// sems can thams cad dka' bas lta// dga' zhing rtag tu tshig brtsan 'gyur// de'i myig gis kang mthong ba// thams cad dbang du gyur da par 'gyur// skyes pa dag la bsku byas na//
113a3(mdo): rtag tu tshig smra blo che zhing // rtag tu ya la dgo bgos pa'i// 'jigs pa myed pa'i las su 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni myi bzod cing // gnod sbyin 'byung po gsang ba pas// rtag tu thub par myi 'gyur ro//
113a4(mdo): stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang // rtag tu sred myed stobs ldan zhing // glang chen stod kyi stobs ldan 'gyur// lha rnams/ 'dar ni yid med cing // klu rnams mtshon skrag par byed//
113a5(mdo): gas te rigs sngags smra ba yis// reg na ri rab lhun po la/ nga// g.yo bar 'gyur bar the tsom myed// rtag tu sred myed/ stobs ldan zhing // stobs dang gzugs dang rtsal ldan 'gyur//
113a6(mdo): nor bu'i rgyal po bla na myed// 'di ni thogs pa tsam kyis su// sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing // dug rnams thams cad 'jom sa par byed// dpal dang skal bzangs rtag thob 'gyur/
113a7(mdo): gang gi lag tu thob 'gyur ba// sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing // de bzhin 'jig rten dga' bar 'gyur// da ni de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// zugs skyes gsung skyes sras su 'gyur// 'phags pa
113a8(mdo): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bla ma rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing // rigs sngags smra ba dbugs dbyung phyir// de bzhin du ni bsrung ba dang // rtag tu mchog ni sbyin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po thub chen
113a9(mdo): kyi// bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob// gang zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klub kyi bye ma bye ba khrag theg brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa ba'i snying las// de bzhin gshegs pa de
113b1(mdo): dag thams cad mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa dang / phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// dpal dang skal ba bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par 'gyur/
113b2(mdo): sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa gcig pur 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyis song bar myi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur// phyag ma pa
113b3(mdo): ma yang rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstand pa ste/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nor bu chen po bzung bas/ sdang ba bdud la/
113b4(mdo): stsogs pa thams cad dang / brtsegs dang / log 'dren thas cad las rgyal te/ pha rol 'pham par mdzad nas/ chos kyi'akhor lo bskor to// 'dis rnga bo che la bskus te brdungs na
113b5(mdo): chos kyi ngo bo che brdungs par 'gyur ro// gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi mtshams myed pa lnga'i sdig pa rab/ tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa/
113b6(mdo): ri dgas dang bya gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / mnar myed pa la gzhol zhing / gnas pa
113b7(mdo): dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur// dmyal pa chen po bcu drug las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur// de la dug gis 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/
113b8(mdo): me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur// mchod kyis 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ 'dis
113b9(mdo): dung la bskus te bus na/ chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur/ gan dud kyi sgra bos pa'i bar der de dag thams cad kyang slam ldog par gyi 'gyur// skyes pa dang / bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag kyang / skye
114a1(mdo): ba dang / dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni skye ba phyi ma yin te/ shi nas thams cad rigs
114a2(mdo): mthun par bde ba can kyi 'jig rten kyi khams su pad ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe' byad brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ pad ma las dkyil mo krung bcas te skye
114a3(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du/ 'od dpag myed las mngon gsum du chos kyi 'brel gtam thos par 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi po la cod pan dkar pos bcings te/ nor bu chen po'i 'di
114a4(mdo): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sgreng ba tsam kyi mod la chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar 'gyur ro// 'di rgyal mtshan kyi rtse mo la btags pa mthong ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying
114a5(mdo): por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba mthong bar rig par bya'o// 'di bsgreng ba tsam/ kyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag zhug thams cad zhi bar
114a6(mdo): 'gyur/ gnod pa thams cad dang / myangs dang / mu ke'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba rnams 'jigs
114a7(mdo): par 'gyur// rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung dang / sdang ba'i sems can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dug mye bzad pa dang / gcan zan gtum po dang / bya dang sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / bya ba dang / sdig
114a8(mdo): sbrul dang / 'bras dang / lu'u ta dang / dug dang / shu ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan ma rdol ba dang / skye ba 'gags pa 'jigs par 'gyur/ sdang ba'i klu dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung gis
114a9(mdo): myi tshugs shing / bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang / myi mang pos yongs su gangang zhing 'byor da par 'gyur/ chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur
114b1(mdo): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / zas dang / skom mo zhim pa dang / shi nang tu 'jam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang /
114b2(mdo): 'bru myen ma dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / srul po dang / lus sbrul po dang / skyes byed dang / grib ma dang / bza' nyes dang / spyad nyes dang / blta nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing /
114b3(mdo): myi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro// yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni nor bu'i rgyal po'i
114b4(mdo): byin kyis brlabs yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhin 'dzum zhing / myig myi 'dzums par
114b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu gdags pa/ de bzhin// gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing / lung
114b6(mdo): bstand pa bdag gi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa rjes su bsgrags par bgyi'o// gser dang / na la da dang /
114b7(mdo): 'gyelu 'ang dang / bzla dang / ldong gros dang / pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / kur kum dang / nag pus pa dang / dA tsa dang / ta ka ra dang / tsan dan nam gnyis dang / spr-ig ka dang / ka la ka dang / nA ta dang /
114b8(mdo): shu ti dang / pri yang gu dang / ha re nu ka dang / suka smel dang / lo d+ha dang / dza ta pa ti ka su ma na dang / sa ma ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / shing a ra ka'i 'o ma rnams bsogs te/ cha mnyam pa byas gser nyis
114b9(mdo): 'byurang du byas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang / ches grangs shing dge ba la zhus legs par byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ nyin zhag gcig byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag ste/ bye ma'i ba mor
115a1(mdo): byas te/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtor la dri chab bzang pos spangs te sbyar la/ gser dang bsre/
115a2(mdo): la/ ga pur dang gla rtsi'i bdug pas bdugs te/ nor bu zho gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas/ phug la ras skud kyis btags te/ gser gyis g.yogs la yang don yod pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/
115a3(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar myi smra bar bsgrub pa byas la/ de nyid kyi zhabs drung du grib ma la bskams par bya ste/ phyed dam bzhi cha gser gyis g.yog par bya zhing / phyed g.yog par
115a4(mdo): myi bya'o// gapal gser gyis g.yogs pa 'di ni/ ga pa la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las
115a5(mdo): 'das pa'i las chen grub par byed do// gser gyis ma g.yo/ gas pas ni 'jig rten kyi dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par byed do// nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / lu ta dang /
115a6(mdo): 'bras dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / shu ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / phol myig dang / sha bkra dang / myig nad dang / grang nad dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / kha nad dang /
115a7(mdo): sna nad dang / na nad dang / so nad dang / dkan na ba dang / spen pa dang / matsun pa dang / snying na ba dang / ci ba logs na ba dang / ljon pa dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / gcin bsre ba dang / zug
115a8(mdo): ber dang / 'azhu ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nyin bzhi pa dang / nub las gyur pa dang / mchis pa las
115a9(mdo): gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lus kyi nad kyi nad thams cad la chu dron dang sbyin no// phyi rol kyi nad thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad la
115b1(mdo): byugs bcas kyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa khams cad la sbyard pa tsas kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ the tsom kyi bya'o// gser gyis g.yogs pa dpung pa la btags te/
115b2(mdo): thams cad du thogs pa myed par 'gyur te/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnod pa phyag na rdo rje dang / pad ma 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na myed pa/ rnam
115b3(mdo): pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar bya ste/ thig le dang gdong bkru ba dang / lus bsku ba'o// yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub pa ste/ the tsom gyi bya'o// rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor
115b4(mdo): dang bcas pa dang / skye bo dang / blon por bcas pa bran pa na na du dbang du 'gyur ro// nor bu gyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rigs bzlas na/ bkyigs myed par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
115b5(mdo): lag pa g.yas pa la btags te rigs sngags bzlas na/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga stong phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te/ lan cig bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rab tu 'phel bar
115b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// mgul par btags te bcangs na zhus ma byas pa zhus byas par 'gyur/ myi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur/ tshangs par myi spyod pa tshangs par pyod par 'gyur// thub par ma
115b7(mdo): byas pa grub par byas par 'gyur/ spung ba ma byas pa sprung pa byas par 'gyur// tshig myi bcan pa tshig brtsan par 'gyur// ma grub pa grub par 'gyur/ dam tshig myi shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur/
115b8(mdo): byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ sbyin pa gang chung ngu yang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du/ sbyin pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// nor bu 'di lag pa g.yas/
115b9(mdo): pa la btags na/ gang la reg pa da zad mye shes par 'gyur ro/ su la brjod par myi bya ste/ de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rkyed pa la btags te chu'i nang du zhugs na/ chu klung chen po/
116a1(mdo): 'i gting slebs par 'gyur ro// de nas nor bu bsgrub par 'dod pas/ dngul shaM nad tu yongs su dag pa las pad ma 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa kha bye ba/ dbus kyi snying po dang ze ba za ma/
116a2(mdo): tog 'dra ba/ sor bcu drug tshad du byas la/ de'i dbus su gser gyi nor bu gzhag par bya'o// ga lang gyi lci ba/ bad kyi gcin dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar
116a3(mdo): bya ste/ kho ra 'khor yug tu pad ma bris la/ pad ma dbus kyi ze bar dngul las byas pa'i pad ma bzhag ste/ bum pa kang ba bzhi dang gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi bzhag par bya zhing / me tog dgram par bya mtshon
116a4(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ska'i bdug pas bdug cing / gtor ma dkar po gzhag par bya/ phan gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ mar
116a5(mdo): kyi mar me sum bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya/ 'bras bu dang / me tog 'phreng sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon tu 'phyogs par bzhag ste/
116a6(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mas gos rtsang ma bgos la/ nyan mtshan gcig smang ba byas la/ tshes bco ldanas nyi shu dgu dang gnam stod kyi bar du/ dus mtshams gsum du mchod pa bya zhing
116a7(mdo): pad ma pa ma tog can de dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor kyi shar phyogs su mngon tu 'phyogs te 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po
116a8(mdo): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyungs kar dang chus dbang bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan stong rtsa brgyad bya/ de bzhin du 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o// myi smra bar dgos pa thams cad byas na/
116a9(mdo): de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga zla ba nya'i nang par gyi dus mtshams su nor bu'i rgyal po pad ma dang bcas te// gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/
116b1(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis pad ma 'bar
116b2(mdo): ba de lag pa g.yas pas blang bar bya ste/ blangs pa tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ 'khor lo'i rgyal po'i gser gyi mdog
116b3(mdo): can/ blta na sdug pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur/ sdang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba thams cad zlog par byed/ 'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rigs sngags 'chad kyi
116b4(mdo): rgyal por 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan kyi rtse mo dang / ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob par 'gyur/ don yod pa dri ma myed
116b5(mdo): 'bar ba'i rtse mo la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'i zhag sa pa 'thob par 'gyur// phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshe gas pa'i zhing gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin
116b6(mdo): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byind par 'gyur/ nor bu chen po yongs su dag pa rdo rje la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyi lus rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
116b7(mdo): dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ mgo bo'i spyi bor btags na/ nor bu
116b8(mdo): chen po'i rdzu 'phrul kyis nub phyogs su song nas/ bde ba can kyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal myed khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ legs par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang
116b9(mdo): pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// khar bcug na nyi ma re re tshigs su bcad pa stong lobs par 'gyur ro// myed pa tsam kyis zos pa rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro// lce'i rtse mong bzhag na/ lce pad ma dang / ku mu da
117a1(mdo): ltar 'jam par 'gyur zhing / thos pa mang po 'dzind par 'gyur ro// lag pa la byags na gang la reg pa de bgyi ba ci mchis shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las chos snang ba'i sgo'i chos bshad
117a2(mdo): pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang / rgyan dang / gzhal myed khang stond par 'gyur/ mgul du btags na/ phug gi gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/
117a3(mdo): thams cad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// phug stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i sgo bye bar 'gyur// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na/ myi snang bar 'gyur zhing / lus myi snang ba
117a4(mdo): gang ga'i klung bye ba stong phrag brgya rnyed kyi/ lus mya snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon dang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po las stsogs pa thams
117a5(mdo): cad myi snang bar byas par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal myed khang sgo bye zhing 'dug par 'gyur ro// rkyed pa la btags na/ gnyer thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ pus mo g.yas pa dang / brla g.yas
117a6(mdo): pa la btags na/ nags kyi phug gi gzhal myed khang gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye zhing / sman kyi dngos po thams cad rab kyi gzugs kyis mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro//
117a7(mdo): rkang pa'i rje dmal btags na/ rlung kyi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / cung zad tsam song bas/ dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'gro zhipa/ slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur/ nyin mtshan
117a8(mdo): kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams su rlung chen po'i shugs kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyis song ste/ slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / gang gyis kyang gnod par myi 'gyur// thams cad
117a9(mdo): du dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// lag mthil la btags na/ sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur zhing / sa'i 'og gi phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur te/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa
117b1(mdo): der 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad bkye ba ci mchis shes thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// nor bu bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// /
117b2(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag don yod grub kyi bum pa rab mchog zhes
117b3(mdo): bkye ba'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga chen po mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstand pa ji lta ba dar de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po'i mthu bsgrub pa'i cho ga
117b4(mdo): 'di rnam par 'phrul ba bsam kyis myi khyab pa bsgrub pa 'grub/ par 'gyur lags so// rigs sngags 'chang rnams la phan/ ba dang / bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag pa bsgrub par 'gyur
117b5(mdo): lags so/ de nas gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs sa ma/ kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing kun nas shin tu zlum pa mgo 'am/ mgrin par phyin pa'i tshad shin tu 'jam zhing /
117b6(mdo): zag zug dang / shang shong myed pa/ dbyibs legs shing byi dor legs par byas pa/ kun nas yongs su gang ba la mtshal gyi mtshon kyis pad ma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa bri bar bya ste/
117b7(mdo): mgrin par pad ma'i snying po dang ze ba bri/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ shar phyogs su zhal khri/ lhor myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag/ nub tu dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag/
117b8(mdo): byang du yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bya'o// pad ma'i 'dab ma la dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / bram ze dang / drang srong kyi tshogs dang /
117b9(mdo): gshin rje dang / chu lga dang / rlung lha dang / khyab bdag dang / brgya byin dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / lha'i tshogs gzhan dag bri bar bya zhing / me dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / lha mo sgrol ma dang
118a1(mdo): khro gnyer can dang / pho nya mo dkar mo dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / gzho nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug bri bar bya'o// pad ma'i 'dab ma'i 'khor dag tu
118a2(mdo): pad ma'i 'phreng ba bri'o// de nas bum pa tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya zhing / gser gyi rgyan kyis brgyan par bya/ rim pa'i cha bkra zhing mdzes par bya'o// de nas shing las pad ma'i ba dan zlum po bum pa shong
118a3(mdo): ba tsam kyi tshad du byas la/ de'i steng du bum pa bzhag la bum pa de nyungs kar dkar pos bkang ste/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan par bya/ ras kar pos bcing bar bya/ steng du nyungs kar dang / glo rtsa
118a4(mdo): dang / 'gyi 'u wang dang / ldong gros gzhag par bya/ bum pa'i kha ras dmar pos g.yog par bya/ rin po che sna bdun gzhag/ par bya/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mas gos rtsang ma
118a5(mdo): bgos la/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa 'phang du 'khru gang bar bya/ ste/ ba lang gyi lci ba dang sar bsres pas legs par byugs ste cha mnyam par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor de'i steng du tri
118a6(mdo): thams cad kyis byugs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus su tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor 'khru gang gru bzhi pa byas la/ gur kum dang / me tog pad ma mchod pa bya ste/ pad ma
118a7(mdo): 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bris la/ pad ma'i ze ba'i steng du bum pa bzhag ste/ 'phan gdugs sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po khor yug tu spos dang / me tog sna tshogs
118a8(mdo): dang / byug spos sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi snod sna tshogs dang / bum pa gang ba mdzes pa dang / bdug spos kyi phye ma rnam pa mang po gzhag par bya/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog 'phreng ba ci 'byorapa/
118a9(mdo): pa kun tu gzhag par bya/ mar gyi mar me bzang po bcu drug bltam par bya/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas pad ma'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya/ sgo bzhi shin tu cha 'byes par bri/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mtshan ma
118b1(mdo): gsal bar bya/ mda' dang / ba dan 'khor yug tu gzhag par bya/ tshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dkar gsum ci 'byor pa gzhag par bya/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / bza' ba
118b2(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ me tog 'phreng bzang po kun tu gzhag par bya/ bdug spos kyi snod dang / bum pa gang ba kun tu gzhag par bya/ pog phor bzhi gzhag par bya/
118b3(mdo): dri chab kyi phor bu bzhi gzhag par bya/ snod bzhi dang kham phor brgyad gzhag par bya/ ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dkar po rnam pa mang po gzhag par bya/ mar gyi mar me gang ba drug bcu rtsa gcig dbul bar
118b4(mdo): bya/ 'bras yos dang nyungs kar dgram par bya'o// chang dang sha dang breg tsod kye'u dang 'bags pa dang kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa spang bar bya/ mgo nyes spang bar byas te/
118b5(mdo): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bkos la/ zla ba nya la bsgrub par/ bya'o// bsrung ba'i cho gas bdag bsrung ba dang / thor tsugs/ bcing ba dang / yul bcing ba dang / de bzhin du grogs
118b6(mdo): bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung bar yang bya'o// gu kul gyi bdug pa dang / mar dang nyungs kar gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o// tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ska dang
118b7(mdo): kun tu ru'i bdug pa 'di ni yang dag par bstand to// bum pa bsgrub pa ni mchog ste/ zhag lnga spyang ba byas nas/ gsang sngags bsgrub par bya ste/ dus mtshams gsum du bum pa dang
118b8(mdo): sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya'o// myi smra bar dkyil 'khor la mngon tu 'phyogs te/ dkyis mo krung ngu 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa bum pa'i steng du bzhag la/ 'gro ba'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la
118b9(mdo): chu dang nyungs kar kyis dbang bskar la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas so// yid la byed pa rtse gcig pas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje rje ltar bya zhing /
119a1(mdo): sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgoms la bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga'i nya'i thun tha ma'i nang par dbyig gi bum pa cher g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po ya
119a2(mdo): grag par 'gyur te/ bum pa chen po de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/ dri ma myed cing yongs su dag la/ dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur
119a3(mdo): mdog yongs su dag cing me tog pad ma dang / ku mu da ltar dkar zhing 'jam par 'gyur/ bum pa de'i sku gzugs rnams rang rang ki lus las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis
119a4(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po bya/ rigs sngags 'chang bum pa 'di bsgrub pa 'di ni grub po/ de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis chu dang nyungs ka ra la 'khro/
119a5(mdo): bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dbang bskur/ ba byas nas/ dbang bskur ma zag tu bum pa de las sgra 'byu nga bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang chen po legs so//
119a6(mdo): legs so// khyod kyis bum pa bzang po grub ste/ bum pa bzang po ji lta ba bzhin/ don yod pa'i snying po'i bum pa bzang po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po yang de bzhin nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa
119a7(mdo): longs spyod cig/ yid la ci ltar bsas shing bcos pa zas cad grub par gyur cig/ de nas mchod pa chen pos gzhal myed khang chen po de mchod de/ buM pa bzang po de bzung bar bya zhing / mchod pa byas na ji ltar yid la @
119a8(mdo): pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad grub par 'gyur te/ legs par bshad pa'am/ gtsug lag gam/ snyan chags dang / gar kyi bstan chos dang / rtsis chos dang / bya ka ra na dang / cho ga zhib mo smras pa dang / gsang sngag
119a9(mdo): sngags smra ba dang / nags bsgrub pa dang / phug bsgrub pa dang / bcud kyis len dang / myig sman dang / gtar smra ba dang / rig byed kyi gsang sngags dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde las tshogs pa chos
119b1(mdo): dang 'dul ba smra ba de dag thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / sdud pa dang / gser dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / mu tika dang / in 'dra ni la dang / ma rgad dang /
119b2(mdo): ke ke ru dang shel dang mu sa ra dang / bye dur+ya dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / kos dang / mal cha dang / gnas dang / khang pa dang / longs spyod dang / rtsed mo rgya chen po dang
119b3(mdo): rgyal po la 'os pa'i gzhal myed khang sems kyis bsams pa tsam kyi mod la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myig 'phrul gyi gzhal myed khang dang / sangs rgyas kyi skul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa dang / rdo rje 'cha
119b4(mdo): kyi srul pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myo'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzhal myed 'ang dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po'i bdag po'i gzhal myed
119b5(mdo): de thams cad bsams pa tsam kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// char/ ha cang che ba dang / char myi 'bab pa dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / srin dang / ser ba dang / chu zlog par byed pa de thams cad ston par
119b6(mdo): byed/ de las sogs pa thams cad bsams pa tsam kyis 'grub pA 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog dang / gzhal myed khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ ji ltar bsams pa de thams cad 'byor
119b7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// gla rtsi de blangs la 'gyelu wang dang / ga pur dang bsres te/ shing a rka'i 'o mas sbrus te ri lur byas nas/ bser mo'i 'o ma la bdar te/ dpral bA thi ga le byas na/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rigs
119b8(mdo): sngags 'chang bye ba stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur/ snying ka ra thi ka ye byas na myi snang bar 'gyur zhing / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi rje dpon du 'gyur ro// lce'i rtse mo a reg na nyin re/
119b9(mdo): zhing tshigs su bcad pa stong blags shing 'dzi nad par 'gyur/ myed na so stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur/ 'o ma dpalan cig 'thungs na zos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur/ shing arga'i lo ma dang lhan cig zos na
120a1(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib mo dang gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad mngon tu 'gyur/ lce'i gnas su thig ye byas te/ chu klub
120a2(mdo): chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ gting du bying bar myi 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyind par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyind par 'gyur/ s+ya bor thig ye byas te/ g.yul ngor zhugs a/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal
120a3(mdo): bar 'gyur/ zhun mar dang lhan cig zos na/ glang po che stong gi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / lag pa ya cig gis glang po che bskyod pa dang / nam mazhal la 'phen cing slar yang 'dzind to// r-i lu 'dis lag pa bskus
120a4(mdo): na/ mye stong thub par 'gyur ro// rai lu 'dis lha'i gnas su brkos te bzhag na lha thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ dus dus su char 'beb sa shing / sad dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba gcod par byed do//
120a5(mdo): rgyal po'i sgor brkos te bzhag na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / bkal la gtogs pa dang / zhang blon dang / bram/ ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang
120a6(mdo): gi sgor brkos te bzhag na/ dge slong thams cad bde ba'i reg pa la gnas pas gnas par 'gyur/ rtag tu byams pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gi nang du rgan pa'i
120a7(mdo): mthar rkos te bzhag na/ dge slong thams cad zas dang skom 'dod dgu thob par 'gyur ro// lhung bzed kyi nang du bzhag ste/ grong khyer mang por bsod snyoms la song na/ kha zas ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs 'bad myi
120a8(mdo): rgos par thob par 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gi gnas su brkos te bzhag la/ mchod rten la mchod pa byas na/ r-i lu dzaM srid du mchod rten gyi gnas ra gnas pa de srid du/ mchod rten chen po brgyad
120a9(mdo): la nyin re zhing mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du/ brkos te bzhag la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs/
120b1(mdo): dbang phyugs mchod pa byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ ri lu ji srid du gnas kyi bar du/ nyi ma re re zhing 'phags pa 'argyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas par/
120b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// lam po cher brkos te bzhag na/ chom po dang / g.yon cad dang / kun ma dang / phyi dang / myi ma yin pa dang / gcan zan 'khro bo rnams bcings par 'gyur zhing / phyogs mtshams su 'byor par 'gyur ro//
120b3(mdo): ri'i rtse mor brkos te bzhag na/ sman gyi ngos po thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du mi'i rtse mo snang ba de srid du skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ba lang dang / phyugs dang / ta las bsogs
120b4(mdo): pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad las/
120b5(mdo): yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu zhi ba chen po/ ra 'gyur/ nad thams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mgus du bta/ gas te bcang bar byas na/ 'phags pa rgyan ras kazigs dbapa/
120b6(mdo): phyug sku ston bzhed par 'gyur zhing / rtag tu dgongs par 'gyuraro// bang bar brkos te bzhag na 'bru mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// chang yod pa'i sgor brkos te bzhag na/ chang thams cad rab tu 'phel
120b7(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// zhing gi nang du bkos te bzhag na/ lo tog mang por 'byor da par 'gyur ro// brag phug tu rkos te bzhag na brag phug ki sgo bye bar 'gyur ro// pug gi sgo byugs na/ phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur ro//
120b8(mdo): bu ka'i gnas su byugs nga ro thams cad 'dzag par 'gyur ro// nags kyi phug tu bgos te bzhag na/ nags kyi lha thams cad rang gi mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// dgongs pa gang byed pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// pad ma

123b5(mdo): dang / skyer kha 'da' dang / a ka ru rnams de bzhin du de dag cha bsnyams te/ zhib mor btags la kha ra dang sbyar te ka ser dang dngul gyis bkri zhing zangs kyis kyang bkri ste/ tsan dan dkar po'i
123b6(mdo): kab tse'i nang du bcug la/ lag pa'i snyim par bcang bar bya'o// zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la smyung ba byas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar
123b7(mdo): don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po stong pa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ gseng sngags rgyal po tong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas mgul bar gyur na de blangs te/ 2ra
123b8(mdo): bcug na myi snang bar 'gyur ro// le stong thub par 'gyur ro// sor bzhi tsam gyis rkang pa sa la myi rag par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgyar 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// me tog can gyi rig 'dzind 'khor los sgyur
123b9(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// lus las mu da dang / ud pa la'i tri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ud pa la sngon po dang / tsam pa ka dang / ke du'i me tog dang / de dag cha bsnyams te sbyar la mkhas pas sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te/
124a1(mdo): ri u byas la gser dang / dngul dang / zangs kyis bkres te/ zla ba yar gyi tshes drug nas tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcu nyis nas/ bcu bzhi 'am bcu gsum nas bco lnga'i tshe/ nyin zhag gsum du spu /
124a2(mdo): ba bya'o// shi nad tu zhus byas shing / gos kyang ma bgos te/ rtsang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs ras la bris pa la mchod pa rgya chen
124a3(mdo): byas ste/ shi a shod ma las byas pa'i gab tse'i nang du mi lu bcug nas/ lag pa'i snyim par bcug lo re mo'i spyan sngar ji srid du 'ol ba'i sgra byung ba de srad du bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas grub pa yin te/ de las
124a4(mdo): khar bcug sa dpag tshad stong du 'di 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / slams 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sor brgyad tsam du rkang pa sa la myi regabar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag bcu pa 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/
124a5(mdo): myig ud pa la sngon po lta bur 'gyur ro// sud pa la sngon po'i dri kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhin yongs su rgyas pa zla/ ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'gyur ro// mdog pad ma phru gur
124a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// lus las tsam pa ki'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig 'dzin nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos dang /
124a7(mdo): a ru dang / pa oMn dang / de dag rnams cha bsnyams te/ zhib mor btags la du rus ka'i mar gyis ri lu bya'o// gser dang / dngul dang / zangs kyis bkra'o/ tsan dan dkar po las byas pa'i sgrom bur bcug ste tshes
124a8(mdo): bcu gsum nas nya' bar du nyin zhag gsum mr-i nyal bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya cher bya zhing / gtor ma yang cher byin la/ mA dUr ba'i stan la 'dug ste/
124a9(mdo): lag pa'i snyim par bcug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 'khrikhro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas ri lu 'gul bar 'gyur na/ rigs sngags
124b1(mdo): 'chang bas des na grub pa yin par rig par bya ste/ ri lu grub pa ni de yin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas/ 'phags pa 'apyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya ste/ nas nangs kar skya reng ser po ma 'char la
124b2(mdo): dus su 'azal bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bya'o// grogs byed pa yang byin te/ ri lu gcig par gzhug par bya'o// rasu
124b3(mdo): kha bcug pa tsam gyi mod la gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad lnga stong du 'gro zhing slar ya pa 'ong bar 'gyur/ r-i lu bsgrub par byed pa tshegs myed par grub pa rnams kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
124b4(mdo): bor 'gyur/ tshe mo lnga stong thub par 'gyur/ 'bru gang tsas kyis rkang pa sal gyi reg par 'gyur ro// / de nas gter rko 'dod pas/ gnas gapa gter yod par dogs pa'i gnas de ga
124b5(mdo): l+yaM bas ma 'dal byas la/ me tog gtor zhing / gu gul gyi bad+yA/ ga pas bdug cing gtor ma gtsang ma dang / sha dang khrag gi rtor/ ma dang / phye zan dang / 'bras bu dang / pad ma'i gtor ma dang /
124b6(mdo): gtor ma rnam pa gsum sbyin par bya'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras ga gas dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o// stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod bya'o// stong phrag bcu tshang ba dang / gnas gang na gter yod pa'i
124b7(mdo): gnas deng / gter snang ba mngon tu 'byung zhing / gter 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gter srung ba la gtom sa dang mchod yod sbyin par byas na/ gter srung ba de'i srid 'tsho'i bar dulas byed pa po 'gyur ro// gangadu ma gas/
124b8(mdo): ba dang // kang bsgo ba'i las de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// nyungs kar dang bral ba la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan 'dun bzlas brjod byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ brtsegs dang / log 'dun dang / gnod
124b9(mdo): sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po khams cad bcings par bya'o// mtshams chen po bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro// log 'drin phung bar byas da/ nyungs mar dang / nyungs kar dang / ku ku la dang / skye che'i 'bru dang / lan
125a1(mdo): tsha nams sbrang rtsi dang / bsres la shing ka ra byi ra'i yam sreg shing gyis me bus te/ nyin par dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ log 'dren thams cad bcom par 'gyur zhing / rnam par zhig par 'gyur
125a2(mdo): ro// dmag bcing bar 'dod pas/ nyungs kar dang / dug dang / skye tse'i 'bru dang / sa bon bdun rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la/ dmag ki mdun tu shing nim pa'i me s+phar te/ thog mar brgyad brgya byas na dmag bcings par 'gyur ro//
125a3(mdo): lan gnyis byas na nad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brgyad brgya bzlas brjod lan gsum pa byas na/ dmag thams cad zhig par 'gyur zhing / phyir yang lan 'gal yang 'ong bar myi 'gyur ro// / de nas dbyug
125a4(mdo): pa bsgrub par 'dod na/ dbyug pa seng lde pa las gshin rje'i dbyug pa'i tshad 'khru do pa bya'o// de nas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar zas dkar gsum zos te/ stong phrag bcur bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas
125a5(mdo): tshes bco lnga tshang ba'i tshe/ smyung ba byas te/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// 'khri bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas dbyug pa 'bar ro// de
125a6(mdo): nas grub pa yin par shes par bya'o// don yod pa'i dbyug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzig sa dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas
125a7(mdo): dbyug pa blangs te/ kun tu lan bdun bskor bar bya'o// de nas dbyug pa des sa la gdab par bya'o// dbyug pas sa la gru bzhir gzhal bar byas na/ kun tu gru bzhi lham pa'i khyim chen po gzhal myed 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur te/
125a8(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha'i gzhal myed 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / bu mo'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
125a9(mdo): bzang ba mdzes pa blta bar 'os pa zhig 'ongs nas/ rin po che bdun las byas pa'i snod bum pa gang ba zhig thogs shing sgo'i nang na 'dug go// de nas lha mo de na ra rigs sngags 'chang rang gi khyim yin gyis nang du zhugs
125b1(mdo): shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas snying po myed par gyur da pa'i khyim gzhal myed khang 'dis ci zhig bya zhes brjod par bya'o// de na re snod ga pab 'di long shig dang rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur
125b2(mdo): ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas d+h+r-ig ces khros pa byas pa dang / lha mo de dus ste ji ltar char pa babs cher 'babs pa de bzhin 'di'i myig nas mchi ma byung ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang bas blang bar bya zhing / rang gi lus la
125b3(mdo): bsku bar bya'o/ bskus pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser lta bu'i lus su 'gyur ro/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / go shir sha'i dri lus las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ khar bcug na lha rdzas kyi ud pa la'i dri Sha nas
125b4(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchog myig tu bskus na/ lha rdzas ud pa la sngo na po 'dra ba'i lha'i myig tu 'gyur ro// skra bskus na/ lha'i rma bya'i mdog 'dra ba'i skar 'gyur zhing skra 'khyil la 'khyil par 'gyur ro//
125b5(mdo): rna ba'i bu gar blugs na lha'i snyan du 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag gsum du thos par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong phrag gsum/ du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'thungs na bskal pa stong phrag bcur 'tshe/
125b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// bar gyi skal par rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// gar zabs dang / tro Ta ka dang / bda' srod pa dang / bstan chos dang / b+hA ra ta dang / ra ma yan dang / sngon gi gtam rnying dang / tshul
125b7(mdo): dang / 'dul ba dang / skyes rabs dang / snyan dngags dang / bye brang thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / mdo sde dang / chos mngon pa dang /
125b8(mdo): theg pa chen po dang / de dag thams cad mngon tu 'phyogs par gnas so// thams cad du rtogs pa khong du chud pa chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bud byed de na re/ rje btsun dam pa rang gi khab mchog tu gshegs su gso/
125b9(mdo): zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas brjod par bya zhing / rang gi rkang pa rims kyis 'jug par bya'o// de nas bud myed de nu ma gnyis stond par byed na/ rigs sngags 'chang bas nu ma gnyis bzu pa la
126a1(mdo): bcir na// de las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas blang bar bya/ btung bar bya/ rkang pa bsku bar byas na/ bskus pa tsam gyi mod la 'khor stong dang lha mo de dang / lhan cig tu nam
126a2(mdo): mkha' la 'phur te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rlung gi phung po la zhon par 'gyur ro// rig 'dzind 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / dpon por 'gyur ro// bde ba
126a3(mdo): can gi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nyid rig pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa yin no// dbyug pa lag pa g.yas par bzung ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
126a4(mdo): bzlas brjod bya zhing / lan bdun bskor ba byas na/ gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad skad cig tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dgug pa/ de thams cad bkug cing mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin
126a5(mdo): dang / gnod sbyin mo dkug par 'dod na/ btsag gi ri mo bris la/ dbyug pa la don yod pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bya/ zhing / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo'i steng du bskor bar bya'o//
126a6(mdo): gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// gtor ma dkar po can gyi snod dbu la bar bya'o/ lan bdun bskor ba tsam gyi mdo la gnod sbyid dang / gnod sbyin mo mdun na 'dug cing bka' bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro//
126a7(mdo): gang bsgo ba'i las de byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad ma tshang ba myed par bsgrub par 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / dngul dang / sa ye sbram dang / kos dang / mal stan dang /

126a9(mdo): ro// mdun na rang gi ngo bo gnas par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par byed do// nam thos kyi sras kyi zhabs la lan bdun brdab cing don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par byas na/ nam
126b1(mdo): thos kyi sras mdun na rgyug cing gnas par 'gyur ro// nor mang du sbyin par mdzad do// gang 'dod pa de thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ro// myi smra bar dbyug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya zhing / rgyal po'i sgom

126b4(mdo): pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byas ma/ lha de rang gi ngo bo ma dun na gnas par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba de thams cad byed bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro//
126b5(mdo): nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe nyi ma'i mdun tu bskor bar bya zhing / don yod// pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byas na/ nyi ma babs te/ mchog gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// zla ba1
126b6(mdo): li zhal du bskor zhing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byed na/ zla ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang bcas te/ 'bab par 'gyur ro// mchog bsams pa thams cad sbyin par

126b8(mdo): smra bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byed cing dbyug pa bskor na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
126b9(mdo): cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa dang / bsams pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// yang na 'phags pa s+yad ras gzigs
127a1(mdo): dbang phyug gi rang gi sku bzhi thun tho rangs kyi tshe/ mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// mchog bsams pa thams cad sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad par 'gyur/

127a6(mdo): zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// brjed byed las bsogs pa'i bar la bstand pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bya bas na/ byabs pa tsam gyi med
127a7(mdo): la rims thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi pa'o rims ni bu zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// gsul 'gyed cing 'thab pa'i tshe/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'khros pas bzlas brjod bya// dbyug pa bskor ba

127a9(mdo): 'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing dbyug pa bskor ba byas na/ rkun po dang / chom po dang / mya rgod dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / dug myi bzad pa dang / gtsan zan khro bo dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang /
127b1(mdo): dug dang / bcas pa'i srog chags de dag thams cad kyi spang bar 'gyur ro// rang gi khyim du bde bar 'gyur ro// myi ngas thams cad dang / ba la ba ki nad dang / byugs ngas chen po dang / ta nad chen po dang / bud myed
127b2(mdo): dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo nad chen po byung ba'i tshe/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dang / 'kho bo'i rgyal po skad chen pos dran par bya zhing / dbyug pa grong khyer kyi sgo bzhir bskor ba byas na/ ba tsam gyi
