127b4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// bud med dam skyes pa dkrug par 'dod na/ gnas mthon po po 'dug ste/ skad chen pos don yong pa'i rgyal po 'i po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o// dbyug pa bskong bar bya'o//
127b5(mdo): kang gi tshad du bya ba de mying brjod pa byas na/ dpag tshad brgyanas kyang de 'ong zhing / bdag dang do pa la dbang byar yod cing gnas/ par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// 'o
127b6(mdo): te nor bu bzang po'i sras dkrug par 'dod na/ zla ba mar gyi tshes bcu bzhi la smyung ba byas te/ dbyug pa la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po las nyi shu za gcig bzlas brjod byas ste/ nor bzangs kyi sras kyi
127b7(mdo): sde ba'i nyed du bzhag par b+ha/ 'gro ba'i rgyal po bzlas pa byas na/ ba'i bus kyi mi rangs tsam na/ nor bu bzang ba'i mas rang nyid rigs sngags 'chang kyi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing / gser gi dong ce stong /
127b8(mdo): bcu sbyin par mdzad do// de lasu dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal du buwu bar bya/ 'phags pa pyad dus klu rigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya/ nor bu babang po'i sras la mchod yon gyi chab dbul bar bya/ nyi mtsha
127b9(mdo): zhing/ ring bsangs kyims la mchom min gyims sum na/ rnas 'tsho'i bar du nyis re re zhi gas gi dang sa sbyin pam mdzad do// de las rigs sngags 'tha bas byed dang / yon cig cig dgod par byaste/ spyod pa
128a1(mdo): sbyin par bya/ bsod nams bsag par byas la/ nor bu bzang po'i sras dang lhan cig tu rjes su yid rang bar bya'o// 'brog dkon pa'i nang du song na/ 'brog dkon pa gapan chu dkon par dbyug pa la
128a2(mdo): sa do nyi shu rtsa gcig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing / gang na ne'u gsing sngon po yod pa'i gnas dems la lan bdun rdab cing bskor te/ skad drag pos don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bya/ 'phag
128a3(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nyams thag zag skad du bya ste/ de nas gnas gang du brdabs pa'i gnas der/ lha rdzas kyi chu ha cang grang ba yang myin/ ha cang trog yang myin/ ro dang chas pa'i rdzing bu 'byung bar
128a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa la 'gro bo rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rdzing bu'i nang du tshul ba rdab par bya'o// de nas rdzing bu'i nang nas myi ser skya bo cig byung ste
128a5(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang ba la thal mo 'od stong du sbyar nas 'dug te/ rigs sngags 'chang ba ci 'dod ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sa sngags 'chang bas bdag ni kha zas kyi ched du lags kyis gsal
128a6(mdo): tu gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas mya de la shis pa'i tshig brjod par bya'o// de nas myi de rdzing bu'i nang du zhugs pa dang / skad cig zang cig yud tsam la kha zas dang btung ba
128a7(mdo): ro zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs yod par byed cing rigs sngags 'chang ba la sbyin par byed/ de/ skye bo stong phrag brgya'i ston mo byar yod cing / yo byad phun sum tshogs po shin tu mang por 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngakra
128a8(mdo): 'chang bas rdzing bu myed par myi byed na/ rdzing bu de dus rtag tu gnas par 'gyur/ myi snang bar myi 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dang / 'don pa thams cad la yo byad thams cad kyis brel pa myed par 'byung bar
128a9(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'on te don yod pa sna tshogs bya bar 'dod na/ rigs sngags 'chang ba des lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i tri chus zhus byas la s+yai gtsug bcing bar bya'o// myaM smra bar dbyug pa la lan
128b1(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ bskor bar bya'o des na 'khor dang skye bo mang po 'khor zhing rmongs par 'gyur ro// de nas dbyug pa bskor ba byas na/ yid la ji ltar sems dpa'i ngo bo de bzhin du thams cad ston/
128b2(mdo): par byed do// 'bras bu dang / me tog gi char 'bebs so// sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs stond par byed do// de nas ro langs bslang bar 'dod na/ rigs 'asngags 'chang ba des legs par zhus byas shing / kos sar pa
128b3(mdo): bgos te/ gtsang mar byas la/ dur khrod du song ste/ dbyug pa la don yod pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ 'kho bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byed cing / dur khrod kyi nang du bskor ba byas na/ dpag tshad
128b4(mdo): tshun chad du kun tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// bkyegs khams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po ma rungs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis kyi lo langs te bkru bar bya'o//
128b5(mdo): pa'i rnam lngas sbyang bar bya'o// ba'i lcibs dkyil 'khor gru bani lham par bya'o// seng sdang gi phur ba tshad sor bcu gnyis pa bzhi ga bzhir gzugs par bya'o// tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkyil
128b6(mdo): 'khor kun tu bskor bar bya'o// mau ro ras dkar pos bkri bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya'o// me tog gis gtor bar bya'o// gtor ma dkar pos gzhag par bya'o// mchod yon
128b7(mdo): gyi chu gzhag par bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang ba shar phyogs su la bltas te 'dug la/ dbyug pa lag pa g.yas par bzhag ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po gdon par bya'o// 'jo bo'i rgyal po// lan
128b8(mdo): drug bcu dran par bya'o// g.yas pa rgya rgya'o/ lag pa g.yas pa'i dbyug pa gdab par byas na/ myi ro de 'gul bar 'gyur/ g.yo bar 'gyur/ langs te phyogs bcu pa lta bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa de
128b9(mdo): skye bor bzhag par byas na/ mya ro de tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas gsang sngags dran par bya'o// yid kyi bsam par byas na/ s+yai ro des thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
129a1(mdo): da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa snying kar bzhag pa byas na/ khrag tu skyug par 'gyur ro// khrag des thig le byas na/ khyim thams
129a2(mdo): cad la sgo srungs myed cing / sgo thams cad gdangs par 'gyur ro// bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur da cing 'udug go// dbyug po snying kar btsar na skyug par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags
129a3(mdo): 'chang bas blangs te mtha' dag bza' bar bya'o// zos pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'byung ba chen po'i bdag po dang / dbang phyug chen po'o 'dra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// A we/
129a4(mdo): bya bas dbyug pas btsar la sdig pa byas na/ de na lce 'byind par 'gyur ro/ rigs sngags 'chang bas bcad la rigs sngags/ 'chang bas blang bar bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkhal la 'gro bar 'gyur
129a5(mdo): ro// rigs sngags 'chang ba ral gri'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang ba/ bco brgyad kyi 'khor kyis bskor bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags
129a6(mdo): 'chang bas myo ro li spyi bor dbyug pas brdabs na/ sgra 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / shi ba'i ro gcig tu ma khregs pa'i gser yin pas blang bor byas na/ srang gcig gis zangs srang stong gser du 'gyur ro// de dag ni/
129a7(mdo): 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga yin no// / de nas byang chub sems dpal 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/
129a8(mdo): sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bdag gi 'jig rten pa'i cho ga lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas bka' sa lad pa/ sems can chen po sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ 'jig
129a9(mdo): rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dam pa gsang ba'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / blo brtan po 'jigs pa myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dam pa bslab par byed pa de 'o na nyid grub par 'gyur ba
129b1(mdo): dang / blags pa dang / dran pa tsam dang / grub par byed pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par grub par 'gyur ba dang / mchog grub chen po so sor thob par
129b2(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi 'dod par rtogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par grub par 'gyur ba smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'phyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
129b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas dbugs 'byin pa dang bsgo ba thos nas/ shand tu yid dka' ba chen por gyur da te/ de stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu kaza rad te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas la btsugs rba/
129b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gyi bas phyag 'tshal te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / rje dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos kos dang
129b5(mdo): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sdud pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur chen po byas te/ mchod nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma pa
129b6(mdo): por byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi lham rtogs pa dang / gang dag rig 'dzin grub pa dang / gang dka lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin
129b7(mdo): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gang dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa dang / gang dag ri po ta la la gnas pa de dag thams cad
129b8(mdo): kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dr-i dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / kos dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / chas dang / sdud pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas te/ yid dga' bar gyurd to// 'phags pa s+yan ras
129b9(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la stong phrag brgya bskor ba byas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ya de lags su thal lo sbyar te btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
130a1(mdo): kyai spyan sngar myig myi 'dzums par 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'jam pos 'di skad ced gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa'i rmad du byung ba rnam par blta ba/ don yod pa'i cho 'phrul//
130a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin kyis brlabs pa dang / dam tshig chen po'i
130a3(mdo): dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa blags pa dang / sgrub par byed pa grub pa mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa mchog bsgrub pa// de bzhin
130a4(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs shing / lung bstan pa lags te/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin kyis brlabs kyis/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad mchog
130a5(mdo): tu grub par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i/ phyir dmyal ba dang / yaM dgas kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje/ l-i 'jig rten se lad pa/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa myi bzad pa
130a6(mdo): 'joms pa dang / ngan song thams cad sel ba/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das po'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa nges par bsreg par byed pa/ yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// mtshams myed
130a7(mdo): pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / mtshams myed pa la gzhol ba dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
130a8(mdo): sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad spong bar byed pa/ de dag gis mnyan pa dang / mthong ba tsam dang / sdom pa tsan dan dang / lan cig 'bad pa tsam dang / 'chad pa tsam dang / thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// pa mtho
130a9(mdo): ba tsam gyis thams cad zad par 'gyur/ byang bar 'gyur ro// rims nad thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / dr-i dang / ser sna dang / 'phra dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa zhes
130b1(mdo): cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'tsho ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid/
130b2(mdo): myi bde ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phung bar byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang / sdigs pa dang / gsod pa dang / gsul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa dang / btson du
130b3(mdo): 'dzind pa dang / lcags su 'jug pa dang / rkun a dang / zol pa dang / mya rgod dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / nad ngan pa dang / dmu chu dang / sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu g.yon can dang / shu ba dang / shu
130b4(mdo): bran dang / g.yan pa dang / glad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / dom dang / rjed dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yai dgas dang / sha za dang / brjod byed dang / sbrul ma rungs pa dang / kha gtug pa dang
130b5(mdo): sbrul nag po dang / srog chags kon pa dang / dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags 'jigs pa sna tshogs dang bcas pa dang / me dang chu dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / g.yam sa dang / khyim rdib pa dang /
130b6(mdo): grang ba dang / rlung dang / nyi tshan dang / bye ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad ni/ blags pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ phung bar 'gyur/
130b7(mdo): mod la phye mar blags par 'gyur ro// yongs su blags par 'gyur ba 'di la dogs par myi bya// yid gnyis bskyed par myi bya'o// the tsom myi bya'o/ sems gnyis su 'gyur ba bskyed par myi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
130b8(mdo): bdag rtag tu mngon tu dran par bgyi ba dang / rtag tu yid la byed pa'i blo 'byung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'od dang / 'jo bo'i rgyal po'i snying po yang bzlas par bgyi'o// mang du byung ba rnam par lta ba/
130b9(mdo): don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin kyis brlabs
131a1(mdo): dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po na/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par dus thams cad du yid la kha ton tu brjod par bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par rjes su dran
131a2(mdo): bar bsgom par bgyi'o// de dag dran pa sgoms pa tsam dang / dran pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi ldog pa zhes bya'o//
131a3(mdo): phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// lung stond pa dang / byin kyis rlob par 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'phag/
131a4(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang dran pa dang / dus gsum du shin tu gsal bar yid la byed pa dang / mchod cing phyag byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can de ni nga dang
131a5(mdo): 'dra ba yin par rig par bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin dgyis brlabs pa'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur
131a6(mdo): pas dbang bskurd pa yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig lan mang du shin tu lhag par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin par rig par bya'o//
131a7(mdo): bdag kyang dus thams cad du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// dus thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par bgyi'o// bsam pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de'i tshe bdag gis sems cad myur ba myur bar
131a8(mdo): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bzhag par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni go cha chen po btad par khas blangs pa la 'tshal ba lags pas/ sems can thams cad bsgral po'i phyir
131a9(mdo): re ba'i mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'argyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces
131b1(mdo): bka' saHla to// sems can dag pa'i mchog legs so legs so// 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog de ni/ myi nga 'dzind pa tsam gyis sems can yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/
131b2(mdo): lta ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub pa dang / smyud pa'i cho ga byed pa dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sems cad de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro//
131b3(mdo): sems can dag pa dus la bab pa ga pa yin par shes na smros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing 'dzum ste/ don yod
131b4(mdo): pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po smras so// tus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dpa'aphags pa nyan thos kyi
131b5(mdo): dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' chogs/ kyi mchog la phyag/ 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i dkyil
131b6(mdo): 'khor gyi lha gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / drang srong gi tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// pas sgrub pa dang bsgom pa
131b7(mdo): 'grub pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan sngar rigs sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun tu de kho na nyid kyi snying po/ gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bcom
131b8(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thul pa bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpel byad kyis rnam par smras pa phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i 'phreng ba dang /
131b9(mdo): spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skye bor bzhag nas/ grad pa la byugs te 'di skad ces bkalas la da
132a1(mdo): sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod spros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin kyis brlabs te/ ngas kyang da ltar byin kyis brlabs kyis khyod gas pacu dam pa'i dam tshis
132a2(mdo): spros shig/ phyogs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i gang ka'i klung kyi 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gis bye ma'i rdul 'phra rab snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
132a3(mdo): kyis kyang byin gyis brlags shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
132a4(mdo): yAn sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to// / oM pad ma hasta/ ma ha a so kA pA shru sA d+hA ya sa ma ya tri d+ha ya na tsa ra tsa ra/ hU~M don yod pa'i zhags pa na
132a5(mdo): rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no// byang chub sems dpa'/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gsanga' 'i snyi'i po 'di brjod ma lag tu mo'i rgyal po ta la 'di zag dang / dam
132a6(mdo): tshal dang / rtse shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab 'khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing / lha'i gnas nabs ldeg par 'gyur te thams cad 'dab 'dar po po 'gyu
132a7(mdo): ro// klu'i gnas dang / nod sbyin dang / min pa'i gnas rnams kyang 'jugs par gyu to// rgyam che chen po'i rnabs kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// cu gter rnams kyang 'thugs par gyur to// de sa zus su byonapa
132a8(mdo): bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa/ don yod pa gsang ba'i snying po klags pas 'grub pa bla na
132a9(mdo): myed pa smras pa legs so lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' sartsal to// sems pa dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba klag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par
132b1(mdo): spros shig/ gyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis me'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas/ gang ka klungs ya bye ma snyed kyi de bani
132b2(mdo): gshegs po'i phyag brkyang ste/ spyi ba la bzhag nas legs so// zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ zhig par bgyid
132b3(mdo): do// sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid// sdig pa dang / sems can gang gdug pa rnams dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de/ 'od la
132b4(mdo): the tsom myi bgyi'o// rtag tu 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dab phyug mchog sbyin lta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so// rigs sngags 'di'i cho ga bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mar
132b5(mdo): gyur da pas shi nad tu zhus bgyis te/ gos rtsang ma bko' bar bgyi/ 'o// byams pa dang snying rje yid la bgyid pas/ 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras
132b6(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi'o// me te ga dang / bdug pa dang / dr-i dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / dbul bar bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ tshes btsa
132b7(mdo): lnga la bsgrub pa zlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snyi po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ chab dang / nyungs dkar
132b8(mdo): kyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bcing bar bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyi dbang bskur bar bgyilo/ phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de la 'og tu don yod pa'i/
132b9(mdo): gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod gdon pa tsam gyis/ de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// 'khro bo'i rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis pa
133a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod rdzogs nas/ r-i mo'i gzugs 'bar zhibs yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod
133a2(mdo): pa'i zhags pa lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang snying dka' ba dang / skye bo'i gtsug 'bar bar gyur da to// 'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no// zhes bsgrub pa'i rtags dang legs so//
133a3(mdo): zhes bya ba'i sgra byin te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dgos pa thams cad dang bdag kyi lha'i gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par dkal ldan gyi gnas su 'jug pa
133a4(mdo): don yod par 'og myin gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa don yod par sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su brgya byin lha'i rgyal por 'jug pa/ don yod par ri rab chen po lag pa gcig gis bskul ba/ don
133a5(mdo): yod par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ston dpa/ don yod par myi snang ba ston / pa/ don yod par stobs 'phel ba/ don yod par glang ba n-i/ la dbang ba'i 'khor los sbyar ba/ so ser thob par stond pa
133a6(mdo): don yod par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yon par 'bru' char 'bebs pa/ don yod par gos kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par rkyen dang / mu tig gi chun 'phyangs dang /
133a7(mdo): gdub 'khor dang / gser gi cong cong dang / gapu bu dang / dpung rgyan sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs par yang dag par stond pa/ don yod par ro rnam pa sna tshogs ro'i mchog/ ro brgya'i kha zas kyi char 'bebs pa// don
133a8(mdo): yod par sems can sna tshogs grol bar stond pa/ don yod par bstan chos dang / tshig le'ur bcad pa dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / mdo sde dang / lung bstand pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang /
133a9(mdo): gleng bzhi dang / de lta bu byu la dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / gnad tu rgyas pa dang / mang du byung ba'i chos kyi yan lag sA tshogs dang / chos mngon pa sna tshogs kyi gtam yang dag par stond pa dang / don yod par theg pa chen po
133b1(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ rab tu stond pa don yod par gnod sbyin dang / sran po dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / ya~M dgas dang / grus bum dang / brjed byed dang / bkyegs dang / log 'dren sna tshogs
133b2(mdo): nyes pa dang / gsod pa dang / shind tu sel ba yang dag par ston pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na yon tan chen po can gyi gzungs/ ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/ thams cad du myi 'jigs pa
133b3(mdo): gnas rab tu ston pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam legs par rab tu stond pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu stond pa/ phyir gyi ldog pa'i gnas dang / sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par mdzad pa lags te/
133b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das don yod pa la rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stong po// yon tan khyad par yongs su bsgrags pa/ de bzhin
133b5(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba la rab tu gnas pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya/ thub pas byang chub sems dpa' s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug
133b6(mdo): la 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs 'di'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa bshad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
133b7(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa/ gsang ba'i snying pos yongs su bsgrags pa legs so legs so// de dag ni sems can thams cad la lam mchog/ shi nad
133b8(mdo): tu mchog tu gyur pa gya nom pa bla na myed pa mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs kyi snying po gsang ba yongs su bsgrags pa ste/ gang gis 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sems can pha rold tu sgrol ba yin no// s+yan ras gzigs
133b9(mdo): dbang phyug rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pa 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngas/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs dang / dza'u rigs dang / dmapa
134a1(mdo): rigs gang la la zhig gam/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas don yod par rnam par lta ba'i snying po 'di dang / rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
134a2(mdo): snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lang du byung ba'i de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mying 'dzind pa
134a3(mdo): gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po stsogs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzind par yang 'gyur ro// gang ga'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba khrag zhig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma'i rdul 'phra rab
134a4(mdo): dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon tu mthong ba dang / mngon tu chos thos pa dang / mngon su dbyangs thos pa dang / mngon tu lung bstan da pa thos par 'gyur ba'i
134a5(mdo): sems can chen po de dag gis ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu che/ ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de gzungs gang yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang /
134a6(mdo): ka dang / myong sna tshogs da ltar zos pa dang / yang na klog pa dang / yang na lta ba tsam mthong ba ni de dang mnyam pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i
134a7(mdo): rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang de dang mnyam pa yin no// dka' ba byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang thos par 'gyur ro// gang zhig gzungs 'di yi dkyil
134a8(mdo): 'khor 'bad daM/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gnod par byed pa dang / 'dre ba dang / klog pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi tsho gas bsgrub par byed pa dang / 'bad par byed pa
134a9(mdo): de ni dga' ba chen po la zhugs pa yin te/ de dang mnyam pa yin no// dka' ba gang zhe na/ pi ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pas bskal pa grangs myed pa
134b1(mdo): gsum du dka' ba la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas ste chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen
134b2(mdo): ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam / re'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang yin pa 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga stobs chen po dang / pha rold
134b3(mdo): gnod pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga tshol ba yin no// 'di lta ste 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa dang / cho ga dang / dkyil la
134b4(mdo): lta ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang phyag rgya bcings te bsgrub pa dang / 'di lta ste zos pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
134b5(mdo): sems pa dang / dus gsum du lan gsum don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran pa dang / 'gro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur/ ba dang / gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu sta gcig bzlas brjod dang /
134b6(mdo): cho ga dran pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pas snying brlan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba la lhur byed pa de ni/ dka' bar spyod pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no//
134b7(mdo): bskal pa grangs myed pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa dang / zhugs pa dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yin no// de'i tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /
134b8(mdo): sangs rgyas nyid du so sor gnas pa yin no// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib ma'i rgyal po// // bam po bcu gsu pa'o// /
134b9(mdo): bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngags par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyag g.yas pa byang chub
135a1(mdo): sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na yon tan chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang / dkyil
135a2(mdo): 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no// gzungs dang dkyil 'khor dmar po 'am// yang na gur kum 'dra' ba'i mdog/ sa rtul kar po snum pa ni// mar sar 'dra ba 'jam pa yin//
135a3(mdo): sa'i khyad par dbye ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags// byang chub snying po sa der mtshungs// ring srel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang // de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin// brkos pa'i nang du mkhas//
135a4(mdo): pa yis// slar yang sa de dgang bar bya// ci srid dong bu mnyam bar dgang // de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o// nyung dang lhag pa bsgrags pa myin// 'dir ni 'grub pa myed par bstand/
135a5(mdo): 'khru ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis tshad// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig/ dag gdab// yang na 'khru ni bcu drug dang // yang ni 'khru na/ bco lnga bya// mnyam zhing gru bzhi legs par dbye// ba
135a6(mdo): lci ba dag dang ni// sa dang bsres te bsku bya ba// shi nad tu zhend par banig pa dang // 'jam zhing zhen par bya ba yin// de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// sna tshogs mtshon gyis kun tu dbye//
135a7(mdo): sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes pa dang // ta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni// rnam par bye ste mu bzhi tshad// 'bru gsum la bar 'bru bzhi ni// TIka skud chen gyis rnam par dbyel//
135a8(mdo): nad gi yig gi tshad dag tu// mdung rje gsum pa dag dang ni// nor bu rin chen sna tshogs bya// bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu// pad ma dang ni rdo rje dag/ kun tu bri bar bya ba yin// phyi'i thig gi tshad dag tu
135a9(mdo): de rje nas pa'i stegs bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs gzhal myed khang // sngags bu dag kyang bri bar bya// pad ma'i dbus su gzhal myed khang // gzhal yas khang pa gnas par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi pad ma la/
135b1(mdo): rnam par snang mdzad thub par bya// g.yon du 'od ni dpag myed pa// g.yas phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs// shag kya'i rgyal po dag dang ni// don yod rgyal po 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug mgon la mngon gsum du/
135b2(mdo): btud de thal mo sbyar ba ni// phyag bzhi par ni bya ba yin// phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'o// me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang // rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan par bya// 'od dpag myed pa'i mdun du ni// 'jo
135b3(mdo): bo'i rgyal po phyag bzhi pa// btud de thal mo sbyar ba dang // lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs dag/ lag pa gnyis na thogs pa dang // sna tshogs rgyad kyis brgyan par bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs brgyan pa/
135b4(mdo): sna tshogs dar gyis mdzes par bya// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya che// pad mo'i bdad dang rnam brgyan pa// 'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya// gru bzhi dag ni byas nas ni// gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste/
135b5(mdo): dbus kyi gnas su 'jigs myed pa// shar gyi gnas su gnas ba ni// lha mo sgrol ma rnam par brgyan// g.yon gi kan/ sa su gnas pa ni// gos dkar mo ni rnam par brgyan
135b6(mdo): nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni// lha mo dkar mo rnam par brgyan// byang gi gnas na gnas pa' ni// lha mo pad ma mdzes dga' brgyan// dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams su// rgyal chen
135b7(mdo): bzhi ni bzhag par bya// bar gyi gnas su bzhag pa ni// ral pa gcig ma gtum mo shar// nub tu pho nya bzhin skur ma// g.yas phyogs su ni bzhin sgur ma// rdo rje lugs sgrog bya ba yin// byang du/
135b8(mdo): srin mo 'khro gnyer rdong // kun kyang mye dbus 'jigs pa myed// dkyil 'khor dbus su bkod pa bzhin// phyi rol de thig la pad mo'i 'breng // rdo rje rtse gsum bzhag pa ni// kun tu 'bar ba 'phreng ba ba
135b9(mdo): phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// br-i bya rtags dang phyag rgya dang // lha ni dbang phyug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang // chu lha dbang po lus ngan po// dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi// lhanaH/
136a1(mdo): 'og myin rnams kyi bar// lha rnams bri bar bya ba yin// sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // kun kyang pad ma'i bdan la gnas// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang //
136a2(mdo): rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang // zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang // legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no// mdung rtse gsum dang pots+tsha sa// ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang // rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad ma'i 'phreng // 'khor lo'i drung dang
136a3(mdo): 'gal ta dang // ral gri dang ni lo ma rab// bum pa gang ba dag dang ni// s+ye snang ba'i 'bakag dang // pad ma dang ni sud pa la// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang nor bu dang // dbyug pa dang ni rdo rje dang // grwa bzhi
136a4(mdo): rdo rje mtshan ma yin// nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni// phyag rgya bzhi dga' ba 'khyal// bya ma gsum dang ku 'di dang // ril ba'ab+h+ring ka ri dang ni// raM dgas e ne pags pa la// mchod phyir
136a5(mdo): thogs pa'i snam bu dang // steng du rgyu skar bcas pa'o// zla bo nyi ma de bzhin no// kun kyang 'bar ba'i nags 'dug/ bya// so sor cha ni dbye bar bya// mkhas pas rang gi sgo dra
136a6(mdo): ba// 'gying bag mthong na 'jigs su rung // rdo rje 'chang ba'i 'bar ba'i nang // ki li ki li gtum pa che// lho phyogs kyi nai sgo ru gzhag// nub tu rdo rje bIng ga la// mthong na 'jigs
136a7(mdo): su rung ba'o// byang du nges par gnod mdzes bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// pad mo'i 'phreng dang ud pal 'phreng // grwa dka dang ni gla rnams su// klu'i rgyal po bzhi rnams bril// sgo srung ba da/
136a8(mdo): bri ba ni// nor bu bzang dang kang ba bzang // stobs kyi lha dang lngas rtsen yin// sgo'i gnas kyi bar dag tu// chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba// gang ka dang ni sin ta dang // pag shud dang ni sin du yin// 'phreng ba'in pa
136a9(mdo): rol thog pa / dpal gyi lha mo ba sar ti// dpe myed pa dpasa'i lce// lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang // sgra dbyangs ma dpa 'jigs ldan ma/ de bzhin mo'i sgra dag dang // 'phrog ma dang ni dug can sa// gtum
136b1(mdo): mo dpa di la rtog so// de dag bri bar bya ba yid// zhus byas rdzi ma 'an grangs yis// grang sa'i rjod du tshan rnams ni// lcag sa khyen pas kus bya'i// bas ni dag gsum grub par bya// khyad par 'dod pas
136b2(mdo): zas ngan pa// spang bar bya ba'ang nya dpan// cong dang sgog skya kye'u rnams// 'dres pa spang bar bya ba ni// log 'dren grags chos spang phyir ro// zhus byas gos ni sar pa bgos// rtsa ngams dkyil 'khor bri 'am/
136b3(mdo): bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// kun tu brgyan par bya ba ni// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam pa sna tshogs mda' dang ni// lha rdzas dang ni sbyang ba dang // ba dan yang ni sbyang bar bya// tshon skud sna
136b4(mdo): lnga'i srad bu yis// kun tu yongs su bskor bar bya'o// zangs las byas pa'i pad ma'i tshad// sor bzhi 'dab ma kha bye ba// mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su//
136b5(mdo): pad ma brgyad ni bzhag pa dag/ gser las byas pa bzhi bzhag/ cing // de bzhin rdul las byas pa bzhi// kun tu byu ru'i 'phreng ba dang // mu tig 'phreng ba de bzhin no// kun tu gser gyi
136b6(mdo): srad pu dang // rin chen sna tshogs gzhag par bya// snying po'i dkyil gyi tethig bar du// gser kyi snod ni bzhi dag dang / dngul kyi snod ni bzhi bzhag go// rdul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi/
136b7(mdo): dngul dang / gser dang / zangs las byas pa'i me tog sbas pa'i mgo lhogs kyis sras pa gzhag par bya'o// gser gyi bum pa bzhi bzhag pad la// mu tig dang / byu ru dang / pad ma ra ga dang / mar gad dang / in tra
136b8(mdo): ni la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog gis sras pa'i mgo spogs bzhag par bya'o// gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur kum dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang ba dang // dngul gyi snod kyin
136b9(mdo): dugaser gi me tog dang / dngul ki me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog mu tig gis brgyan cing / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sras pa bzhag par bya'o// cod pan kis rgyal mtshan bzhi bzhag par bya// rin po che'i
137a1(mdo): rgyal mtshan bzhi bzhag par bya// tshon sna tshogs can dang / dar dmar po sbyang bar bya// dngul gi pag por bzhi bzhag ste/ kla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / kur kum kyi bdug pas bdug par bya// sa
137a2(mdo): las byas pa'i bum pa gser gis g.yogs pa'i nang du/ dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par bgyis la/ bkang ba la dar gyis bcings la/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa
137a3(mdo): steng du/ zangs las byas pa'i me tog bzhag nas/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag par bya'o// de nas phyi rol kyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu las
137a4(mdo): gartogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mchod yon kyi chab kyis rdul gyi sngo da dang / zangs kyi snod bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o// lcags kyi bum pa gang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// me tog
137a5(mdo): dang / mgo lpags dang / pog por bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi bzha ga par bya ste/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o// sgo bzhir tri chab kyis bum pa dar kyis brgyan cing spud pa bzhag par
137a6(mdo): bya'o// sna ma'i me tog gi gdu bu'i steng du mda' la ba tan btags pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi btsugs te/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa'i mda' dang / nor bu'i 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
137a7(mdo): dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o// de nas phyi rol kyi dkyil 'khor log zag tu/ sa dang sres pa'i lcibs dkyil 'khor byas la/ dri chab kyis bskus te/ cho sna lnga la srad pus thig btal la/ sgo bzhir rnam par phye
137a8(mdo): he ka seng ldeng gi phur bu'i tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi btab po// tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor bar bya'o// bum bu dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum drug bcu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs
137a9(mdo): kyis bka' ba bzhag go// kham por zlum po drug bcu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhag go// gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi so sor bzhag go// snod tshon sna lnga pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi khabs /
137b1(mdo): ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang / gtor ma gsod pa sna tshogs gzhag go/ yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang la/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag go/ 'bras
137b2(mdo): bu sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram mo// 'phreng ba brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du sbyang bar bya ste/ byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la drug bcu rtsa bzhi/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum bcu rtsa gnyis gdas
137b3(mdo): so// me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud par bya'o// gtor ma brgya drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / dkyil 'khor thog zag tu mar me bud par bya'o// chang dang sha dang / breg cong dang / sgog skya dang / kyi lu dang / tshod sngon dang /
137b4(mdo): la pug spangs po'i gtor ma gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya 'o// dkyil 'khor kyi phyi rol grwa bzhir don yod pa'i zhags dpa'i mdo sde klag par bya'o// sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes
137b5(mdo): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa klag par bya ste/ chos klog pa legs par zhus byas te/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyis bkris te/ cang ma la dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bskos pa'i gos yang ma bgos
137b6(mdo): te/ chos kyi stan shi nad tu brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dug nas/ tshig 'jam po 'jam pos tshig mnyen pos klag par bya'o// nub kyi phyogs chal dkyil 'khor mthon po la bde ba cad bkod pa bris pa/
137b7(mdo): 'od dpag myed dang / 'phags pa 'phyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa'i gzugs bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khomal mngon tu phyogs par gzhag par bya'o// shar phyogs chal
137b8(mdo): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mthon por byas A/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'khri bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon tu phyog
137b9(mdo): par bzhag go// sgo phyogs kyi cha la mi 'dra ba'i gnas mthon po byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa dang / den mang
138a1(mdo): pa'i zhags pa'i ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon tu 'phyogs par gzhag go// byang gi phyogs chal 'the bo'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / byams pa
138a2(mdo): dang / sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon tu phyogs par gzhag go// stegs bu'i rnam pa mthon por byas pa thams cad kyang legs par brgyan par bya'o// da kyi 'phreng bas brgyad pa bya'o// rgyan ces
138a3(mdo): cad kyis brgyan pa dang / bum pa gang bzhag pa dang / dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ro'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bzang ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi ro dbul ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
138a4(mdo): bsod snyoms bzhag pa dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ska dang / ka pur dang / gro rtsa dang / kur kum dang bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o// de nas
138a5(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du zhus bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang cho ga bya'o// / tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga/ tshang gi bar du
138a6(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / don yod pa rnam par
138a7(mdo): lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa la na nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
138a8(mdo): bya ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// zla ba nyar thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// tshes bco lnga'i nyin mtshan thog thag tu don yod
138a9(mdo): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dpag tu myed par bzlas brjod bya'o// mtshan thog zag tu bzlas brjod byas kyang ngal ba myed pa dang / lus snyoms pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o// byams pa dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i
138b1(mdo): bsam pa'i sems su bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zin nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / dkyil 'khor bsdam par byas nas//
138b2(mdo): de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dkyil 'khor kyi las zin nas/ mchod pa brtsam mo// mchod pa'i cho ga zin pa dang de nas/ de nas bzlas brjod
138b3(mdo): brtsam par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// bzlas brjod lan
138b4(mdo): nyi shu rtsa gcag dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar zhi pa 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byind par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'cha
138b5(mdo): ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug shind tu 'bar zhing 'od 'phro ba nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer can/ don yod pa'i zhags
138b6(mdo): pa'i tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon tu gshegs te/ phyogs bcur dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzigs shing / rigs sngags 'chang ba la legs
138b7(mdo): so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i phyi ba la bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor kyi mchog shin tu brgyan cing / sras pa 'di ni shin tu bzang ba yin te/ legs so legs
138b8(mdo): so// 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byid kyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa
138b9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams kyi gsang ba lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po rnams
139a1(mdo): kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdud thams cad 'pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor bkyegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'joms pa/ bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge/
139a2(mdo): sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / mtha' na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya yang rung ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcod ro ba las sgrol ba yin no// 'di ni
139a3(mdo): sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / nad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'che ba las yongs su tha rad par byed cing / 'jigs pa myed pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin no//
139a4(mdo): 'di ni rnam par tha rad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po dang / gsang sngags su bcas pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rigs
139a5(mdo): sngags 'chang ba de dang / des myong brjod pa dang / gang dran pa tsam la satshogs pa dang / lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / myang 'dzind pa yang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu rgol bar 'gyur ro// phyir
139a6(mdo): myi ldog pa nyid dus bcu bgrod nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro// de gang zhe na/ gapo zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mthong du
139a7(mdo): mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzungs 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod byed pa dang / klog pa dang / dran pa dang / 'chad pa dang / lan 'ga' spyad pas mthong ba dang / thang cag
139a8(mdo): dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam gyis mthong ba ni pa dang mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa yin no zhes pa smra'o// bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang 'dzin te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
139a9(mdo): 'das pal yin pas/ rgya bor 'akur bar bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang bas zung shig dang / mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang / li ltar yid la le ba dang / bsam pa// de thams cad rjes su gzung zhing spyod par
139b1(mdo): mdzad do// de'i tshe rigs sngags 'chang bas yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting ge
139b2(mdo): 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan ya grang ka'i klung gi bye sa dang mnyam pa zag zhig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyis nam ma'al la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor na
139b3(mdo): dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni/ dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par/
139b4(mdo): 'gyur ba'i phyir myi ldog par thob par 'gyur ba yin/ lung bstan da pa dang / byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin// de ni mngal na gnas par skye ba'i tha ma ste/ phyis mngal na gnus pa'i rdzi
139b5(mdo): mas gos par myi 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de pad ma'i nang nas brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kun
139b6(mdo): tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// don pa'i rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po/ rnam par grol po'i la 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po/
139b7(mdo): chos kyi 'khom lo bskor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha ton byed na/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhibad/ byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs par mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshes
139b8(mdo): pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar legs so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs par skyes pa yin pas legs so legs so// phyir myi ldog par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
139b9(mdo): las rab tu gnas pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum phrag bye bas mdzes par gyur cing / bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i/
140a1(mdo): phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas/ spyi bor 'jog cing dbugs 'byind par yang mdzad do// byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du chos kyi 'brel pa'i gtam mngon sum du sgrogs par mdzad do//
140a2(mdo): za na dkyil 'khor chen po rol mo'i sgra rnga bo che dang / dza bran dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rol mo'i sgra gang dag/ grag pa la sems can gang dag gis sgra de zos nas/ na ba'i bu ga tsam du song ba de thams cad phyir myi ldog par 'gyur
140a3(mdo): zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// zan byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// de ltar na
140a4(mdo): rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul pa yin no// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung
140a5(mdo): bdage sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rig/ sa sam/ dmangs rigs dang / 'ga' zhig gis/ rnam par// grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa
140a6(mdo): dang / sems can gang gis sgra de thos nas/ sgra dbyangs de dang myi zos pa rna ba'i bu kar song bar gyurd pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa myi bzad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pa dang /
140a7(mdo): sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi sras zhu bo yin no// rtag par 'phags pa byar
140a8(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu dbugs 'byin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjes su srung bar mdzad do// sems can ga pa'i
140a9(mdo): dkyil 'khor de lis phyogs su song ste/ sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs shing / skri pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro//
140b1(mdo): de'i sa'i rdul rlung gis 'das te/ de'i lus la phog pa gang yin pa de yang / tha na sems can ngan pa yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir myi ldog pa mi gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad las yongs
140b2(mdo): su klos pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar
140b3(mdo): 'gyur ro// sgra thams cad kyis bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ltar na smra thos pa tsam dang / myi nga 'jan pa
140b4(mdo): tsam gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par gros ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sregs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing / sdug bsngal drag po las
140b5(mdo): rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya ma/ tshe dang / 'khor ba las sgrol bar 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi sngo// ka pa'i gnas bla na myed par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa
140b6(mdo): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na myed pa ston/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' ston pa/ lha'i stegs sbyin sregs byas pa tsam gyi mad
140b7(mdo): da mi da / dang / 'an dang/ dang / ga ga po dang / dang / tsun nga / / gas la gyis/
140b8(mdo): thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// the com myed par lga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam mthal ldi dang / phyi 'am ci dang / lto phyi chen po dad/ srin po dang / ba dang / thul bum
140b9(mdo): thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mo sa rigs sngags 'ding ba'i napa pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do// de bzhin du nyid mtshan kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur lo// rgyam po chen po pazhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid
141a1(mdo): bo dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu yang phyogs bcur srung bar byed do// myi srung ba ma rungs par seld cing / dmyal ba dang 'jigs pa myi bzad pa dang / dug drag po dang / sems can ma rungs
141a2(mdo): pa rnams seld par byed do// de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun dang / bsod nams chen po'i phung po bla na myed pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan srang nyi shu dang / a ga ru srang lnga dang / du rus skra srang bdun dang /
141a3(mdo): ga phur dang / gla mau srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang / gur kum srang gcig dang / lce pog kun tu ru srang lnga dang / gu kul srang bdun dang / 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te phye mar byas la kha ra dkar po dang / sbrang rtsis
141a4(mdo): r-i lu zho re'i tshad tsam tu ba stong rtsa brgyad dang / nyungs kar dang / 'bras yos sres te/ r-i lu dang bsres nas mar gyi nang du spyugs te/ spyan bsregs bya'o// shing su ra 'bye dang / shing a rka dang /
141a5(mdo): shing sha myi yam sreg shing gi ma sbar te/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o// gang dang kong gi tshe/ stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sregs byas na/ de dang de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa drag po thams cad sreg par 'gyur ro//
141a6(mdo): de de'i tshe/ nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
141a7(mdo): rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / rmongs rigs la batshogs pa thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / byur thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad
141a8(mdo): dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyod pa dang / shags 'gyed pa thams cad de/ rang gi 'khor dang / gzhan gyi 'khor 'jigs pa thams cad dang / phyir/
141a9(mdo): rgol ba'i dgra 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / bol pa dang / mye rgod dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can
141b1(mdo): de dag thams cad 'jigs pa myed par 'gyur ro// bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag kyis de'i dri tshor
141b2(mdo): ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir myi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tsha brjes nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'dzin kyis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// pad mo
141b3(mdo): 'i nang du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// byol song kyi skye gnas su rtogs pa rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par
141b4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur zhing / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar sprin sregs byed pa de lta de ltar de'i lus tri ma myed cing yongs su dag par
141b5(mdo): 'gyur ro// stong rtsa brgyad tshang na/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma / po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag
141b6(mdo): gis rigs sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rigs sngags 'chang ba legs so legs so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog rnam par grol
141b7(mdo): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sregs kyi cho ga yin no// 'di ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'jom pa'i sgyid sregs chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed
141b8(mdo): byed dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i sbyin sregs chen po'i cho ga yon no// 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sregs chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni byang chub
141b9(mdo): kyi lam bla na byed pa yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser ki kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i mgo bo'i skye ba la phyag 'jog par mdzad do//
142a1(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi rol nyid rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ nad mad pa'i nags pa dang / tshangs pa'i mabyad pa dgu srupa mo'i cod pan gyis bskrun pa/ dang / mdung /
142a2(mdo): rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs pa rigs sngags 'chang ba'i mdun na bzhugs te bka' stsos pa/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las
142a3(mdo): 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legs so legs so// zung shig dang / mchog ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas 'chang bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog
142a4(mdo): smras pa na/ de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+ya na ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i mgo bo'i s+yai 'os phyag bzhag pa dang / phyag bzhag ma thag tu rigs
142a5(mdo): sngags 'chang ba nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// phyogs/ bcul sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon gsum du/ mthong ba thob par
142a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// phyir myi ldog pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskurd pa thob par 'gyur ro//
142a7(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'cha
142a8(mdo): pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du mngon gsum du thos par 'gyur ro// de nas hom zhung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas/ bla na myed pa'i pad ma 'bye bar 'dra bar byas
142a9(mdo): pa/ zlum po gru gsum pa/ sa dang ba'i lci bas sras pa dang ldan par byas te/ pad ma'i snying po la gos khung zabs su brko ba dang / zad ka kun tu zhugang pa can pa par bya'o// nang du pad ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas
142b1(mdo): pa bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis pad ma de brgyan par bya'o// pad ma'i phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor klu bzhir byas la/ dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /
142b2(mdo): dngul gyi snod gangs bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi chus bkang ba gser gi snod bzhi dang / ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag pa ni/ gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis
142b3(mdo): gtor te/ 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs sbyangs la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu tshen sna lnga li ba dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang / sgo bzhi cha 'byes pa dang / bum pa bzhag pa ni legs par brgyan cing dra chus yongs su
142b4(mdo): bkang ba bya'o// sgo bzhir chos smra ba shind tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa klag par bya'o// grwa bzhir chos smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas/
142b5(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde klag par bya'o// gser gyi me/ tog dang / rdul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / rid/ po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bam
142b6(mdo): zhus byas/ gos rtsang ma bgos tI zhim pos bskos te/ rtsa mar byas la lo lu la dod yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// 'khro ba'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur
142b7(mdo): ro// don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brkyang bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas don yod pa'i 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying pos stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ phyi smra bar
142b8(mdo): rnams pa'i sems dang / snying zag pa nas 'che ba dang / snying rje bar bya ba ni las thun myed pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub semams dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
142b9(mdo): ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ oM pad ma pA NaM/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pad ma b+hu dze/ dz+wa la dzA la/ hu ta sha ne/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ bI mo kA/ b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/ sarba ba yan
143a1(mdo): a mo gA ba ni ba ra de/ hUM hUM ni daha/ pa lam sha ma sha ma ni/ lo kod ta ra ni/ sa yan ra sh+mi ba de/ tu ru tu ru/ pra ba re/ A mo g+hA sid d+hi/ au b+hu b+ha ba/ na mo stu te swa ha//
143a2(mdo): de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi sbyin bsreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na myed pa yin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas rmad du byung ba chen po yi bya
143a3(mdo): ba thams cad bya'o// thal ba des gang gi lus la gos pa de ni sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// bral bar theg le byas na/ de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las tha rad par 'gyur ro//
143a4(mdo): zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / mtshan mo dang / nyan par dang / nam phyed pa dang / nyin phyed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims las lan
143a5(mdo): 'gal yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar myi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyur ro// tshogs mar thig le/ byas na/ gdod stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi las tha rad par 'gyur
143a6(mdo): ro// thams cad kyang phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro// thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gab tu lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang / sran po dang / 'byung
143a7(mdo): po dang / sha za dang / ya~M dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / brgyags dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ thams cad phyir 'bros so// phyogs kyi gnas dang lhung na slar 'ong bar myi
143a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// snying kar thig le byas na/ nad thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na/ lte ba'i nang kyi nad thams cad mod la sos par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa la

143b1(mdo): sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / shu bran mched dang / 'brum bu dang / sngags 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / me dpal dang / 'brum 'phran rnams byung na/ chu dron po dang sbyar te/ bskus la mar la lan bdun bzlas/

144a1(mdo): 'am/ dkon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun tu gtor na/ mtshams chen po bcad cing bzhi pa chen por 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor na/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad las
