155b9(mdo): bam po bcu drug pa// @/ de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgongs pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ oM zhes bya bar don yod/
156a1(mdo): oM AH/ ShA b+h+ya// po'i zhags pa'i pad ma gtsug tor kyi dkyil 'khom thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig mo 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bus dran par byas na/ sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//
156a2(mdo): sngon sdig pa bstsags pa sems can dmyal ba myi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ don thams cad kyi rjes
156a3(mdo): su 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gang dkyil 'khor kyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do// gsapa sngakra
156a4(mdo): oM zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba/ can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi yi ge ga cig pa'o// mAM pU yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa gnyis/ pa
156a5(mdo): thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi saspyan snga na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin bar mdzad/ sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/
156a6(mdo): sngon kyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing / nye bar gnas par 'gyur/ myi gang dang gang gyis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed par mya 'gyur/ tshe 'phos
156a7(mdo): nas ri gru 'dzind du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// AM pad me/ gsang sngags yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa gsum pa la yang dag par
156a8(mdo): 'jug par 'gyur/ pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur// 'phags pa pyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad cad mdun na bzhum/
156a9(mdo): par 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad mo'i gtsug tor kyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams
156b1(mdo): stond par mdzad// thams cad du dngos grub rjes su dran pa sbyin par mdzad do// AM pad ma hri/ gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin
156b2(mdo): gshegs pa mye 'azhugs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing / dpung pa brkyang nas phyag skye bor 'jog par mdzad la/ rigs sngags 'tshang la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/
156b3(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang tshur shog/ khyod kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shi nad tu dri ma myed par yongs su dag go// myi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas/ pa'i
156b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ phyir zhing rnams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos par myi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
156b5(mdo): pad ma b+hu dze/ gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i tha
156b6(mdo): ma rab tu stond par mdzad/ sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad para'agyur/ rigs sngags 'cha la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byu nad par 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so//
156b7(mdo): khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes ste/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod che brjes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du
156b8(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyed par 'gyur zhing / po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma tsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po ran
156b9(mdo): par phye ba grub cing / rigs sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang // sdig pa thams cad spangs kyis/ bya ba thams cad kyis shig yid la bya ba'i bsgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin
157a1(mdo): grub par 'gyur ro// oM pad ma pa lo ki te/ gsang sngags yi ge drug pa/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snapa /
157a2(mdo): swa/ mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi 'ams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon gsum du sbyinapa
157a3(mdo): par mdzang / dbugs 'byidad par mdzad ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan/ rigs sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs
157a4(mdo): 'byin par yadzad de/ rigs sngags 'jab pa'i sangs rgyas nas byang chub kyi snying po'i mapar zug gi bar du chu bshog/ sa byas pa ni go da tu yongs su pad cing / khyod kyis sems can myal ba'i smon
157a5(mdo): ni bcad/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon dang / rigs kyis+ye ni 'ong du chud/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa padam
157a6(mdo): gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas/ 'jig rten dang / 'dzegarten las 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa rnams/ ji ltar yid la byas
157a7(mdo): pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig/ oM pad ma dz+wa la hUM d+hika/ yi ge 'dun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin pad ma dri ma myed pa'i sgrib pa dang / bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/ ting
157a8(mdo): po 'dzin kang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer rin po che 'bar 'ang 'tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
157a9(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dang kang du 'od zer ring po che 'bar pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'ab pa las/ me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
157b1(mdo): thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma myed pa'i pad ma 'od zer 'bar ba'i gser gi mdog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rigs
157b2(mdo): sngags 'chang kyi spyi bo la 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba'ang 'byin la dbugs 'byind par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so// legs so// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas
157b3(mdo): brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug gtor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o// rigs sngags
157b4(mdo): 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad ma gtsug gtor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par phrul pa grub kyis/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song
157b5(mdo): la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig/ ongs mo kA ma Ni pad me gzungs sngags kyi snying po brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ lus shi nang tu yongs su dag cing / dri ma myed par 'gyur/ bzlam
157b6(mdo): brjod byas bcas kyis nor bu rin po che chen po shel ltar phyin pa shi dang tu yongs su dag ste/ de ltar rigs sngags 'chang kyi lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub
157b7(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'phyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongs su dag pa/ rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bo ston cing / rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la/ rigs sngags 'chang yang dag par
157b8(mdo): dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i dgyi bor 'jog par mngadu// legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'cha legs so// lags so// rigs sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa
157b9(mdo): bsam pa dpal dga' las zhugs so// rigs sngags 'chab sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'bresad pa'i 'jig rted rnam par lta bar chu shog/ der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// byed
158a1(mdo): kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ oM pad ma lo can
158a2(mdo): hu ru hU~M/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
158a3(mdo): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rigs sngags 'chang la mngon gsum du ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par skul pa sna tshogs stond par mdzad/ rigs sngags 'chang gi
158a4(mdo): byi/ bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad legs so zhes bya ba'i yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang chen po legs so// legs so// khyod kyis ngal zhing sbyang ba'i las legs par bsgrub pa byas so//
158a5(mdo): khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas/ nyid du bsgrub pa grub ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa dang / mdo sde lung dang bcas pa bsgrub pa
158a6(mdo): 'jig rten gi 'dren pas bstand pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad grub pa yin no// AM pad mo ShI sha bi ma le hU~M phaT// / gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ phyir myi ldog
158a7(mdo): pa nyid du gyur nas/ sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang myi'i myi skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur// don
158a8(mdo): yod pa pad ma tsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ the tsom myi bya'o// gsang sngags bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na myed pa 'di ni/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa bzlas
158a9(mdo): brjod tsam gyis grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhed pa/ rtsang ma cang sgrar spyod pa/ gos rtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje skyes pa/ bden pa smra ba/ bla ma la
158b1(mdo): gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang / slob dpos la rtag tu mchod 'byed pa 'di ni/ bzlas brjod kyi chog yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na myed pa bstand to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
158b2(mdo): chen po yag na rdo rje/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bzhin rab tu 'dzum la/ rdo rje bskor bzhin du mgo btud nas smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po gsang sngags
158b3(mdo): kyai gzhi don yod yi na/ a ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po rgyas pa 'di ni shi nad tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po re re po 'di dag ni/ bzlas brjod tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/
158b4(mdo): s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod bsgrub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ nyen zhag gcig bsnyen gnas la gnas shing / zas bslangs pa
158b5(mdo): dang / 'bras bu dang / ldum bu dang / rtsa ba bza' ba zos nas/ rigs sngags 'di bsgrubs na/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ s+yan ras
158b6(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje nyin zhag gcig spyang ba la gnas shing / nyin zhag gcig tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/
158b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dge sbyong mgo bregs pa/ rigs kyis 'tshe ba bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud myed de/
158b8(mdo): khye'u'am/ bu mo 'am/ dza'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gapa la la skad cig/ zang cig yud tsam 'am/ dus tshigs gcig gam/ duso chags gnyis sam/ dus tshigs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzha
158b9(mdo): myi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma tsug tor gyi snying po 'khro bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par phye ba/ gzungs sngags chen po bcu po 'di lan cig dran nam/ klog gam/ myong bzung ba yang dran nam// lags
159a1(mdo): rdo rje dus tshigs gcig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang de'i mtshams myed pa byed pa mnar myed par gzhol ba/ bskal par gnas pa yang de'i thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa bsachags pa/
159a2(mdo): rnams zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs su dag cing dri ma myed par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rje ba 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/
159a3(mdo): tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ bskal dpa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad bcu 'khor los sgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur/ bskal dpa bye ba 'bum phrag brgya bcur 'jog
159a4(mdo): rten gyi 'ams bde ba can du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun bcum
159a5(mdo): gnyis su/ 'jig rten gi kha mas 'jig rten rnam par gzi/ gas par skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// / bskal da pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis su nor bu 'chang ba'i 'khor
159a6(mdo): los sgyur bar 'gyur// bskal pa khri phrag brgyad bcur 'pha gas pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri glu 'dzind du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal da pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur
159a7(mdo): 'og byin gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad bcur dgal ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum du sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du brgya byin nyid byed pa/
159a8(mdo): 'gyur// bskal pa/ 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la 'gyod par 'gyur te/ nams kyang
159a9(mdo): ma'i mngal du skye bar myi 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ laka na rdo rje de ltar rigs sngags san cig dran pa tsas gyis dge ba
159b1(mdo): ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyu'o// lag na rdo rjegs te gang zhig zhagacig gapa/ lan cig sprub las gnas te/ bzlas 'arjod dang bcas pa byed na/ lag na rdo rje de ni mi 'di nyid la myi'i bdag nyid kyi
159b2(mdo): nyid sgrib pa dang bral nas/ dod yod pa chen po jis myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'gral bo// don yod rnams par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzid dpon po/ pad+ma sa gtsug tom mtha byin/
159b3(mdo): pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob po// dod yod pa'i 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba grub pa thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang
159b4(mdo): kwa'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i sa pa bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod rnams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ re rjes nas 'jadag rten gyi 'ams bde ba can du pad ma dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur
159b5(mdo): 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho go zhib mo/ don yod pa pad ma cug tor gyi dkyil 'kho tshig zhing mo mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par 'arton
159b6(mdo): tu lobs par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad ma tsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste
159b7(mdo): bsgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan
159b8(mdo): 'das don yod pa'i pad ma tsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i 'gas pa'i snying po'i bya ba'i cho ga dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa bshad par gsolang// bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'chang kun gyi
159b9(mdo): grub pa bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na bshad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin
160a1(mdo): gyi sde dpon po lag na rdo rjel 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par byas pa nyon cig// lag na rdo rdzogs pa sngags rtsa ba dod yod pa'i zhags pa/ pad ma
160a2(mdo): gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rigs sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa
160a3(mdo): yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas/ sems can thams cad la dmyigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung / ngan song gsum du skye bar myi 'gyur te/
160a4(mdo): sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams kyi gnas de dag myed de/ de ltar sems can thams cad bsgrub pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// san gnyis
160a5(mdo): brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis dug dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras/ dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa las gcog+sa
160a6(mdo): pa rnams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// lan bzhi brjod pa tsam gyis/ dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad seld par 'gyur ro// lan lnga brjod pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang /
160a7(mdo): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro// lan drug brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi bas
160a8(mdo): 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de lta bas na/ sems can thams cad kyi don du nyid re zhing / gzhan myi smra bar lan bdun dran par bya'o//
160a9(mdo): sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar shi ba dang / dge slong gapal la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la gus par/ ma byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma rtsang ma blangs la/
160b1(mdo): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dur khrod dam/ ro bsregs pa'am/ mchad pa der bye ma gtor bar bya'o// gang dang gang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod par bye ma gtor ma thag tu/ de dang der bye ma bab pa'i sems can
160b2(mdo): de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha zar skyes pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi skye gnas su skyes na/ de de'i mod la tshe rjes nas/ thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur zhing / nams kyang sems
160b3(mdo): can dmyal bar gzhol bar myi 'gyur ro// yang na gro ba la bris nas/ mchod rten kyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang gnyis pa 'am/ rkang bzhi pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad grib ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig
160b4(mdo): pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro// tha na r-i dgas dang / bya dang / ldang sko skad dang / ne 'u li dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / khyi dang /
160b5(mdo): ru sbal dang / lag 'gro dang / sbyin 'khor de la grib ma bab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhog
160b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// dupa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ gnas mthon por bus na sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / r-i dgas dang / bya dud
160b7(mdo): 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la
160b8(mdo): gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum bzung ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa'i de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas/ sems can de dag thams cad phyir myi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na myed pa
160b9(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur la/ tshe rjes nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// tsan dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas
161a1(mdo): dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdugs nas/ gang dag der bsnams pa'i sems can de dag
161a2(mdo): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos gos la bdugs nas/ rang gi lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang slob pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus la bab pa tsam gyis ji
161a3(mdo): ma/ dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// gos bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyis gos de bdugs nas/ rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor du zhugs na/ rgyal
161a4(mdo): po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na/ dge slong sa
161a5(mdo): cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'os par 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i/ nang du zhugs na/ nor chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / mtsho/ da pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro// ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i'
161a6(mdo): bdugs nas gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mod la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed do// gu gul dang bsres nas/ lha mo/
161a7(mdo): mdun du bdug par bya zhing / gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdud byab pa byas na/ mod la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang kyi mdun du 'dug nas/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed
161a8(mdo): ngo // bo la dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul bsres nas/ sed myed kyi bu'i mdun tu bdug par bya zhing / gsang sngags rtsa ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lus kyi yan lag dag la byab pa byas na/ sred byed kyi bu rang gi gzuH/
161a9(mdo): kyis mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed la/ dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed do// yungs kar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la bdug cing / gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi byab pa byas
161b1(mdo): na tshangs pa rang gyi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug la mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// pad ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas/ nag po chen po dang / mang po'i tshogs la bdugs na/ nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i
161b2(mdo): tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / mchog dang bya ba bsgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag pus pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang / bsres pa'i 'dug pa klu'i mtshor bdug cing /
161b3(mdo): gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun nyungs kar la bzlas brjod byas na/ klu'i mchor gtor na/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing / dran par byas na/ klu dang / klu mo dang / klu'i bu pho dang /
161b4(mdo): klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la 'dud cing / gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// lan
161b5(mdo): gsum sbyar na/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yang 'ong ngo // klu'i rgyal po dka' bo dang / nye dga' bo'ang 'ong zhing / thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur da nas 'dug go// gnod sbyin
161b6(mdo): dang / srin po dgug par 'dod pas/ dur khrod kyi nang du myi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas bdugs la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dran na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po
161b7(mdo): dag rgyug cing 'ong la/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la btud nas/ rje btsun bka' so la cig ces zer ba dang / de bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin byas na/ bsgo ba thams cad byed la/ mngag pa'i las
161b8(mdo): byed par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug go// zod pa sbyar ba la san bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ bdugs pas bdugs na/ 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing / thams cad dbang du
161b9(mdo): 'gyur la/ las byed par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas/ btsag gis gnod sprin mo bris la/ pa lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas par phyes pad ma'i ri mo bra zhing / phye'i gtor ma pad ma
162a1(mdo): lta bur byas pa bzhag la/ bdug pa 'dis bdug cing / gsang sngagasartsa ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas/ nyungs kamal lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ gnod sbyin mo la bdeg pa/
162a2(mdo): byas na/ gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / lho'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la slar yang 'ong ste/ don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur ro// yang na ma'am/ chung ma
162a3(mdo): 'am/ sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas na bu la stug pas longs spyod dang gzhal myed khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su skyong bar byed do// gal te sring mor byas na
162a4(mdo): rnam zos la 'gran par 'gyur ro// gal te chung mar byas na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spyod la rtser 'jug par byed do// lha mo dpal la bdugs na/ gsang
162a5(mdo): sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing / lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs na/ lha mo chen mo dpal rang gyi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / nor gyi phung po chen po 'bul bar byed
162a6(mdo): de/ de nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing / nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na/ gser srang stong sbyin par byed do// nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na/ gser
162a7(mdo): ga dong ce stong sbyin par byed do// tshal gseb du bdugs na/ tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / rdzas dang / sman thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug go// ri rnams la dus
162a8(mdo): na/ mA dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / dzas thams cad 'bab par 'gyur ro// grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnams su bdugs na/ grong khyer kun tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / nad thams
162a9(mdo): cad dang / 'bab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'brog tu bdugs na/ rkun ma dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / sbrul dang /
162b1(mdo): dred dang / dom gyis 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar gyi 'gyur zhing / ri dgas gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar gyi 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad las tha rang bar 'bru/
162b2(mdo): ro// / sdig pa thams cad 'byebs pa/ tsan dan gyi gdug pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// / de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par bya ste/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i/
162b3(mdo): gsang sngags bsgrub pa ni nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / mtshungs shing skar ma la skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po rnam par 'phes
162b4(mdo): lo// lha rnams kyi dpar lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / bya ba 'dug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur gyis/ rigs sngags 'chang gis the tsom kyi
162b5(mdo): bya'o// bral ba'i steng du thig le byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin/ te/ nyi ma ltar 'od gzer gyi dra ba stod kyis gsal zhing shel/ ltar dag la/ mdog dkar sham tri zhim pa dang / glang po che'i bya
162b6(mdo): la dang / phral ba dang / ba glang gi gnas ltar skyon myed cing mnyam bar mthun la/ shi na tu dul ba dang dpon cig pu'i nor buragyurd cing / gsang sngags 'bum bzlas pa leg pa sgrub cing
162b7(mdo): gser dang gos ltar kun tu 'bar ba ni mig ye yin no// sbyin mtshams kyi bar 'phrul pa na/ shin tu phra ba rtag tu rtag par mdzes pa ni/ zla ba nyal mkha' la 'gro ba lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na gsal
162b8(mdo): ba ni/ rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zla ba dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na/ lha rnams kyi rgyal po brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na mi 'jig rten gyi rgyal po gdugs gcig pa ltar 'bar ba yin/
162b9(mdo): 'jig rten pa'i nang na gdugs gcig pa bde bar gshegs pa ltar shin tu dul ba yin la/ shag kya'i rigs kyi rgyud ltar sems can thams cad sa phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du/ nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni//
163a1(mdo): sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gcig pu ltar mchog dang / rab mchog sems can thams cad kyi don tu sbyin
163a2(mdo): bar byed de/ de ltar thig le nor bu'i mthu ni/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po dbang po dbang du 'gyur bar rjes
163a3(mdo): su 'gro ba dang / tra ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myo 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dod par 'gyurd pa/ thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni/ nam mkhal la skar ma ltar bral bar rtag tu dbang du
163a4(mdo): gyu rad pa yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu 'dud la myes myi tshig/ chu'i sa myi khyer cing / lus/ la dug dang / sbyar ma'i dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / byad myi brdza
163a5(mdo): pa dang / ngan sngags dang / sdang ba'i rnam pas myi tshugs par 'gyur te/ nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rims dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad
163a6(mdo): dang / rlung dang / glad nad ched po la thig le byas pa lta bur mod la/ de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can btson du bzung ba 'am/ chad pas bcad pa 'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la
163a7(mdo): thig ye lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las za rad par 'gyur/ spyan mtshams bral bar thig le byas na/ de'i mod la gnod sbyin stong dang / srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon stong phrag rnams lus la 'jug
163a8(mdo): par myi 'gyur zhing / glang po che dang / ri dgas kyi bdag po'i khru dang / chom rkun dang / shod kyi lam dang / raM 'i lam dang / r-i sul dang / ngam grog dang / glog dang / grang ba dang / sbrul dang / snga 'jigs kyi 'jig
163a9(mdo): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / 'thab mo dang / tha snyad mo nyid la zhi bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe
163b1(mdo): nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang yin pa dang / thig le yang byas na/ 'khor lo la byugs/ la phyi rol kyi dmaka tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na/ bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
163b2(mdo): las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham par byas par 'gyur zhing / phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// thig le byas na/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/
163b3(mdo): rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyurd nas/ nye bar 'khod do// ji srid mtsho'i bar du mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang / yan lag tu thig
163b4(mdo): le byas na/ thams cad du rgyal ba thob cing / reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/ don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri lu dag ni khar bcug nas/ lhan cig
163b5(mdo): 'dug la smras nas ni/ thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am/ dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang // rgyal rigs dang ni dmang rigs nyid// skyes pa dang ni bud myed
163b6(mdo): dang // khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang rung // de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// kun tu mngag pa'i las rnams byed// r-i lu zos pa tsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig/
163b7(mdo): gang ni nyid da pa'i rims// gang dag 'od skyem nad kyis nyams// gang zhig rtag pa'i rims kyis btab// gang du 'bab mo 'byung ba dang // de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can// bdag la grib gnon gzhan grig
163b8(mdo): gnod// skyes byed skyes pa brjed byed dang // gang zhig gzhan gyi bzad pa dang // sdig pa'i las ni kun tu spyod// sngon gyi las ni myi bzad pa// de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jig/ ri sul zhus byas tsam
163b9(mdo): gyis ni// 'bras dang shu bar 'gyur rnams dang // lhog pa dang ni rkang shu dang // mtshan par rdol dang me dpal dang // khye dze mdze dang rkang pa'i nang // mr-i bzad de rnams kun dang ni// gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin//
164a1(mdo): byugs pa tsam gyi mod la ni// thams cad duka myed zhi bar 'gyur// r-i lu thams cad las byed pa// lha rdzas shi ba sos par 'gyur// r-i lu dag ni 'chang byed cing // thig le dag ni byas pa
164a2(mdo): yaMs// thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thob// thams cad du ni nor dag 'du// dpal 'dod pa ni dpal 'thob cing // 'bru 'dod 'bru'i phung po 'phel// lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing // klu rnams dag
164a3(mdo): ni dga' dang bcas// gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang // lha myin mkha' lding myi'am ci// lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang // 'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas// rtag tu phyag rgya gnas 'gyur zhing // zas
164a4(mdo): cad dbang du 'gyur nas 'khod// 'khor kun dran byed ci bya zar// gang zhig ri lu de dag stond// ri lu zag la rtag byed la// de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad// 'phags pa s+yan ras
164a5(mdo): gzigs kyi dbang // de la nyin rig la rtag tu ni// mtsho// ka sprin dus kun gzegs par mdzad// bsod nams phung // po stong dag ni// nyi ma re re stsogs par byed// 'jig rten pa
164a6(mdo): 'i bde spyod cing // 'jig rten pha rol shi nad tu bad// tshe rje ba ni 'phos nas su// bde ba can du mod la 'gro// gang dang gang du skye bar ni// tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran// lag na
164a7(mdo): de rje gnod sbyin che// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // g.yel ba myed par nyin mtshan du// dus kun tu ni srung ba dang // skyo ba dang sbed dang bsrung bar byed// gang zhig bu ni myed pa dang // bud myed
164a8(mdo): bu ni 'dod pa la/ raM u gcig cig sbyar nas su// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags ni// mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi ngor// 'bum ni tshang bar bzlas nas su// zla ba nya ste bco lnga la// skyes pa bud
164a9(mdo): myed zhus bya zhing // yan lag yan lag zig le bya// dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing // bram ze dag kyang mchod ston sbyin// bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas su// gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsha//
164b1(mdo): bdag nyid rgyan kyis brgyan nas ni// gos rtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas// snying rje sems can sdug par byed// bsam pa dag cing nges pa dang // bla ma rtag tu gus
164b2(mdo): par bya// me tog sna tshogs rab dgram zhing // spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang // du rus tsan dan sa la ki// lha'i bdug pas bdug bya zhing // pu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni// ri lu legs sbyar bza' bar
164b3(mdo): bya// gsang ba 'odi 'thungs mod la ni// bdud dang kha zas bza' bar bya// mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin mdzad pa mchog rab bya// byams mdzad de'i zhabs drung du// mtshan
164b4(mdo): mo nyal dang nang par ni// mthong ba mchog ni thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi dbang mchog sprin rang gzu gas ston mdzad cing // mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad/
164b5(mdo): bud myed de ni bu skyed cing // gzugs bzang mchog tu blta na stug/ stobs ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// / lha'i dpal ni rjes su 'gro// chos ldan mkhas shing gsal
164b6(mdo): ba dang // tshe ring dbang phyug tshad myed 'gyur// dpa' bo dgra/ las rgyal ba dang // sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyu ra// yang na dran pa'i blo skyed par 'dod pas// thos pa la brten
164b7(mdo): nas 'dug cing // rigs sngags 'chang thang ma des zhag bdun du nyin ra zhing / mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ri lu bdun bcug ste/ zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol tu/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas
164b8(mdo): nas// 'jam tsam pa 'thungs la// phyis kha zas bzal bar bya/ zhag bdun gyis zos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsugs par 'gyur te/ bstan chos thams cad dang / chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang
164b9(mdo): snyan dngags dang / bda' srod pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i snga dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /
165a1(mdo): skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos mngon pa dang / rtsis dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thams cad kha ton tu lobs par 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu
165a2(mdo): rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba byas na/ stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis/ pha rol gnod par 'gyur te/ glang po che'i khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig tsam sbyar ba byas na/ lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer
165a3(mdo): ma dang / sgra kar spangs la ska lcang lo 'khril zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro// lo gcig tu sbyar na/ lha'i sman bcud kyis lo nad mchog la 'jug cing / nam mkha'
165a4(mdo): steng du lha rnams dang lhan cig mthun par rgyu la/ brgya byin dang / yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i gzhal myed khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ rin po che sna bdun
165a5(mdo): kyai gzhal myed khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyur ro// nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed// gzi brjid 'bar bshi nad tu gsal ba mya bzod
165a6(mdo): cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba la the tsom myi bya'o// las thams cad bsgrub pa'i thig le dang / ri lu bsgrub pa'i tshe ga ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas myi snang bar bya ba dang /
165a7(mdo): nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub pa bshad par bya ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na nyid yin no// sman dngul chu dang / pra mI kI ra dang / su ban ni k+ki ra
165a8(mdo): dang / shel sngo bsangs dang / kugaHkrI dang / su gan d+hi dang / king ku d+ha skyon myed dang / ud pa la bzang po dang / pad maka kA dang / gu kul dang / phe lu pa tra dang / gur kum dang / na ga pus h+la dang / 6
165a9(mdo): pa dang / spang spos dang / shi ri sha'i me tog dang / tsan dan dkar po dang bcas pa bsres nas/ zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma la/ don yod pa'i pad ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis
165b1(mdo): shaM na da tu brtson par/ lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing / 'khro bo li gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig ma lan 'bum bzlas brjod/
165b2(mdo): bya/ de'i tshe gzungs sngags bcu po/ so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas/ sman don yod pa'i rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog
165b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du/ bzhag la grib ma la skams par bya'o// yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis/ lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas// snod
165b4(mdo): kyi nang du bcug nas/ nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ thams cad du bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mar gyur pas/ lus legs par zhus byas la
165b5(mdo): spos chus byugs te/ gos gtsang mar bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog 'di nyungs mar gyis spras la/ rang gi lus la byug/ par bya ste/ lhan cig bskus pa tsam gyis myi snang bar 'gyur/
165b6(mdo): gnas gsang bar bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par 'gyur/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang //
165b7(mdo): srin po dang / sha za las spogs pa'i rtse bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas/ las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad
165b8(mdo): kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad la thams cad na 'dug la/ klu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun du 'bod nas/ bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing / las su
165b9(mdo): bya ba dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ji srid mtsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing / nyin mtshan du gnas la/ de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// sman la sing ha dzi hra dang / ba'i 'o ma dang /
166a1(mdo): sbyar bas mgo kun byugs na/ ji ltar yid la byas pa dang / rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs stond par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin stond par byed/ gnas
166a2(mdo): su gtogs pa thams cad 'khor gyi na na ji ltar rnam par skuld pa'i gzugs sna tshogs stond par byed/ ci srid mtsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams stond par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do// spos kyi zil mar dang spus na?
166a3(mdo): byin pa dang rkang pa la bskus na/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyural gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhang nams kyang phyir sa la rkang pa 'jog par myi 'gyur
166a4(mdo): lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na/ gang dang gapa la reg pa de 'ong bar 'gyur la/ sus kyang mthong bar myi 'gyur/ bud myed gzhon 'o ma dang bsres nas/ myig la bskus nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du
166a5(mdo): zhugs na mthong bar myi 'gyur zhing / don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed// do// don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang myi mthong ngo // bud// myed gang dang 'phrad na sus kyang myi mthong la/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du
166a6(mdo): 'dug kyang sus kyang myi shes so// khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / gzhad rgad byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs pa byas pa byas pa thams cad byed la/ lus ni sus kyang myi mthong ngo // bu
166a7(mdo): pa la byugs nas chus bkang na/ chu'i rgyud snang la bum pa de ni myi mngon no// gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus su byugs na/ chu de gang bar snang la bum pa de ni myi snang ngo // bdag nyid la byugs na/ bum pa
166a8(mdo): chus bkang ba lag na thogs na/ bum pa las chus 'byung ba ni snang la/ myi de'i lus ni myi snang ngo // myig la bskus nas/ skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na/ myi mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgra ni zos shing rang gi
166a9(mdo): sus ni mying mngon no// gnas su gtogs pa de thams cad du zhugs na/ rang gi lus zhus ma byas kyi bar du myi mthong ngo // su yang rung ba'i myig la bskus na/ de dag thams cad myi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / gang
166b1(mdo): dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der myi snang bar 'gyur la/ zhus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro// sus kun bskus nas/ mdzod chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ myi mthong bar 'gyur la gser dang / dngul dang /
166b2(mdo): 'bru men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byu ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / rdo rje dang / bye du r+ya dang / mar kad dang / mabon ka dang / kos dang / skud pa dang / rgyan dang / lbab lbub gang yang rung
166b3(mdo): bo nyid 'dod na/ thams cad blangs nas song na/ sus kyang myi mthong la/ gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du zhus ma byas pa de srid du rang myi mtho ba la zhus byas na/ thams cad du mthong ngo //
166b4(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang bud myed kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pas/ rtsang mas zhus bya'o// de nas spos chus zhus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o// yang gur kum gyiHzhus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba
166b5(mdo): rnam lngas khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu spos kyi til mar dang lha/ na cig bsres pa des lus bsku bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bud myed gzho nu'i zho dang sbyar bas myig bskas na/ de nas ri
166b6(mdo): lu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdags par bya'o// de nas rko/ sa rtsang ma bgos nas/ gsang sngags brjod cing dran par bya sa la/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na myi mthong bar 'gyur te/
166b7(mdo): lus sus kyang myi mthong ngo / nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu zhus byas la/ bud myed dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la yongs
166b8(mdo): su spyod par byed kyang sus kyang myi shes la// 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na/ sus kyang glags myi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas kyi bar du/ rang gi lus myi snang bar 'gyur ro// phug tu 'jug na lus kun spos kyi
166b9(mdo): til mar gyis byugs nas/ phug tu zhugs na phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la/ ji lta ji ltar las su bya ba da lta de ltar gyis shig/ chu'i nang du zhugs na/ ji ltar khyim gyi
167a1(mdo): nang na 'dug pa bzhin chus myi rlan la/ chus gos par yang myi 'gyur ro// mye'i nang du zhugs na/ myes lus la myi reg cing / tsan dan ltar bsil bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na/ gnas
167a2(mdo): na 'khod pa rnams kyis de myi mthong kyis/ ji ltar rang gi yid la las su bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig/ myi snang bar bya ba ri lu bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//
167a3(mdo): 'phags pa don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po / phyag rgya gsum ni rnam stsal pa/
167a4(mdo): phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan// bzang po gtso bo chen po ste/ mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no// phyag rgya gya nom bla na myed/ 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin// snying po 'di nyid gyur pa
167a5(mdo): ste// phyag rgya dkyil chen legs par bsgrubs// sangs rgya// sa byang chub phyag rgya 'di// dus gsum gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs// kun gyis 'di ni byin kyis brlabs// phyag
167a6(mdo): rgya dus gsum gshegs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa phyag rgyar btab// de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa// thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil gyi//
167a7(mdo): gsang nyid kun tu zhugs pa yin// de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid// dngos grub bla myed bshad par bya// / oM ma mo gA hrid ya/ pad ma U Sh+NI Sha/ sa d+ha ya b+ha ra sa ma bA ra/ mahA
167a8(mdo): pad me sa sa// bskul ba dang / phyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM pad+ma ma u Sh+NI lam mo g+ha/ man pA le hUM// dkyil 'khor srung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams band
167a9(mdo): ba'i dang / dri chab dang / chu dang / yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o// au pad ma shi kha re phuM/ s+yai drug bcing ba yin te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// IM pad ma u shi
167b1(mdo): a mo g+ha dza le hUM/ zhus bya ba'i sngags te/ yungs kar dang / tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM bi ma la shud d+he hUM/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so// oM sang tshad ya pad me hUM/ gos bko pa
167b2(mdo): 'i sngags so// oM mi li mi li shud d+he hU~M/ lus yongs su sbyang ba'i sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i mul lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM pad ma u Shi ka a mo g+ha/ a b+hi shin tsa/ ad ma shud d+he hUM/
167b3(mdo): dbang bskur ba'i sngags te/ dr-i chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// AM pad ma ka ba tse/ dri Da ban d+ha hUM dza la swa ha// go cha'i sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM badz+ra a d+hiSh+Tha
167b4(mdo): na pad me hUM/ byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la pame d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ sa'i sngags so// oM pad ma a shra ya/ ha tsal tsa la hUM/ gdan gyi sngags so// oM dang bya pad me hUM
167b5(mdo): me tog gi sngags so// au pa da ma a mo g+ha sam b+ha ra ni sra ha/ bdug spos kyi sngags so// IM pad ma gAn d+ha aM sha ra hU~M/ byug spos kyi sngags so// IM pad ma pra kir ne/ d+ha ra ni sa ma
167b6(mdo): swa ha/ 'bras yos dang me tog dgram pa'i sngags so// pad ma dza le su g+han d+ha pa ti hU~M/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so// oM shug la ba sems la gud d+he hUM/ lha bshos kyi sngags
167b7(mdo): so// oM su ru su ru/ kum b+ha ba ti swa ha/ gtor ma'i sngags so// oM pad ma a shri mes 'ang+ga ya hUM/ gtor mthar gzhug pa'i sngags so// A~M pa la bi shud d+he pra ba ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngags so/
167b8(mdo): AM pra ra pu shwe dza ya swa ha/ 'phreng ba'i sngags so// IM dz+wa la dz+wa la ya/ ra sa ra sa/ gr-i ni hUM/ gtor ma bcos pa'i sngags so// AM pad ma di pa ya dzA la hUM/ mar mo'i sngags so// AM sa ma pad ma
167b9(mdo): g+ha ba ne shu sa ra hUM/ 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM pad ma u shr-ISha/ a mo g+ha mu ni hUM/ phyag bya ba'i sngags so// AM tsag kra ma Na Da le sa man ta pad me hUM/ bskor ba'i sngags so// oM sa man pra
168a1(mdo): kai ra na pad me sam b+ha ra hUM/ me tog dor ba'i sngags so// AM pad ma sa ma ya uSh+TaM Sha/ ma ha a mo gA sa ma ya hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags so// AM sa man ta/ sa d+ha ra na/ pad me hU~M phaT/
168a2(mdo): dky-il mo krung gyi sngags so// au pe ri mi ta/ dza la pad me hUM/ bgrang 'phreng gi sngags so// au sha ta sa ha sra dza li ta pad me/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so// swo sa man ta d+ha ri sha na par
168a3(mdo): me hUM/ rgyu lam kyi sngags so// AM sa man ta raka kA ra ni pad me hU~M/ bsrung ba'i sngags so// o sa man ta me ru dr-i/ r+Na sI re hUM/ ra ba'i sngags so// oM sa man ta/ dz+wa la ma la g+ha ra D+h+we dzA la dzA la ma/
168a4(mdo): ha pad me dza le hUM/ me'i sngags so// IM du ru du ru/ pra sA ra/ d+hu sa ri man tre swa ha/ bsreg lugs kyi sngags so// mA sa man ta/ A ba lo ki te ku h+ye/ ba u dza be pad ma be
168a5(mdo): gai ni swa ha/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngags so// AM shu b+ha sta ra NaM/ pad ma pU dze hUM/ mtshon cha'i sngags so// AM sa man ta a ka ra sha ni/ pra sa ra gu d+ye hUM/ drang pa'i
168a6(mdo): sngags so// na mo tri b+hu bA na/ ai shwa ra ya/ yo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ d+ha ra dwA ra/ a man ta a la au ta gu he/ a kang tsa b+ha ka ban/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma ha bi ra ma ni ka na ka/ badz+ra byi'i du r+ya/ ka ra
168a7(mdo): ka ta/ pad ma ma rA ka/ id tra ni ya/ ma ha mug ti ka/ bi b+hu Shi ta sha ri ra/ ma ha pad ma b+hu dza/ a mo gA pa sha d+ha ra/ sa man ta/ A ba lo ki ta/ ba ra da/ ba ra da ya ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/
168a8(mdo): mnata/ a pa lo / a ga / b+has 'ad/ gr-i g+ha sa sa la / nu skA ma'i bi d+hU be kAnA rA/ sem barba/ se rAn sa b+hUta/ irba rA/ sa seM nas/ da ma
168a9(mdo): skas rnas/ thi gas ka tsha/ sa ma b+ha rnaman sa mas/ sa nu s+pha ra/ da ra shi na/ sa mu zin pa 'i drA ta ma ta ma/ sa man ta ma sr-i/ pras kar wAg reng/ ma hA ka tsu She// sbom rtsa su/
168b1(mdo): 2/ pa ri pu ra Na/ tsan tra maN Da la/ na ba tsan dra dza ta d+ha ra/ a mi ta b+ha/ ma ku ta d+ha ra/ ma hA pra/ sma be sha d+ha ra/ tri lo tsa na/ a mo g+ha b+ha ra d+ha/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma ha ka ru NaM ka/ pad ma pa sha a ba lo ka te/
168b2(mdo): shud d+ha swa ha/ ba ra da ya ka/ na mo stu te swa ha// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// rigs sngags 'dis ku kul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad ban
168b3(mdo): brjod byas nas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o// bdugs pa tsam gyi med nyid la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis stond par mdzad cing / mchog
168b4(mdo): thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// gal te mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa mnar myed par gzhol ba des kyang bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par stond par mdzad na/ dge slong tshangs par spyod pa bsam pa dag pa can smos

168b8(mdo): gnas su nag po la bdugs na/ nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas 'dug la/ las dang bya ba thams cad bsgrub par byed/ thams cad du dngos grub chen po bsgrub par byed do// tshogs
168b9(mdo): kyi dbang phyug la bdugs na/ bgyegs dang / log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na/ sdang ba dang bdud dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan ka pa yin pa de thams cad bcings
169a1(mdo): par 'gyur zhing / myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor bdugs na/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas/ dbang du 'gyur te/ nye bar gnas la/ 'dod pa dang bya ba thos
169a2(mdo): cad byed do// nyi ma sha rang pa'i tshe/ nyi ma la mngon tu phyogs nas bdugs na/ nyi ma 'bar cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do// zla ba nya ba la bdugs na/ zla ba dbab cing dbang phyug 'byor da pa chen po

170a1(mdo): ma thams cad dbang du gyurd nas/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go// 'dod dkur sgyur ba'i gzugs can la bdugs na/ 'don dkur sgyur ba'i gzugs can sa 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o zhes

170b7(mdo): sna mo chen mo sgrol ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod par sgrol ba tri ma myed pa pad ma tsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags kyi snying po smras pa// na mo ste'i yid d+hi ka nan/ ta tha ga ta nan
170b8(mdo): shAka kya rA dza ma d+hi ShA na/ na ma s+thi ta nan/ na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma ar+ya pa lo ki ta shwa ra yA/ bo d+ha swa tra ya/ ma ha sad tra ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ na mo ta ra ye/ ma ha d+he bye/ oM ta ra ni ta ra Ni ta re pad mA
170b9(mdo): baM b+hu Shi ta tA re/ ma ne ka na ka/ bi tsing tri ta ma ye/ dza ta ma ku ru/ ma ma Ni ta pad me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pad ma pa sha b+hu dze/ sa mo g+ha pa sha ha ste/ ta ra ya/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ma ha sid d+hi ba ra re/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA ta ra NaM/

171a5(mdo): ldan 'das rigs sngags 'di bsgrub pa'i tshe/ rang kaM gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos gru ba rjes su stsal par bgyi/ bgyegs dang / log 'dren thams
171a6(mdo): cad bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams
171a7(mdo): cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi/ mchog gsal bar bgyi/ bde legs dang / dge ngas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na/ bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis bdag
171a8(mdo): la bdugs shing / bdag gi snying po nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod dang / dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs
171a9(mdo): yongs su dag pa bstand cing / mngon gsum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad rjes su gsal bar bgyi/ byung ba dpa'abyung ba'i bkal mchud bgyi'o// dran pa tsam gyi mod dang / don yod pa'i pad ma tsug tor

176a3(mdo): rjes su zhugs po yin no// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul ba rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'di ni don yod pa'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas drangs shing / sku gcig
176a4(mdo): gau dam tshig la bkod pa yin te/ des na don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin kyis brlabs so// snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzu ngas sngags ni rtag tu blags pas grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs
176a5(mdo): pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs pa yin no// de nas bco/ ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas/ byang // chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po s+yan ras gzigs dbang
176a6(mdo): phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan palegs so// legs so// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi s+yai'i dam tshig bsgrub pa/ don
176a7(mdo): yod pa'i zhags pa' snying po bslab pa blags pas 'grub pa/ 'di ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis/ yon tan gyi phung po shod cig/ snying po yi ge 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// bsgrub pa
176a8(mdo): bde ba blags pas 'grub pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa bsgrub po'i cho ga bla na myed pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
176a9(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad ma rigs kyi rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil
176b1(mdo): 'khor dang / de 'o na nyid kyi dam tshig gsang ba chen po dang / rigs spyi'i bsgrub pa blags pas grub pa 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das byin kyis brlab tu gsol// bcom ldan
176b2(mdo): 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shing / bsam pa thams cad bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rigs sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su gsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
176b3(mdo): kyis bka' saHlad pa/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so/ legs so// de ltar khyod kyis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing / rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis
176b4(mdo): rab tu sbyin par gyis shig/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gas pa ba'i dam tshig dang / yi ge gcig po rigs spyi'i rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis yo byad dang bsgrub pa la
176b5(mdo): cho ga shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba dag zos nas/ snying sho nad tu
176b6(mdo): dga' ste/ yo byad dang cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon gsum nyid du sdig pasreg cang / ma lus par zadapar bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba rtsa nas 'byin pa'i dkyil
176b7(mdo): 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su// dbus su pad ma'i 'khor lo bya// tshon rtsi'i rnam pas rnam par dbye// pad ma'i ze ba'i dbus su ni/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par
176b8(mdo): bya// bum pa bkang dang pad ma rnams// dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya// me tog sna tshogs legs par dgram// spos dri bzang pos bsgos pa'i// mar me'i 'phreng ba kun tu bud// mchod yon chu
176b9(mdo): ngag gzhag par bya// a ka ru dang du rus ka// bdug spos sna bzhi dag nas bdug// rigs sngags 'chang ba zhus byas nas// gos rtsang bkas te smyung ba la// nye bar gnas pas tshes brgyad dam/
177a1(mdo): bcu bzhi tshes ni bco lnga ste// zla ba yar gyi ngo bo bsgrubs// shar du kha bltas 'dug nas su// don yod zhags pa dus gsum du// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya// snying po brgya rtsa brgya
177a2(mdo): du bzlas// yi ge ko cag po 'bum du ni// mtshan mo bar chad myed pa bzlas// skya rengs shar nas 'jig rten dbang // ze ba'i dbus na 'bar 'gyur zhing // 'gul 'gyur 'gul ba de yis ni// myal ba
177a3(mdo): chen po bcu drug gi sgo rnams dag ni phye bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis// g.yo la g.yos pa tsam des ni// dmyal ba'i tshor kun rnam par 'jig/ dmyal ba de yang rnam par
177a4(mdo): 'joms// sems can dmyal ba de dag ni// tha rad nas phyogs bcur rgyug pa'i// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun sus grol// mtho ras lam du zhugs par 'gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi
177a5(mdo): sdug bsngal thams cad dud 'gro rnams las yongs su grol bA// 'gyur// bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / sU// ga bsngal myi bzad pa thams cad mthar gtugs par 'gyur//
177a6(mdo): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ ro// gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur da na/ de'i tshe/ 'phags pa s+ya na ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser
177a7(mdo): gyi mdog can du stond par mdzad la/ mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa'i dri ma myed pa la ye shes bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur// sgrub pa dang bral ba sems kyi rgyar
177a8(mdo): rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma bye ba zhag zhig 'bum 'phrag dku bcu rtsa dgu po rnams yod nyid la mngon gsum du stonod par mdzad la/ de
177a9(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ 'jig
177b1(mdo): rten pa kun gyi gcig pu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur// gshin rje dang / rtswa lha dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis
177b2(mdo): mngon gsum du ston cipa nye bar 'a'od pa dang / kun nas bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / skyed pa byed par 'gyur// dngos bsgrub pa dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams
177b3(mdo): cad zad par ma gyur da na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser ki kha dog can du myi mthong ngo // des sgrub pa dang / sdig pa lhag ma lus par shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas
177b4(mdo): brjod kyi cho ga spung ba byas pa dang / sdig pa dang / slob pa thams cad rtsa pa dang bcas pa'i nga thams cad phyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gsum pa byed na/ bzlas brjod kyitshe/
177b5(mdo): gsum pa rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi bya/ ka kayas pa brkyang nas/ rigs sngags 'chang btegs te// mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpag myed kyi s+ya/
177b6(mdo): sngar 'jog par mdzad la mngon gsum du bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyis dbugs 'byind par mdzad cing / phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad de/ tshe dpag tu myed par 'gyur
177b7(mdo): gal te sems can gzhan rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ skyes pa'am/ bud byed dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ ba na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba gang zhig sdig pa
177b8(mdo): dang / sgrib pa zad par 'dod na/ rigs sngags 'chang zhus byas la/ gos gtsang ma bgos/ spung ba byas pa des dkyil 'khor la mngon tu 'phyogs par bzhag la/ rigs sngags 'chang cho ga byed pa des/
177b9(mdo): gsang sngags rjes su dran par byas nas/ mtha'i spros byab par bya'o// de tsam gyis yon tan kyi khyad par 'thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / gdug
178a1(mdo): pa thams cad dang / na ba thams cad dang / mtshams myed pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te/ the tsom myed do// sgrib pa thams cad dang / bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing / tshig gzung bar 'os par
178a2(mdo): 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyis bzung zhing kun nas bsrungs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos par 'gyur/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzigs bzhed par 'gyur/ tshe ring ba dang / sgrib
178a3(mdo): pa dang / nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan
178a4(mdo): bar 'gyur te/ snying rje dang / byams pa chen po yid la bya ba rtse gcig tu bya zhing / smyung ba dang bzlas brjod bya'o// sdig pa dang sgrub pa zad par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o//
178a5(mdo): 'phags pa don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam / dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ gru bzhi po ko sa
178a6(mdo): 'i tshad du cha legs par phye ba/ grwa bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / zem skas kyi rim pa can du tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas thig gdab cing / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po mdzes par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po
178a7(mdo): pad ma mchog 'bye ba/ 'dab ma brgyam brgyad pa/ snying po sde pa shin tu 'byas pa/ snying po las pad ma byung ba/ 'a byed bye ba dang / lag pa gnyis byung bas pad mI 'dab ma 'dzin pa bris par chul kyi snod kyi nang
178a8(mdo): du sman bkang ste/ rar kyis la g.yogs nas pad ma 'dab ma'i steng du bzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dar kyi cod pan bcings zhing brgyan pa/
178a9(mdo): pad ma'i steng du bzhugs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kye phyi rol da kun tu phyag rgya'i rtags rnams gsal bar bralo// ske sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma'i steng du gzhag pa kha dog dang lo gzer 'bar ba bra'o// mA
178b1(mdo): glar bum pa gang ba bra'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu pad ma dang / bum pa gang ba dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya// mchod yon gyi chu dbul
178b2(mdo): bar bya/ tsan dan dang / a ka ru'i 'dug spos dang / spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ dkyil 'khor kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dgod cing / kun tu 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dgram/
178b3(mdo): bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang mang mar gyur pas/ legs par zhus byas shing / gos rtsar ma bgos pa 'jigs pa myed pas zla ba yar kyi ngo nyal bsgrub par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur//
178b4(mdo): cid/ byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis pa sgrub par bya'o// gang gi sa ka gis bzung bcam dang / reg pa tsal gyis mod la dga' ba 'thob cing / sdig pa thams cad 'ang /
178b5(mdo): par 'gyur// sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// mtshams myed pa byed pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur/ mong/ la nang thams cad byang zhing ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par byed pa/
178b6(mdo): bsod nams chen po'i stobs kyi dngos grub sman gyi de 'o na nyid mthong ba ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lu bstand cing / de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs pa/ byang chub
178b7(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa/ 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis phrul pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi skakhams cad kyis bsngags pa/ rigs sngags 'chang gi dbang po @
178b8(mdo): dbang po thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dab phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / tsul+la dang / ku be ra dang / nyi ma dang zla bas mnad pa/
178b9(mdo): de bzhin du/ rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / gza' kun dang / 'jug rings dang / de bzhin gapal khyim dang / thams cad du bkra gas kyis mchod pa mo ga zhi'i mo thams cad dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor dang / phyas/
179a1(mdo): rgya dang / bzlas brjod thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ rigs spyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi
179a2(mdo): 'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstand pa/ yang bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang mthun pa 'i sman na// sman gyi rdzas bkra
179a3(mdo): shes pa bye brag kam/ lhag par gyur pa gzhan gapa yang myed do// sman de lta bu ni rtag tu mchog/ gtso ba sbyin pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba yin no// de'i phyir thams cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas kana?/
179a4(mdo): gang yang rung bar sbyar bar bya ste/ rtsang ma legs par khrus byas dpa des sbyar bar bya'o// dzaM lta ji ltar bkra shis kyi bsam pa yaM/ da la byed pa de lta de ltar bsam pa yid la byed pa yongs su rdzogs

179a7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpal 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs shing / snang ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ nyin zhag gsum du sbyar na ngag rnam pa/
179a8(mdo): dag pa 'thob po// nyin zhag sngar byas na/ dran pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// nyin zhag bdun du sbyar na/ rigs sngags chen po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par dag pa 'thob po// nyin zhag bcu bzhir sbyar na/
179a9(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi ram cheg chen po 'thob po// nyen 'ag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyis 'kho
179b1(mdo): chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub chen po 'thob po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub 'thob po// zla ba gcig tu sbyar na/ 'phags pa s+yan ras ga bims/

179b3(mdo): sbyar na don yod pa'i dngos grub rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ myig mthon zhing mdog bung ba lta bu/ ska ral bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ tshe lo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang mthun
179b4(mdo): par 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa 'bum grub par 'gyur ro// bdar nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ gang tri bsnams pa tsam gyis bgyegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang sha ba dang

180a1(mdo): dang / 'brum bu 'phra mo dang / rma dang / khong gi ma yongs su sos par 'gyur// dug thams cad dang / zos pa dang / dug myos pa dang / sbyar dug drag po dang / dug sbyar ma dang / sbyar dug phye
180a2(mdo): ma dang / byad rnams la skus pa tsam dang / chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis dug myed par 'gyur ro// dr-i tsam gyis klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug kyang myed par 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa la dpral/ khA
180a3(mdo): bskus na/ ku co 'don cing 'bros so// rims thams cad dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyen gsum pa dang / rUb las gyurd pa dang / mkhris pa las gyu rad pa dang / bad kan las gyur dpa
