180a7(mdo): tha rad par 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur/ lag pa gdangs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ myi ma yin pa gang gyis kyang mdangs dbrog par myi 'gyur zhing par
180a8(mdo): chang bya bar myi nus so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// rgyal po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang dang ga
180a9(mdo): du sbyar bar rang gi blos bye brag 'bum sbyar na las bsgrub par byed de/ sman gyi mchog shi nad tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o// / sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas de'i
180b1(mdo): phyir gser gi ri lu'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma tsug to//
180b2(mdo): kyi rgyal po zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying pos/ byin gyis brlabs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dab
180b3(mdo): phyug 'od kyis bkal saHla pa/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag zhig 'bum phrag dku bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing bsngags pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa dbang bskur
180b4(mdo): pa/ rjes su zhugs rangs par mdzad pa/ lung bstan pa/ mgon po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug kau katsug gi nor bu cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyal ba 'od dpag myed kyi
180b5(mdo): tsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi thig le yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa rigs sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga
180b6(mdo): zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam las stsogs pa 'dir tshad bstand pa ra lta su zhig gis nus
180b7(mdo): mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung kyi bye ma snyed bye ma dang / dus gsum kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par mngon gsum du mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'o/
180b8(mdo): dag nyid mngon gsum du mchod par bzung ba dang / lung bstand pa thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mngon gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// no/
180b9(mdo): bu gser gi kha dog tu bstan pa'i r-i lu 'di gang gis mthong zhing 'chad pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyed par 'gyur/ nor bu ri lu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang
181a1(mdo): gdug pa dang / mtshams myed pa lnga dang / mnar myed par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sngon gyi tshe rabs nas bsugs pa'i sgrib pa
181a2(mdo): thams cad rnam par 'jog cing / spangs par 'gyur/ rims nad dang / nad thams cad las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur/ gang gi lag na sman 'di yod par gyur pa'i sems can de ni lung bstand par 'gyur ro// /
181a3(mdo): r-i lu ga pa la yod pa ni/ phyir myi ldog par lung bstan cing / mgon po sa bcu dag la gnas// rtag tu mchod rten gyurd pa ste// sku gsung snying po'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur//
181a4(mdo): dus gsum dag la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa gang // sangs rgyas dpa' bo de kun kyi// sras gcig tu ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras zugs las
181a5(mdo): skyes pa dang / zhal nas skyes/ chos kyi dbyings srul chos la// sa skyes// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// phyag g.yas rtag tu spyabar
181a6(mdo): nai// 'jog mdzad 'di ni the tsom myed// rai lu mthong ba tsam gyis ni// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu sgrol// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag/ de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mya 'gyur// phyir
181a7(mdo): zhing gnas mchog zhi ba thob// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'od dpag myed// mgon po rtag tu mngon gsum mthong // bde ba can du 'jug par byed// gang dag de'i mngon dga' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa myi
181a8(mdo): pa// rtag tu myi 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gyi g.yo myi 'gul te// sems dpa' ri rab che dang mnyam// gzung du myed pa mtsho dang 'dra// phe la bgyegs dang log 'dren dag/ nams kyang 'jug pa
181a9(mdo): kyi 'gyur la// sems dpa' phyag bya'i gnas su 'gyur// gang la nor rgyal 'di yod la// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung dang bcas par bkol dang bcas// rtag tu bsrub phyir gnas byed de// 'dre 'i
181b1(mdo): nyin mtshan de bzhin no// lha tshogs thams cad bsrung bar ni// the tsom myed par byed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phyel// de la legs par 'gyur// 'jigs myed rtag tu rgya lam naM// dngos
181b2(mdo): po chen po sna tshogs mthong // gru 'dzin mal gzhal skyed 'ang // tshal dang bcas shing rin chen bcas// gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri la yA myi gsang ba thA/
181b3(mdo): nam mkhal spring dang phyi'am ci// de bzhin lte chen 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnams ni// kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// rin ched wA'i seng ge'i bdang // 'ang pa stegs pa
181b4(mdo): cen dang // rim bu chen pos brgyad pa dang // 'jig rten dbang bya ga grub po'i mo// pad ma'i snying pos bzhugs nas// donas pa 'gas pa'i phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i chos spyod /
181b5(mdo): gsung kun thos par gyur nas ni/ thub par rang gi ngo bo mthong // / de ltar rmyil ma bzang myib// nyin cig bzhin du mthong bar/ 'gyur// nor bu rgyal po'i mthu ni de 'dra bas// de bas skye
181b6(mdo): 'bad pa chen pos zung // dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal rigs dang // dmangs rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am// btsun mo slas sam dpung gi rtse bo 'am// skyes pa 'am bud myed khye'u dang bu mo
181b7(mdo): dag/ nor bu'i rgyas po rtag tu 'chang byed pa// de ni stonang pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur// chos kun kyis mi gyi bskus shing // gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs kyi 'gyur// 'jigs pa gyi ba'ang brgyang las tha rang //
181b8(mdo): la 'dug dang sbyar ba'i dus// dug sbyar drag pos kyi tshugs shing // de la byad kyis tshugs kyi 'gyur// gabs nor bu'i rgyal po yang // des nad kyis kyi tshugs shing // nabs ma yin sdig pas sbyin// pad+mas
181b9(mdo): tshulas kyi chags ltar// rtag tu chags pa myed par gnas// g.yul 'gyed pa'i nangan 'am// 'jab pa 'ab 'gyed pa sod pa na// lan thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni// thob par 'gyur te me tsom myed// de bas
182a1(mdo): rdzas ni bshad bya ste// sman ni bkra shis dang ldan pa// grub pa'i mtha' ste mchog tu gsang // 'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / pad ma dang / ud pa la
182a2(mdo): dang / shai ri sha'i me tog dang // a ba ma rga dang / me ru dang / na la da dang / chu srin kyi sder mo dang / ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang / tsan dan kyi 'bras bu dang / pad ma'i 'bras bu dang / rdo dreg dang / me da dang / bcod dang /
182a3(mdo): su ka r-i dang / mar ko taM dang / 'dza ya dang / byaM dza ya dang / pa ri be la dang / ba la dang / ra sa dang / bI rA dang d+ya ma ka dang / rgya spos dang / bu sa dang / A ba ra ta ka dang / ru rta dang / bya gra na kha dang / pad tra dang / tra
182a4(mdo): tsa dang / ka Da ma b+ha ra dang / pr-i yang ku dang / 'gye'u wang dang / spug ka dang / smr-ig rkang dang / yungs kar dang / na ga pus pa dang / A lA dang / ldoljong gros dang / gu kum dang / kla rtse dang /
182a5(mdo): spang spos dang / na le sham dkar po dang / su ma na dang / nye'u shaM nga dang / shu ta dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsam pa ka ste// // de bzhin rdzas ni de dag kun// su ba ra Na ni dkar pos sbyar//
182a6(mdo): raM/ lu namo cig tsam du mi// skyes bu mkhas pas bya ba yin// su par nas ni bkab nas su// rdzas rnams bsres nas sbyar bar bya// cha rnams 'phel bar bya ba ste// gla rtsa yaus nai dr-i bskyed do//
182a7(mdo): phye ma zhib mor brtags nas su// tsan dan dkar po'i chus sbyar nas// grib ma la ni bskam par bya// tshes brgyad nas ni brtsams nas su// tshes ni bco lnga'i nya'i bar// nyin cig bzhin du don yod pa'i//
182a8(mdo): rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// 'khri bo'i rgyal pos nyin cig bzhin// lan bdun bar du dbang bskur ro// phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba yang bya// de nas tshes ni bco lnga ste// nyas chu dang yungs kar dag
182a9(mdo): dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya// de nas nor bu'i rgyal po ni// gzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// cha rnams ma nor legs par dbye// rgyar ni ko la'i tshad du bya// sha nad tu 'jam la phya ba dar legs/
182b1(mdo): mtshon kyi sna tshogs 'byes pa dang / dkyil 'khor mchog mi thig gdab bo// sgo bzhi yod cing gA ba'i gdong // kun nas shind tu mabye zhing // dkyil 'khol snying po cha bye ba// tshad dang shi na tu ldan par bya//
182b2(mdo): da ma chen po bzhi dag dang // de bzhin phyag dang spyan du bcas// don yod dngos grub bri bar bya// nor bu rgyal po 'chang ba yis// phyag rgyar bcas pa yang bri bar bya// chu'i rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// las
182b3(mdo): kyi rdo rje legs par bri// dkyil 'khor snying po dam pa la// kun nas 'khyer rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni// nor bu pad ma legs par bri// sgo bzhi
182b4(mdo): ni gnas rnams su// pad ma zhags pa mdung rtse gsum// rje tshul mchog lta bur bri// zla bzhi li ni gnas rnams su/ lag mnor bu yod 'bri// pad ma'i steng na rab tu gnas// dkyi
182b5(mdo): 'khor babang po/ 'phan phran dang // bum pa bkang dang me tog dang / bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyad// gtor ma dam pa sna tshogs dag/ ci bdog zungs cher bzhag par bya//
182b6(mdo): kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang // mchod yon chu dang a ka ru// tsanadan bdug spos dbul bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal po 'jigs myed pa// snod bzang legs par dgram nas su// rgya da la
182b7(mdo): zhwa g.yogs te// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig pas gzhag/ dkyil 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang // bzhag te de nas las rdo rje// snod kyi steng du gzhag pa ni// nor bu dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// de nas
182b8(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gis// don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 'dzod bya// 'kho bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur bar bya// de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'bum tshang bar bzlas
182b9(mdo): brjod bya ste/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gi aka/ kayas dang ldan pas bzung nas ni// chang pa dam du bsdam par bya// bsdams
183a1(mdo): pa tsam gyi mod dag la// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro// nor bu dri ma myed pa don yod pa// rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa ces bya ba// rigs sngags 'chang gis 'khor lo sgyur pa 'thob/
183a2(mdo): la// 'khor rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur// khung gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
183a3(mdo): rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dag kha tor tu lobs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sa byas 'tshal ba dang / 'dud pa das
183a4(mdo): gis gsong por smra bar byed// thams cad du yang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba zos par 'gyur// tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su rang bar 'gyur// don yod pa'i pad ma'o
183a5(mdo): 'khor lo mdun du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na/ sngar bstand pa'i yon tan kyi khyad par rnams tho/ par 'gyur la/ mnyam pa mnyam po nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs
183a6(mdo): pa dang 'dra ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i ri lu ni/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa li las rnams sgrub pa yin no// che brjes na 'jig rten ki khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/
183a7(mdo): kang dang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// nor bu ri lu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon gsum du mthong zhing lta bar 'gyur// 'phags pa
183a8(mdo): rus gzigs dbang phyug mngon tu mthong zhing rtag tu lta bar 'gyur// rang gi lus la yod pa de yang phyir myi ldog par rig par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po mchod rten dang mnyam pa
183a9(mdo): zhes bya ste/ 'di la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par myi bya'o// mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la/ sngon kyi las kyi sgrib pa grangs dang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis bskal pa 'bum du bsugs pa mnar myed
183b1(mdo): pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skurd pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
183b2(mdo): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po mthus thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dag la yongs
183b3(mdo): su za rad par 'gyur// bde 'grol lam la gzhol bar 'gyur// tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na legs par bsgrub pa'i las mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/
183b4(mdo): mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya// shin tu gsal zhing rab tu gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i bsam pa 'bad pas sbyar bar bya/ rang ki sha dang khrag dang yongs su btang nas btsal bar bya zhi /
183b5(mdo): gzhib mo'i rgyal po yongs su btsal bar bya ba yin no// phyi rol kyi dngos po nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser/ dang / rdul dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams yongs su btang nas/
183b6(mdo): yongs su btsal bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ srog btab bar bya'i/ de btang bar myi bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i steng po rnam par thard pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba bsgrub pa
183b7(mdo): 'di btsal bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o// 'di'i dus phyi ma'i che na/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi
183b8(mdo): mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang bar 'gyur/ phyir gyi ldog par 'gyur zhing / nams kyang dun 'gro sog par 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// nor bu ril lu bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas de'i phyir don yong/
183b9(mdo): pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i dngos bsgrub kyi sman nor bu dang gsang sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang /
184a1(mdo): phyag rgya'i mthu des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ rigs sngags 'chang rnams kyi de bzhin gshes pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig kyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ro//
184a2(mdo): po nyid bstand pa yang dag par ston par mdzad de/ blags pas grub pas rigs kyi dam tshig kyi'i gsang ba'i thams cad du nye bar stond par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang rnams kyi ngal ba 'bras bu byed pa gzhan
184a3(mdo): du 'gyur ba myed do// ngal ba dang / dub pa dang / 'bad pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'bras bu myed par myi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems kyi rgyud dad pa dang / gus pa dang / gsang chen dang / gsang bar bya ba gzhan
184a4(mdo): la bstan par myi bya ste/ dngos grub myed par myi 'gyur ro// de bas na gsang sngags sgrub sgrub pa ni/ shin tu gsang bar bya zhing / legs par spyang ba byas la/ dbab par bya// kha zas ngan pa spang ba
184a5(mdo): bya gos ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa yang yongs su spang bar bya// mye srung ba dang / mye bden pa dang / 'phra ma dang / sems can/ sun par byed pa dang / gsang sngags rku ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rku bar
184a6(mdo): byed pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor zhu bar byed pa de dag ni rtogs pa 'i gang yang myed do// dus gsum kyi mgon pos spang cing / byang chub sems dpas kyang spangs/ mgon po'i 'phags pa
184a7(mdo): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyis kyang smad pa yin no// sems can sdong du ma bsregs pa 'di// gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ rtag tu smad par bya ba yin// lha rnams
184a8(mdo): kyis ni yongs su btang // ma rungs pa ni bdud kyis bos// ma rungs pa ni bgyegs kyis zin// bslab ga'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang / mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byirang pa// de la dngos grub ji ltar 'byung
184a9(mdo): re la skyob pa gang yang myed// mgon byed kun tu spad ba yin// de bas de la dngos grub ni// chung ngu'ang byed sa nyes pa yis// gsang sngags dang ni sman myi 'grub// nyes pa de dag rang gis byas// gzhan ya
184b1(mdo): ma rungs byed pa yin// de bas sems can mkhas la sbyin// slob par 'dod cing yon tan dga'// snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog// de'i lag tu sbyin bya ste// de//
184b2(mdo): 'i dngos grub bla na myed// gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gsang ba yin te/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po gsang pa snying po de yang rigs sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bsgrub sla ste/ blags

184b9(mdo): ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i me tog dang / lan cig sku'o// til mar bcos pa n-i/ bra h+ma ti si ste/ shing ba la sha'i mar dang lhan cig smra'o// kha gdong bkru ba ni tsan dad dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig s+thA
185a1(mdo): zhing / su ma na dang / kur kum dang / spos chus lhan cig sbrus la so sor brgyam brkyang bzlas brjod bya// 'kho lo'i rgyal po nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas
185a2(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas gcig tu smras te/ rdul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brkyang bzlas brjod byas nas/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya/

185a6(mdo): tshogs dag gis dgang // snod ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i/ gtor ma cha lnga dbul bar bya// kun tu 'phreng ba nyi shu dang // ma me nyi shu lnga dag dang // spos kyi phye ma lnga dag dang // spos kyi cha ltar
185a7(mdo): phye bas byug// 'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lngar gdags// mtshon rtse lnga yis mdzes par bya// gser dang dngul kyis g.yogs pa'i// bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga// rin po che ni lnga bzhag go// sgo bzhi grwa bzhir bum pa
185a8(mdo): brgyad// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa sna nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras yos dang / yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni// kos dang sdod dang yon gyis so// thub pa 'jig rten da
185a9(mdo): phyug ltar// ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas su// dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// de nas las rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la sna tshogs byas//
185b1(mdo): rang bdi chen po gnas byed dang // rim pa ldan pa nga kyi rtag tugs pa// de nyid dngos su' bsgrub pag// de bzhin nom du sman larnam so// rod 'di'i margyab gzhis te// mams pa'i phyi'i ma bya ba sa
185b2(mdo): 'phra ma'i tshig kyang myi sten te// rdzun ni rnams kyang smra myi bya// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i de nyid de// de la 'grub par the tsom myed// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// kun nas gru bzhi lham pa ste// grwa bzhi cha ni/
185b3(mdo): legs pa zel// kau la'i tshang su legs par dag// rna rdzogs tshod kyi lakri byud kyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa yig gdab po// dkyil 'khob dbus kyi snying tho di// 'khor lo ba'i thom tho bar bya// ras
185b4(mdo): kyi lte bar pad ma'i 'khom so gsal par bri bar bya// pad ma'i snyi po gser dang dri// rdul dang can ngas las byas pa// bar ba 'di ka nyed dbang phyug bzhugs// 'khor lo kun dang rtsibs dang ni/
185b5(mdo): zung dag gis ma bye'o// dkyis 'khor snying po'i ma rnams dang/ sgra'i dbang po 'angs pa dang // kyab 'dus dbang phyug chen po ni// kun tu 'byung nas pa dang // par ma 'greng ba rnams bya'o//
185b6(mdo): 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni// rtags dang phyag rgya rnams thaM he/ rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum// ras gri 'gas pa tho ba dang / gshin rje'i be cod pad ma gdugs// dbyug to mnga' bo che rnams so//
185b7(mdo): grwa 'ams kun tu 'greng ba dang // me tog rnas pa sna tshogs 'gram// sgo sgo de ni dkyil 'khor gyi// lha ste gshin rje nu swa dang // lus ngan dang ni gzho ru bri// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi rnams su ni// rgyal po chen po
185b8(mdo): go dag// go cha legs par bgos pa dang // 'the bor lta ba 'jigs myed bri// 'di ni dkyil 'khom mchog yin te// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos pa rnams// legs par yongs su rdzogs par ni// rigs spags
185b9(mdo): ji bzhin bstand par ni// de nas legs par zhus byas la// gos rtsang bgos pa 'jigs byed pas// sman mchog bzung ste las bya'o// rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam sru lad pa//
186a1(mdo): gang gis ngan 'gro zer 'gyur ba// sems can kun la bstan par bya// rtag tu dga' dang dad pa dang // gus pa de nyid thob par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chad gyis bsgrub pa'i mchog/ dngos grub
186a2(mdo): de nyid thob par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang gis sngar zhus byas la// rdzas kyi dri chab rtsang ma don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya// tsan dan gyi tshul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas/ skra yan
186a3(mdo): tshad tsam byugs la chod zin par bskus nas/ 'a gdong bkru bar bya'o// myig sman la an brgya rtsa brkyang bzlas brjod byas nas bskus na// myig bzang por 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod byas sra
186a4(mdo): bdag nyid dang / phyogs bcur gtor ro// de bzhin du til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas// skA yan chad bsku ba dang / tshod zin par bsku ba dang / lus rkang 'thol yan chad bsku'o//
186a5(mdo): yi ge gcig po yid la byas la/ sems byams pa nyid la gnas/ nas/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i sgo'am/ skye bo'i nang ngam/ 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang 'phrad
186a6(mdo): pa 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sa 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang / kha dog tu mthong zhing / sa'i steng nas rkang pa 'khru gang tsam gyis spags te 'dug la/
186a7(mdo): ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dad pa/ de lta de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/ rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'am/ myi'i seng ge'am/ phag gam/ sred myed kyi bur stond pa dang / tshangs pa 'am/ sum
186a8(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po myig gsum pa'am/ gzhon nu'am/ chu lha'am/ gshin rje'am/ rnam thos kyi bu'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi 'am/ nag po chen po 'am
186a9(mdo): dga' byed dbang phyug gam/ ser skra'am/ gsang ba 'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu 'am/ gang ba bzang po 'am/ stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung ngam/ drang
186b1(mdo): srong nyid de/ ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad stond par byed do// me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na/ de sangs
186b2(mdo): rgyas kyi gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs su snang zhi pa/ gzhal myed khang gi rnam pa dag kyang stond par byed de/ ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid la byas pa de ltar gzugs rnams stond par byed do// 'khor
186b3(mdo): 'tshogs pa'am dgon pa 'am/ 'chag sa dag kyang smon nor bu dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogs su stond par byed do// 'dron po 'brog gi nang du phyind pa nyams zag pa'/ 'jigs pa
186b4(mdo): bzad pa/ chu myed pa/ dgon par 'gon myed pa/ sdug bsngal drag po de dag lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs myed pa/ mgon myed par gyur pa/ skyob pa myed pa/
186b5(mdo): dpung gnyen dam par gyur pa/ de la rigs sngags 'chang gis// phye ma 'dis phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par bya/ phye mas/ dkyil 'khor kyi tshul du ri mor bris la/ r-i lu lnga dkyil 'khor gyi/
186b6(mdo): dbus su bzhag go// yungs kar gyi til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ dbang
186b7(mdo): bskur nas/ 'khri bo'i rgyal po hU~M zhes bya bas phyag rgya bcangs la/ sa la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis/ chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung
186b8(mdo): bar 'gyur/ tshal dang nyi ma'i tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal myed khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ phye ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang / khang bzangs 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyim
186b9(mdo): kyai gnas lnga hong 'byung bar 'gyur// zhing bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / myi mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyo tshong dang / tshong dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / rta dang /
187a1(mdo): glang po'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / tshong pa dang / khyim dang / 'ang pa bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsams pa de srid du 'dug go// chu dang yungs/
187a2(mdo): kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ myaM snang bar 'gyur ro// yungs kar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des pha rol
187a3(mdo): kyi dmag tshogs dang dgra 'jigs shing / 'joms par byed la rgyal bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer kyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na/ 'obs bcad cing ra ba 'khyer kyis bskor la/ grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag
187a4(mdo): snang bas/ grong khyer gnan pa'am/ brtse bar sus kyang myi nus so// mtshan mo 'i dri'i til mar de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ chang pa gang myi'i nang du gtor// chang
187a5(mdo): pa kang phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na/ kun nas mar me 'phreng ba/ 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ji srid dgos pa do srid du 'bar ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/
187a6(mdo): 'chag sa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na/ mar me'i 'phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la// chu dang yungs kar gyis myi snang bar 'gyuragrong khyer kyi skor yungs kar gtor na/ gtor ba tsam gyi mo la
187a7(mdo): dgra thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi grong khyer myi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rold kyi dmag tshogs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ tshal gyi tshang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas
187a8(mdo): su gtor na/ 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ thams cad phan tshun ngo myi shes nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'bros par byed do// dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na/ mtshon cha thams cad
187a9(mdo): dang / 'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad myi snang zhing / gcer bur 'gyur ro// zhal ce 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na/ 'gyed zla gtso bo de gcer bur 'gyur ro// dgra'i steng du gtor na/ ma 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de
187b1(mdo): dag las sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum snyed byed do// de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa pa'i rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mar legs par zhus byas pa spos kyis bskus pa des yungs kar dang /
187b2(mdo): til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gtor bar bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur nas/ phyag byas pa'i lag pas
187b3(mdo): r-i lu s+ya bar bzhag la phye mas gdab par bya/ til mar gyi rgyal po rkang pa la byug par bya/ don yod pa'i rgyal po lan cig dran par byas te/ yongs su sbyang ba'i lam/ lhan cig bya ba legs par byas pas/ 'phags
187b4(mdo): pa s+yas+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs g.yo ba ste/ gang dga' bar 'gro la gzugs brnyan rab tu 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro'o// lha'i steng du gtor na/ lha lha'i gnas nas 'pho zhing gar dga' ba
187b5(mdo): der 'gre'o// phye mas lha'i steng du gtor la/ 'khro ba'i rgyal po'i hUM zhes bya bas myi snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar gyi rgya/ la po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ bdag nyid kyi
187b6(mdo): pus mo dang / byin pa la skus na/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rkang 'thil la bskus nas/ sa'i steng na rkang pa so bzhi tsam myi reg go// rdo'i steng du rkang pa bzhags pa dang / rkang
187b7(mdo): rjes byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu bzhag pa'i rku ba la bskus ma/ sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'dug go// yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas/ mes sbyin bsregs byas
187b8(mdo): pa'i thal ba de blangs nas/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis sbrus pa la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas/ myag la bskus na/ myig gsum ston cing / dbang
187b9(mdo): phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do// thal bas lus la byugs na/ tshangs po'i gzugs su ston to// shing pa la sha dang pa na ka bsres pa lus la byugs na/ sred myed kyi bu'i stobs dang shugs dang
188a1(mdo): gzugs su stond to// til mar chen pos khar bskus na/ thal bas bral bar thig le byas na/ gzho nu'i gzugs su stond to// yungs kar gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la
188a2(mdo): til mar chen pos byugs pas bskus la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing / 'khro ba'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing / 'khri bo
188a3(mdo): 'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur la/ de nas rdul gyi snod kyi nang du gzhug/ de nas las thams cad byed de/ nam mkha' la gtor na/ nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to// de bzhin gshegs
188a4(mdo): pa mchod pa'i tshe/ nam mkhal la gtor na/ me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du nam mkhal la gtor/ na/ 'bras bu dang / nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs ston to// tshal gyi nang
188a5(mdo): du gtor na/ me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs stonang to// ri pug/ tu gtor na rdzas dang sman sna tshogs ston to// mchod rten rnying / pa'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas su gtor na/
188a6(mdo): byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang zhing rdzogs pa khang pa bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog stond to// grong khyer stong par gtoran/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing / yongs
188a7(mdo): su rdzogs pa dang / yul rgyal po dang / slas dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don pa dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag stond to// yang 'khri bo'i rgyal po hU~M zhes bya bas
188a8(mdo): gtor na/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ston to// dur khrod kyi nang du gtor na/ shi ba'i lus kyi rus pa gang dang gapal bab pa de dang de kang du sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin je
188a9(mdo): l-i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za'am/ myo 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'am/ bya 'am/ nya'am/ ru sbal gyi rigs su skyes pa'am/ lha'i 'jig rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
188b1(mdo): du skyes pa de'i rus pa 'am/ zod pa las tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang du skyes pa de'i gtam yang smra'o// kang dang kang gi skye gnas su skyes pa de thams cad sprus/ thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o// sungs
188b2(mdo): kar das kyang rus go 'brel pa 'am/ shi ba'i ro'am/ rus pa 'thob pa la bab na/ bab pa tsam gyi mod la/ sems can dmyal ba nas yongs su thar nas/ 'jig rten gi khams bad ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/
188b3(mdo): zo bkram pa'i nang du gtor na/ thams cad mngon par 'gyur ro// nam mkhal la gtor na/ skur ma rnams kyi mthong bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na/ thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// 'dus
188b4(mdo): pa'i nang du gtor na/ thams cad bro chung bar byed do// dge 'dun kyi nang du gtor na/ dge slong thams cad bsam gtan thob para'agyur ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor na/ rnal 'byor dpyad
188b5(mdo): par 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na/ thams cad bong bu dang / wa dang zhwa'i gzugs can du 'gyur/ ro// sbyor ma'i khyim sgor gtor na/ sbyor ma thams cad
188b6(mdo): 'bam la/ ma he'i gzugs can du snang ngo // shi ba'i steng du gtor na zo rung bar byed do// zod pa'i steng du gtor na zo dung ba re byed cing rgyug la/ phan tshun rgyug par byed do// lam gyi bzhi
188b7(mdo): mdzor gtor ya/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyu rad nas 'khod do// nyin cig bdag gnyid la gtor na/ mchod
188b8(mdo): pa chen po'i gnas su 'gyur te/ gzhan yang rang gi blo rnams kyis las 'bum snyed do// don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i/
188b9(mdo): zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam pa// de nas de'i phyir 'gugs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bstand pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang gis lha rnams myur du
189a1(mdo): 'ong ba dang / phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur du stond to// rdo rje'i sku dang / stobs po che/ rta mgrin dang ni 'gul sngon dang / de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i kha/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ldan gzugs po che// log
189a2(mdo): 'dren rnams ni rab 'joms dang // 'khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed s+yan// ki li ki li rgyal po che// 'khri bo tshol pa stobs po che// de bzhin rdo rjes 'od gzugs rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang // klu tshan rab 'joms spyan yangs
189a3(mdo): dang // sog ma myed ni 'dul ba dang // de bzhin thigs khro khros chen dang // de bzhin mche ba brtsigs mdzad dang // rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgrog/ klu'i dbang po stobs kyis gnon// mgon po gos sngo kon pa dang /
189a4(mdo): dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug pad ma 'aM lte// phyag na pad ma pad ma phyug/ de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel dang // de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten bla// sna tshogs
189a5(mdo): gzugs te bzang po dang // sred myed bu dang tshangs pa dang // drag po 'di'i dbang phyug dang // nag po chen po gzho nu dang // gshin rje dang ni chu lha nyid// nyi ma dang ni zla ba lha// rgyu skar sgra kaH
189a6(mdo): 'jug rings dang // de bzhin gza' dang lha ma yin// nam mkha'i lding dang myi 'am ci// gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che// 'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu// de bzhin yul skyong myig myi bzangs
189a7(mdo): 'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang // mye'u zung dang drang srong gzugs// nor bu bzang sras gang ba dang // sna tshogs gzugs can stond pa dang // rgyal po dang ni ded dpon dang // tshong dpon de bzhin khyim
189a8(mdo): bdag dang // bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang // dge sbyong stag dang seng ge dang // khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi lha// shing lha de bzhin lo tog lha// gang ga' si ta yA mu na// zla ba skal ldan ru sbal nya// lag
189a9(mdo): 'gro dang ni zod pa can// skal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang // me tog rgya rlabs chen po dang // sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs// de ltar 'gug pa bstand pa dang // de ltar slar gshegs gsol
189b1(mdo): ba nyid// sbyin sregs 'dra ba 'di nyid ni// sgyu 'phrul mad 'byung gsang sngags 'grub// rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub// don yod zhags pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// de nyid dngos grub rab ston la// mchod rten
189b2(mdo): dkon pa myug lag khang // lha'i gnas dang de bzhin grong // grong khyer nyid dnga'abab chu dang // / mtshe'u dang steng ka chu bo dang // phreng dang de bzhin char 'bab dang // 'brug sgrogs dang ni glog 'gyu dang // gzhan
189b3(mdo): yang mye ni 'bar ba dang // dud pa'i phung po ste 'gyed dang // skyes bu go cha gyod pa dang // de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong // khyu mchog grub pa mthong ba dang // de bzhin rmad du byung ba ste// rdzas nyung sbyar ba tu
189b4(mdo): gyurang byung // de nyid dngos grub bla na myed// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas// bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad// rigs sngags 'chang rnams blags pas 'grub// dbul po rnams ni nor rdzob
189b5(mdo): cod// sdang ba rnams ni byams par bgyid// mu stegs can rnams dad par bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bkri da// gdul dka' rnams ni tha rad par 'tshal// dge slong nas ni
189b6(mdo): bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzinang bla na myed pa thob// chos 'dod nams ni sangs rgyas mthong // sdig byed pa rnams sdig 'jig/ myi rigs byed rnams tha rad pa 'thob// mnas
189b7(mdo): byed lnga 'ams nas dag dod// dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin mchog/ ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dus// ma gal pa rnams smol ba'i chu// tha rad pa'i lam du 'gro bar gnas// ma grol dzan
189b8(mdo): 'gro kun lus grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// lung ma bstand pa lung ston byed// skyon dang dri ma sdig pa rnams// thams cad mod la spong bgyid de// de las sogs pa'i las rnams ni//
189b9(mdo): blags pas 'grub par bgyi ba lags// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten 'das// dod kyi dngos grub bla na myed// gang dang gang du sbyong ba bgyid// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yid//
190a1(mdo): la bsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir ni yid kyis rnam bsams pa/ ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang // ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa// de ltar rnam 'phrul stond par bgyid/ tshes grangs rgyu skar//
190a2(mdo): sbyar myi 'tshal// smyud pa bgyi ba myi 'tshal te/ cho ga ji bzhin dus ji bzhin// cho gas rigs sngags rgyal po bzlas// rigs sngags 'chang ba phrang gyur da cing // legs par zhus bgyis gos gtsang dag//
190a3(mdo): bkos pa bden pa smra ba dang // bla ma la ni gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog// sdom la gnas shing tshangs pa s+yad// chos ma yin pa spong byed dpa/
190a4(mdo): gal te de nyid grub 'dod na// chang dang sha dang snyun 'tshong dang // 'dres dang zas 'phro spags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa su na 'byin pa// rigs sngags rku dang cho ga rku// chos rku gsang sngag
190a5(mdo): rku ba dang // de bzhin yi ge rku ba dang // ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis// de dag la ni dngos grub myed// ma rungs pa ni dam// tshig nyams// yid gcugs pa ni myed par byed// sdig pa'i
190a6(mdo): chos ni kun tu myod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyis smad// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smad// rtag tu chos kyi sdong dum gyur da// shaM nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol// rtag tu smad
190a7(mdo): pa'i gnas su gyur pa// dbul po lu ni skams pa dang // mdze dang khyi rdos 'dobs pa dang // sdug bsngal rkun ma chos sun 'byin// chos rku ba'i lus can ni// 'jig rten 'dir ni bder myi 'gyur// 'jig
190a8(mdo): rten pha rol da ga la bde// sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin// de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas ni// rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing // rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pha dang / ma dang /
190a9(mdo): bla ma dang / ston dang pa ni/ skyob pa dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen mdzad pa/ stond pa mchog sbyin pa/ dngos grub dang myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ rga shaM las tha rad par byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa/ nor sbyin
190b1(mdo): ba/ longs spyod sbyin pa la dad pa// mchog bskyed pa/ de nyid 'jig rten gyi bla ma/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po/ dbang phyug mgon po mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshog/
190b2(mdo): stond par mdzad pa// dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las/ yongs su tha rad par bgyid pa/ nad sna tshogs sbyong bar grub pa/ rin po che sna tshogs
190b3(mdo): sbyin par bgyid pa/ 'jig rten na sdig pa sna tshogs seld par bgyid pa// bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs bgyid pa lags te/ de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams cad rab tu spyan par
190b4(mdo): bgyid pa/ rtag tu 'bad pas shin tu gus par bgyid pa lags so// de nas rdzas kyi sman bsgrub pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ seng ge li lce dang / snying dang / myig dang /
190b5(mdo): de bzhin du nya phyis kyi phye dang / ldong gros dang / bra ma 'aM 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / pad ma dang / pad ma'i ze ba dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / na ga pus
190b6(mdo): pa dang / l-i shaM dang / rgya spos dang / de bzhin du 'gyi wang dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gurakum dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / srig ka dang / de dza ba ta
190b7(mdo): ste/ de ltar cha mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad/ phye ma zhib mor byas la/ dngul gyi snod bkang ste dar kyis g.yog/ don yod pa'i rgyal po s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du
190b8(mdo): ze bzlas brjod bya'o// dus gsum du lajo bo'i rgyal po/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas dbang bskur cing / phyag rgyas kyang lan nyi shu wa gcig tu dbang bskur ro// khri tshang nas cha sngar byas te/
190b9(mdo): phye ma dang / til mar dang / nor bu dang / myig bskus pa dang / tal mar tshos pa dang cha lnga'o// phye ma ni pad ma mu ru ka'i phye ma dang s+phar la waM bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos ni lnga stong ngo // til
191a1(mdo): mar ni ma ha rbu di ras grub ste/ brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo // nor bu ni sbrul gyi khyi khrag gis sbrus ste/ khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// 'khro bo'i
191a2(mdo): rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o// myig sman ni rma bya'i myig chu dang / 'ug pa'i myig dang / glad pa dang sbyar la/ khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal pos stong rtsa brgyad do// bram te'i la srad
191a3(mdo): nyi shu/ gan dar ba te'i la srang brkyang/ yungs kar srang bcu drug/ 'o ma srang brgya/ ba sar mo grub po'i 'o ma dang / ba'i lci ba dang / ba'i gcin srang bdun/ du rus ka srang gnyis te/ rdzas 'di nas
191a4(mdo): chu dang / bsres nas pad ma'i sdong bus dkrug cing zangs snod du btso'o// mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas/ cho ga dag gis srung ba bya// cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyar/ me
191a5(mdo): tog bdug spos dag gis bdug// til mar mchog ni bsgrub par/ bya'o// chu ngur mye bud grub pa mchog// spos kyi shing gis// bud pa bzang // 'di ltar grub par shes pa dang // 'azhi po
191a6(mdo): rgyal po dbang bskur ba/ nyi shu gcig tu dbang bskur ro// til mar de ni snod rtsang ma// zangs snod yang na rdul snod bzang / smyig ma'i snod du bzhag par bya// de nas rigs sngags
191a7(mdo): brgyad stong dang // 'azhi bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid// so so dag tu bzlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa der gzhag par bya ba ni/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar byas
191a8(mdo): nas bzhag cing / slob dpon gyi las kyang bya ste/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba
191a9(mdo): phyag bya ba dang / s+yai sdug bcing ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / bsrung ba'i cho ga dang / nye reg bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / mchod phyir thogs pa ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon kun gyis de dag
191b1(mdo): thams cad bstand par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por gzhag pa la/ rigs sngags 'chang sbyang ba'i cho ga byas pas/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad/
191b2(mdo): bzlas brjod bya// 'gro bo'i rgyal pos kyang stong sa brkyang du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brkyang du dbang bskums/ phyag rgya bcings nas nas gsum 'dra bar dbang bskur ro// de nas/
191b3(mdo): thams cad bya ste/ yungs kar kar po grub pa la rigs sngags 'chang gis brkyang stong bzlas brjod byas la/ pad ma'i mchog gtso bo rtsang ma/ rtsang mar byas pa/ legs par bkrus pa/ sbyangs pa phye ma zhi
191b4(mdo): du gtags pa/ thal ba lta bu brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas/ sdong dkang / ku gul dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / sreg ka la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas byas nas/ snod kyi
191b5(mdo): nang du bka la/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i steng du so sor ka/ zhag go// de nas 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing / phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/ gang gi tshe don tu bya
191b6(mdo): ba byung ba po'i tshe/ bya ba thams cad byed do// gser ram yang na dngul lam zangs las pad ma'i tshad du byas pa/ 'dab mashu rtsa gcig pa dang / snying po dang / ze ba can dang / de bzhin du
191b7(mdo): sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la/ sdong bu sor bcu drug pa 'tshang rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/ skud pa dmar po'i zhags pa pad ma'i tshon dmar pos zhen pa/ gzho nus bkal ba grub pa dang / de dag la brgyad stong/
191b8(mdo): bzlas brjod bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing / phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la/ mkhas pas gsang ba'i gnas su kazhago// gang gi tshe don tu bya ba byung ba de'i tshe/ las thams cad grub
191b9(mdo): pa stond to// shaM nad tu gas bzhing gsang bar bya ste/ su la yang myi sbyin no// sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par gyurd pa/ dam tshig nyams pa yang ba la bgyegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing / 'phral du
192a1(mdo): mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub rnams kyang shes par myi 'gyur ro// gzhan ni sangs rgyas la gus shing / sangs rgyas chos la sten byed pa/ 'phags pa'i chos la/
192a2(mdo): dad pa dang / byams sems snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ de'i lag tu rab tu sbyin bdag gi srog gzhan btang bar bya// de dag dngos grub mchog yin// blags dang mthong ba tsam gyis ni// ji ltar yid la byas
192a3(mdo): pa bzhin// rjes su mthun pa'i las byed do// 'jig rten 'dir ni rtag tu bde// 'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin// 'gro ba'i lam ni bde bar 'gro// gang na 'od dpag myed pa bzhugs// bde ba can du
192a4(mdo): rtag tu 'gro// rdzus te skye ba'i pad ma las// rgyad rnams ku na kyis rnam par brgyan// tshe rabs dag ni dran 'gyur te// sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rigs sngags 'chang rmongs pa
192a5(mdo): chen po'i dam tshig stond par 'dod pa// rtsang mas legs pa/ ra khrus bya/ gos rtsang ma bgos nas/ nyin zhag gcig/ smyung ba byas pas/ lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras
192a6(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon tu gzhag ste/ me tog dang bdug spos dbul zhing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi sku gzug sa dang / phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa bya'o// 'phags
192a7(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug/ lag na rdo rje la gu gul gyi bdug spos kyis bdug/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha bshos dkar po dbul/ lag na
192a8(mdo): rdo rje la ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/ nyan par don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya/ mtshan mo 'khri bo'i ngal ba myed par bzlas brjod bya ste/ kha gdo'i khro gnyer myed pa dang / dr-i ma dang / ser sna
192a9(mdo): myed pas nam nangs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar bar 'gyur la// lag na rdo rje yang pus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi myig nas 'dzag pa
192b1(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gis blangs nas/ thig le byas na/ myi snang bar 'gyur ro// myig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gre'o// khar bcug na rigs sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil
192b2(mdo): 'khor mngon tu 'gyur// lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'dug cing / 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog
192b3(mdo): rjes su sbyor bar byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis 'apyod par byed/ lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis/ par gnon par byed de/ de ltar lag na rdo rje 'gugs par 'gyur ro// nyi ma
192b4(mdo): 'char ba'i dus su til mar chen po ran par bdag nyid la bskus/ myig sman gyis myig byug/ phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyidaka le bya/ nor bu 'gol bzhag nas/ gu gul gyis bdug/ 28
192b5(mdo): nyid dur smrig bgos nas/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba sgom zhi / zhi ba dang / dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam/ dge 'du/ na gyi nang du bcug par bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gi sde can gyi
192b6(mdo): nang du bzhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa'i rigs sngag/ sa 'chang de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du mthong ste/ mtshan nyid nyi shu rtsa gcig yod cing /
192b7(mdo): 'od 'dom gang ba/ stan pad ma brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i mdun kyis bdar ba/ lha'i tshogs kyi gzugs mthong bar stond to// dge slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / mdog tu mthong nas/ zhes
192b8(mdo): cad zhabs gnyis la 'dun par byed do// rigs sngags 'chang des brnyas par myi bya ste/ bdag la bstod par yang myi bya/ brnyas pa tsam gyis khyod kyis bsod nams su nyams par mya 'gyur bar bya'o// 'phags
192b9(mdo): pa'i dge slong myi dge 'dun rdzu 'phrul chen pos stobs bcu dang ldan par dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ rgyu des na brnyas par myi bya'o// de nas grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya/ de nas 'dus pa'i nang du
193a1(mdo): 'jug par bya/ de nas grong dang / tshang tshang dang / yul dang / ri brags kyi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ yul gyi skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo/
193a2(mdo): dang / de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs su mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang / rim 'gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no/
193a3(mdo): zhes smra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga 'thob po// yungs kar dang til mar gyis rang gyi 'khor kyi skyi bor gtor cing byug na/ thams cad lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yan dang /
193a4(mdo): nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su stond to// rkang po til mar gyis bskus na so'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis 'phags te/ nam mkha' la 'gro ste ji srid
193a5(mdo): du ma bkrus pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du stond to// mgo/ na po s+yan ras gzigs mthong bar 'dod pa'i rigs sngags/ 'chang de nang par sngar langs nas rtsang ma zhus byas te/ gos rtsa ba
193a6(mdo): ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs nas/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / btsun mo dang /
193a7(mdo): skyes pa dang / bud myed dang khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu rgyan dang / 'phreng ba byas la 'go la gdags so// til
193a8(mdo): mar gyis yan lag tsam la bsku bar bya'o// dpral bar thig la bya/ myomyig sman kyis myig bsku/ phye mas bdag nyid la gdab/ ras bzang po yug cig go/ byang chub sems dpa' cha byad du bya/ nor bu dang /
193a9(mdo): gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skud kyis bcings na/ de dag thams cad rgyan dang / skud pa dang / nor bu dang / rdul dang / rdo rje dang / bye dur+ya sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan par snang ngo // lag na pad ma thogs nas
193b1(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang ngo // yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang / tshangs pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa brgyad dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / rgod
193b2(mdo): ma'i kha dang / 'gul sngon dang / rta mgrin du stond to// ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar sto nad te/ je srid du zag le yod cing / dbu rgyan thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs tond par byed do// ti la/ mar
193b3(mdo): dang yungs kar sres nas/ king ku shwa dang / lhan cig sbrus nas/ lus la bsku/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/ dpral bar dbang phyug chen po'i thig le byas nas/ pad mo'i phye mas gtor la/ nor bu'i myi chug tu
193b4(mdo): bcing / myig sman kyis myig bsku/ ku gul gyis bdugs la/ shes rab can 'khro bo'i lta ba'i tshul du byas na/ mngon gsum du rdo rje 'chang ba'i gzugs su snang ste/ de la the tsom myi bya'o//
193b5(mdo): ji srid du bdag/ khrus byas/ de srid du rdo rje'i gzugs can snang la ya/ sa sna tshogs byed cing / myang dpa'ajig rten thams cad kyis/ rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the tsom myi bya'o// seng ge'i
193b6(mdo): khrag gis til mar dang nor bu smras nas lus la bskus na/ myaM 'aM seng ge chen po'i gzugs su stond to// phag ki khrag gis smras nas/ lus la bskus na/ phag gi gzugs chen por ston
193b7(mdo): to// til mar dang phye ma lhan cig bskus nas/ yung dang shing pa la sha'i mdog tu byas la us a skus na/ sred myed kyi bu'i gzugs su ste nad to// rigs sngags 'chang gis pad ma dang / til mar lhan
193b8(mdo): cig sbrus la lus la skus na dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ shing a rka'i 'o ma dang / til mar dang mnyam par sbyar la bskus na/ tshangs pa'i gzugs su stond to// glang po che'i zhag dang ti lA ma?/
193b9(mdo): sbyar nas lus la skus na/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to// ra'i khrag dang spras nas/ lus la byugs na ra'i gzugs su stond to// til mar dang / thing shing dang / pad ma'i phye ma dang /
194a1(mdo): glang po che'i zhag dang / lhan cig sbyar nas lus la skus na/ nag po chen po'i gzugs mngon gsum du rang gi gzugs su ston da la/ gang dang gang dag la thig le byas na/ ma mo'i tshogs kyi
194a2(mdo): A/ gzugs su ston to// sbrul gyi khrag dang / pags pa dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang / lhan cig sbrus la skal tshigs su sku zhing dpung pa g.yon par bskus na/ klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su stod to// pi swA
194a3(mdo): ltar khrag dang sbyar zhing / ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar gzugs su ston to// de nas gzhal myed 'ang lta bar 'dod na/ yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus nas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du ste pa 'og tu gto/
194a4(mdo): phye mas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo kun tu bskus na/ dge 'dun dag na rims su bkod pa'i dbus su gzhal myang 'ang chen po rgyar kyis brgyan pa stond to// dge slong rnams kyi steng du gtor na dge
194a5(mdo): slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la ci ltar byas pa bzhin rgyal po'i gzugs su snang ba dang / gzhan dag blon po dang // gzhan dag bkrabs pa dang / gzhan dag mdun na 'don pa dang /
194a6(mdo): gzhan dag yongs su pyod pa'i gzugs su ston la/ yungs kar ma bskus pas gtor na/ slar yang dge 'dun rnams su snang ngo // shing a ka laM lo ma yungs kar la bskus na/ dge 'dun kyi dbus
194a7(mdo): su dge slong rnams kyi mal stan gyi steng du gtor na/ ji ltar dge slong thams cad 'khod pa ltar snang ngo // ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa la gtor na/ rgan po 'khar ba zhogs pa sgur po ltag dge smra kar can nyams
194a8(mdo): chung bar snang ngo // mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gtor ba/ gal te mtshan thog zag bzhag na gzhan du myi 'gyur ro// lug gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor na/ de thur ma'i gze ba dang sbrul nag po snang ngo / snod kyi steng
194a9(mdo): du gtor na kham por du snang bar 'gyur ro// btung ba'i snod sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i steng du gtor na/ phyag dar kyi phung por snang ngo // grong khyer kyi sgo dang / grong khyer kun tu gtor na/ grong khyer kun nas myi snang bar
194b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// grong khyer kun tu yungs kar dang / pad ma'i phye mas gtor na/ skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gyi snang ba thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// seng ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas/ dud 'gro'i skye
194b2(mdo): gnas kyi steng du gtor na/ lam gyi bzhi mdo thams cad du seng ge'i gzugs su ston to// sde drag cing gtum la yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du gtor na/ thams cad la'i gzugs su sngabs/
194b3(mdo): phyogs bcur rgyug go// g.yul 'gyed par gtor na/ thams cad gnyid log par byas par 'gyur la/ mtshon thams cad dang / cho ga thams cad kyi snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// me'i nang du gtor na myi snang bal
194b4(mdo): nams snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gto ra na/ rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du gtor na tshul gyi mngon par 'gyur ro// bum pa chus bkang ba la gtor na/
194b5(mdo): srog chags chu'i nang du gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byung / zhing zang la gnas so// tshas kyi nang du sungs kar gyis gto// ra na/ me tog dang 'bras bu myi snang bar gyur pa thams cad sA
194b6(mdo): zhing shing skam po dang / tshal gyi mthard me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad stond to// nam mkha' la gtor na/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ 'dus pa'i nangangs skye bo mang po'i nang du me toH
194b7(mdo): gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/ lha'i dri legs par smind pa yid dka' ba sim par byed pa 'bab po/ las dang ldan pa 'am bzo'i las kyi gnas te/ las kyi snod thams cad la til mar rgyal pos
194b8(mdo): byugs la phye mas bsku/ pad ma chen po'i phye mas 'khor kyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar kyis phyogs bzhir gtor la/ de nas las kyi gzo bzang po mi lta ba bzhin stond par 'dod na/ las kyi snod de dang de dag nyir
194b9(mdo): g.yol las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang po mthar phyi nad pa rnam pa du ma dag stond par byed la/ nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te phyir bzlos pa ma byas na/ rin ji lta ji lta ba de lta de ltar nyo tshong byed do// chu dang yungs kar
195a1(mdo): kyis bzlog pa byas na/ myi snang bar 'gyur la/ dpag tshad brgya tsam kyi bar du khring na/ de dang de nyid du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo la phye mas byug cing / yungs kar chags
195a2(mdo): par byas la/ pad ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas/ 'jim pa gzhag la/ snod kyi ngo bo ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin byas te/ snod kyi ngo bo rdul las byas pa'am/ gser las byas pa 'am/ zangs las byas pa laM//

195a4(mdo): pos tshong byed do// yungs kar gyi phye ma dang pad ma'i phye ma lhan ci Tag sbyar nas/ tshong dus kyi dbus su gtor na/ kun tu bzod bkram pa'i snod myi snang bar byas pa thams cad snang bar byed do//

195a6(mdo): sbrul du ston to// ji srid du chu dang / yungs kar kyi bzlog pa ma byas pa/ de srid du sbrul rnams 'dug go// bzlog pa byas na myi snang b.ra'agyur ro// gtsug lag khang dang / lha'i gnas sam/ zhang

195a8(mdo): bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go// sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtor na/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs g.yo bar mdzad/ bzhud par mdzad/ 'chang bar mdzad do// tsan dang la
195a9(mdo): bzlas brjod byas nas bdugs na phyar bzhugs so// bum pa sbrang rtsis byugs pa rnams la gtor na g.yo bar byed de/ ci tsam du phyir bzlog pa ma byas pa de tsam du g.yo'o// chu dang yungs kar kyis bzlog
195b1(mdo): na phyir 'dug go// de nas rdo rje bskyod par 'dod na/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ ku gul gi bdug pas bdug/ de yang yungs kar dang / phye ma dang bcas pas gtor la/ don yod/
195b2(mdo): po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ rdo rje de dkyil 'khor las langs nas/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar bya/ 'phar bar byed/ 'dug par byed/ 'bar bar byed cing / phan tshun 'gro bar byed/ mtho bar 'gro bar/
195b3(mdo): byed/ dma' bar byed par byed/ 'bar ba chen pos 'bar bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog par ma byas pa de srid du nam mkha' la 'gre'o// chu dang yungs kar kyis bzlog par byas na de nyid na snang ngo // de nas
195b4(mdo): 'khor lo bskyod par 'dod na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ spos sna tshogs kyis bris nas/ me tog bkram pa yang bya/ gu kus kyi bdug pas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo lan nyi shu
195b5(mdo): rtsagacig bzlas brjod byas nas/ til mar kyi rgyal pos bsku/ phye mas bsku/ lte bo'i gnas su thig le byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/ de la yang yungs kar dang
195b6(mdo): pad ma chen po'i phye mas gdab par bya/ 'khor lo kun nas gu gum bdug pas bdug cing / se gol gyi sgra yang byas na/ 'khor lo de dkyil 'khor las langs nas/ nam mkha' la 'phar
195b7(mdo): sdang ba thams cad la 'bab pa byed de/ gal te g.yul 'gyed par 'bab na/ de'i tshe dgra thams cad kyi mgo gcod par byed/ snga pa la thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad la 'bab na/ 'dzeg par byed/ bkyegs
195b8(mdo): thams cad la 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / gdon rnams la 'bab pa dang / klu sdang ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed de/ ci srid du bzlon
195b9(mdo): pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar ro// chu dang yungs kar kyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'udug go// mdung rtse gsum pa bskyod par 'dod na/ dkyil 'khor byas la thod pa gzhag par bya/ me tog bkram
196a1(mdo): ba yang bya/ ku gus kyi bdug pas kyang bdugs su/ mdung rtse gsum pa nyis mab kyi rgyas thom bcu/ phyems gdas cing / mis m+b+ha/ ci'i rgyun gsum sa pad ma chen po'i phye mas gton na/
196a2(mdo): A thod pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ yungs kar kyis gtor zhib hUM zhes se gol byas na/ mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar byed/ sdang bar byed nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ kun tu 'phar bar byed/ 'gro bar byed/ phyogs
196a3(mdo): bcur 'bar bar byed/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar bar byed do// chu dang yungs kar kyis bzlog pa byas na/ slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go// du pa la til mar byugs la phye mas gtor la zhig
196a4(mdo): le bya/ yungs kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus na/ ci srid du sgra zos pa de srid kyi skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bro rdung bar byed/ rgyug par byed/ mchong bar
196a5(mdo): byed cing / phyogs bcur rab tu rgyug par byed do// g.yul ngor bus na/ 'gyed pa'i myi thams cad dang / mtshon cha thams/ cad dang / go cha thams cad btang nas bro rdung bar byed/ gcer
196a6(mdo): bur 'byung bar byed/ phyogs bcur rgyug par byed do// gal te dupa lan bdun bus na/ phyir rgol ba dang / pha rold kyi dmag tshogs des nyon mongs pa skyed par 'gyur te/ ci srid du bzlog pa ma
196a7(mdo): byas pa de srid du mchong zhing phyogs bcur rgyug go// spos chus bzlog cing zhus byas na phyir bde bar gnas par 'gyur la/ rtag tu rgyal ba dang / dpal gyi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas sgyu ma'i de 'o na nyid
196a8(mdo): bsgrub pa'i gsang sngags dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor kang du dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shi pa/ kun nas
196a9(mdo): brgyan par yungs kar dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang / phye mas bsres pas byugs pa dang / zag les kyang dbang bskur zhing / pad ma chen po'i phye mas byugs la/ lag pa'i phyag rgya dang / hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod
196b1(mdo): na/ brjod pa tsam dang / yungs kar gtor ba'i mod nyid la/ gtor ma'i snod dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu bkang ba thams cad dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas/
196b2(mdo): nam mkha' la sor bzhi tsam gyis 'phags te 'dug la/ ji srid du dkyil 'khor kyi las su bya ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du nam mkhalas 'dug go// las su bya ba thams cad zin nas/ dkyil 'khor
196b3(mdo): kyi yo byad dri chab kyi cho gas dbang bskur na/ gtor ma dang / sdod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu thams cad rang nyid 'phar bar byed la/ slar yang rang gi gnas su 'jug go// go cha de lta bu ni dkyil
196b4(mdo): 'khor thams cad la bya ste/ thams cad du mtshan stond par snang la/ byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur te/ the tsom myi bya'o zhes bshad do// de'i phyir pad ma'i dngos grub bshad pa
196b5(mdo): bya ste/ gser ram/ rdul lam zangs las shi nad tu legs/ shing mdzes pa'i snying po dang / ze ba dang bcas shing / sdong / bu dang / tshad dang / ldan par byas la/ 'dab ma phyed kha bye ba
196b6(mdo): 'khor bar 'dab ma drug bcu rtsa bzhi yod pa/ 'khru gang tsam gyi tshadad sdong bu dang / snying po dang ze ba'i tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku// pad mo'i phye ma dang / myig
196b7(mdo): sman dang / myig bsku ba dang / thig ler bya ba dang / bcas pas kun legs par bskus la/ pad ma'i sdong bu'i bar du nor bu rin po che bzhag nas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal
196b8(mdo): pos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang bskur nas/ rigs sngags 'chang rtsang ma legs par zhus byas pas/ gos rtsa ma bgos pas/ til mar kyis bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/ myig sku ba dang /
196b9(mdo): thig le dang / bdug pas bdag nyid kyi lus la bdug par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/ lag pa g.yon pas pad ma bzung la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/
197a1(mdo): 'khor gyi nang du/ bcom ldan 'das la pad ma'i mchod pa 'bum bya ste/ pad ma 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas/ chu dang yungs kar gyis btab na/ yang 'byung bar
197a2(mdo): mya 'gyur ro// pad ma sru lad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad chu'i nang du bor na/ pad ma 'gal me bskor ba bzhin 'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad ma 'bum rnams chang du 'bab par 'gyur ro// pad ma chu'i nang du
197a3(mdo): gzhag par bya ba ni/ mtsho bran nam/ steng ka'am/ chu bo 'am/ chu bo chen po 'am/ 'obs sam/ rdzi pa ngam/ mtsho'i nang ka pa yang rung ba'i gnas su bzhag na/ gnas de thams cad du pad mal mtsho chen po
197a4(mdo): 'byung ste/ ji srid du pad ma ma byung ba de srid pad ma rtag tu pad mo'i mtshor 'dug ste/ ston ka 'am/ dkun nam/ dped dam/ sos ka ba'i dus rtag tu pad ma'i mtshor 'dug go// tshal kyi 'gram du zhugs
197a5(mdo): nas/ yungs kar la til mar kyis skus pa phye ma dang / sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung ba zhig gis bzung bskol la/ yungs kar gyis gtor na/ me tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chu
197a6(mdo): dang yungs kar kyis thams cad du bzlog par bya ba yin no// 'bra sa bu ji snyed pa lag gis bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gos lag pas
197a7(mdo): bzung nas/ yungs kar gtor te bskor na/ kos dang bla re sna tshogs stond par byed do// rgyan lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lha'i rgyan bzang po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / skye
197a8(mdo): po 'dus pa thams cad kyi rgyan tu byed la thams cad la rgyan btags par 'gyur ro// yungs kar dang chus bzlog par bya'o// yungs kar til mar gyis bskus la phye mas bsgo 'gyi lu wang dang / gur kum dang / shing
197a9(mdo): kun dang / sno hr-i'i 'o mas kyang bsgos la/ de dag gcig tu byas nas/ grib ma la bskam mo/ de nas 'bras bu gcig khar bcug la/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ kha nas mye 'bar bar snang zhing / lus las 'bar
197b1(mdo): sna tshogs 'byung bar snang ste/ ji srid du yungs kar kha na yod pa'i bar du lus las 'od gzer 'bar ba kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo // til mar dang lhan cig btags pa snying por bya// kong bur til mar gyi
197b2(mdo): rgyal pos bkang ste bus na/ mar me 'bum ston par byed do// me zab khung bu'i nang du bcug na/ tsa srid du ma phyung ba da srid du me 'bar bar stond to// mar me'i sdong bu 'i nang du bcug la ma phyung na/ rtag tu 'a
197b3(mdo): ro// mgal me 'bar ba'i nang du bcug na/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'bum snyed snang ngo / gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa'i nang du gtor na/ gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa thams cad 'bar bar snang ngo // lag cha dang
197b4(mdo): mtshon ma thams cad la byugs na/ gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs la ri lu gsang ba gyi bor gzhag na / lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar snang ba nas/ lus ril 'phe
197b5(mdo): par snang ngo / lo ma dang yungs kar kyis gtor na/ lus slar snang bar 'gyur ro// lag pa dang rkang pa la bskus la/ rai lu gsang ba 'bar ba lag pas bzung ba 'am/ rkang pa'i mtha
197b6(mdo): bos bzung na/ lag pa rkang pa gnyis gcig tu 'bar ba dang / 'brel bar snang ngo / 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo 'dus pa mang po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ sde can gyi nang ngam/ rig byed bzhi'i rang
197b7(mdo): thams cad du yan lag nyams par snang ngo // dri chab dang yungs kar kyis gtor na/ lus slar rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo ri lA bsregs pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag nas/ yungs kar gyis gtor
197b8(mdo): na/ mar me 'bum phrag bye ba snang po// kun nas phyogs bzhir chu dang / yungs kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yin no// mtshal chen po'i mtha' dang / nang du gtor la shing gcig la r-i lu gsang ba bzhag na /
197b9(mdo): dang rtsa ba dang / shing gel ba dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo // ri'i rtse mor mar me bus nas ra kun tu gtor na/ ri kun nas gcig tu 'bar zhing / mched par snang la sa
198a1(mdo): can thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzind par 'gyur ro// rkun ma dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / snang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams
198a2(mdo): cad dang / sdang sems can nas ri dgas gtum po dang / bya la stsogs bar raM la gnas pa rnams/ de'i mtshan mo nyid phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'bros shing / ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byidad to// spos kyi chab
198a3(mdo): kyis bzlog par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan kyi steng du gtor la gsang ba ra lu 'bar ba bzhag na/ gzugs brnyan thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur te/ spos chu dang yungs kar kyis bzlog par 'gyur ro// mar me
198a4(mdo): bai r-i lu shar phyogs kyi sgor sbar te/ gnas rtsang mar gzhag/ dkyil 'khor gcig sbyar nas/ gtor ma'i cho ga bum pa bka nga ba gzhag grong khyer kun tu yungs kar kyais ga tor zhing / don yod
198a5(mdo): pa'i rgyal po yang dran par byas na/ grong khyer kun nas mar me'i 'phreng ba 'bar ba gcig tu snang ngo // grong khyer kyi sgo bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byas la/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs
198a6(mdo): na kang grong khyer na gnas pa/ skyes pa dang / bud byed dang khye'u dang / nu mo dadag thams dga' ba chen po rgya che bas tshim par 'gyur ro// grong khyer de dag nga po'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / pas
198a7(mdo): kyi dgra dang / chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / glags lta ba'am/ grags tshol bar gyur pa gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba dang / brjed byed dang / mye ma yin pa kang ya
198a8(mdo): rung ba grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag lang yod du gyurd cing / gdungs la bu zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing / grong khyer kyi sgor byung nas/ phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros so// grong khyer de yang kun nas gdod pa myed cing /
198a9(mdo): 'khrug pa myed par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mtshan mo 'das nas spos chu dang / yungs kar gyis grong khyer
198b1(mdo): khyer kyi sgor gtor zhing dbang bskur na/ bzlog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po
198b2(mdo): sdong gros dang / zing shing gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / ma hA te'i la dang / ar ka'i 'o ma dang / pha gu'i 'o ma dang / gcig tu sbyar ro// nya'i myig mkhris pa dang bcas pa dang / na ga
198b3(mdo): pus pa dang / pad ma'i chu ba dag kyang lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor bya'o// phye ma snga ma legs par sbyar la/ chus ri lu byas pa dang / phye ma gzhan yang bcang ngo // phye ma 'di dang / pad ma chen po'i phye ma
198b4(mdo): banangs pa lhan cig bsres pa'i phye mas lus bskus la/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ ri lu khar bcug la hUM zhes pa bsdams te brjod na/ de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing / de kho na bzhin du na pa
198b5(mdo): ba gnyis kyang lha rdzas kyi 'byung bar snang / lus las spos chu'i// rigs yid du 'ong ba rab tu tshim par byed pa 'byung ba ni thos cad du grub par snang ste/ rgyal ba'i phyag bzhin no// yungs ka
198b6(mdo): kyi phye ma blangs te/ nam mkhal la gtor na/ r-i lu lag pas bskor na/ char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// r-i lu nam mkhal 'phangs na myi 'bab bo// g.yul chen po 'gyed pa'i nang du h+ye
198b7(mdo): ma/ de yungs kar dang bsres te/ nam mkha' la gtor la ri lu de yang khar bcug ste/ steng du bltas la hUM zhes pa'i sgras bor na/ gnam lcags chen po 'bab ste/ yid myi chad pa dang / sdug bsngal
198b8(mdo): bskyed par 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du zhugs te phye ma gtor la yungs kar dang r-i lu chu'i nang du gdab par bya/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ de'i las lus bskus na/ klu chen po gzugs su snang ngo // ri lu
198b9(mdo): dang yungs kar me'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres pa'i yungs kar nam mkha' la gtor na/ 'brug sgra chen po 'byung zhing / glog chen po gsal ba snang bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang nas byung nas mya snang bar 'gyur ro//
199a1(mdo): khron pa'i nang du btab na/ chu lud nas phyogs kun tu chu 'bab par 'gyur ro// rdza ma 'am/ bum pa'am/ rdzang bu 'am/ ril ba b+hing ka ra 'am/ ril ba la bye mas byugs te/ de'i
199a2(mdo): steng du yungs kar kyas gtor la/ chus bkang ste khrus byas na/ de chu 'bab par snang zhing / de'i snod ni myi snang bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa mang po byed de/ mchog tu grub pa yin no// de nas ri tshan
199a3(mdo): po'i tshad du 'bru mar gyi rgyal po bya ste/ 'bru mar gzhan dang de bzhin du til las 'bru mar kyi rgyal po de bzhin du sbyar ro// lag pa dang rkang pa bzhag la 'dir nyam drod kyang shes par bya'o// gzhag pa thams cad haM
199a4(mdo): drod shes par bya ba ni mar sar bzhin du 'jam par 'gyur zhing / skad cig de nyid la mtho ba dang dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa de bzhin du ri yang 'gyur ro// snying po zhur ma 'dra ba 'am/ zlum po
199a5(mdo): 'am/ yang na lcug ma lta bur byas pa'am/ ka ba yang 'dud pa dang / r-i yang dma' ba 'am/ yang na mthon por 'gyur bar byed do// yungs kar dang pad ma chen po'i phye ma lhan cig bsres
199a6(mdo): pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bskos pa phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na/ thams cad myi snang zhing 'brog dgon par snang bar 'gyur// yang na myis bgrod par myi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na/ seng ge dang stag gis
199a7(mdo): gang ba lcug ma dang / tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba 'am/ rtsub pa dang / dum bu dang / khong stong du snang bar 'gyur ro// ji ste rigs sngags 'chang 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
199a8(mdo): pho bA nga ri bo ta lo'i gzhal myed khang mthong bar 'dod na/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas kyi 'o zug gi zas bos te/ rtsang ma shaM nad tu zhus byas pa gos rtsar ma bgos pas ri'i gsab du zhugs
199a9(mdo): la/ sa phyogs rtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me sbar la/ yungs kar phye ma dang sres pa 'bru mar kye rgyal po dang sbyar la/ 'bras so ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun du dus gsum du sbyin sreg+sas
199b1(mdo): bya'o// lga bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dbul lo// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la zhag cag spung ba byas la/ shand tu zhus byas la mang mas spos sna tshogs kyis lus bskus gos ma
199b2(mdo): bzang po bgos te/ 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gi lus bskus phye mas lus byugs te/ myig sman gyis myig bskus thig le byas la/ nor bus mgo bcing zhing mgul pa dang / lag pa dang / dpung pa dang /
199b3(mdo): byed pam yang bcings la/ sungs kar dang / mtshal bsres pas mi'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ pad sa chen po'i phye ma de yang phyogs bzhir gtor la/ rang gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang / pad sa
199b4(mdo): bzung zhing / g.yas pas rnam par lta ba snang ba dang / don yod pa chen po'i dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya bzung ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan cig bzlas brjod byas na/ ji ltar don yod pa'i zhagra/
199b5(mdo): pa'i mdo sde bshad pa las bstand pa da ltar ri po ta la'i gzhal/ myed khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang de la/ pa 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su sA
199b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar ro ba ta la'i gzhal myed 'ang bzhin du rmades yang gzhal myed 'ang snang ste/ ri de la rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyi gzhal myed
199b7(mdo): khang snang ngo // sA ya dang / ta la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / a d+hi muka ta ka dang / ba ri shi ka dang / ka dam pa dang / ne la dang / ba ta la dang / pA lA sha dang / u dum pa ra dang /
199b8(mdo): dong ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang / snu ma'i me tog dang / ta ra Na dang / na ba mA li ka dang / kub bya ka sna tshogs sdang bar 'gyur ro// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa dang / ri dgas kyi tshogs snga
199b9(mdo): tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe phyir bsdu bar byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ gnas gzhan du 'gro bar byed/ gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin
200a1(mdo): bya'o// dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni blags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rigs sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// don yod pa'i sgyu ma/
200a2(mdo): rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni/ pad ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon/ pad ma kha ni phyed bya ba
200a3(mdo): phyag dag ni rab tu 'dzin// phyag gnyis 'byung zhing brkyang nas kyang / bskum pa'am/ 'dzin stangs de nyid kyi/ kun nas 'phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags/ mtshon cha phyag rgya bsnams pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang /
200a4(mdo): mdung zung dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'phreng zlum dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / zur gsum ma zhes bya ba dang /
