200a7(mdo): gdugs dang / be con dang / gshin rje be con dang / chu srin kyi kha dang / sngags po'i 'phreng ba dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng zlum dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsgyings pa dang / dbugs 'byind pa dang /
200a8(mdo): myi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / glegs bam snrums pa dang / 'khar sel dang / lhung zed dang / gdugs dang / dbu rgyan dang / nor bu brgyus pa dang / gser skud dang /
200a9(mdo): mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna tsa dang / me'i zab khung ngo / kun nas 'bar 'phreng phyag rgya de// sna tshogs rmad du byung bas sras/ mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'i// pad ma
200b1(mdo): 'dzim la rab tu gnas// ras la bris pa'am dkyil 'khor ram/ rtsig pa'am gang yang rung ba la/ mtshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ gang du bris pa mthong ba de// ngan 'gro sems cad dmyal bar ni//
200b2(mdo): phyir yang 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang gyis rtag mchog sprin// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gang zhig nyes byas myi bzod pa// mtshams myed lnga po byed pa nyid// mnar
200b3(mdo): skyed pa'i gnas dang ni/ dmyal ba dag tu gzhol ba gang // phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur// skye dpa' rmi las rnam par grol// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgal bar 'gyur//
200b4(mdo): de dag skye ba phyi mar ni// phyir yang mngal gyis myi gos te// yang dang yang du pad ma las// rdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur// rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro// gang na 'dren pa tshe dpag myed // bzhugs
200b5(mdo): po'i s+yan sngar rtag tu der// skye 'gyur the tsom ma za shig/ don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags sA tshogs bde bar bsgrub// bde bar dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing /
200b6(mdo): rtag tu myi ldogs gnas 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam rgya sa// sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la// bla myed dge rtsa skyed par 'gyur/
200b7(mdo): 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob// de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa// de nyid grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu spyon
200b8(mdo): sdig pa thams cad mod la sal// gang zhig mtshams myed byed pa dag// myi bzang mnar byed gnas pa'i// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ni// mtho ris sgo phye
200b9(mdo): com myed// sgo phye gyur pa rnams la ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam
201a1(mdo): kyis sems can phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na/ shi 'phos pa'i mdo la ni/ bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs pa tsam gyis/ gang na
201a2(mdo): thug pa 'dren pa 'od dpag myed bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// kun nas cha ni mdzes par bya// gru bzhi ko la'i tshad tsam la// sgo bzhi them skas bzhi 'a yis brgyan/
201a3(mdo): shin tu legs par bskus dang ldan// 'jam zhing mnyen la mnyam pa'i// sa'i cha dang ldan pa la// dkyil 'khor shes rab can kyis dbye// dkyil 'khor de nyid thig btab la// phyag rgya bri ba rnam par dbye// phyogs ban
201a4(mdo): tsho ni mnyam pa'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying po yin// gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer kyi rnam pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba rnam par dbye'o// gru bzhi pa'i dbus su phyag/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya
201a5(mdo): kun nas 'bar ba bla na myed pa dang / phyag rgyan kyis brgyan pa mtshon/ rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol da kyi gnas su// phyag rgya bri ba yang shin tu 'byes par bya'o// dkyil
201a6(mdo): 'khor kun nas gos dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan kyis brgyan nas kun tu yungs kar dkar po gtor ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kyi phyi rol kyi gnas su phyogs bzhi kun tu bya ba ni/ ba lang gyi khyi ba
201a7(mdo): sa dang bsres pas/ shind tu legs par byugs pa dang / ldan pa la mtshon rtsi phye mas la khyer kyi rnam pa dang / kun nas pad ma chen po'i 'phreng ba rgyan chen po dang / mtshon cha bris la/ 'di'i sgo yang rnam par 'byes pa
201a8(mdo): bri'o/ ji ltar phyag rgya dang mthun pa'i ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la yang mchod yon phul ya/ dbyab mo// phru ba dang / bum pa dang / kham por dang / rdzi'u gtor mas bka pa la / gzhag go// kun
201a9(mdo): tu bum pa gang ba dang // bdug spos kyi snod dag dang / me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dkar po dag gis dgang / me tog rnam par bkram byas la/ kun tu 'phreng bas gzhag par bya'o// 'phreng ba bzang po
201b1(mdo): bzhag nas kyang / de bzhin kun tu bdug spos dbul/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du rus ska dang / sa la gyi dang / spreg ka dang / gu gul dang / sra rtsi pog sgron shing dang / gla rtsi dang / ka pur gyis bdug pa 'di dag gis
201b2(mdo): gdugs la/ gtor ma dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dbul lo// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par bya ste bskor la/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhing / phyag rgya thams cad la dgra/
201b3(mdo): zhing me tog gtor ro// gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsgrub pa gang dgos pa la/ sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyis las thams cad
201b4(mdo): bya'o// rigs sngags 'chab mang ma y-is rtsang ma yi ni go bgos la ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa// de bzhin du ni las bya'o//
201b5(mdo): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla myed pa// dkyil 'khor 'dar ni zhugs tsam gyi/ thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i// myi'i rigs nai thams cad du/ phyag rgya dkrigs dang gtams kyi/ dam tshig tu nitri
201b6(mdo): par 'gyur// spyi rigs kun kyi cho ga yi// dam tshig rjes zhugs de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang / rgyal bas lung naM bstand par 'gyur// kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i// phyag
201b7(mdo): nai spyi bor 'jog par mdzad// chos kyi ro ni bdud rtsi'i// gzi badz+rod mod la 'jug par 'gyur// rnam snang mdzad gsungs dkyil 'khor du// don yod dngos grub rtsol par mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gar bzhugs
201b8(mdo): pa// gang du phyi'i rigs rnams kyi// don yod dngos grub mchog myur 'thob// sangs rgyas bye ba gang ka'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
201b9(mdo): 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni/ tshe 'di'i yin par khong du chud par bya'o// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//
202a1(mdo): tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran zhing / 'od gzer 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing / tshe bskal dpa brgya stong dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// yon tan thams cad drim byed par snang ba don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa
202a2(mdo): stond pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa 'bob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa ston par byed do// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i rigs kyi'i rigs de bzhin
202a3(mdo): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin kyi rlabs kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mya dang myi ma yin pa thams cad
202a4(mdo): dbang du gyur pa nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor 'byor da pa gzigs nas/ bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba mdzad par 'gyur
202a5(mdo): ro// sems can thams cad phyi bzhin 'brang zhing / mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo 'i 'khor dang / bcas pa rnams kyi mchod 'os chen por 'gyur ro// sems can
202a6(mdo): thams cad kyis gcig tu bla mar byed par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dgapar 'gyur ro// mtshan ma bri ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshe
202a7(mdo): ga'o// / de nas sbyin bsreg gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi/ de nyid bsgrub pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ kye'i rigs rnams thams cad kyi/ chos
202a8(mdo): zhib mo bla myed yin// gang gis spyan bsregs byas tsam gyis/ phyogs kun rnam par gzigs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs rnams byon gyur da cing / byang chub sems dpal dgongs par 'gyur/ rigs sngags
202a9(mdo): dngos grub rjes brtsol cing // rtag tu bsrung ba mdzad par 'gyur/ mgon po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzags/ the tsom myed par myur du byon/ mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na/ rang gi gzugs su mthong bar
202b1(mdo): 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol/ rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid// nyin dang mtshan du rtag par de// rnam par gzigs 'gyur the tsom byed// dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste// dkyil 'tsho/
202b2(mdo): gru bzhi shi nad tu mdzes par bya ba ni/ rgya chen ko la'i tshad tsam la// legs par byugs pa shind tu 'jam pa/ shind tu gsal ba/ gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi dang / them smras bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa/
202b3(mdo): mchog tu mdzes pa/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po yang bya'o// me'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la// kun nas them skas bzhi dag dang // steng du gru ni bzhi pa bya// rtag tu pad ma
202b4(mdo): snying po dang / snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang // kun nas pad ma mdzes par bya// p+la g+har pad ma'i 'phreng ba bya// de bzhin du grwa gnyis kar rdo rje pad ma dang bcas pa bya'o// gsum par
202b5(mdo): mdung rtse gsum pa pad ma dang bcas pa'o// bzhi par 'khor/ lo pad ma dang bcas pa'o// lnga par bum pa gang ba bzhag go// sna tshogs mtshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i// kun nas par
202b6(mdo): ma'i myu gu bya// rin chen snod ni bkang ba dang // me tog 'phreng dang dang ba dang // phye ma pad mar bcas pa dang // de bzhin me tog sa dag nyid// de bzhin sna tshogs brgyan pa'o// nub kyi gnas dang
202b7(mdo): bla dag tu// pad ma'i 'dab ma ud pal bcas// bum pa dur bas gang ba bri// rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la// 'dir ni 'khyer thig kyang gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya ba// thig gis kun nas
202b8(mdo): cha bsnyam zhing / sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni// mtshon sna lnga'i skud pas gdab// me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can// grwa dang grwar ni me lha bri// lus ni me mdog 'bar ba dang /
202b9(mdo): lag na me 'bar 'dzin pa dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga bzhin// ba dan mda' dang sna lnga Sh+Ti// skud pas bum pa gang bkris pa dang / de bzhin
203a1(mdo): 2/ bdug spos snod dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che ba'i// sna tshogs ro ni gtor ma bzhag/ rdze'u dang kham por rnam gsum gyi// dkar
203a2(mdo): pos bkang ba gzhag par bya// rdze'u dang dbab mo bum pa ni// gtor mas bkang ba kun tu bzhag/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag/ kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing // 'phreng ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya
203a3(mdo): 'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni// kun tu mar me 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin du// dri'i phye ma lha bshos dag/ dkyil 'khor kun la gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la/ glug
203a4(mdo): gzhar dur ba rtag tu gzhag/ shing ni a rka sha kyi dang / yungs kar 'bras ni so bo dang // zhun mar dang ni mar kar dang / kun tu tsan dan dkar po dag/ sbyin bsregs cho ga pa 'di bzhan
203a5(mdo): ste// dus gsum rtag tu rig 'dzin gyis// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa/ brgyad du bya// rig pa 'dzind pa rtsang ma'i// rtsang ma'i ni gos bgos la// dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' zhing // gzhan ni ba
203a6(mdo): dad kyad myi bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas// dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing // du raM b+hA'i stan la dkyil krung du// shar phyogs kha ltas 'dug par bya// byams pa'i sems la mnyam kha'
203a7(mdo): ste// don yod rgyal po dran bya zhing // snga dro'i dus su spyan bsregs bya// gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing // s+yai'i lugs kyi sreg lugs ni// phye 'phred dus su bya'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs /
203a8(mdo): sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang // grub pa kun tu cho ga yis// bdag nyid dbang bskur e kun gyi// sbyin bsreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs// kun tu gnas ni thams cad ni// rgyas pa gnas 'jog rA
203a9(mdo): dang // kar gyi de bzhin yur bu dang // mdun na 'don pa mye lha mi// sbyin bsreg byed pa 'jig rten par// mtshungs shes stond pas lung bstand to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa/ rig 'dzind dbang
203b1(mdo): po chen po dang // phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang // mnyam pa bas kyang lhag ma nyid// mye'i sbyin bsreg byed pa la// de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob// gal te zhag bdun
203b2(mdo): dus gsum du// de las spogs pa'i las rnams ni// me la sbyin bsreg byed pa la// mo la mdzod shes lnga thob ces// de skad 'jig rten 'dren pa gsung // las 'di byas nas de nas ni// sbyin bsreg
203b3(mdo): ni brtsam par bya// bsreg lugs sbyin bsreg byas tsam gyis// las rnams thams/ 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams rtag tu 'ob 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gshegs kun dgyes par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang
203b4(mdo): byod nas na// mod la mthong ba sbyin par mdzad// sdig pa smras cad bsreg pa mi 'gyur// shin tu gyi bzang sngon gyi las/ bsreg lugs tsam gyi mod la 'asreg/ 'bar ba'i ma yis bye/
203b5(mdo): ba bzhin// de la sogs pa'i sdog pa ni// bsreg 'gyur 'ad ni the tsom byed// sdang ba phyir ni rgol nyid dang // dka' zhing / yid ni bde ba dang // lus can dag ni thams cad la// rtag tu
203b6(mdo): dkal bar byed cing gnas// rtag tu myi'i lha nyid ni// rgyu nang tu mthong bar 'dod pa yis// me la sbyin bsreg byas tsam gyis/ me lha nyid ni zhugs kyur da te// rtag tu las ni thams cad mdzad//
203b7(mdo): rgyu nad tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lA ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing // thams cad du ni mthong ba ste// chu skor zla ba nyi ma dang // gshin rje dang ni chu lha dang // rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung bcas bzhon pa
203b8(mdo): bcas pa'am/ nyin dang mtshan tu rtag tu ni// rjes 'brang bsru ba zhing the com byed// ci ste rigs sngags 'chang ngos yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bsgrub par 'dod na// rigs sngags 'chang mang ma des shin pa d+ha
203b9(mdo): byas la// gos sapas bgo bar bya// nyin zhag cig spung ba bya zhing // shing a ka'i lam khasreg shing kyi me sbams/ pad ma dang / kun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin bsreg brgyad brgya byas na/ sreg sugs
204a1(mdo): lan cig byas pas/ mtshams myed pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur te// 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par myi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dod na/ rigs
204a2(mdo): sngags 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gyi me sbar la/ rigs phyir pad ma dang / ud pal sngon po dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg brgyad brgya byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
204a3(mdo): kyi myi'i rigs kyi dngos grub thob ste/ thams cad cho ga chen po zhib mo dang / sbyin bsreg chen po'i cho gar 'gyur ro// de nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par 'dod na/ rigs sngags 'chang rtsang ma des shi nad tu
204a4(mdo): zhus byas la/ gos rtsang ma bgos te/ ser ldeng gyi me s+phar la zho dang zhun mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi bsreg blugs kyis sbyin bsreg brkyang stong byas na/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi dmaka
204a5(mdo): tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// pha rold kyi dmas chog/ sa dang / dgra bcom par 'dod pa dang / dpung gzhag par/ 'dod na/ de nas rigs sngags 'chad gyis shing ka ra bi ra ka'i me
204a6(mdo): s+phar la/ sbrul gyi pags pa rjes pa dang / skye tse'i sa bon lan tsa/ 'bras sa lu dang / sres pa yungs kar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg byas na/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol kyi dmag chog
204a7(mdo): dad / dgra la gnam lcags chen po dang / rlung grang mo 'bab pas 'phongs pa dang / yid myi bde ba bskyed par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// klus char 'babs par 'dod na/ rigs sngags
204a8(mdo): des nyin zhag gcig spung pa byas// sha nad tu zhus byas pa cang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / yungs kar dang / sha ta pus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum du byas na
204a9(mdo): klu'i rgyal po chen pos char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du 'bab par 'gyur ro// char de nyid ha chang ches na/ thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na/ ha chang char ches bcad par 'gyu ro//
204b1(mdo): yang me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing / rang ga gzugs su mthong bar 'dod na/ rigs sngags 'chang rtsang ma des gos rtsang ma bgos la/ nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur da pas/ shing snga ma'i me sbar la 'bras so ba dang
204b2(mdo): kun mar dang / bu ram sha kha ra dang bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / snga ma'i me tog bsres pa brkyang stong sbyin bsreg bya'o// brkyang stong tshang ba dang / me lha me'i nang nas lus byed phyung ste/ 'dug nas rigs sngags
204b3(mdo): 'chabs cheb kyi bka' stsold cig ces ber zhing / ji ltar rigs sngags 'chang gi cho ga'i don tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o// thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba mchog thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ bdud rtsi 'bar ba zhes bya
204b4(mdo): mi'i kha kha'i mchog sbyin par byed do// gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mi'i 'a thob pas// gang du dbugs phyung ba// bdubs pa de me 'bar ba 'byung por 'gyur ro// gang du phu zhes bya ba/ der ma
204b5(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mun nag tu dbugs byung na/ me 'bar te/ snang bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan kar po'i sbyin bsreg stong rtsabargyad byas pas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid/
204b6(mdo): kyi gzugs stonang par mdzad do// sa bon bdun gyi sbyin bsreg kI ni nad thams cad zhi bar byed do// 'bras so ba'i sbyin bsregs kyis ni rgyal po dbang du byed do// phub ma dpal na tsha'i sbyin bsreg gis ni/
204b7(mdo): 'gras par byed do// 'bras yos dang yungs kar gyi sbyin bsreg gis ni sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// yungs kar dang gu kul dang / zhun mar gyi sbyin sreg gis mi gnod sbyin 'gugs so// ka ra byaM ra'i me tog
204b8(mdo): dadag gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg gis ni srin mo 'gugs so// de bzhin du 'dir las thams cad byed do// sbyin bsreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ka'o// ri mo 'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya
204b9(mdo): ste/ kun tu thun mong bsgrub pa'i mchog/ dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing / bla myed bsod nams chen po stsogs/ don yod rgyal po'i de nyid ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag/
205a1(mdo): tu/ 'jig rten 'dren pa snang bar byed/ mthu dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba// grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas// so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni// ras sam
205a2(mdo): yang na dang dag la// 'jigs pa myed pas gzugs bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po ni 'khru kang tsam gyi tshad dam/ yang na tshad shi nad tu rnam par 'byes pa/ pad ma'i mdog lta bu phyag brgyad pa dbu gsum pa/ de bzhin du
205a3(mdo): suspyan gsum pa zhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya/ ste/ de bzhin du zhags pa 'dzind pa dang / pad ma 'dzind pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ril ba s+yi blugs 'dzind pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be con dang /
205a4(mdo): dbugs 'byind pa dang / bgrang 'phreng dang / me tog gi thum po 'ji nad par bya'o// g.yon du ni kar mo'o// kayas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud pa// rgyan thams cad
205a5(mdo): kyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ra lad pa'i zor tsugs can/ dbu rgyan 'od dpag myed kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba tshes pas/ brgyan pa
205a6(mdo): dgas kyi pags pa banabs pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang dang ldan pa'o// nang rim du pad ma'i 'phreng ba bya'o// rim pa gnyis pa rdo rje'i 'phreng ba yAn/
205a7(mdo): kyu dang bcas par ro// rim pa gsum pa nor bu rin po che li 'phreng ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs mdzes pa'o// rim pa bzhi par mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'o// rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba bya'o//
205a8(mdo): steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs sogs par bya'o// gson du gzhon nu dang gshin rje dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug dang /
205a9(mdo): bu rnams bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu 'khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni/ khros pa gtum pa'i gzugs 'chang ba phyag bzhi pa 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa sku
205b1(mdo): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'chang ba/ 'od dpag myed kyi dbu rgyan can yun gsum pa/ g.yas pa zla bas brgyan cing / ral gri 'dzind pa dang / zhags pa 'dzind pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzi
205b2(mdo): pa dang / dgra sta 'dzand par bya'o// dkar mo'i rgyab du rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag myed can thogs pa/ pad
205b3(mdo): ma 'dzind pa dang / nor bu rin po che chen po 'dzind par bya'o// 'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs can ma dang / dung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe myed ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / pho nya mo
205b4(mdo): bzhi dang / lo tog gi lha dang / so'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// steng dang g.yas phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dkyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam bya'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha gyu
205b5(mdo): skar dang bcas pa bya'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi rol kyi rim pa/ kun tu phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan sna tshogs par bri'o// klu brgyad/ bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o// rigs sngags
205b6(mdo): dngos grub bla na myed pa'i ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni/ sdig pams cad mod la sel// mtshams myed lnga po sbyong bar byed/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa dngos grub 'di ni mye'i/ riH
205b7(mdo): thams cad du 'jug par stond pa yin no// s+ye'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang byin kyis/
205b8(mdo): brlabs pa'o// don yod pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de 'o ma nyid snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di mthong /
205b9(mdo): btsam gyis rnam par 'a dad pa 'thob cing lung bstand par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bran myed pa thams cad grub bo// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par snang ba bye
206a1(mdo): klung sa kyis brgyang grong zag dag 'anas duma'i mngon gsum chum ma bar 'gyur ro// rigs spyugs sog san med pa/ 'i gas pa dag 'byung bste/
206a2(mdo): kyis bstan/ de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang / gang yang pad ma'i rigs de bzhin// nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang // rdo rje'i rigs gang bla myed pa// su rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni// ri ma mthong ba'i ltung
206a3(mdo): par yin// phyir yang ngan 'gror myi 'gro zhing // dmyal ba'i ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de// mtho' rigs kyi ni sgo yang phye// bla na myed pa ston pa'i// phyag rgya mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di// bsod nams bla na myed
206a4(mdo): yin// dzaM ste don yod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mtho bar 'dod na/ rigs sngags 'chang ba des can dang dkar po las 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sor brgyad kyi tshad cas
206a5(mdo): gnad kyi gnas kyi cha'i sor chad gi nang bya ngas par dbyes pa dang/ dang / mgur dang / rmed pa dang / pus mo dang / sman lag dang / zhabs kyi rigs dang / phyag sor dang / phyag por gyi tshigs dang /
206a6(mdo): sen mo thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo'i chad gi nad tu 'byes shing / cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i gsas phyo/ sa na Tags can/ zhi ba'i gzugs can gyan gsum pa/ byan
206a7(mdo): bAzhes tu mdzes pa dang / dbu ga gan tu mnges pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis btsun pa'i gzugs dang ldan la/ 'gas pa 'dzin dpa gsod pa/ 'od dpag can phyag na pad ma bsnams pa/ phyag dgasas nas
206a8(mdo): skye gsum pa dang / dbums byin cing tuka d+hA ma chok+Sha sbyis brgya sa dang du/ pad pa'i 'das lnga 'khrigs par bya'o// sgoms da/ mo la 'od 'dos kyang dang lus par dgad do// mnon po gan ma
206a9(mdo): ning sar rgyam pa rgyas kyis mas kyi tshog pags pa 'a sa kyitsug mas pa ma / da 'i gyimaca dang//
206b1(mdo): mchod la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'di'i dbus su pad ma ge sar dang bcas pa/ snying po dang bcas pa/ 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bris pa la/ de'i dbus su 'jigs pa myed pas 'jig rten dbang phyur/
206b2(mdo): dad kyi cod pan gyis bcings pa bzhag la/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing / me tog dgram par bya/ me tog gi 'phreng bas mchod par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mar gyurd pa shi nad tu zhus byas
206b3(mdo): pa/ kos rdzangs bgos par spyang pa byas la mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon tu phyogs par dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ mchod yon dang lha bshos yul la byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag ste/
206b4(mdo): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyurang pa'i ting nge 'dzin da yang sgom zhing / shin \u0f7fyongs su sbyang ba legs par pyod cing / gzhan gyi smra bar 'jig
206b5(mdo): pa myed pas bdag bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyisa'akhor bcing ba bsrung ba dang bcas pa yang byas la/ 'azlasabarjod de nyid stong rtsa brgyad dang / phyag rgya yang stong rtsa brkyang brtsa
206b6(mdo): na/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang / snying dka' bar 'gyur ro// 'pha gas pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i
206b7(mdo): phyag rgya gyi bor bzhag ste/ legs so// legs so// rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod padas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi chog chen po byas so// bsgrub pa dam pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa/
206b8(mdo): kyi ri rigs 'di dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang / thams cad kyi'i dngos grub rigs sngags 'chang khyod la/ 'grub kyis khyod/
206b9(mdo): kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rjes su zung shig dang / rigs sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsams pa de thams cad rjes su sbyin no// 'di ni/
207a1(mdo): khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba'i pha ma yin te/ skye ba dang dga' ba dpa'achi ba dang mngal du gnas pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang khyod la shi 'phos nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jig
207a2(mdo): rten gi khams su pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed mngon gsum du mthong bam 'gyur/ mngon gsum du chos nyan par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du tshe
207a3(mdo): tshad bskal pa brgyad stong dpag tu myed grangs myed bgrang du myed par 'gyur ro// zhes tshig tu gsung ngo // de nas rigs sngags 'chang gas 'khro bo'i rgyal po gapal 'khro bo'i rgyal pos me tog gam/ cod pan
207a4(mdo): la mngon tu gtor na/ des ma 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rigs sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba
207a5(mdo): ting nge 'dzind 'thob po// yangs pa chen po'i rnam par thar pa/ pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub 'thob/ par 'gyur ro// sku gzugs bsgrub pa de kho na nyid gces pa
207a6(mdo): 'di gal te/ rigs sngags 'chang skal ba chung ba mnar myed par gzhol ba/ mtshams myed pa lnga byed pas de lan cig nges par bsgrubs pa tsam gyis/ mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par
207a7(mdo): mchis par bgyi'o// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dus ka
207a8(mdo): du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyi brlabs de rigs sngags 'chang bsgrub na/ rgya lam du bdag gi gzugs mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing / yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su
207a9(mdo): rdzogs par 'gyi'o// mchog thams cad nges su phul bar bgyi zhing / sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa dag par bgyi'o// rje la byed par rnam par ba rad pa'i 'od zer kyi dkyil 'khoms rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba
207b1(mdo): ting nge 'dzind thob po// sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa sgo kun
207b2(mdo): tu dri ma myed par snang ba zhes bya ba'i sus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral zhing / nyon mongs pa da
207b3(mdo): bral bar 'gyur ro// gdol pas kyang dad pa dang gus pas bsgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / cho ga gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la brtsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi// rang gi gzugs kyis mthong bcal
207b4(mdo): bar bgyis/ myer gyu rang pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bsdom brtson can gyis lta ba smos kyang mi 'tshas te/ dran bcas kyis bdag rang kyai gzugs kyis mdun mchis par bkye zhing / yid la bsam pa
207b5(mdo): cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la the tsom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par myi bgyi'o// de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das/ sems cad tshe gcig pu de la rigs sngags bsgrub pa'i dngos grub
207b6(mdo): rjes su brtsald par bdag gis rngo myi thog lags so// gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong dag dang / rigs sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can sems gya gyu ba/ gnyis su myi byed pa
207b7(mdo): ngo gnyis can ser sna can/ byas pa myaM bzo ba/ pha rol kyi rdzas la brkam chags can/ gsang sngags rku ba/ yi ge rku ba/ gdug pa/ phra dog che ba/ khengs pa gzhan gyis rdzas 'phrog pa/ mkhan po dang slob
207b8(mdo): dpon/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor stond pa'i bla ma la ma gus pa/ rigs sngags kyi cho ga zhi bapo'i ston pa la ma gus pa nyid bkam chags can byas pa myi gsob nyid 'gal 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la bskyang bar bas/
207b9(mdo): pa'am/ dngos grub bstan par rdo gyi log lags so// bdag la yang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta zhu 'byung ste/ bdag la yang sun par bgyid pa/ bdag la yang ma gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas man sa
208a1(mdo): dang ldadubs thag 'byind par bgyid pa dag 'byung ngo // bdag sa yang 'thu bar bgyid pa de bzhin gshegs pa bams cad kyigasang ba'i rgyal 'a'ar dang / kye'i rigs kyi dam cig mun par bgyid pal
208a2(mdo): sa can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o// rigs sngags kyi cho ga zhipa mo dang / dam tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba
208a3(mdo): kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig
208a4(mdo): dang / gsang ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang gyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems can de dag sdig pa gdol pa zhes bgyi ste// dge slong
208a5(mdo): ngag dang / rigs sngags 'chang de dag ni smad par 'os par rig par bgyi'o// tshig pa ka ba tshig pa lta bu rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren kyis zin pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad
208a6(mdo): pa zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa/ chung gsan pa/ rigs sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba/ de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongs su spangs pa
208a7(mdo): ma lags so// de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spangs pa rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang /
208a8(mdo): phyag rgya thams cad yongs su spangs pa/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig yongs su spangs pas/ bkyegs dpalog 'dren thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad kyis
208a9(mdo): zi nad cing / nad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba/ de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so// de lta mod kyi rigs sngags bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/
208b1(mdo): phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas pas bsregs pa gsang ba bsregs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang / rigs sun 'byin par byed pa/ sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni/ des na bskal pa mang po rdul 'phra/
208b2(mdo): mo bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol kyi bde ba can myed do// de lta bas na sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rjes su sems dpas
208b3(mdo): byams pa'i sems su bya'o// gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rigs sngags gsang ba rnyed par gyurd pa de la des gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma
208b4(mdo): dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/ sto nad pa'i gus pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang khrag dang / rkang yang btang bar bgyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
208b5(mdo): stan dang / bgo bas rim 'gro dang / mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ brjed pa dang / bla mar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ dran pa tsam kyis kyang bdag gi
208b6(mdo): gzugs mthong ba rjes su su sad par bgyi/ rgyun tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// bdag rgyu nad tu rjes su 'brang ba ni ci ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa su lad pa ltar kun tu mchi bar brgya
208b7(mdo): rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad rjes su mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag gis zhags pa dang / lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/
208b8(mdo): stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ka bi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad du bsgrub pa dang / dngos grub dang mchog stsal par bgyi'o// de na tsan dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas/ 'phags pa myan ras/
208b9(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ bdeg rang gi gzungs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o// gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas par mtshungs
209a1(mdo): par bgyi'o// sa phyogs de ni stond pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o// gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyi'i dam tshig gnas
209a2(mdo): pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas so// zhes rig par bya'o// de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig par bgyi'o// lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
209a3(mdo): thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs
209a4(mdo): 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal myed khang gi gnas bkod pas rgyas par rig par bgyi ste/ de la ye tsom dang ying gnyis bskyed par bye bgyi'o// de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du gtogs pa ma
209a5(mdo): dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed/ par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na/ rigs sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa s+yan ras
209a6(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa/ shi nad tu madz+re sa pa/ sku shin tu tshad dang ldan pa phyag drug pa de bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ tshangs pa'icha
209a7(mdo): byad 'chang ba/ s+yan gsum pa ral pa'i yor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag myed kyi dbu rgyan 'chang ba zla gam can no// zhal g.yas pa ni 'the bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs can/ gzugs bsgyur ba/ dash+yam
209a8(mdo): gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tsugs kyi steng gi ral pa la/ 'od dpag myed pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o// g.yon pa ni zhal 'khro gnyer can 'khros pa'i lta stangs su lta ba
209a9(mdo): s+yan gsum pa/ ral pa'i zor tshugs 'chang ba 'od dpag myed pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ g.yas phyogs zla gam can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/ zhags pa
209b1(mdo): thogs pa/ pad ma thogs pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs pa/ dbugs 'byin pa/ rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad ma'i ba dan la bzhugs pa'o/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal
209b2(mdo): mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o/ g.yon na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o// zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gi
209b3(mdo): gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyar pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la kha bltas nas/ pus mo btsugs te 'dug par bya'o// mtshon mi tshad dang / tshad ma 'dres par byan dang
209b4(mdo): smin ma dang mchu dang / sen mo'i ka nad kyi gnas su sbyang bar bya'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po//
209b5(mdo): bam po / de nas rdzas spyad par bya ste/ 'jigs pa myed pas spos kyi rigs tsan dan dang / ta ka ra dang / pu shel ci dang / li shi dang / na ga pus spa dang / spug ka dang / rgya
209b6(mdo): skyegs dang / kha bar ni kha dang / spang spos dang / na la da dang / kur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ka pur dang / sgron shing dang / kan d+ha pr-i yang ku dang / kun tu ru dang / sha Sha ra dang / pad ma gye sar dang /
209b7(mdo): du rus ka dang / til mar dang / sra tshal dang / lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma zhib mo shi nad tu 'jam pa mnyen pa mchog 'di rtsang ba rtsa sgra spyod pas/ thub pa 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge zhing shin tu dul ba dang /
209b8(mdo): rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin tu mdzes par bya'o// gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas/ lhan cig bsgrub pa ni mchog yin te/ 'di yongs su rdzogs nas/ 'jo bo'i rgyal pos khams la mngon tu gton
209b9(mdo): te/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gi las brtsam mo// de nas rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mar gyurd pas/ gos rtsa ma bgos te/ shi nad tu zhus byas la dris byugs pas/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa
210a1(mdo): gsal ba ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor bzang po legs par byugs pas shin tu gsal bar bya'o// dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shi nad tu 'jam pa la tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis dbus su las/
210a2(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar bya'o// 'dir pad ma yang bya ste/ 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa kye sar dang snying por bcas pa/ shi nad tu mdzes pa/ shin tu bzang ba/ tsan dan dang / gur kum kyis bri bar bya ste/ der
210a3(mdo): mtshon rtsi gzhan ni/ pyad par myi bya'o// bum pa spos chus gang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu dang / gtor ma dang / gtor ma thams cad dri sna tshogs kyis bskos pa dang / ci yod pa'i gtor ma bzhag ste/ de nas 'dir
210a4(mdo): dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ gnas sam dgon pa'am/ khyim 'am kang du gnas par gyur da pa de pa 'khru gang tshad dam/ 'khru do 'am/ 'khru gsum 'am lhag par bya'o// de bzhin du bdug spos kyang tsan
210a5(mdo): dang / a ga ru dang / du rus ka dang / kun tu ru'o// ba dan kha/ dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o// me tog 'phreng ba dgram bya zhing // tri dang byug pa de nyid dang /
210a6(mdo): kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba'o// de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad ma'i dbus kyi steng du bzhag pa la// rigs sngags 'chang mngon tu
210a7(mdo): phyogs par dkyil mo krung bcas te/ 'dug nas gzhan mya smra bar bzlas pa brgyad stong brtsam par bya'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ska las 'od gzer sna tshogs 'byung
210a8(mdo): cher g.yo bar 'gyur/ rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan las rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub po// don yod pa chen po'i 'khor
210a9(mdo): rnam par 'phrul ba'i dngos grub dang / thams cad du dgos pa bsgrub pa da nyid grub po/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub po/ khyod kyis bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog tu grub zhes
210b1(mdo): sgra 'byung ngo // de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gzhug pa dang / dam tshig ni 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o// de nas rigs sngags/
210b2(mdo): 'chang gis gang gi tshe/ dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe tri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa byas te/ des na dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun tu bzhag
210b3(mdo): la/ bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na/ dgos pa sna tshogs myi lam du stond cing / ji ltar bsams pa thams cad stond par 'gyur ro// de'i mdun du tsan dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor byas la/ tsan dan
210b4(mdo): dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// de nas thal ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing / thal ba de nyid dang yungs kar gyis byugs phyogs
210b5(mdo): bzhir gtor na/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kau gzugs ji lta ba de// ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon gsum du mthong ste// ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug
210b6(mdo): mi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro// dri chu dang yungs kar gyis mngon gsum du gtor na/ phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyur ro// rdal ba des rab tu bdugs te/ dur khrod kyi nang du zhugs na
210b7(mdo): 'byung po'i bdag po dpung dang 'khor du bcas pa mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur da nas gnas te/
210b8(mdo): bdag dang nor kyis bgyi ba ci mchis shes bya ba byed do// rang la byugs te tshogs kyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na stond pa ji lta ba de ltar rigs sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa'i 'os chen
210b9(mdo): por 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ don dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// thal bas lus bskus te klu'i mtshor zhugs na/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang
211a1(mdo): tu gyur nas gnas te/ bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing / 'i srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rabs thugs te rgyas po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun mo dpa' 'or num
211a2(mdo): dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ rde ba kyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdus na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ don yod pa chen po dang / mchod
211a3(mdo): pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin/ gang dang gapa la thal bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sngag
211a4(mdo): pa dang sgrub pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khas
211a5(mdo): su skye bar 'gyur ro// byas pa myi gzo ba gsang sngags kyis// gdol pa ma gus pa/ bla mar myi byed pa/ rlom sems can// nga rgyal dang ldan pa bdun gyis phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti
211a6(mdo): mug can/ stsogs pa la zhes pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can de/ dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de dag yun ring por tha rad pa myi rnyed pas/ dus gsum gyi de
211a7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rigs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba rgyud par rang gi brgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha
211a8(mdo): rol chud gson pa/ dag ni ma gtogs ste/ de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems can sgrol bar rngo myi thog lags so// sangs rgyas thugs rje
211a9(mdo): chen pos bka' sa lad pa'i yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rngo mya thog lags so// de lta mod kyi sdug bsngal mang po brgyad pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub ni byams pas 'thob ste/ byams pa
211b1(mdo): dang gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/ byams pa'i ras gri thogs pa/ sems can thams cad sa phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la don kho na nyid bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas/ rjes su
211b2(mdo): gsang ngo // mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis/ spos kyi gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugs su mngon gsum du mthong ba mtshungs po nyid khong du chud par
211b3(mdo): 'o// sangs rgyas bye ba gang ka'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa mngon gsum du mthong ba 'o na dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs par khong du chud par reg par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o//
211b4(mdo): de nas phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bsgrub par 'dod pa'i dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ rigs sngags
211b5(mdo): 'chang ngam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rigs sngags 'cha gis phyir/ mya ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum du ga/ shegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong par 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa
211b6(mdo): s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rigs sngags 'chad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin de mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
211b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod na/ cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas pa/ bya ba dang bcas pa des myur ba dang / shin tu sbyar ba dang / mgyogs par 'dzis/
211b8(mdo): rten thams cad kyi mngon gsum du cho 'phrul du byung ba'i gsang ba bston pa mthong ste/ 'dil som nyi dang nes nung bskyed par myi byA/ the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par gyi bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'cha
211b9(mdo): gyis 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser mdog can sor bzhi tshad tsam tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ ral po'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ sha nad tu tshad dang ldan pa/ cha byad mdzes pa cha shi nad tu rnam
212a1(mdo): par 'byed pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa 'od dpag myed pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba ches pa/ phyag g.yon na yad ma dang / ril ba kyi blugs snams pa/ phyag g.yas kyi 'jigs
212a2(mdo): pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga pur dang / kla rtsi dang / ring bsrel gyis bkang ba/ g.yas na lA mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa lal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / g.yon na rdul las
212a3(mdo): dkar mo thal mo sbyar te/ yad tsam 'dud pa pad ma'i bdan la bzhugs par bya'o// steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag myed dkyis mo krung bcas te/ bzhugs pa dang / g.yon na shaka kyo'i rgyal po dkyil ma krung
212a4(mdo): banas te bzhugs pa bkod par bya'o// 'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par bya zhing / gnad dang gnad shi nad tu rnam par 'byes pa/ skra dang dpral ba dang / sbyin ma dang / shangs
212a5(mdo): dang / snyan dang / zhal dang / mgul pa dang / dpung pa dang / nu ma/ dang / rkyed pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad du mdzes pa
212a6(mdo): sku chu zheng gab cing mthon dman ran pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po 'chang ba bya'o// las shi nad tu yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu mtharaphyind pa dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug na/
212a7(mdo): gzugs zin par rig nas/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya 'am/ tshes brkyang dam/ bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ chu skar bkra shis pa rgyas kyi nyi ma dag mdu
212a8(mdo): ba rnyed nas/ dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shi nad tu mdzes par bya ba ni/ gru bzhi la cha legs par phye ba/ ka la'i tshad tsam la/ zem sgras bzhi brgyan pa/ zhu gsum par dge bar bya ste/ chung ba dang
212a9(mdo): lhag par ni myi bya'o// legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ snyi ba mnyen pa dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa ni/ shi rang tu rnam par 'byes pa sgo ban
212b1(mdo): pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khom don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bu'o// phyi rol kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su marnam pa brgyad du brel/ lho'i grwa'i gnas su de bzhin
212b2(mdo): gshegs pa'i rigs mchon snga tshogs kyis bro'o// de nas byad kyi grwar bri ba ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon gyi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o// de nas nub kyi grwar bri ba ni/ nor bu'i rigs dkyis 'azho
212b3(mdo): tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o// de nas shar gyi zla baglang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khoram chon mi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shind tu gsal bar bri'o// shar phyogs kyi ri bo
212b4(mdo): ya me tog dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ ri'i lha dang / bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dka' bo dang / nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum bcu
212b5(mdo): gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor ri spos kyi ngang / ljang dri ba'i tshogs kyis gang bshing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin/ tu mdzes pa bri'o// nub phyogs kyi skor te se lha rnams kyi gnas
212b6(mdo): me tog sna tshogs dang / 'khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs mchogakis rtag tu gang ba bri'o// legs par zin nas kun tu ni/ mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'bar 'phreng ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
212b7(mdo): rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs nyid gzhag go// nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs bkazhag cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / thams cad du rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhag na/ phyi'i rigs
212b8(mdo): 'grub bo// sku mo smom pa 'i ngo'o nyam la gzhan no/ rirabs gos dkar po// dab myed pa'i ti sa'i so mor ro// rlos ma 'dun ni thos kyi dang ldang la gzhag go// phyogs kyi rlom pa nyi mo ri po/
212b9(mdo): mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// lce phyogs kyi sgo srid mo ras pa gcig sa/ srin mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor de rje lu ku rgyal rgyud bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// byas
213a1(mdo): phyogs kyi sgor 'khro gnyer can rgyal mo 'khro gnyer can bdun kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// de nas 'jigs pa myed pas mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gi mdog can ring bsrel dang ldan pa
213a2(mdo): don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o// grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs po che go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can mtshon cha 'bar ba
213a3(mdo): thogs pa gzhag par bya'o// gang zhig thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis srul pa/ phyi'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyas po rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa
213a4(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsgrub pa'i ched du cho ga sna tshogs dran par bya'o// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ nam zor dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// legs par bsgrub pa mthong tsam dang
213a5(mdo): blags pas dngos grub bla myed 'gyur/ de bas rtag tu 'bad pa/ yis bsgrub par byed pa'i myi mkhas so// de nas rigs sngags 'chang rtsang mar gyur pa shi nad tu zhus byas pa gos rtsang ma bgos
213a6(mdo): bas/ dar dang ba dan sna tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o// ro bro ba'i cho ga rgya chen pos snod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang / gser dang rdul gyi sdod du mchod yon dbul zhing /
213a7(mdo): ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya/ de bzhin du 'bras bu sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha zas kyi gtor ma yang dbul lo// me tog sna tshogs dgram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis
213a8(mdo): bkang ba dang / bus pa dang / rdzing bu dang / por zlum dang / kham por dang / dbab mo dag kyang dkang ngo // kun tu dri chus bsgos pa'i// rgya chen gtor sa kun tu'o// sna tshogs pa'i pog por dang // sna tshogs bdug s+ho/
213a9(mdo): dbul ba ni/ a ka ru dang can dan dang // sprika ka dang / hu rus ka dang / kun tu ru dang / ku gus dang / smon shing dang / shri be Sh+Ta ka dang / ra sa dang / sar dza ra sa dang / de bzhin du ma pur dang / kle mi dang / gur tu
213b1(mdo): dang / sha kha ra'i bdug spos 'di dag ni rab tu phul/ thams cad du 'grub pa bla na myed pa yin no// sna tshogs pa'i dri dag dang / phye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid shes rab can kyis kun tu ni/ dkyil 'khor dag la gan
213b2(mdo): par bya/ sga rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun kyi me tog dang / rdul gyi me tog dang / 'angs kyi me tog dang / byu ru dang ni mu tika dang / sin tra ni la dag dang ni/ pad ma ra ka dag kyang ngo // gser dang dngul kyi bum pa na
213b3(mdo): po che sna bdun can yang gA bzhir gzhag par bya'o// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor/ kun nas me tog/ 'phreng ba ni/ chad 'byung dkyil 'khor la gzhag cing / kun nas mar me'i 'phreng
213b4(mdo): ba yis// dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la bzhag/ rigs sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pa des/ yang bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la/ cho ga bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang /
213b5(mdo): kun nas dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas la/ dkyil 'khor kyi la sa bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ bla ma mkhan po/ 'am/ slob dpon nam/ pha 'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po chen
213b6(mdo): po la dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba bsten te/ 'gon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma mthong zhing / dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas/ phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug
213b7(mdo): spos dbul ba byas la bskor ba bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis thams cad sa byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/ dkyis mo krung bcas nas 'dug kyi smra ba pa ya mtshan du snang ba mthong gi bar du/ don
213b8(mdo): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod byas la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu 'khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing yungs kar dang / chu dang / me tog gis dkyil 'a khor tu kun tu lan brgyas brgyad
213b9(mdo): gtor ba'i mongs rtag tu phrag rgya lan 'argya rtsa brgyad bcings la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri yul nas mgon mo 'jig nyin dbang sdug de yod pa'i zhags yi ma songs/ nga yod kyi
214a1(mdo): nyid mchod par bya'o// de mgon po phyag na rde dze dang / rigs sngags kyi rgyal po bra na myed pa mchod par bya'o// de nas lU po sgrol ma dang / kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o// de nas dkyil 'a
214a2(mdo): kyi lha thams cad la'o// de nas ri'i rgyal po rnams la gnas pa'i ri'i lha thams cad la'o// thams cad dang sgo srungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o// de nas phyogs bzhi kun tu rigs sngags 'chang gis rtag tu mchod
214a3(mdo): nas/ dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ 'jigs pa myed pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya'o//
214a4(mdo): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dpas gzhi g.yo zhing / gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la snyad dga' ba dang / sems bde ba 'thob po/ 'od gzer
214a5(mdo): bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkra' ba 'byung zhing / dkyil 'gro/ gyi snying po na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'akul bar 'gyur/ dkyil/ 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
214a6(mdo): thams cad dang / de bzhin tu phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha dang lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyuralha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / dkyil 'khor kun nas legs
214a7(mdo): so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur ro// de nas ci ltar gser bkod pa ji ltar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs
214a8(mdo): dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo gser gyi mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur/ sku gser gyi mdog can gzugs bzang pos bdag nyid kyi
214a9(mdo): rang gi ngo bo stond par snang bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun tu rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/ byams pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtan por gyu rad pas me tog dang /
214b1(mdo): rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang gi gyi bor bzhag nas/ legs so zhes bya ba
214b2(mdo): sbyin par mdzad cing / rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi
214b3(mdo): 'jig rte gi khams su lung bstand kyis rang gi ngo bo 'di nyid kyis yongs su dag nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi
214b4(mdo): go bo'i phyir gyi ldog pa dang / don yod pa'i rigs sngags 'ang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig/ dkyil 'jo 'di la rten pa'i skye bo dge ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas zhus
214b5(mdo): pa'i sems cad thams cad za na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das paralung bstan gyi bar du byar gyi ldog par 'gyur ro// ji ste se/ mas can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdos pa spang ba dag der zhug
214b6(mdo): sa/ gzugs brnyan las zhag 'dzag cing / sgra gyi bzang ba 'brung ste mgon po 'di myi mthong / dkyis 'khor nyid 'bar ba 'gyur/ sa 'di ga mi bar gyi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor 'dzis
214b7(mdo): 'bar bar myi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rigs sngags 'cha la mye lam tu ston te/ de nyid kyang gzhan du myi 'gyur ro// ji ltar mngon gsum pa de bzhin du mye lam du stond cing / yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs
214b8(mdo): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis legs par btag cing / so sor brtags te/ sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o// bsgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang / dbang po//
214b9(mdo): yang dag par bsdams pa sems can thams cad la byams pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba can/ gzhan la yang dag par smra ba tshig btags pa dad pa can gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/ mar 'ja dad pa
216a1(mdo): par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa/ rtag tu bla ma sa gus pa nyid kyi sems can 'di dag gzhug par bya'o// rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu ma bzhi rtsang sgra dang ldan pa
216a2(mdo): dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang / 'dres pa dang / gcig tu 'dres pa dang / cung zad bkrus pa dang / chang dang sha dang / snyun 'dod dang / sgog skya dang / kye'u dang 'dres pa'i kha zas dag
216a3(mdo): spang bar bya zhing / rang gi kha 'phro yang spang bar myi bya'o// lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar bya ste/ 'di dag bsgrub pa'i cho ga dran par bya'o// lag pa 'bags pas/ gdong la reg par myi bya'o// lhung zed dor bar
216a4(mdo): mye bya'o// rtag tu 'am phyed phyed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'phags pa 'di dag nam yang bza' bar myi bya'o// rtsang mas zas rtsadu ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong las
216a5(mdo): stsogs pa la myi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni mchog tu ma/ dzes shing blo dang ldan pa yin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chang / gyis las shi nad tu rdzogs par bya zhing / dkyil 'khor kyi bya ba
216a6(mdo): legs par rdzogs na/ de la zhag 'dzag par myi 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa 'phyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang bas rigs sngags 'chang kyi lag pa nas bzung nas/ dkyil /
216a7(mdo): kyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing / shi nad tu dri ma myed par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mgul pa nas bkrol te/ rig sngags 'chang kyi mgul du 'dogs par mdzad do// spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing /
216a8(mdo): 'di la sras kyi bu bo zhes gsung ngo // mgul bar nor bu bcings pa tsam gyis mod la de nam mkhal la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyu
216a9(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rigs sngags 'chang kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhi ba mo dang / dkyil 'khor mngon tu 'gyur zhing / rgyas
216b1(mdo): mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid spyan mtshams ma 'dug par 'gyur ro// rgya chen po dri ma myed par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin rjes su thob pas 'jig rten pa
216b2(mdo): thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul stonang par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa dang / dam tshika dang / gsang ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po sto dang par 'gyur ro// don yod/
216b3(mdo): pa'i chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad stond par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin kyi brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas pa 'thob ste/ gang dag tshig
216b4(mdo): thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam do tshig dang / mtshungs par shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa stond par 'gyur ro/
216b5(mdo): de nas rigs sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bya ba thamasacad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ s+yan ras gzigs dang/ nga phyug ring bsrel dang bcas pa de yang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas
216b6(mdo): rtsang mar gos rtsang ma'i gdan bshams la de'i steng du gzhag pa po bya'o// a ka ru'i bdug spos dbul zhing / nyin cig bzhin du nang par sngar gzhan myi smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ rigs
216b7(mdo): sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/ nyin cig bzhin du 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzug
216b8(mdo): brnyan smra bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byind par 'gyur ro// da ltar kyi de bzhin du de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba dang / mya dge ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de thams cad smra bar
216b9(mdo): 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba 'am/ tshe yongs su bad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po ma la'am/ dgra 'thab pa'am/ pha rold dmag tshogs 'thab pa 'am/ lo nyes pa dang / myo ngas dang / dkan pa
217a1(mdo): dang / nad dang / na ba dang / gdon dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gtun
217a2(mdo): po'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bde ba dpalo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing / de'i thabs thams cad kyang rab tu stond par 'gyur
217a3(mdo): ro// rigs sngags 'chang la nyin cig bzhin du khyad par du rnam pa mang po rab tu stond par 'gyur ro// kha cig la bstand par myi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can rig sngags kyi gdol pa/ rkun ma byas pa myis
217a4(mdo): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa/ bslab pa myi 'dod pa dang / yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstand par myi bgyi/ rnam par bsgrogs par myi bkyi/ skra'i rtsa
217a5(mdo): mo tsam du yang snang yang bstand par myi bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo 'di// ni yi ge 'bru cig tsam yang bstand par myi bgyi/ rjes su 'ju/ ka par myi bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang dngos grub mchog
217a6(mdo): thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan pa dang / rnam par thard pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang ki drung nas rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i rigs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor
217a7(mdo): chen po lag tu thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang / bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyid/ bdag dpa'adra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyis gus par bgyid na/ bdag la gus pa dang / bla mar bgyes pa lags/ mchod pa
217a8(mdo): dang / brjed pa bgyis pa lags so// de lta bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang / snying rje bskyed par dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur ro// ci ste bgyi ba 'di las mnga' bar myi bgyid
217a9(mdo): pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun myi 'chad par dran pa dang / bdag 'dod pa tsam gyis rang gi gzugs shi nad tu yongs su dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing / yang la re ba zas
217b1(mdo): cad dang / mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa la gzhan du bgyid na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bslus pa lags pa lags so// rigs kyi bdo//
217b2(mdo): pa rkun mar gyur pa la ni myi bgyid de/ dam bcas pa gzhan du smra bar myi bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gyis rtag tu rtsang mar bgyi/ rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu byams pa dang / snying rje bsgom pa yo
217b3(mdo): bkyeng na/ de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/ dge ba'i pyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyi/ don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rjes su rtsa ga pa/
217b4(mdo): bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi las/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs star thams cad du kun tu mche bar bgyi'o// ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par sgru ba'i thams ca
217b5(mdo): yongs su zad par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dka' bas kun tu mchibar bgyi'o// sems cad gapas pa byams pa dang / snying rje mchis pa'i sems cad la rold de rnams kyi besam pa phun du
217b6(mdo): tshogs pa de yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de lta bas na rigs sngags 'chad kyis shin tu sdom pas bsdam zhing rag sngags brjod par bgyi'o// yongs su gtong ba'i lag par bgyi zhing spar
217b7(mdo): tshugs par myi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang bar myi bgyi'o// gtor ba mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la gnas par 'gyi'o// sngam legs par byang par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pyad pa bkye'i
217b8(mdo): rtag tu yid la bgyi'o// des na bdag dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes brgya'o// rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas 'khro bo'i rgyal lo/
217b9(mdo): bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po yang 'byung che// kun tu dngos grub thogs myed cing // dkyil 'khor kum la dbang bskur ba/ sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// bdud dang bkyegs ni rnam par 'jig
218a1(mdo): gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros// gdon gyi rtse bo skrod byed cing // sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sdang ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jig cing // 'jig
218a2(mdo): 'phongs rnams la myi 'jigs stsol// rig 'dzin rnams la grub smos pa// don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston// myi'i rigs ni rab ston pa// don yod kyi
218a3(mdo): 'arigs gsang ba ni// rtag tu gzhan myin snying po nyid// 'khro bo'i rgyal po bla myed pa// de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
218a4(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i rgyal po 'khro bol gzugs su gnas te/ sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed par gyurd cing / lag na zhags pa thogs te/ 'khri bo 'di smras so//
218a5(mdo): na ma sa rba ta tha ka ta/ a r+ya ba lo kyi te shwa ra badz+ra d+ha re b+hu/ AM/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma ha pad ma haste/ ka a ka la/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hasta
218a6(mdo): ma pra ba ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ma/ nai shA tsa re shwa ra/ e h+ye si bu/ d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ ki Ni ki NaM/ ba ra ma shud d+ha sad tra/ ka ra ka ra/ kau r-i ka r-i/ ma sa ba shu pa ti bI / Sha d+ha ra/ hA hA/
218a7(mdo): hU/ swo kA ra praR+YA/ bA Sha ng+ga ra/ se ru sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ra shI sha ta sa sasa?/ pa ti man Da~M ti sha rI ra/ d+hAng+ku ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nang ku mA ra/ rud dra ba g+ha sa pa/ d+ha na da/
218a8(mdo): ma ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ de rA da ra/ sa man ta/ a ba swo ta/ bai lo ki ta/ lo kI shwa ra ma h+ye shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ sun tsa sun tsa/ ban b+ha ban d+ha/ tra Da na/ ta ra dza na/ rA dza ta ska ra/ ak+ka na ma?/
218a9(mdo): da ka/ bi ShaM tra s+thA pa ra mo tsa ka/ ka Da ka Ni/ mas tsa la/ b+ho d+hang ka/ tsa tu rAr+ya/ sad tra sam pra ka sha ka/ ta ma ta maH/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa ma sa/ ma hA Ta mon d+ha ka ra/ pra sha ma na/ mi li ma
218b1(mdo): e ne yA/ tsAma? pa ri ka ra/ swe he h+ye/ ma ta ma ta/ bi gu d+ha bi sha ya/ ni bA san/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka/ shwe ta yang nyo pa bi ta/ rad na ma ku ta ma la dam/ sa rbad nya shi ra sr-i ki ta/ ka ra bu ta sa ma d+ha/ pra ka/
218b2(mdo): bya// Shad pA nA myi ta pa ri pU ra ka/ ma ha sa rba sad tra san ta ta pa ri pA tsa ka/ sarba mA rA Da myaShA pra mar d+ha ka/ sa rba sad d+h+ya A shA pA ri pU rA ka/ a bai shin ts+ya tu man/ sarba ta tha ga ta Sh+ye ke ra b+ha ka b+han a mo gA
218b3(mdo): ra dza hUM phaT// na mo stu te sra ha// / 'khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// o bi kri ta dang Sh+Ta/ a mo g+ha sa mA yI/ a bi Shin ts+yai man/ sarba bid d+ya/ a mo g+ha a be She ka hUM/
218b4(mdo): mi li mi li swas/ 'jo bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dod yod pa chen po gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas ri chen po po ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu
218b5(mdo): g.yo bar bsams te/ klu'i tshogs ni 'khrugs so// lha'i tshogs thams cad ni dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin/ dang / man po dang / bkyegs dang / log 'dren ni 'bar bar
218b6(mdo): krur to// bdud las sogs pa sdang ba zhi yang dag par rab tu ni bar 'gyur ro// ngan song gi sdug bsngal khams cad ni rab tu na'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ska thams cad mi mchog tu dkal bar gyur to//
218b7(mdo): snang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad ni gyi sdang bar gyur to// nad thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// rims thams cad las ni rnam par gros so// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las
218b8(mdo): ri yongs su thob so// me tog gi chen po rab tu par ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa mchod par gyur to// sems pan thams cad da song gi sdug bsngal thams cadas sa ljongs su zas par 'gyur ro//
218b9(mdo): nas cus gsum du gnags pa'i bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyis 'a'ams rten pa'i lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phags pa sun ras gzigs dbang phyugs tshig gcis
219a1(mdo): tu legs so// zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so// snying rje chen po can mchog tu don yod pa'i rigs sngags 'di smras zin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / rigs
219a2(mdo): kyi li dam tshig dang / snying po dang / 'khro bo'i re kho na nyid gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor du spros shig// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phakra
219a3(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'gro ba'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bshad do// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa shin tu mdzes pa ko la'i tshad tsam shi nad tu
219a4(mdo): rnam par 'byes pa'i grwa bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang / ta babs dang / mda'i kha khyer dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rnam pa dag kyang byas ste/ mchod rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pa'i thig skur
219a5(mdo): kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o// ri mo mkhan rtsa mas snod sar pa dang / pir rtsang mas dkyil/ 'khor dam pa legs pa dar bri'o// dkyil 'khor snying po rnam dbye ba// dbus su legs
219a6(mdo): par rnam phyes// kun nas pad ma'i 'phreng ba dang // rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod// dbus su 'khor lo tag bri ba// shan tu lta stug 'khor lo dgod// dbus der rgyal po gzhag bya ba/
219a7(mdo): shag kya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// g.yas su 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin gzhag la// rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag/ de'i 'og tu 'od gzer dang ldan
219a8(mdo): bar bya ba yin// lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang go cha dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / dam+ba sta lu ku rgyar can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bas so// 'phags pa khyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'os tu
219a9(mdo): dkar sham chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo ral ba dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba gyi thugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ni/ mche ba 'dzegs su rung
219b1(mdo): zhing kyi sdug pa/ sbrul se rel khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dkra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin dang / log 'dren la bsdigs shing zhag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo'i tse to nas 'dzind/
219b2(mdo): pa dang / zag gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/ glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa'i spyod g.yogs 'phyang ba dang / spang g.yogs can bya'o// sa pa'i slar pad ma dang / ro rje gzhag ni 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can shin tu bzang ngo /
219b3(mdo): gzhag bya'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyig/ de'i sku 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can gzhag par bya'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang zhags pa phya
219b4(mdo): mthogs par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pad ma chen po 'i rigs mdzes ya zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni/ phyag na pad ma sogs par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i choH
219b5(mdo): rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na bogs pa'o// de nas 'jug pa'i skor/ tsan dad kyi chu kur kum dang / kla rtse dang / ka pur gyis bskos/ pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos dkris shing / rgyan
219b6(mdo): kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun can/ rtag tu gzhag par bya'o// ci snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs pa yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor legs
219b7(mdo): par brgyan par bya'o// bdug spos kyis bkang ba dang / mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog dang / dri dang byug pas mchod par bya'o// dzaM srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams cho gas bsrungs la/ de nas dod yid pa'i
219b8(mdo): zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing / dor sod pa'i 'gro khos dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbang bskur bcas kyis kyang 'dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// 'jig tu
219b9(mdo): gyi mgon po'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dngos grub thams cad mngon tu 'gyuraro//
220a1(mdo): gang bsam pa dang / gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byorard par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang /
220a2(mdo): phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon tu 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang gdug pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
220a3(mdo): lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / rigs sngags 'chang kyi gnas phug dri ma myed pa dang / nam mkha'i rjes su rgyu ba dang / chu na rgyu ba dang / nags dang skyed mos tshal na/ spyod pa'i rigs sngags
220a4(mdo): 'chang kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i drug mal thams cad du dbang bar 'gyur/ ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag gzhug par 'gyuraro// gang zhig de la myi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod
220a5(mdo): sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang // myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa gang rigs sngags 'chang la myi phan par sems dpa' de thams cad kyi
220a6(mdo): de dag gi gnas dang / lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rdul las 'khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam bya ste/ shi nad tu mdzes pa/ shin
220a7(mdo): tu tshad dang ldan pa zhas gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan cing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag myed pa 'i dbu rgyan cad zla ba dbul thogs pa/ zhal dang po'i 'khri bo'i gzugs/ g.yon
220a8(mdo): ba dang gams pa'i ba'i gzugs/ zhas cung bar 'dzums pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad ma 'dzidad bya/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ ral gri dbas dung ce gsum pa 'dzidad pa'o// g.yas su sku mo smo
220a9(mdo): ma me tog dbul ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// gson du lha mo'i ga sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po me chen po 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rigs sngas
220b1(mdo): 'chang dum pa 'dugs pa/ lag na tshig sam dang 'bra 'the 'ogs te/ bcos ldan 'das la smra ba'o// gzugs brtad de nyid kyi mang+ya sha dang da/ po'i kyis ma'ong ba nga / zung sus kyis chod pa da/
220b2(mdo): dkyil 'khom de 'i steng du 'tsho ba'i rgyal po bzhag ste/ de'i steng sngar bzlas brjod skyong zag brgyal bya'o// de nas gzugs brtad de 'dus zhi gso zar 'gyur// 'jag par 'gyur/ 'od gzer 'byung bar 'bru
220b3(mdo): 'byin par 'gyur/ legs so zhes bya ba 'byin par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa gyi bo 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsam pa dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'gyuraro// rigs sngags 'chang de yang bdag
220b4(mdo): 'bar bar 'gyur/ nam mkhal la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / do/ yod pa yangs par snang ba/ dngos grub dri ma myed par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags 'chad kyi 'khor sos sgyur bar 'gyur ro// riH
220b5(mdo): sngags 'chang kyi 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi tso bo dang rgyal por 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i bskas da pa zhag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro//
220b6(mdo): bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de mtshan mo 'das pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal myed khang gis rnam par 'phrul par
220b7(mdo): 'gyur zhing / tshe'i tshad bskal pa dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi chos stond par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i
220b8(mdo): bsgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o// bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'gro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/
220b9(mdo): 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / myi 'phrul dang / bzhad dgad dang / phur pas gdab pa dang / bsreg pa dang / 'phang ba dang / gsad pa dang
221a1(mdo): dbang du bya ba dang / sgyu ma stond pa dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / mya snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang / nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / sa gzhi smra ba dang / rgyu ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang
221a2(mdo): chu rkel ba dang mye dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las rgyal ba dang / mongs byed dang / rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / zla
221a3(mdo): ba dang nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / bden pa bstand pa dang / nad las btsogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dgug pa dang / 'byung po dgug pa dang
221a4(mdo): klu dang lha dgug pa dang / bud byed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dkrug pa dang / bta ba dang / dgos pa la sosogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mod la dngos
221a5(mdo): grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// las thams cad byed par 'gyur// ro// blags pa tsam gyis las dang / dngos grub dang / bsku ba pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang /
221a6(mdo): pha rol dmag tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir bzlog par 'gyuraro// dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur te/ skal ba
221a7(mdo): ngan pa dang / nor chung za ba dang / myi 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i myis ma ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin no// 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs la
