221a9(mdo): bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub bob par 'gyur ro// rkyed pa'i gnas nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/
221b1(mdo): rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyurd nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang / nor kyis ci srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// cod pan la a na brgyam brgyad yongs su bzlas
221b2(mdo): mthe bo'i rgyal po'i dbul bcings na/ nges par dbang bskur bayob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par myi bya'o//
221b3(mdo): sa pa don yong ba'i cog sa'o// danas byag na dang yod pa'i// du u das par 'grus
221b4(mdo): la pa'i mas kyis 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor de nas la 'alums babs nas/ 'od kyi kyi 'gro ba chen po'i mdusaldan 'das sa mchod pa chen po dang / 'azung ba ste sa rjod tu byas
221b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la ldan brgyad stong du bskos 'byas nasaldan 'das kyin pas gnyisas kyi bos rgyan / ldan 'das sa marjod pashus rab rkyen 'tsha mo dzadapa/
221b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'byan ras gshegs dbang phyug ga na bde sogs su song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa rgyan ngas/
221b7(mdo): da rnams kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod la byas so// me tog dang / bdug spos dang / nr-i dang / 'theng ba dang / thug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / sgrub grub dang / ses spyan dang / les rdom pa rnas pa
221b8(mdo): tshogs kyis/ mchod nas san gsum bzhom 'byas so// ri lo b+ha la'i gnas myed 'das gnas pa'i sgra dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / ska ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi dang / kyai 'am ci dang /
221b9(mdo): chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so// dkyis 'khor gi sgra de dag la yang mardzo ba bya'o// khor chen po de dag la yA mchod pa bya'o// lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang / mngon tu bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas/
222a1(mdo): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje yud tsam cig cad kyi sme bar 'dug par gyu rang to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag nardo rje 'gying bka dang / brjid bka 'gros kyis la
222a2(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
222a3(mdo): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ byang chub sems
222a4(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shi nad tu zab pa/ shi nad tu rtogs par dka' ba/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shi nad tu zab pa/ r-i rab chen po ltar
222a5(mdo): sha nad tu mya g.yo zhing myi skal ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shaM nad tu bzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa mang po dang / ri mo'i sku
222a6(mdo): gzugs bri ba mang po dang / bsgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mang po dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul ba dod ldos/ blags pas
222a7(mdo): 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan tu gyur na la/ ji ltar bsgrub pa re jo thog/ ji ltar nges par bzung bar rngo thog lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya
222a8(mdo): dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad pa dang / gtor ma tha dad pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mtshon yon dang /
222a9(mdo): zhabs bsil dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / dkug pa dang / dam tshig dang / zhus dang / smyung ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin pa sreg dang /
222b1(mdo): srar gshegs su gsol ba nges par 'azung ba 'am/ dran par bgyi ba 'i ltar lo thog/ bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen pos sems can kyi myod pa rmugs par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/ rigs kyi rdum
222b2(mdo): nams sam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rde'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs kyi rigs sngags 'chang de rnams
222b3(mdo): kyis don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di nges par gzung ba ji ltar rdo thog/ rigs sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub pa rdo thog/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la mchog tu yang mtshan skyes pa de dag
222b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis the tsom gcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom gcad pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan da tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
222b5(mdo): shag kya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la/ 'di skad ces bka' saHla to// lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod/ pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po smrab
222b6(mdo): grub pa la gang gi tshe/ dngos grub kyis dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe/ glo chen po'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur// dngos grub chen po'i chen por 'grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po
222b7(mdo): chen po skye bar 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub
222b8(mdo): gang gis sgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ lag na rdo rje gapa la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam kye byang chub kyi sa bon kyi 'bras bu
222b9(mdo): thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong
223a1(mdo): bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rnge'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan gang su yang rung ba bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ring bsrel yungs/
223a2(mdo): kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig 'thob par 'gyur la/ des ring bsrel de za a tog gi nang du bcug ste/ nyin cig bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang khrus las stsogs pa byed cing / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug
223a3(mdo): pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi mchod pa byed na/ lag na rdo rje rigs sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang / mchog dang / bla na myed pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang
223a4(mdo): du dgos pa sbyar ba de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur ro// rang bsrel la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byas pa de rig sa kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/
223a5(mdo): rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud myed dam/ skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag/ gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang ga'i
223a6(mdo): klung gi bye ma dang / mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ brjed pa dang / gus pa dang / bstod pa dang / phyag byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du

223a8(mdo): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan kab su yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rnge'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ skyes pa'am/ bud myed dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo re
223a9(mdo): ngag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyis brlabs kyis byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung bstand par 'gyur ro// shes rab dang zabs la mkhas pa'i rtsa ba dpag tu myed par
223b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu myed pa thob par 'gyur ro//
223b2(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par tha rad po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu myed par thos
223b3(mdo): par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen por brjod pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin kyis brlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin da 'thob par
223b4(mdo): yang de dag par 'gyur ro// de ltar dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje khyod so la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras
223b5(mdo): gzags dbang phyug la yongs su dras shig dang / dris pa de'i lan ljon par 'gyur ro// da nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang /
223b6(mdo): rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phya ga 'tshal te/ song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
223b7(mdo): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rab du phyug gangan pa de logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la gyi 'os phyag byas te/
223b8(mdo): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhis 'dzum la/ gdong 'khro gnyer myed pas 'phags pa 'argyan ras ga zigs dbang phyug la myig kyi 'dzums par lta 'ang / 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun tu
223b9(mdo): 'dug nas rdo rje gso zhing gdong du ltas te rtog cing 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'argyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpe na me po phyag ma rdo
224a1(mdo): la 'di skad ces smras so// lag mdo khrod kyi gso bar mdun du 'dug ste/ ro rdo gso ma'i bapal mi zhis lta/ ci'i ga yongs su 'drib pa 'dod/ me'ig gsos pa 'debs par 'dong / yan na/

224a6(mdo): 'i gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni gang / snga ma ni gang phye ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang / ma tha ma ni gapa lags/ mang du yongs su zhu'o// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag

224a8(mdo): po'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par tha rang pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por rim par phye ste/ rjes su bzung ba de nges par gzung bar myi nus/ bcom

224b1(mdo): par phye ba dang / ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga mthal dag nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba the tsom gcad pa'i slad du sems dpa' chen pos bka' bal du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
224b2(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje yun ji srid cig nas spobs pa gang zhig skyes te/ pal yongs su 'dri/ lag na rdo rje
224b3(mdo): nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig pa rtags gcig pa/ chos gcig la zhugs pa/ dbyangs dang / khams dang /
224b4(mdo): snying po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o// de ste mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'ang / sa pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

224b6(mdo): sbyin par mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun snga tshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid
224b7(mdo): dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku la dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes so// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje de bzhin du// 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i 'grus pa/ byang chub seMs
224b8(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang gcig nyid las de thams cad du rjes su 'gre'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'a
224b9(mdo): ba'i rdzu 'phrus kyi lus kyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongs su smyidad par byed pa'i gnas bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rjes su 'jo/
225a1(mdo): cing / de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur
225a2(mdo): ro// de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyi rdzu 'phrul kyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par
225a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar gzungs dang / taM pe 'dzind yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dpal bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje lta bu'i'aM ting nge 'dzin da dang / rgyal mtshan
225a4(mdo): kye rtse mo dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba/ ra l-i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'jan dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od gzer rab
225a5(mdo): tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dza/ na dang / stobs dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / la ga na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting
225a6(mdo): nge 'dzin dang / dri ma myed pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po'i ting nge
225a7(mdo): 'dzind dang / zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od gzer gyi ting nge 'dzind dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i ti nge 'dzind dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lce'i sdug la rnam par lta ba'i
225a8(mdo): ting nge 'dzind dang / yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i kun tu bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chags pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi
225a9(mdo): ting nge 'dzand dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin da dang / shan tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sha nad tu rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nyi ma kun
225b1(mdo): tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun nas dkyis 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid
225b2(mdo): la kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i yang dag par 'dzind pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od gzer gyi ting nge 'dzind dang / pad ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / don yod pa
225b3(mdo): kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / don yod pa dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun tu don yod pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rgya chen por dbugs 'byind pa don yod pa rin po che'i ting nge 'dzind dang /
225b4(mdo): dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don
225b5(mdo): yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzind dang / pad ma'i lcags kyuli/ ting nge 'dzind dang / dri ma myed pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i
225b6(mdo): 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rtogs pa tri ma myed pa 'thob pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun tu lta ba rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
225b7(mdo): 'dzind dang / rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa li ting nge 'dzind dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi rtse bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin da re re yang 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag gang ga'i klung kyi bye
225b8(mdo): ma dang mnyam pa thams cad rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa 'di'i byin gyi brlabs kyis kyang / don yod pa zhags pa'i snying po klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang
225b9(mdo): bsgrub pa dang / phyag rgya bcing bas yon tan de dag 'thob par gyur to// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan gsum/
226a1(mdo): rnan par byed na/ lag na rdo po sems can de dngos kyul dod yod pa 'jol par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'grus pa rjod sa napa dang / ra ba'ide gshenas pa sa parim song ba dang / gzu ma 'on yod pa
226a2(mdo): pa dang / ting nge 'dzinang don yod pa 'thob pa dang / bsod nams stsogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam
226a3(mdo): par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyis brlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba
226a4(mdo): don yod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang / blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab zab mo rnam par 'phel ba don yod
226a5(mdo): pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa bcu yong su rdzogs pa don yod pa/ dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim/ 'gro dang / bla ma dang / gus par bya ba'i don yod pa de'i phyir/
226a6(mdo): lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes mying gdags pa byas na/ lag na rdo rje rigs sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye ba ra 'gyur/ sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ dran pa dang / blo gros
226a7(mdo): rmongs par 'gyur te/ de'i gnas ni myi snang na/ su zhig smra bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa'i 'gas pa'i mying du
226a8(mdo): dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de ni don yod pa'i 'gas pa'i mying du dmyigs so// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzinang byang chub sems dpa'
226a9(mdo): sems dpa' chen po s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni don yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o// de'i snying po'o// snying po gang
226b1(mdo): yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mying du dmyigs so// gang yid la sems/
226b2(mdo): pa dang / gang don tu gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'gugs par 'gyur/ le nad par 'gyur te/ shi na tu ring po nas kyang ye shes kyi zhags pas 'gugs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de bas na/ don yod
226b3(mdo): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mying du dmyigs so// lag na rdo rje gang gis ting nge 'dzin da 'di 'thob pa de la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ glo dman par 'gyur te/ gnas 'di ni myi snang ngo // lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzungs/
226b4(mdo): kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo/ 'di'i gsang sngags rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor kha ton
226b5(mdo): nyid du gnas te/ thams cad so sor yang dag par shes so// 'di lta ste don yod pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod/ pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i pad ma
226b6(mdo): lugs kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi bam tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa lhun po'i snying po
226b7(mdo): sangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don song pa drim myed pa'i pad mA zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / dor yod pa'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i ying bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya/
226b8(mdo): ba'i gzungs dang / drod yod pa rnas par 'phrul ba mi 'ong zer zhes bya ba'i gsungs dang / dod yod pa phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don song pa'i ri rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rab tu gnas pa 'as
226b9(mdo): bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yo pa sangs pa spang ba'i zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / do yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / dod yod pa bris myed pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / dod yod pa gro rgyas
227a1(mdo): pa'i zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / dom yod pa 'bar ba'i phyag zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
227a2(mdo): cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs de rnams thob pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar
227a3(mdo): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton tu gnas shing / thams cad so sor yang dag pa/
227a4(mdo): shes te/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa la rmongs pa skye bar myi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par myi 'gyur/ dran pazhan par myi 'gyur/ dran pa rmugs par myi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par myi 'gyur// /
227a5(mdo): dran pa myi rtag par myi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar myi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / phra dog gi rjes su 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ dran+ma pa'i
227a6(mdo): sgrib pa can du myi 'gyur/ dran pa sdig pa can du myi 'gyur/ dran ba 'jig rten pa'i myi dge ba byed par myi 'gyur te/ rtag tu blo yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/ rtag tu myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam
227a7(mdo): ba'i dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro// rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro// laka na de rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhi ba mo'i rgyal po de ltar go skabs yangs pa la
227a8(mdo): gang gi gzungs 'di 'phob pa de/ lagan re rje'i lta drad pa mongs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu skyed pa'i sus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su das pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang /
227a9(mdo): sadangs yongs su dag pa dang / myis yongs su dag pa dang / nas yongs su dag pa dang / snga yongs su ngas pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / rang pa 'i 'angs sungs pa 'dzem par 'gyul so/ dod yod pa'i nasas
227b1(mdo): l-i snying po 'di brags pa tsam dang / mnyam pa tsam dang / ma'ong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i bsam bcas kyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po 'di thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu 'thob pa de la lag ma dzo rje ji ltar/
227b2(mdo): rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam cig sdod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus su ji ltar mngon gsum du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar bab par bstan par bya'o//
227b3(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i chen po bstand par
227b4(mdo): bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang du chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas/ don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnam par 'phrul
227b5(mdo): ba'i ting nge 'dzind 'di dag dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon gsum du thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yad bde ba skyes te/ snying dga'
227b6(mdo): zas dka' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur de nas smras pa/ bdag sus dang / sems shind tu sbyangs pas yongs su dga' ba yid la bgyid pas nges par gnas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa mchog
227b7(mdo): tu dka' ba dang / ngo mtshar du gyur da pa dang / som nyid gyur pa dang bral ba dang / 'gyod pa ma mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o// rnam par ga dad pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa
227b8(mdo): 'phags pa gyur rus gzigs dbang phrug gi drod yong pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'dis chog tu rnyed par dga'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na ro ngas/ byang chub sems dpa'
227b9(mdo): sems dpal chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ dri ma myed par kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi dga' bar phul nas/ rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor
228a1(mdo): pa byas nas song ste/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / 'gying bag dang / brjid bag gi 'gros kyis song nas/ rang gi stan la 'dug ste/ bzhin 'dzus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas
228a2(mdo): nas/ snying yongs su dka' bas/ bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba snying rje dam pa
228a3(mdo): rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmyigs pas sems can bsgral ba'i phyir/ 'od zer dri ma myed par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul te nam mkhal la 'phangs so//
228a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu rin po che chen po de nam mkha'i dkyil pu 'phangs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten ga khas
228a5(mdo): 'odi cher g.yos par gyur da to// 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya stong pas lhag pa'i 'od gzer 'byung bar gyurd to// snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi lus
228a6(mdo): la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / ya~M dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan song du 'gro ba las yongs su grol bar gyurd to// gang yang sring
228a7(mdo): bzhi pa li yi dgas dang / dmyal ba de dag la yang snang ba des snang bar gyur pas/ nyi tse ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi gdub pa myed par gyur da te/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su tha rad nas/ bde ba can kyi 'jig rten gyi
228a8(mdo): khams su skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ lus yongs su dag par gyurd to// ka yang mnar myed pa la zhug pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od gzer gyi snang ba des reg pas/ dmyal ba de dag thams cad du par
228a9(mdo): ma'i mamo 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag kyab yongs su la rad nas/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par pad ma las rdzus te skyes so// grang ba'i dmyal ba
228b1(mdo): gang yin pa de dag kya dro zhing bde ba dang / reg bde bar gyur to// tsha ba'i dmyal bka' yin pa de dag kyang 'asil par gyur cing / reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dgal 'ar gyur to// gapas bdu 'gro'i skye gnas su song /
228b2(mdo): ri dgas dang / bya dang / ba na sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag kyang 'od gzer des reg pas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// sems can gang dag btsongs par gyur pa/
228b3(mdo): pa de dag kyang 'od gaper des reg pas/ sems can bcings pa las yongasu grol bar 'gyur to// su myi 'dod pa dang / lugs sgrog dang / lpags kyu lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa de dag kyang dum bur gyurd to// gang
228b4(mdo): snod ma yin pa de yang 'od gzer des phog pas/ mthong ba yongs su dag pa thob po// gang sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna ma tshang ba yang / 'od gzer des
228b5(mdo): theg pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lus yongs su dag / par gyur to// gang 'bras bu zhing sdo dad pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pa yongs su skams par gyurd pa yang 'od gzer des
228b6(mdo): reg pas me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu 'byung bar gyu rad to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od gzer ba bapar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa da na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
228b7(mdo): du so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag zhig brgya stong phrag gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna
228b8(mdo): bdun gi khang pa rtsegs pa'i gzhal myed 'ang dang / seng ge'i zhi dang bcas pa'i gzhal myed khang 'byung bar gyu rad to// nam mkha'i dkyil kang du 'od gzer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang byes/
228b9(mdo): bcu rnam pa kun tu rin po che rang bzhin gyi srin gyi/ srin brtsegs pas khyebs par gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab po// lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cod pan dang / dpung rgyan dang /
229a1(mdo): gdu bu dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rna rgyan dang / gser ki skud pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab po// tshon khe dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu
229a2(mdo): phab po// lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab po/ lha rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab po/ lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char rab tu phab po/ tshon kha dog sna tshogs
229a3(mdo): pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyi char rab tu bab po/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / b+ho re shau ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ts+li
229a4(mdo): mug ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / skya snar dang / ka dam pa dang / man d+ha ra ba dang / man d+ha ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
229a5(mdo): palaM las byed do// bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa yang rin pa/ che sna bdun kyi khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur da te/ gru bzhi pa/ ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ sha nad tu
229a6(mdo): 'bar ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan kyis yongs su bskor cing / mu tig kaM tra ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu sna tshogs 'phyang ba/ gos sna tshogs kyi 'phreng bas mdzes par
229a7(mdo): byas pa/ chu shing gyi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ kAr lha rdzas kyi rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ go skabs rgya che ba la 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po byung
229a8(mdo): zhing snang ngo // nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha rnams lhardzas kyi me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyas mtshan dang / ba dan
229a9(mdo): dang / rol mo sgra sna tshogs dang / saM la snyan dang pheg dab pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing 'khod do// de ltar don yod pa'i 'phrul kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs rmad du byung ba'i chen po'i
229b1(mdo): chen po rab tu bstand cing / ya mtshan yad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul kyi cho 'phrul chen po'i chen po sngar bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyis
229b2(mdo): rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i bkod pa chen pos rang gyi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya
229b3(mdo): stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon tu bltas nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
229b4(mdo): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor/ byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyis
229b5(mdo): phyag bgyis pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba// gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po chen po/ bdag gi snying po gsang ba/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po
229b6(mdo): don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / don yod pa 'khro bo'i lcags kyu dang / rigs sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis sta/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de
229b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// bdag dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga
229b8(mdo): rim par phye ba'i mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon tu gnas par 'gyur te/ thams cad so so nyid du gnas so// gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thams cad mdun na gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas byang chub
229b9(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems cadan dag pa chen po khyod kyis 'byan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan kyi bya pa dang 'dapa lugs pa
230a1(mdo): legs so// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na da smros shig/ de nas byang
230a2(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhang myag mya 'dzums par/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon
230a3(mdo): tu phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs
230a4(mdo): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzind rigs sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dpabacas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khom
230a5(mdo): kyi rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngag/ so rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
230a6(mdo): 'das pa dang / mkhyen pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyaga'atshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la satshogs pa dgal ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'khor kyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
230a7(mdo): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed bde ba can gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu myed pa la 'jig rten ka khams kyi de bzhin
230a8(mdo): gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gas pa' dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems da
230a9(mdo): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa gyen ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs sngags dang / dkyil 'khor mams cad kyi sku/ sems can thams cad sa byams pa/ kus nas don yod pa'i dkyil lo kyi

230b8(mdo): sha rang na pA sha d+ha ra/ sA mA'i tsid tra/ sU b+hA ra ni bi b+hu ki ta/ a mi ta b+he dza na ma ku ta d+ha ra~M/ d+ha ra dA ra/ pad ma pA sha/ ang kug d+ha ra/ sa pa bid pA man tra/ mung dzA man ta ya tha ba ra/ sa bA ya sa b+ha ya/ bi kra rtsu ba
230b9(mdo): rnam/ mnam thu las sem re dza/ saM mre rtsa yu la~M/ pa ra su ku ru ni ka/ sang tha 'das las mams tra mud nA ma sa twa k+Sha/ ma sapa yang sad blan mo stu d+he/ a mo kA yang kug/ pangs srungs sa// byang chub ma
231a1(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di snyam pa lag tu mags chen po bran dang / rnanam mas dang / 'byed mos nas du bcas pa'i gnas kyi gnas byed 'jamam
231a2(mdo): drug tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po bab po// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang
231a3(mdo): bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di yang so sor le'ur phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so// gsang sngags kyi yig 'bru yang gser la bye du rgyas yi ger bris pa'i srin kyi rim
231a4(mdo): pa na snang ste/ yi ger 'phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyi nad par bris pa/ thig gi 'phreng ba bshibs pas brgyan pa snang ngo // gang lag pa'i phyag rgya yang pad ma'i nang nas 'byung ba phyag rgya bcing ba
231a5(mdo): sna tshogs 'od gzer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so// ga / mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma la rab tu gan/ sa pa nam mkha' la gnas par gyurd to// gang ras kyi ri mo
231a6(mdo): laM sna gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzind pa/ rnam par bkra ba tsho ga dang yo byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba bris pa yang nam mkhal la gnas so// dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rigs
231a7(mdo): sngags kyi lnga po nya mo dang / 'khri bo dang bcas pa gzhal myed 'ang rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba zhag
231a8(mdo): zhig brgya stong kang ka'i klungad kyi bye ma snyed kyang / phyogs bcu kun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyurang to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems
231a9(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so/ legs so// rigs sngags mchog dam pa don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i rigs
231b1(mdo): sngags kyi rgyal po mthal dag rdzogs par smras pa gang gis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thard pa'i dkyil 'khor gi cho ga zhib mor gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba la de bas
231b2(mdo): cad don yod pa'i lcags kyu le gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangs so// 'khor 'di'i nang nas nam mkhal dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am
231b3(mdo): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba bud myed dam/
231b4(mdo): skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo rigs 'jand pa thams cad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa s+yan ras gzig sa dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na/ lan cig
231b5(mdo): dran pa tsam gyis kyang / mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thard pa'i
231b6(mdo): dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khomarim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang / blo rgya
231b7(mdo): bsags pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro// nam yang blo dman par gyi 'gyur zhing / nam yang brjed ngas
231b8(mdo): pa ro myi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog
231b9(mdo): chen po spyad la/ lags par mo ma chog tu snying rje can khyod kyis chog rgya chen po smras pa legs so// legs so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na re dzes/ du 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul kyi yon
232a1(mdo): tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas/ dbugs phyind par gyur da cing / mchog tu dga' ba thob lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/
232a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi nang du/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de nas rigs sngags 'chang gapa 'phags
232a3(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par tha dad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsgrubs par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu'am/

233a1(mdo): myi rtsang ba yang rtsang bar 'gyur ro// yongs su ma dag pa yang shin tu yong su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bcas pa yang shin tu dri ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang zhe sdang dang bral bar

233b7(mdo): de ltar don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par bgyid ngo // dngos grub thams cad 'gugs
233b8(mdo): par 'gyid do// bsgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i
233b9(mdo): sam yan lag brkyang ba dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mthal dang / don dam pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de/ don yod pa'i lugs kyu 'dis 'dren par bkyed/ yangs par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog
234a1(mdo): 'dren par bgyid do// de ltar mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen po brjod pas/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po stsol bar bgyi'o// de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun tu sorga/

234a9(mdo): bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khru gang gi sangs su bzhi'i/ rnam par bye ba/ shind tu mdzes pa/ mu ba'i kun nas la khyer gyi rnam pa can bkye'o// dbus su padam pagyi he/ 'dab ma brgyam brgyad pas
234b1(mdo): 'dab ma thams cad la sngags kyu bri zhing / dbus kyi snying po gi sar dang bcas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyad par bgyi'o// 'od kyi 'phreng ba zlum po tshod kyi sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byes par bgyi'o// snying po'i

234b8(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag go// snying po'i dkyil 'khor kho khor yug tu dngus kyi snod bkang ba bzhi dang / 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ba'i sdod pa'i dang / rje'i sdong bzhi dang / dris pa
234b9(mdo): ba'i snod bzhi dang / dngus kyi pog bor a ka ru dang / can dan dang du rus ska'i bdug spos bsregs pa bzhi gzhag go// phyi rol kyi dkyil 'khor kho ra 'or yug du sa las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang / gtor ma'i snod
235a1(mdo): bum pa yongs su bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / bdug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog por brgyad 'jigs pa myed pas gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kyis bcu bzhi nas/ zla ba
235a2(mdo): nya tshes bco lnga'i nya'i bar kyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas/ 'bras yos dpa yungs ka ra la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor bar bgyi'o//
235a3(mdo): yungs kar dang / dri chal la 'khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor zhing / dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kyi mar me drug bcu rtsa bzhi spar
235a4(mdo): bar bgyi'o// me tog ji snyed pa mang po dgram zhing kho mkhor yug tu 'phreng ba gzhag par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus yungs ka ra la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs
235a5(mdo): su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang phyogs bzhi dang / steng 'og tu gtor na dkyil 'khor bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// phyog/ sa bcing ba dang / s+ya'i gtsug bcing ba dang / bdag bsrung ba bgyis/
235a6(mdo): par 'gyur ro// bgyegs dang log 'dren dang 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bdud las tsogs pa bcings par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
235a7(mdo): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag mthong ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzind pa de dag thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba'i slad du
235a8(mdo): gshin rje dang / chu lA dang / gzho nu dang ku be ra dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa lcags kyu dang / zhags pas bkug par 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /
235a9(mdo): sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dang / lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro// steng nas nam mkhal la tshangs pa dang /
235b1(mdo): khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / mtshan mo la lha dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar dang bcas par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gyis/
235b2(mdo): phyis bgyi ba'i las bgyi ste/ rigs sngags 'chang gyis nA ku sha'i bam po'i steng du shar phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor la mngon tu phyogs par dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis la/ gzhan myi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
235b3(mdo): snying po lan brgyam brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhag par bgyi zhing / me tog re re la bzlas brjod bgyis la/ 'phags pa 'argyan ras
235b4(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun tu dor bar bgyi'o// de nas 'khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar kyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa pyan ras gapags
235b5(mdo): dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dbul bar bkye'o// raM lu re re la bzlas brjod bgyis po'i bdug spos dbul bar bgyi'o// yungs
235b6(mdo): ka ra re ra la bzlas brjod bgyis la/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun tha ma nam nangs kar gya nom pa yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba dang / rab tu dka'
235b7(mdo): bar bgyid par g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / skra mnyen pa dang / snyen cing mdzes pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo khab pa dang / ka la bing ka dang / myi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis/ seMs/
235b8(mdo): brtan por bgyi zhing / mchog tu dka' ba yid la bgyid pas bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu mchi zhing snga
235b9(mdo): bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 'od gzer gyi gdugs su gyur da nas gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri zhim po rmad du byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i tsan dan dang / 'gro
236a1(mdo): shair sha'i tsan dan dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / ka pur dang / bla rtsi'i pr-i 'byung ste/ dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu tri gnas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung
236a2(mdo): ba mang du 'byung ba bye du r+ya sngon po 'i srin brtsegs pa lta bu'i bdug spos kyi sran nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas par 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun tu bdug spos kyi dra rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor
236a3(mdo): kyi dbus nas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshangs pa'i bzang po'i cha lugs can/ ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i
236a4(mdo): zhags pa'i gzugs lag pa bzhi pa/ pad ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag myed pa'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs shing dbus
236a5(mdo): 'byi dad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/ rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid kyis shi nad tu 'bar ba bzhin 'dzum zhi pa nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od gzer gyi snang
236a6(mdo): ba dang ldan pa/ 'khru brgyad tsam gyi lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad ma'i stan las langs te/ nam mkhal la mchis nas zhe ba'i gzugs can byams pa'i sems dang snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pas
236a7(mdo): dkyil 'khor kun tu lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rigs sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag
236a8(mdo): mthil sha nad tu bzang po 'od gzer bye ba brgya phrag stong gis legs par brgyan pa'i lag pa/ rakas sngags 'chang kyi skye bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa s+ya bor bzhag ma
236a9(mdo): zag tu/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang de nam mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / lcags kyu rgya chen po 'od gzer snang ba bkod pa/ rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i
236b1(mdo): ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kyi bye ma snyed 'thob po// kun tu don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags pa/ don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i gzungs 'phags surgyan ras/
236b2(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang kas gzungs 'thob pa'i mod la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo byang chub sems dpa' mas
236b3(mdo): cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa kha ton nyid du gnas so// gzhan yang pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
236b4(mdo): dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / glang po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par phye ba
236b5(mdo): gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rnam pa thams cad kha ton nyid du/ gnas so// rig sngags 'chang kyi 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba khrag/ khrig brgya stong phrag gang ka'i klud kyi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams
236b6(mdo): kye rtsa ba dang / mchog dang rigs sngags 'char gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzukas dbang phyug gis rigs sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rigs
236b7(mdo): sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa dang / bsam pa spros shig dang / mchog de thams cad rjes su sbyin pa byed do// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang / mchog mngon par 'dod pa
236b8(mdo): thams cad smra zhing/ mchog yid la byed pa thams cad byin par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar byung ba rnams smra zhing / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /
236b9(mdo): da ltar byung ba smra'o// lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / bde ba dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / lhag par 'jigs pa dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo
237a1(mdo): dang / yams kyi nad dang / myongs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / gapal 'bab pa dang / 'bab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yum 'gyed pa dang /
237a2(mdo): char ches pa dang / char dkon pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe bung ba dang / tshe yongs su zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa dang / dge ba dang / myi dge ba dang / skye ba dang /

237a4(mdo): thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / yaM dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang gnod sbyin
237a5(mdo): dang / sran po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / myo 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / r-i dgas dang / bya'i skye ba dang / 'chi ba
237a6(mdo): de thams cad phyin ci ma log par smra zhing / de dag gi thabs thams cad kyang stond par 'gyur ro// lhar skyes pa dang / klur skyes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skye ba dang / rgyal po nyid dang /

237a8(mdo): ro// gzhan yang rigs mngon po dang / dma' ba dang / smad po'i rigs su skye ba sna tshogs de thams cad stond cing smra la/ zabs kyang stond par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis ji ltar bsams pa'i
237a9(mdo): don ni thams cad 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon dugasus suldan thams cad gtam zer ro// gzhanas pa 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang / bsgrub pa dang / grub pa de thams cad de la gros 'a
237b1(mdo): bgyid de/ 'di lta ste nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / gyis sman gyi dngos grub dang / gyi snang ba dang / myig 'phrul dang / gter smra ba dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang spo ba dang / dbang du
237b2(mdo): bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / nang zhi bar bya ba dang / gos 'bol pa dang / grob 'thob pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / chu klu chen po rgal ba dang / dug bza' ba dang / gsang sngags sna
237b3(mdo): cho/ sa bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang / 'gugs pa dang / drang ba de sems cad rtsom par bgyid do// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad sgra zhi thams cad gsol
237b4(mdo): 'gyed do// de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i gas pa'i lugs kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// bsams pa dang don tu gnyer ba dang / yid la med

238a1(mdo): 'os dang / ku kus dang / rgya byugs ris su bgyis pa sa bzlas bdod 'argyas brgyad bgyis sa 'angs pa la 'dus sos pus na/ ngas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun nam thas zhi mngonam

238b1(mdo): pa'i las bsgrub pa'i mchog rjes su sros par 'gyur ro// de nas lha chen po dkrug par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang ma shi nang tu zhus bgyis pa kos kyang ma bgos pa des lha'i gnas su mchis la// lha chen po

238b5(mdo): ga~M gtor ma dang / 'bras thug po chen po can gyi lha bshos dang / me tog dmar po dbul bar bgyi'o// las 'di yongs su rdzog sa par bgyis na/ nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang

239a1(mdo): cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang / las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad bsgo ba pa na
239a2(mdo): du bgyid par 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par myi bgyid do// thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing las thams cad 'gyid par 'gyur ro// ci ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par 'tshal na/ de nas rigs sngags 'cha rtsangs
239a3(mdo): shind tu zhus bgyis pa/ gos rtsa pam bgos pas/ shi nad tu dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bsgos la/ kang na me tog gi shing ljon pa der mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig smyung ba

239a6(mdo): bkang ba ka pur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum sAl lo// me tog shi nad tu dri zhim lo gsal bar bgyi zhing / gla rtsi dang / tsan dan dang / ka pur dang / kun tu ru'i bdug spos sul bar ba
239a7(mdo): 'o// de nas las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de lha'i gzhal myed 'ab dang mtsho zhing mdun na mchis te/ de mthong nas ma 'am sring mo 'am chung ma 'am las byed pa 'am// mngag
239a8(mdo): gzhug ma 'am/ pho nya mo rnam pa ci lta bur tshig tu brjod pa de la smos shig dang / ci ste mar gyur da na de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// nor dang 'bru dang dbyeg dang / gser dang / kos dang rgyan
239a9(mdo): dang / lhab lcul dang / mal chas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// ci ste sring mor gyurd na/ de'i tshe longs 'byor thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i bud myed dpag tshad ba
239b1(mdo): li pha rol nas bkug ste/ yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir/ yongs su myod par bgyid cing / phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar bgyi'o// ci ste chung mar gyur pa na de dang lha rdzas kyi gzhal myed khang khang pa dam pa yongs su
239b2(mdo): longs pyad pa'i gzhal myed khang ma thong ste/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs pyod stsol bar bgyid do// ro bra ba'i mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa chas khyad par du 'phags pa'i longs pyod stsol bar
239b3(mdo): bgyid do// mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs pyod la yongs su pyod par bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi dri dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan
239b4(mdo): dang / lhab sgrub kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal myed khang du 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang mdzod dang / bang pa yongs su gang zhing mchis par 'gyur ro// nor dang / gser dang / rdo rje dang / bye du r+ya dang /
239b5(mdo): gser phye ma dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / rdus dang // sa le sbram dang / rdul rgod dpag tu myed pa yob pa'i gtor stsol bar bgyid do// ta dang ba lang dang / ma he dang / phyugs dang /
239b6(mdo): bran pho dang / bran mo rab tu mang po 'phel zhing mchis par 'gyur/ ro// mal tsa'i longs spyod sna tshogs stsol bar bgyid do// sga rdzas kyi chung ma'i longs spyod bud myed gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor
239b7(mdo): brgya dang ldan pa nyin cig bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gis bag
239b8(mdo): par bgyi ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'dzim la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o// rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing / sems can
239b9(mdo): thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o// gzhan du myi smra bar bgyi'o// gal te las byed par gyur pa na/ de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyid pa bzhin du las thams cad bgyid de/ shi nad du yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du las la/
240a1(mdo): mngon par brtson pa 'gyu// ste mangs bcus su gyung na/ gnasagang du ma napa pa de na mas cad du pa'i skye/ cang thoban pa sa rgya po'i skad kyi dem tha /
240a2(mdo): cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid 'dren par bgyid do// dpag tshad stong gi pha rol na bud myed 'gug par bgyid cing / nor dang 'bru dang glang po che dang / ma he dang / rtal pa 'gugs par bgyid de/ slar yang gtong bar bgyid
240a3(mdo): do// bag yod pas bsgo bar bgyi ste/ bdag nyid shi nad tu ring po'i yul dang gnas su phyind par bgyid// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'deg par bgyid de/ der srog gi bar chad
240a4(mdo): du 'gyur bar bgyid do// ci ste pho nya mor gyur da na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// klu'i 'jig rten du mtsho'o/ lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi'o// nam mkha' lding gi gnas
240a5(mdo): su mchi'o// mya 'am ci'i gnas su mchi'o// lto 'phye chen po'i gan/ sa su mchi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas su mchi'o// 'byung po'i gnas su mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya'i bya ba bgyis nas
240a6(mdo): slar yang mchi'o// skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du mtsho zhing slar yang mchi'o// skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad kyi gnas 'am sa cad du phyi nang nas/ pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do// ji srid sa 'og gi
240a7(mdo): jug cing phyir sapam che'o// bya bzhin tu sangs su sogs par bgyis nas/ bag yod pas las thams cad 'gyi ste/ nyid cig bzhin su mchod son dang / rkang pa bkru ba stsas par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi kun
240a8(mdo): bsas cad du smid cing bya ba 'grub par bla nas mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chung des gzhan gyis ma reg pa'i zhing le ba sar pa la/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyir/
240a9(mdo): gyan thams cad kyis brgyan pabri bar bgyi zhing / gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa kyang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bkye'o// rigs sngags 'tshab kyangs shi nad tu zhus bgyis pa gos cangs bgos pas 'o ma dang 'as
240b1(mdo): bran po ma'i can gyi gtoms sul par bgyi'o// shing ka ma'i ma'i me spang sa/ sungs 'bru dang / ku gus dang / ra'i zhag dang / kun ma dpa 'gres pa'i sbyin pasreg stongs brgyad babya'o// stongs bcad rdzon pa
240b2(mdo): pa dang / me tog dmar po stsal na gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang slongs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang kyis kyang khyod pa'i ji bkyi zhes bya ba byed pa mI
240b3(mdo): no// pa'i las thams cad byed pa yin no// pa la dbyig mang po byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo de ltar lags so// zhes smras nas myi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang gi rtse
240b4(mdo): dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ yungs kar dang gu gul la yongs su bzla sa nas mer gtor na/ de mtsho zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbyig stong stsol par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
240b5(mdo): mchis par 'gyur ro// rtag tu ci bgyid pa'i bya ba bgyid para'agyur ro// de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi bu

240b7(mdo): 'chang rtsang ma shi nad tu zhus bgyis pa/ gos rtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad pa bgyis la/ de'i mdun du dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis la/ gu gul gyi bdug spos sul/ dkar gsum gyi gtor
240b8(mdo): mA stsal par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i bzlas brjod yungs kar la bzlas pas/ bu mo de la lan stong rtsa brgyad bdeg par bgyi'o// las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de nang
240b9(mdo): gi gzums kyis mchi zhing mdun tu mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang de dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// de'i las su thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// thams cad du mchi bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'a/
241a1(mdo): bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ste srin po dang / srin mo dgug par 'tshal na/ gu gul dang ba lang ki sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
241a2(mdo): brjod bgyis pas dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs na/ srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang srin mo rnams dbang du gyur da nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba byed par 'gyur/ tsaM bsgo ba

241a5(mdo): na srin mo 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur ro// de na/ sa srin po 'khor dang bcas pa shi na tu mgyogs par 'gyur te// / shugs chen pos dgos pa thams cad bslab cing / nam yang
241a6(mdo): gzhan du bgyid par 'gyur ro// gtor ma stsa lad par bgyi'o// tsaM ste sha za dang sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na/ ba lang kyi mkhris pa dang / de'i so ba dang / gu gul dang / shing ar rka'i 'o mar sbyar

241b1(mdo): sngags 'chang mang ma shi nad tu zhus bgyis pas gos mangs bgos pas des yungs kar ga po dang / skye tse 'is bon dang / 'gyi lu rang dang / pad ma'i 'dab ma dang / spyas cha dang / san tshwa bkres pa la lan

242a8(mdo): dang ni gu gul dang / mu ra ya kA mu ra dang / b+hu ta ke shi mnyam par gzha la/ phub ma dang ni ba la ka/ khyim bya'i sgo ba'i shun pags dang / sbrul pags dang ni yung rnam rnam gnyis// b+hang ga'i sa bon pa lang mazhes
242a9(mdo): nya dang legs par sbyar bgyis te// ra'i gcin gyis bsgos pa la// lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis// bdug pa de nyid rab tu sbyar// bdug pa dam pa gtso bo 'di// thams cad du ni rigs pa ste// stong/
242b1(mdo): phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi'i gdon// gang dag steng na gnas pa rnams// bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing // myi bzad gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs bcu ru ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // sum bcu li lha dang
