244a9(mdo): dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dpal dang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / sha~M nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
244b1(mdo): dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyag gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa la lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ don yo/
244b2(mdo): pa'i lugs kyu'i gzungs chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po blta ba dang / bsgrub bsgrub pa dang / blags pas 'grub pa/ chen po rnam
244b3(mdo): par 'phrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin kyi brlabs kyi dam tshig 'grub pa yin no// gang kres pad ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngag
244b4(mdo): dang / cho ga dang / bde bar bsgrub pa mtha' dag ni rigs kyi 'i thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rjes su 'jug par 'grub para'agyur ro// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad
244b5(mdo): mo'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil/ 'khor 'od dpag tu myed pa'i snying po mchog dang po/ rdo rje rin po/ tshe'i rtse mo'i mchog dang po 'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig la thams cad
244b6(mdo): du rjes su zhugs shing / dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thos cad byin brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba de/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / seMs
244b7(mdo): can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das sun sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrags par bgyi'o// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu
244b8(mdo): rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o// grub pa yang dag par rjes su stsal par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas byang chub
244b9(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' sa sad to// sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing / shind tu yongs su dag pa yin te/
245a1(mdo): legs so legs so// rigs sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / je'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud myed dang /
245a2(mdo): skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstand par bya ba shod cig// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ rigs thams cad kyi myi 'grub pa/ dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par/
245a3(mdo): byin kyis brlabs so// ngas kyang de dag byin kyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad ma'i snying po
245a4(mdo): laM dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa 'grub pa dam pa naM/ sa dang po'i lci bas pa sres pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya ba ni shi nad tu mdzes pa shaM nad tu
245a5(mdo): 'jam por bya'o// tshon sna lngas rnam par dbye ba'i ni gla dang ba cas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyis bris pa/ dang / dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa ni/ mnyam par thig
245a6(mdo): gis dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhar cha dbye bar bya'o// chu zheng du 'khru bzhi'i tshad tsam du bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor kyi snying po na// tsha de 'khru do par byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i skal bu dang / mtshon sa las
245a7(mdo): dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad ma dkar po kha bye 'i zlum por bya'o// pad ma kha bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang pad ma gnas par bya ba ni/ klu mgo'i gdengs ka 'dra ba
245a8(mdo): dang / lcags kyu dang bcas pa dang / lag pa dang bcas pas pad ma'i lcags kyu 'dzind pa dang / 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyis br-i'o// pad ma kha bye ba'i phyi rol kyi skal bu ni lcags
245a9(mdo): klu dang bcas pa'i skal bur bya'o// nang dang phyi'i nang du ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o// lcags kyu'i phyi rol kyi sgal bu ni/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog gis bya'o// zla ba a du 'ong ba tri ma
245b1(mdo): byed pa'i phyi rol kyi skal ba na mdung rtse gsum pa phra bar bya'o// mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'i phyi rol kyi skal bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thogs pa bri bar bya ste/ man sna tshogs dang me tog rnams so// kun la 'bar/
245b2(mdo): ba'i 'phreng ba dang 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs pa bri bar bya'o// phyag gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol kyi skal bu ni stegs bu/ 'dra bar bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi skal bu'i 'khor bar lcags kyul bri bar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil
245b3(mdo): 'khor gyi glar ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi go bkos pa/ lcags kyu dang / mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil mo krung byed du bcas te pad ma'i gdan
245b4(mdo): la 'dug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa myed pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad ma la/ 'dug pa bri b.rabya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su pad ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri
245b5(mdo): ba ni/ shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub tu / lcags sgrog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang / rigs sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kyi skal bu
245b6(mdo): ni me tog gi stegs bu 'dra bar bya'o// phyi rol kyi dkyil 'khor ni kun tu lci bas bya'o// phye'i dkyil 'khor de la nas phyes bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba dang / dar btags pa'i mda' dang /
245b7(mdo): 'i 'o bgapas brdzun cing byug pa'i sa bgang ba dang / 'dug pa'i snod kyis btsun pa dang / me tog gA tshogs kyis btsun pa dang / da / yin kyi pa dang / 'bras dang / yod pa dang / @
245b8(mdo): tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog gis 'jigs pa myed pas brgyad par bya'o// mu tig dang b+hu ru dang / rin po che bye dUr+ya sngon po dang mar kad dang / pad ma ra ka rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan te
245b9(mdo): dkyil 'khor kun tu dung dang bal ba dang / mA dUr ba dang / gser dang / dngul kyis brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi don tu mchod pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang / sgo bzhi'i gnas su tri chag
246a1(mdo): kyai bus pa dar kyis brgyan te gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol phog zag tu mo sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang / bum bu dang / byas bus dang / bum pa dang / te ku dang / rnam mor dang / bus pa kA/
246a2(mdo): ba rnams byas te gzhag go/ pog por dang / gtor ma babang po sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya// 'phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/ tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags tshon sna lnga'i srad pu se pasdeng ki phur pa/
246a3(mdo): la gdags pas gzugs par bya/ kun tu mAr me'i 'phreng ba dang / mar me'i sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin no/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du rus ka dang /
246a4(mdo): ka rnams kyi bdug pa ga pur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kyi bdug pa ni ku gul sa la kaM ka~M dang kun tu'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas gos/
246a5(mdo): sar pa bgos te/ rtsang mar byas nas ma 'dal kyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyul rig sngags bzlas brjod byas pa dang / slob ma gzhug cing dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang /
246a6(mdo): ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod cing / don yod po'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen po na thams cad la sbyar bar bya ba ni/ mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba
246a7(mdo): dang / s+yai sdug bcing ba dang / 'jug pa dang dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba dang de dag thams cad sbyar bar bya'o// sbyin bsreg dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhib mo dang /
246a8(mdo): rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par skul ba dang / las thams cad rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du de sbyar na/ myur zhing rdzogs
246a9(mdo): bar 'chang zhing des na/ grub pa bla na myed par 'gyur ro// bgrang 'phreng dang / 'khrib ma'i gdu bu dang srad bu se re la la mang ma dang / ma dur ba dang / yungs kar dang / chu dang bsres pa dang / rtswa dur ba'i sman la mchod
246b1(mdo): phyir thogs te dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ las bya zhing pad ma dang / mchod yon dkyil 'khor dbul ba dang / de dag rtag tu rgyan myi 'chad par dus thams cad du nges par bya'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya/
246b2(mdo): ste/ grub pa mchog dpalas thams cad grub pa dang / gang dang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o// gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol lo// gsang sngags gzhan dang / bar bsres par bya ste/ phyag rgya dang
246b3(mdo): gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' ba gcig pu blags pas 'grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin
246b4(mdo): kyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing / mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag
246b5(mdo): cing / sgrub pa dang sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa myi bza/ da pa sngar bstsags pa rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten/ pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen
246b6(mdo): po bde ba dang / sha~M ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/ pad mo'i nang nas rgyal ba'i s+yan sngar rdzus te skye ba dang / kha ton byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig 'chang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
246b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba zhag zhig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste/ 'dug cing gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing kyi bor phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byi/
246b8(mdo): bar mdzad cing / dus kun tu bla na myed pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par 'gyur ro// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang / byang chub kyi snying po la yug gi bar du yin gyi/ gzhan du skye bar myi 'a
246b9(mdo): ro// 'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing / bla ma dang chos can dang nor kyis mchod pa dang / sems can kun kyis mchod par 'os pa ni/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel ba
247a1(mdo): dang kos dang rgyan kyis brgyan pa dang / rgyal po dang btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mye ldog pa 'thob par
247a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar myi 'gyur zhing / rtag tu bde zhing dka' ba dang / sems can thams cad dga' ba dang byams par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis lus can sha nad tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro//
247a3(mdo): tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu
247a4(mdo): bltar 'os par 'gyur ro// dpal gyis dus rtag tu 'bar zhi shan da tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma dang mnyam pa
247a5(mdo): snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba/ chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen po dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig zhugs
247a6(mdo): pa tsam dang / dkyil 'khor de lta bu la me tog 'bul ba dang / ril lu gcig tsam kyi bdug pa 'bul ba'i sems can de dag ni gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi
247a7(mdo): zhing me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang gang ka'i bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'bum zag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs kyis mchod
247a8(mdo): pa byas par 'gyur ro// bdug pa mang po rim par phye ba'i srin las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / 'go shar sha'i bdug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sran rim par phye ba rab
247a9(mdo): tu 'khrigs par 'gyur ro// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la rab tu sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa
247b1(mdo): 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na myed pa yin no// de dag gis me tog dang bdug pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po la dge ba'i chen po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug
247b2(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchod sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mthong ba bzhed par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rjes su
247b3(mdo): 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bsgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzhin 'dzum par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang gshin rje dang / chu lha dang lus ngan po dang / gzho nu dang / dbang
247b4(mdo): phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams bsrung ba dang / sbed pa dang / skyob pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab cing byin kyis
247b5(mdo): brlabs par 'gyur ro// de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du se/ mas shing / mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyur ro// sems ca// na gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir sems can de dag gi sdig pa dang /
247b6(mdo): sgrub pa dang dug thams cad las yongs su za rad par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / rims dang mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro// nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub ses
247b7(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis bla mar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / myi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su tha dad par 'gyur ro// /
247b8(mdo): dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur ro// 'di nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// za na ri dgas dang bya dag gnas de'i phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag
247b9(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad dang / de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags pa de da/ l+h+wanas ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bde 'grol gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jig rten myed par
248a1(mdo): mtha' byang chub la thug gi bar du 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bya ste gnas thams cad du bla na myed pa 'grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la sreg
248a2(mdo): par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du dug thams cad se lad pa/ sgrib pa thams cad se lad pa/ bsgrib pa thams cad sbyor ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par tha rad pa/ sems can thos
248a3(mdo): cad phan par bya ba'i phyir/ gang dkyil 'khor chen por kun tu lung bstan pa/ myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon po yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ bkra shis thams cad sgrub
248a4(mdo): pa/ bsod nams thams cad stsogs pa/ myur du nor dang 'bru sbyin par mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir/ dgasang sngags 'grub pa dang / bzlas brjod 'grub pa/ yid la
248a5(mdo): re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyi nad pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa/ de kho na nyid rnam par mthongab zhes bya ba'i bsod nams chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// nam byad
248a6(mdo): chub yang dag par thob kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i lcags kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'i ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba las stsogs pa ni/ phyis ngan 'gro la gnas su myo
248a7(mdo): 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las kyis mya gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sel pa dang / ngan song las tha rad par 'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mya bam
248a8(mdo): pa rnams las tha rad par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kun tu bde ba dang / da ltar gyi 'di la mchog tu dkon pa lhun kyis grub par 'thob par 'gyur ro// bkren pa yang yongs spyod dang phyug po mtshungs pa myed pa mchog
248a9(mdo): mod la 'thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ 'khor bzang po bdog par 'gyur ro// rgyal po rnams kyi bla mar bya zhing rtag tu dus thams cad du mchod pa 'os par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang bram
248b1(mdo): ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud myed dang / skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/ 'dug cing thams cad bsnyen bkur byed cing / 'dug pa ni ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bla na myed
248b2(mdo): pa yin no// ras gru bzhi khyodan kun 'khru gang ngam 'khru do pa legs par btags pa ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po mnyen po shind tu dag par bkrus pa/ rtsang mar byas pa 'am yang na dar yug gam/ yang na
248b3(mdo): mod dpar ma shugs pags la zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga tshang ba'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na myed pa bri bar bya'o// snod rtsang ma sar pa'i nang du mtshon lhag ma ma yin pa blugs te ras kyis sku gzugs kas/
248b4(mdo): bar bri ba ni/ tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'gon po bri ba li/ dkyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa spyan gsum pa zhal gsum
248b5(mdo): pa mchog tu bzang ba/ zhal dang po ni mdzes shing sdug pa dbu lcang lo dang zor tsugs kyis brgyan pa/ cod pan la 'od dpag myed kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o// me tog gi
248b6(mdo): 'phreng bas bcing bar bya'o// 'phreng ba'i kong du 'od dpag myed bya 'o// cod pam la zla ba phyed pa dang / 'od 'dom gang ba bya'o// kun tu lcags kyu'i bya'o// kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba bya'o//
248b7(mdo): phyag bzhi la phyag gasmon pad ma'i lcags kyu/ g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu g.yon gcig mngon yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o// gdan seng
248b8(mdo): ke'i pad mo bya'o// g.yon du lha mo 'asgrol ma'o// g.yas su dkar mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar
248b9(mdo): ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lcug phran dang yal ga dang chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis sras pa bya'o// ne tso dang / ra skegs dang / shang shang te
249a1(mdo): dang / rma bya dang ka la bing ka rin po che'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o// shing gi gong s+yai bo la khang pa brtsegs pa dang / bcas pa'i gzhal myed khang gi nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams
249a2(mdo): cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o// s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// g.yas su phyag na rdo rje 'khros pa'i gad mo 'byin pa'i gzugs mche ba brtsegs pa/ skra gyen du
249a3(mdo): brdzes pa/ lcang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor ba/ nam mkhal la lta ba bya'o// smad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzho nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// gong du
249a4(mdo): dbang po dang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu/ bcom nga ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po rnams btud de/ bcom
249a5(mdo): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yon du dga' bo dang / bsnye/ na dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rigs
249a6(mdo): sngags 'chang 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing ma tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang pog por dang / bgrang 'phreng lag na thogs pa bya'o//
249a7(mdo): phyogs bzhi ngos kun tu rigs bskor ba la ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ shing sna tshogs me tog dang lcug ma can bya'o// rdang bu chu zag pa bya'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi shing dang / lcug ma bya'o// gnas so/
249a8(mdo): sor drang srong rnams dang grul bum gyi shing bya'o// tshul de lta bur don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la bris te/ gnas rtsang ma dben par gzhag pa la/ rigs sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod par bya'o// a ga
249a9(mdo): ru dang / du rus ska dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ci nus par don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o// nyi ma re re ras la sku gzugs bris pa mdong ba tsam gyi mod la/ mtshams rtse
249b1(mdo): pa lnga la bsogs pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / mnar myed par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal kyi 'jigs pa/
249b2(mdo): myi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongs su zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang pra dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzungs grub pa chen pos/
249b3(mdo): so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang log par lhung bar 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob
249b4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis rtag tu bsrungs shing rjes su bcu nga bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa s+yan ras
249b5(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis/ 'phags pa s+yan ras/ gzigs dbang phyug mngon tu mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o// gang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul
249b6(mdo): gyis bya ba byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni/ phyogs bcu kun kye sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dku dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag
249b7(mdo): khrag snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhibs mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i
249b8(mdo): rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems
249b9(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig snga 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can
250a1(mdo): kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams
250a2(mdo): bstand pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyul 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rigs sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi 'khro bo'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang /
250a3(mdo): bsam pa dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa brtson pa myed pa/ brtse ba'i bsam pa myed pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
250a4(mdo): mkha' lding dang / myi 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myaM dang myi ma yin pa thams cad thag 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgyegs dang log 'dren thams cad rab tu dul bar mdzad pa bdud las stsog/
250a5(mdo): pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / phung bar byed pa/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol/ ba dang / dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang / gcod pa dang / 'byigs
250a6(mdo): pa dang / rdung ba dang / gtor ba dang / lus rnam par gzhag par byed pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis gad mo rgyas po'i dkyil 'khor don yod po'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil
250a7(mdo): 'khor gyi skyabs su bcom ldan 'das kyi s+yan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i 'khro bo'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhab mo thams cad du bsrung bar byed pa 'chos par byed pa
250a8(mdo): dam tshig 'dzind pa gnas thams cad la rjes su skyong ba ste/ de ni sgrub par byed pa/ bslab pa 'grub pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'khro ba'i rgyal po chen
250a9(mdo): po byin gyis brlab cing rjes su gnang ba mdzod cig dang / rigs sngags thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su/
250b1(mdo): yad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shaka kya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po 'phags pa gyar ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ 'di skad ces
250b2(mdo): bkal sas yang to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyas btab ste/ ngas kyang byin kyis brlabs/ sngon gyi ro bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
250b3(mdo): kyang phyag rgyas btab cing / byid kyis brlabs kyis smos shig/ gsapa pa a ku na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dang / dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
250b4(mdo): dra ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya 'am dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba spros shig/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs sngags 'chang zas
250b5(mdo): cad kyis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang mchog/ grub par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras go rigs dbang phyug gis bcom
250b6(mdo): ldan 'das kyi bka' sgo zhing dbugs phyung ba zos nas snying dga'/ spyan ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed 'khros par byas/ gdob 'khro gnyer byas/ mche ba brtsegs pa'i s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus
250b7(mdo): 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi pyad snga ma 'dug nas/ don sdod pa'i zhags pa 'kho bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sas
250b8(mdo): dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi
250b9(mdo): dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ drang srong chen po'i tshogs
251a1(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal mtshab du dbang bsku rad pa byams pa la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis
251a2(mdo): bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu myed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khro ba'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag/ 'tshal lo/
251a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug zugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya mA/ oM bi kri ta ba da na/ ma ha kro d+ha rA dzA/ b+ha yang ka ra/ ma hA b+ha bas
251a4(mdo): ad ta/ hA sa/ dz+wa la dzA ya/ ma ha dz+wa lA mA la/ ma ha ro'u da/ ru pa b+ha yang ka ra na/ ha na han/ sarba duSh+Ta/ ya kA/ rA ka/ swama?/ da had ha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ nA ga nan/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sa
251a5(mdo): za duSh+Ta/ bi na ya kAn/ ba ta / ta5/ sarba duShA/ sa tranab+ho b+ha/ ma ha kro d+ha ra dza/ ma ni/ ka na ka/ badz+ra/ be dUr+ya.a lang kr-i ta/ sha ri ran/ badz+ra pa ra shu/ pa sha sha sta ya
251a6(mdo): ma ha pa da ma aM ku sha/ b+ha dza ya/ ma ha pad ma/ sA sa na ya/ ma ha pa da ma bi ka tsa/ ga r+b+ha ya/ a mo gA/ a pra te ha ta/ pa la Sha rA/ kra mA ya/ sa ha sra/ bA rA ya/ sa wa b+ha ta pU yang ka rA yA/
251a7(mdo): sarba de ba d+ha ma na/ kam pa/ ud b+ha bA ya/ ma ha baM kri ta pa da na ya/ na ra si hA/ mu khA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra dza la d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA tsan ta/ be ka d+ha ra/ tsa ri tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ ni \u0f7f
251a8(mdo): tsa ra/ au sh+ma ya/ b+h+r-i kuT mu kha/ hUM hUM pad/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra sa ra/ sa pA pa/ ki la bi Sha ha ra/ ma ha Ne te dza d+ha ra/ pad ma ha ste/ au pad ma/ aM ku sha/ b+hu dze tA ra ya/ man tA swa ya/ bi g+hA
251a9(mdo): shA sa ya/ tu ShA Na/ Na sha ya/ sarba pA pa ra Na/ hUM phaT sA hA/ pa sha sasta/ pad ma d+ha rA ya swa ha/ sa maSh+Ta sa kA ya sra ha/ a mo gA ba ra dA yA swa ha/ kro d+ha ra dza b+ha yang ka ra ya sA hA/ pra ha be sha d+ha ra
251b1(mdo): swa hA/ tre log kya byu Sha Ta A swa sa// ya ma brgya na/ ku re ra/ na ma smi tA mA swA hA/ badz+ra d+ha ma b+hu dzi thA sa sa sa/ mA hA kas/ ma tri ka Ni/ bta Na~Mta/ pU dza~M tra A sA hA/ nAg a ma ya swa hA/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra/
251b2(mdo): re bA ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba man Na la/ a teSh+Thata/ sa ma ya swa ha/ sa rba su tra/ a teSh+Thata mu tra ya swa hA/ sr-i sa mo kA ba ra de/ ma ha/ dngaSh+Ta a ku sha/ badz+ra hUM/ ma ha pad ma a shA sa dar/ na mo stu te/
251b3(mdo): a ma kA/ oM kun/ hUM phaT swA hA// 'khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho ga nas dang bcas pa dang / gzha
251b4(mdo): byed khang rnams kun tu 'gul to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yas so// ma rungs pa'i klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
251b5(mdo): 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / thams cad dang / bdud las srog/ sa pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gdod ma rungs pa/ rnams la sbug tu 'gyel to// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim
251b6(mdo): kun tu tshig ste/ 'bar bar kun tu rab tu 'bar/ 'bar ba ga ga tu gyu rad cing bsregs pa dang du zhing 'gre ldog ste/ tshor ba drag po myi bzad pa chen po myong ngo // lha thams cad shi nad tu 'khrus shi
251b7(mdo): smag go// bdud kyi rigs rnams bred khas btags so// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kun tu 'khrugs so// rgya mtshon gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo dag
251b8(mdo): kyang kun tu 'khrugs shing shin tu skrag ste snying 'dar ro// gzhan yang sa'i steng na/ klu stong phrag brgya gnas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang / ri la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun tu 'khrum
251b9(mdo): skrag gcig tu 'bar bar gyurd cing gdungs so// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag go// nag po chen po dang tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor pa de dag thams
252a1(mdo): cad skrag cing snying 'dar ro// gnas la rten pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'dar ro/ 'bar kun tu 'bar te/ gnas dang bcas par bsregs so// de nas 'khor pa'i nang kyi lha dang / klu rnams/
252a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro// lha rnams kyi rgyan sdud pa sna tshogs dang / chos gos kyi char pa 'bebs so// mchod pa'i las byed cing /
252a3(mdo): tsan dan gyi chu'i char pas sa la chag chag 'debs so// lha rdzas kyi gser dang / dngus kyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// de nas gnod sbyin
252a4(mdo): gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gsor te/ shin tu 'gying bag tu seng ge'i blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
252a5(mdo): ga la ba de logs su so ste/ nye bar phyin nas/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das s+yan ras gzig/ sa dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yAM/
252a6(mdo): du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis sras pa'i 'phreng ba/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad ma la phul te/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog gi 'phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis
252a7(mdo): sras pa 'di la dbu la longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol ba gang gis bdag gi yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so// 'khro ba chen po chen
252a8(mdo): po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po
252a9(mdo): dang / 'byung po dang sha ba ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te/ kun tu 'bar zhing kun tu 'bar nas khas phub tu 'gyel cing bsregs so// sho la thug pa dang / srog ma rungs par 'gyur
252b1(mdo): ba'i don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i latsho lo'i rgyal po ni dus thams cad du mgo bo'i gyi bor blang bar bgyi'o// bcang po sgom so// mchod do// rgyas par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang ba ga 'i sman 'gro ba'i rgyas so/
252b2(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rde'u rigs dang / dmangs riH
252b3(mdo): kyi lag mthogs pa'am/ lus la thogs pa 'am/ lta ba 'am/ 'dri ba'am/ bar 'kho bo'i rgyal po nyam patsam de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bkur bar bgyi'o// lci bos blang bar bgyi'o// bsru
252b4(mdo): bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsam pa dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// grub pa chen po'i chen po rjes su su sad par bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang / sran
252b5(mdo): po dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa thams cad so sor gsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// rtag tu dus thams
252b6(mdo): cad du mthong ba rjes su stsal par bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyis myi 'brel cing / phun sum tshogs par yongs su bskur bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang
252b7(mdo): gzi byin bskyed cing / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o// dgra thams cad so sor gsal bar bgyi'o// nor dang / 'bru dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gros dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan rdzas
252b8(mdo): su stsal par bgyi'o// bu gcig dnga'adra bar rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o// dad pa dang / gus pas dus kun tu mchog tu mos par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
252b9(mdo): s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces lag na rdo rje khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legs so legs so// zhes smras so// lag pa g.yas
253a1(mdo): pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog gi 'phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs
253a2(mdo): spyod pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyi yongs su longs myad pa'i phyir dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dr-i za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myo 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
253a3(mdo): dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 'dir 'dug cing / dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs myang ba'i phyir/ ci lta ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro//
253a4(mdo): de nas 'phreng ba de nam mkhal la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i steng du/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba tri ma myed pa'i me tog gi khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/
253a5(mdo): 'od 'tsher ba/ ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes/ pa/ gru bzhi lham pa chu zheng shi nad tu rgya che ba shi nad tu na pa yangs pa/ me tog ka ta li dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal myed khang sna tshogs
253a6(mdo): su yongs su gyur da te gnas so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu 'i steng zad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog rin po ches sras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhas myed khar
253a7(mdo): du shi nad tu gnas so// de lag na rdo rje'i dbu'i steng gi zad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba tri ma myed pa'i me tog gi khang bu brtsegs par shi nad tu gnas so// de 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng thog thag tu
253a8(mdo): ya / zla ba yid du 'ong ba tri ma myed pa'i me tog gi khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ me tog ka ta las mdzes par bya ste gnas so// khang bu brtsegs pa'i nyan kor kun gshin rje dang / chu lha
253a9(mdo): dang lus ngan po dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na dza yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go//
253b1(mdo): de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su bskor te/ mdun byas so// dkyil 'khor kyi rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang / nam mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong po dri ma myed pa'i me tog gi khang bu brtsegs
253b2(mdo): pa'i 'phreng ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang na/ 'khod pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba spa ba bzhin dang / nam mkhal la zla ba nya ba ni rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor pa spas
253b3(mdo): bzhin du spa bar gnas so// me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / man da ra ba dang / ma ha man da ra ba dang /
253b4(mdo): me to ra tsa dang / ma ha ro tsa dang / me tog sa la dang / tra la dang / me tog tra mA la dang tsam pa ka dang / me tog a d+hi mug ta ka dang / me tag a sho ka dang / me tog pa ta la dang / me tog ni la dang / ma hA
253b5(mdo): nA lA dang / me tog g+han d+ha ba Sha ka dang / me tog su ma na dang / ta ra/ na dang / ku s+ya/ ka'i me tog gi char kyi rgyun 'bab po// btso/ ma ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor chen po
253b6(mdo): la mchod pa'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi chos gos skud pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi char ji srid du char 'bab cing / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do/ de ltar na cho 'phrul che ba'i che ba dag snang ngo //
253b7(mdo): rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par nam mkhal la sgra byung ngo // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam pa
253b8(mdo): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
253b9(mdo): sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i 'khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir/ ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ sdug pa thams cad sreg par
254a1(mdo): 'ashang pa legs mo legs so// 'drin phyi ma'i tshe byi sa'i dus na/ rigs sngags 'chab pa rnams kyis lan cig ngas 'bras kyis dgos pa 'ams car byed par 'gyur/ ngas semams cang/
254a2(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa 'argyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba'i sbyid par 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i grug pa chen po rab tu stonang par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams
254a3(mdo): kyi yangs shing rgya che ba'i chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gcig pur mchog tu grub par 'gyur te/ las bsgrub pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro// de nas 'thos
254a4(mdo): pA'i gang rgyangs kyi sdug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi 'a po byed/ rje dpon chen po stong phrag brgya'i bdag po stobs che ba/ dpung che ba/ brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gis lag mthil gcig
254a5(mdo): gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po skul bar byed pa/ lha'i gnas gzhal byed 'ang dang bcas te/ rgyamatsho chen pon gnas pa'i 'or bye ba pa la mong me dang ldan pa drag go// ga'i 'arjid chen po
254a6(mdo): stobs che ba/ pha rold kyi dpung 'joms par byed pa de stan las langs na/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
254a7(mdo): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang
254a8(mdo): phyug gis/ 'gro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po shi nad tu sde bzung ba'i gsang sngags kyi bshad pas sri bcom ldan 'das gsul myed 'ang gnas dang bcas te bsregs so//
254a9(mdo): gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag zhig 'khor dang bcas pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur da te bsregs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhig ste/ tshig cing zhu bar gyurd to// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji snya
254b1(mdo): bsgrub par bgyi/ bdag la skyob pa su lags/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par nig go// dus kyi nags pas bcings so// bcom ldan 'das 'dag la phan gdags su
254b2(mdo): gsol/ de nas bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shag kya rngub pas/ 'khros pa'i kad rgyangs phyi'i gtsug / 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' saHlang to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
254b3(mdo): khyod ma 'jigs par 'kho bo'i rgyal po sngags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su song shig/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras ka rakas dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song shig/ byang chub
254b4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'phags pa ldan ras gnyis dbang drug 'di ni khyod kyi skyab pa dang / dbung gnyen dang / dang / sa 'gyur te/ klung gis 'khod kyi tshogs dang banas
254b5(mdo): pa gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba yin no// / kye gnod sbyin chen po myur ba myur bar song ste skyabs su 'gro bar/ byos shig/ de nas 'khros bI ga tungs phyug phud 'bar ba'i
254b6(mdo): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung po/ rtogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste/
254b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po 'phags pa dpyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bya zhipa lag pa brkyang ste/ zhabs la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la skyabs su gsol/
254b8(mdo): thugs rje chen po bdag la skyab tu gsol/ bdag la srog sras dpa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba
254b9(mdo): 'khor dang bcas pa srog dang bral bar gyurd to// shes pa ni stong / stobs dang brtson 'grus dang sro bar byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus su zhig gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa'
255a1(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'khros pa'i gad rgyangs s+ya rtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' saHla to// kye gnod sbyin kyi sde dpon chen po
255a2(mdo): nyon cig/ dA ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par 'che ba byas/ khyod kyi bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang /
255a3(mdo): bu mo mang po ni zos/ khyod kyis 'phags pa'i spyan mang po mi nyams par byas/ khyod kyis rigs sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad ni byas/ grub pa rnams ni myed par byas/ ma
255a4(mdo): grub pa rnams kyang myed par byas/ skal ba can mang po ni myed par byas/ skal ba myed pa ni yod par byas/ myi 'tshe ba dang / srog dang longs spyod kyi bde ba ni myed par byas/ 'tshe ba dang
255a5(mdo): srog rnam par 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyis legs par bshad pa na yongs su bor/ khyod kyis nyes par bshad pa dang / ser sna ni mang du byas/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad dang /
255a6(mdo): sems can thams cad la khrod nag po dang / rnam par 'jig par rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan 'gro thams cad ni skyel/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
255a7(mdo): na khyod shi nang tu myi bzang po sdig pa can yin/ gshin rje'i gnas dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na/ khyod gcig pu ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs/
255a8(mdo): 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas kyi gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang / bslab pa dang sdom pa khas blang ba bya ba dang / dge ba'i chos byos shig/ 'on kyang kho bo khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o// khyod sdug
255a9(mdo): bsngal bas nyams zag pa dang / bcings pa myi bzad pa dang / me 'bar ba myi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las ngas yongs su tha rad par bya'o// mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o// de nas 'khros pa'i gad rgyangs kyi sdug
255b1(mdo): 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag zhig brgya stong du mas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ byang chub
255b2(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dang slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang
255b3(mdo): byug cong bka' lung bzhin bgyis te/ dam tshig la gnas par bkye'o// chos kyi rjes su sems dpa' dang / dkon me cog gsum la skyabs su mchis pa la gnas par bgyi'o// 'jo bo'i rgyal po 'di dang / rigs sngags
255b4(mdo): kyi rgyal po sngags kyu'i gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / kang yang gas kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slo dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yongs su bskyang ba

255b6(mdo): tu ma rnams kyis 'og dang / bla dang phyogs bzhi kun tu bsod nams su dmyigs te/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// yongs su bsnyung bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / sro ba dang /

255b8(mdo): zag par byed pa'i gdon dang / bcas pa dang / nad dang / gcod dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// rab tu bsal par bgyi'o// rkun po dang / rol po dang / myi rgod pa dang / kacan
255b9(mdo): zan 'khro bo'i 'jigs pa bsal bar bgyi'o// tus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// skye lam ngan pa dang / bkra myi shis pa byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bya'o// char ches
256a1(mdo): pa dang / nar mye 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char pa dang / srad dang / zan pa dang / byi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// bde ba dang / nyams dga' ba dang / so legs pa dang /

256a3(mdo): rang pas rjes su bsgrub par bgyi'o// bud byed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad bu cig bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos la zhugs pa'i yid
256a4(mdo): dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas gnas par bgyi'o// thos cad du bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// ji ltar bdag gi srog 'di yongs su bskyang ba bzhin du gzungs dang / rigs sngags bsgrub pa 'di yang /

256a7(mdo): ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po legs so// legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rigs so// sems can thams cad rjes su bzung ba chen

256a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab tshogs 'dzind pa la gnas par gyur da to// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang ldan par gyurd to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas byang chub sems dpal
256b1(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bkal saHya to// yon tan gyi phung po mchog tu bzang pa la/ gnod sbyid kyi bdag po khas len du bcug cing gzhag pa legs so legs
256b2(mdo): so// 'khri bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga nye bar spyad pa de smos shig/ rigs sngags 'chang rnams ji ltar mchog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig dran pa tsam gyis ji lta ji ltar myur bar las sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba
256b3(mdo): dang / de ltar dran pa tsam gyis ci ltar bsams pa dang / yid la reb 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / don yod pa'i sngags kyu 'khro bo'i rgyal po 'di srur du rtsub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis rlobs

256b7(mdo): bzhing / nang par sngar langs la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas/ kyai smra bar 'gan de rdung ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du 'bras chan khyor ba bka ste/
256b8(mdo): gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar byas na/ des 'khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing / mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ltar bsgrubs na de nas bzlas brjod gcig dang / dran pa gcig gis
256b9(mdo): thams cad du las thams cad las sgrub par byas na thams cad du bya ba thams cad mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba las byed par 'dod cing / don yod pa zhags pa'i snying po bsgrub par
257a1(mdo): 'dod na/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po chen po las cig dran par bya'o// dran pa tsam gyi mod la bgyegs dang log 'dren thams cad skrag par 'gyur zhing / dpag tshad tshun chad du rigs sngags 'chang ba'i drung du 'ong
257a2(mdo): bar myi nus/ rgyang ring po ring po na 'dug go// 'di la lan cig dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang cho ga dang / bsgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing / dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phamra
257a3(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad tshun chad du 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po 'phang du ri chen po tsam du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpag gsum gyi tshad tsam dang / 'og tu yang sar 'gyur
257a4(mdo): te/ su yang 'ong bar mya nus so// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / dr-i za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mr-i dang mya ma yin dang /
257a5(mdo): bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar myi nus na/ mye ma yin pa phal pa dang / bkyegs dang / log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci / gos te gnas myed do// rigs sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa myed

257a9(mdo): sgra ga can nam/ 'jigs byed kyang 'jig par 'gyur na/ gdon gzhan 'ong bar sta ga la 'gyur te/ mod la gcig tu 'jig par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gdon gyis zin pa thams cad la du khrod kyi thal ba la

257b4(mdo): dang / tsang rong dang / bcas pa rnams 'gul lo// rgya mtsho chen po ni zhugs so// ri rab chen po ni g.yos so// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhal myed 'ang dang / bcas pa ni cher g.yos te
257b5(mdo): 'gul lo// lha thams cad skrag go/ lha ma yin thams cad du zhing / phyogs phyogs su 'bros so// sa ni g.yos so// klu gang dag rgya mtshon gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'byung po dang /

257b8(mdo): ni mod la dug myed par 'gyur ro// klu 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyis gal te zin pa'am/ sbrul gyis zin pa la bdug pa dang / byugs pa tsam gyis thams cad du dug myed par 'gyur ro// gang dag 'jig rten na dug sna
257b9(mdo): tshogs kyi babad pa yod pa sa bdug pa'i dri nam dang / bskus pa tsam dang / ri lu nas kyis mod la dug thams cad sred par 'gyur te be com kyi bya'o// 'bras dang pos myig dang lu ta dang / shu ba dang sha bkra dang / na bkru dang /
257'a1(mdo): mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / ldog pa rnam pa mang po dang / nad mched pa dang / dpal b.li'iphreng ba dang / kho 'bras dang / rkub na ba dang / skan dang / 'bru ba dang / m-i ga sogs na ba dang / snying ka na
257'a2(mdo): dang / gre ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba na ba dang / mgo bo na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba la ril lus bskus pa dang / chu dron 'thungs pa tsam dang / bdug pa tsam dang / bsnams pa tsam gyis thams cad de ma zag tu rab
257'a3(mdo): tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du rilu dam pa la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te byin na/ thams cad du dgos pa thams cad byed pa bla na myed pa yin no// shaM nad tu char che ba dang / char myi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa

257'a6(mdo): pa kun tu 'jug pa'i rims myi bzad pa drag po'i rims dang / rims drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang / me 'bar shi nad tu tsha ba dang / zhag bzhi pa'i rims myi bzad pa dang / grang ba'i rims sdug bsngal
257'a7(mdo): che ba dang / rims gang dag 'tsho ba'i zhags pa 'bar ba 'khrug pa drag po myi bzad pa zlos pa'i rims gso rga ba dang / nyin cig pa'i rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang / de bzhin du rlung las kyu rad pa dang / bar
257'a8(mdo): kan las gyurd pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur da pa la rims dang / rims rnying pa dang / zug zer dang / gzha 'brum dang / gcin sri ba dang / bzad pa dang / rims thams thams cad la
257'a9(mdo): bdugs pa tsam gyis the tsom myed par rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' ldir gyi gdon dang / gang dag myi 'am me'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mya ma yin pa'i gdon dang / gang dag gzhan myi'i gdon
257'b1(mdo): mas cad bdug pa 'dugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro// lugs kyu'i gsang sngags dam pa la lan cig dran par byas na/ skyems byed dang / skams pa dang / brjed byed dang / gdon la ga yag
257'b2(mdo): shwA dang / bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang / grib gdon dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams byung ba dang / gang du gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdug pa tsam gyis wa
257'b3(mdo): cad las de tha rad par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'khros pa dang gang zhig rkun po dang / myi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ tsang rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang ngam/ dog pa mya bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan cig dran pa dang / bdug
257'b4(mdo): pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du rtag tu bde 'gro ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mes kyi tshugs/ chu chen pos khyer bar myi 'gyur ro// sngags kyu'i
257'b5(mdo): rigs sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs nas/ thams cad du pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bde zhing legs pa shin/ tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mtshon kyis myi tshugs dug
257'b6(mdo): gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ de la byad kyis myi tshugs nad kyis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no// gsang sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa ni thams cad du 'jigs pa zas
257'b7(mdo): cad las tha rad par 'gyur ba te/ 'di la dogs par myi bya'o// dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i sems can ma rungs pa mye bzad pa rnams dang / 'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'byed pa na/ bdag nyid bdug pas bdug cing rig sngag
257'b8(mdo): lan cig dran par byas na/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te mthong ba tsam la dogs par myi bya'o// gang zhig rig sngags 'grub par myi 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig bkyegs kyis zan te nyams pa dang / blo zhan cing le lo
257'b9(mdo): can la bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bya zhing / gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na/ des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// skal ba myed pa bdag nyid bdug pa dang / r-i lu mchog gis bkru ba dang / myig/
258a1(mdo): bsku ba dang / mchog thig le byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang / dga' ba dang dbang phyug mtshungs pa myed par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyas po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du stobs
258a2(mdo): thogs pa myed par 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchog grub pa dang / rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par dus thams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mtshan du rjes su 'bras
258a3(mdo): zhing gnas par 'gyur ro// bsrung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pas/ rig sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// bde ba thams cad kyis tsham pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gcig nas ri lu
258a4(mdo): bdun blangs pa la/ 'khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba nas dge sbyong dang bram ze bkren pa sdug 'phongs pa'i bu
258a5(mdo): myed dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'i don du ri lu gcig gis khrus bya/ gcig gis bdag bdug/ gcig gis gos bduka/ gcig ni pa'i rnam lnga dang sbyar ta btung ba bya/
258a6(mdo): gcig ni btup+tAs+yai bor bzhag/ gcig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ r-i lu gcig ni rkyed par btags na/ thams cad du 'byord pa thob par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mchog bla na myed pa gru
258a7(mdo): par 'gyur/ bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// ma dang nyam chung ba dang / de bzhin du chag rmugs dang / bkyegs kyis zin pa dang / gdon rab smras zin pa de dag thams
258a8(mdo): cad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par myi bya'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ gas
258a9(mdo): sngags lan cig dran pa dang / gdug pa mchog gis bdug pa byas pas dogs par myi bya'o// mnar myed pa myi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang / bdug pa dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang phung ba rnams
258b1(mdo): thams cad mod la myed par 'gyur ro// mes phye ma leb bzhin du rtag tu myur du bsreg par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing / bdug pa 'dis bdugs na dus ma le yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig pA/
258b2(mdo): 'gyur zhing / thams cad du sbyar ba la dogs par myi bya'o// 'khor los sgyur ba/ thams cad kyi 'khro bo'i lugs kyu gyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang sgo chen por nam nangs ka dang / nam sros
258b3(mdo): kar bdug cing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas na/ khyim kyi nang der gang dag myi snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon ma rungs pa
258b4(mdo): dang / mya ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir 'byung zhing 'dus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// khyim gang yin pa 'gul pa dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bar bar 'gyur
258b5(mdo): zhing / dmyal ba'i srungs ma myi bzad pa thams cad phyogs bsla/ da par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / myi'am ci dang /
258b6(mdo): lto 'phye chen po dang / klu mthu bo che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na myed pas skrag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs dang /
258b7(mdo): phyogs mtshams 'khrul pa dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa myi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi
258b8(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha dang lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu rnams kyis
258b9(mdo): bsrung ba'i phyir/ nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rjes su skyong ba dang / dus thams cad du bla na myed pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed do// 'khri bo'i lcags kyu'i bla na myed pa grub po'i thig la brjod par
258'a1(mdo): bya'o// thig le skar ma lta bu ni// lha'i nyi ma bzhin du spa/ nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// bsod nams ga'i brjid dag gis 'bar// mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du// mun pa'i nang na sdang bar
258'a2(mdo): 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pa ni// skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin// bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang // dpag tshad gzhal du myed pa yis// lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur// mkha' sa rin chen mchod sngo
258'a3(mdo): ltar// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// ra lu bsten pa byas na ni// lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskrad// gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang // shan da tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po dus rtag
258'a4(mdo): tu// phyag na s+ya bor 'jog par mdzad// rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa/ dang // kun tu bla myed 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gsangapa sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor
258'a5(mdo): 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi// rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te// kun tu 'grub pa bla na myed// 'gye'u wang dang gur kum dang // ru/ rta cha bsnyams te sbyar la 'khro bo 'i lcags kyu laMgasang sngags
258'a6(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par gzhag pa zhus legs par byas pa/ gos rtsang ma bgos shing / rtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i
258'a7(mdo): tshe/ chu rtsar ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya shug gis 'bru tsam byas te/ grib ma la skams la gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom pa de'i tshe/ 'khri bo 'i lcags kyu'i lam nyi shu ma gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ sbyin mtshams su
258'a8(mdo): thig le bya'o// spyan mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byed kyi brlabs kyis byin kyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig la byas ste/ byid kyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod la/ de bzhin
258'a9(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par bya'o// thams cad du mchod pa byas pa dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus pas mnyan par bya ba dang /
258'b1(mdo): rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dka' bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// sems can kun gus pa dang / dga' bo ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa
258'b2(mdo): la bya ba bzhin byed do// nor dang / 'bru dang lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
258'b3(mdo): grags chen dang / klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am tsau dang / lto 'phye
258'b4(mdo): chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nad myed pa dang / rims nad myed pa dang / sdig pa thams cad spang ba
258'b5(mdo): dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mo/ ngas pa'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'jom/ pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtag tu thams
258'b6(mdo): cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// dgra dang phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad kun tu rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro// thig le de lta bu byas te/ 'khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la/
258'b7(mdo): yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ phug gi skor gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdangs par 'gyur ro// ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par bya'o// lan gsum du zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan gzhug pa le ga nas su
258'b8(mdo): 'kho bo'i lugs kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na/ de la tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzang zhing mdzes pa lta bar 'os pa mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'phrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shi nang tu smra zhing
258'b9(mdo): 'bar ba bzhin 'dzum pa/ sus ngo tsha ba ltar byed pa 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas/ gser gyi snod rin po ches bkang ba thogs te/ rigs sngags 'chang ba la dbul bar byed do//
259a1(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang bas cad myi smra bar bya'o// rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar myi bya'o// gsang sngags 'bal zhika dran par bya zhing / yungs kar gyis gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o// ste gzho nu ma re/
259a2(mdo): rtug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba/ 'khro bo'i gzugs sachu 'phyang ba mche ba rtsegs pa ska ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la/ ral bcod pan kyis brgyan par ston da na/ rigs sngags 'chang bas skrag par myi bya'o// 'khrob
259a3(mdo): li lcags kyu 'bal zhig dran par bya'o// yang yungs kar gyis mgo bo'i dbyi bor bdeg cing / khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe de sa la 'gyel te 'gre ldog cing / kye rig sngags rjel bcu blo rigs sngags
259a4(mdo): 'chang khyab 'jug gis gzugs can gum mo kum mo zhes sgra chen po 'byind to// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas rjes su brtags te/ gal tre kha chu dbu bar byung na/ rigs sngags 'chang bas de blangs la/
259a5(mdo): rkang pa dang byin pa bskus na/ rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i rlung la zhon/ te/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang ba/ l-i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang ba'i 'kho
259a6(mdo): brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro// skad cig tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu lon
259a7(mdo): par 'dre zhing / skra yid tsam 'khyil cing 'khyil ba/ rna ca ga du bu tri ma myed cing / spen me tog 'phyang ba dang 'khrib ma gdu bus brgyan pa lus pad ma 'dra zhing dkar sham du 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa stong phrag bdun bcu
259a8(mdo): rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba stong phrag chu brgya dgu su rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro// gal te thig ye byas te myi snang bar
259a9(mdo): gyur pa na/ gnod sbyin dang srin po 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim sgo phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis shes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin
259b1(mdo): cu 'dug go// mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// khyim thams cad du re re yang dpon po dang bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal sa mgo bo'i tshogs mar thig le byas na/ brgya byid dang /
259b2(mdo): lha ma yin rnams kyi dbang po sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te/ rigs 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen
259b3(mdo): bkur byed par 'gyur ro// shi nang tu mthong ba'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dka' kun tu gyod par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thub par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te/ klu'i mchog
259b4(mdo): zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la/ klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas chung ma dang / bu mo go na nu 'am thams cad mdur du 'dug cing 'di skad smras te/ rigs sngags 'chang ba bka' spros da cig dang /
259b5(mdo): las bgyi ba dang dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing / nam 'tsho'i b.radu nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// yo byad thams cad kyis myi 'dre la par bsgrub par bgyi'o// klu'i lha'i longs dpyod mchog tu los
259b6(mdo): spyad pas brtse bar bgyi'o// lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su gnas par bgyi'o// nor thams cad rjes su stsal par bgyi'o// rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang / dngus dang bye du r+ya dang / shang ka shi
259b7(mdo): dang / bai ru dang / sa se sbram dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / oMn dra ni la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / pad ma ra ga dang / bye du r+ya dang / shi nad tu bzang po rnams rjes su stsa lad par bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi
259b8(mdo): bza' ba mchog dang / lha rdzas kyi nor kyigyi phung pos bang mdzod nams rab tu bkang bar bgyi'o// sha nad tu char ches pa bcad par bgyi'o// char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa'i char bcad
259b9(mdo): par bgyi'o// dus su char dbab pa dang // dus su char pa'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas
260a1(mdo): te bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa skyi bor blang bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de la tshag dang / bsam pa rjes su bskang bar bgyi'o// dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na
260a2(mdo): glang po che stong gi stobs yod par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad kyi stobs kyis myi thub par 'gyur ro// 'thab cing dam ki g.yul 'gyed pa'i thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnod pa'i stobs logs pa myed de
260a3(mdo): rgyal po sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha ma yin kun las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad 'di la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba'i phyir rtag tu zha 'bring du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed
260a4(mdo): pa dang / dngogs dbyis pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / g.yul labyed pa thams cad du rgyal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro// lto bar thig le byas te/ 'khro bo li lcags kyu'i rigs sngags lan cig dran par

260a7(mdo): par bya bar 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i chen po lob par 'alum 'gyur ro// lag 'biphel du mig yo byas te san cig 'azlas brjod byas la/ ga la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de bas
260a8(mdo): cad sbyin zhing / bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa bskus la/ lan cig bzlas brjod byas ste/ grong khyer kyi sgo la bdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad
260a9(mdo): dbang du 'gyur te 'dug cang / ji srid grong khyer der 'dug par 'dod pa de srid du thams cad ci bya ba de thams cad byed cing gnas pa dang / mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pa la bskus te rgyal po'i sgol
260b1(mdo): b.rabs na/ ji srid 'dug par 'dod na/ de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la bsku zhing lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab par byas na/

260b3(mdo): dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na gnas shing / dbang du 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ba dang / thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'a
260b4(mdo): ro// brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshal kyi nang du zhugs na/ zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim na gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing / khyim kyi sgo thams cad phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro//
260b5(mdo): sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang / nA dang shang gel ba'i sman dang / rtswa dang 'go ljogs kyi nags tshal kyi rang gi ngo bo thams cad dziHltar 'dod pa blang ba bzhin du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro//

260b8(mdo): kyis yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// nam mtsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// myi'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu bdapa la/ lan cig bzlas brjod byas te myig bskus na/ gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan
260b9(mdo): mo yang nyin par bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchu'i zor to la thig le bya zhing / lan cig bzlas brjod byas na/ gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// tshig bzung bar bya bar
261a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// kha nas ud pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro/ gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang / ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la khrig se bya zhing / lan cig gsang sngags dran par byas na/

261a5(mdo): rgyu ba thams cad me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha'adag bsku zhing / gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na/ lus mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu dang yungs kar kyis
261a6(mdo): bskrad nas bum pa dang / bum bu la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ tri chus stang du gtor ba dang bcas pa byas na/ phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro// ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung
261a7(mdo): rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / dupal bsku zhing rjes su dran par byas nas/ skad cig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// lhung bzed la bskus ma 'bar bar 'gyur ro// mgo bskus na
261a8(mdo): skra 'bar bar 'gyur ro// dung la bskus te de gnas mthon por bus na/ sgra gang du thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi 'khro bo thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ngan pa dang ma
261a9(mdo): rungs pa thams cad rab tu'izhi bar 'gyur ro// sr-im logs su bus na rlung srin dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer kyi sgo bzhir bus na byur dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / lo nyes dang nad ma rungs
261b1(mdo): ba dang / 'bab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed pa dang / 'tshang 'dradru ba dang / mA~M bde ba dang / 'jug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'brung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha ba dang / mi dgas dang / skyes
261b2(mdo): byed dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// rims thams ca zhi bar 'gyur ro// nang thams dpa'i bab 'gyur ro// kas dz+ra sngags dang / byad dang / srod gtong dang / dug gis la
261b3(mdo): pa thams cad las yongs su ba rad par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i skor bus na pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lan 'gal ya
261b4(mdo): 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// ba la pa 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / myi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga mo 'chi ba dang / byur dang / lo nyes dang / nad dang / myig nad dang / nad zas
261b5(mdo): cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po byung ba la kha pa'i steng du skad drag poralan gcig tu smra bud cing / bzlas brjod byas na/ bus pa tsam gyi modo la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// char gyi 'bab pa
261b6(mdo): tshe klu'i gnas mtsho'i 'gram du bus na/ mod la klu'i rgyal po nas char pa'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// char ches pa'i cha srin logs su bus na/ shi nad tu char ches po zhi bar 'gyur ro// san 'a/
261b7(mdo): yang mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra myi shis pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// mtshams chen po bcad nas/ ri mthon po'i khar bus te ci tsam du dung sgra thos pa de tsam tshun chad mtshams chen po bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro// dkyil
261b8(mdo): 'khor gyi mtshams bcad na/ bskor zhing bus dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bsgrub pa bla na myed pa thams cad bya ba la sems can zhi bar
261b9(mdo): bya ba ni nas dang / yungs kar mar dang bsres la shing ar ka'i me bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi napa kun tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad gnod pa thams cad dang /
262a1(mdo): 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ dpag tshad stong kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur ro// rgyas pa bya na/
262a2(mdo): yungs kar dang 'bras sa lu dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres te sbyin bsreg bya ba ni/ lan bdun sbyin bsreg byas na/ dpag tshad kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg byas na/
262a3(mdo): dpag tshad brgya kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ dpag tshad stong kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// shing dri myi zhim pa'i me bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang / lan tsha dang / yungs
262a4(mdo): mar dang / shing bsres te/ tsher ma can kyi yam sreg shing gi me sbar te/ sbyin bsreg lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ yid la dzaM ltar sems shing / 'dod pa thams cad du mngon pyod kyi
262a5(mdo): las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// gsang pa sngags grub par byed 'dod na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar ta/ shing arga'i yam bsreg shing gyis me sbar te/ sbyin
262a6(mdo): bsreg lan bdun byas na/ rang gi 'khro bo'i gsang sngags pa sgrub par grub par 'gyur ro// lan bcu bzhi byas na/ don yod pa li lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang sbyin bsres

262a8(mdo): gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs rnams so// gzhan yang 'khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// tal dang 'bras so ba dang / zho dang sbrang
262a9(mdo): rtsi dang / mar rnams sbyar te/ chang pa bdun sbyin bsreg byas na/ bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ brgya byin las stsogs pa lha thams cad lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa yang

265b9(mdo): nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe ro langs chen po gnod ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de stond kyi dus kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi rjes su zhugs nas/ kapa 'od zer de dag gis gapal reg pa 'od zer gyi dra bas reg na rims su 'gyur te/
