266a2(mdo): cad dang / grul bum thams cad dang / yi dag sa thams cad dang / sha za thams cad 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nam mkha' ldi pa yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa
266a3(mdo): yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus so// kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu// nga yis chad pa drag byas pas// pa la 'byung pos byar ci yod// pa'i sa sdang ba thams cad bcom// gsod par gyur pa stobs po che// ro langs dag
266a4(mdo): gis byar ci yod// de dag kyang ni pa'i zhags pas// kun nas yongs su bskor da pa yin// zhags pa kun gyis de dag kyang // tshugs shing shi nad tu rmongs par byas// 'di'i sa bdag gi don grub cing //
266a5(mdo): gsang sngags tshig rnams grub 'gyur cig/ na ma sid d+ha nan/ sid/ d+ya na tu man tra pa da/ swa stir me sarba sad tA nan tsa/ swa ha/ sangs rgyas kun kyi stobs gang dang / dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs
266a6(mdo): gang dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis// bde legs su ni rab gyur da cig/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis rtag tu 'jigs pa thams cad la swa ha// cho ga ni lan drug bcu rtsa gcig
266a7(mdo): bar+Nas brjod bya ste/ kAM me ru dang bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i skud pa dmar po la mdud pa dor/ de bzhin bya ba yang bya'o// 'byung po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems rnam par g.yengs byed la stsogs pa dang /
266a8(mdo): byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhazhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa mchog yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang mya
266a9(mdo): dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho//
266b1(mdo): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi sa skyes pas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tshab/ rgya gar kyi mkhan po la bu d+ha sings/ ban de ye shes sdes bskur// // rgya gar skad du/ a mya nyan skar
266b2(mdo): ma da ra ni sa rba ka ti pa ri sho d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ye shes ta a la zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems da
266b3(mdo): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung la
266b4(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpal 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur
266b5(mdo): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs spyod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dang / bzhi po de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zla ba dang nyi ma'i kam
266b6(mdo): na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i zla ba dang / nyi ma gnyis de bzhin gan gas pa de dag ka la ba bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' me dag ga la ba der song nas/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
266b7(mdo): po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i zhil bzhugs pa rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa dag nang na byang chub sems dpa' de dag bkod pa yang mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma gnyis
266b8(mdo): gcig la gcig sems te/ ji ltar byas na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams las sems can thams cad la snang ba sbyin pa dang / mun pa mun nag bsal ba'i phyir/
266b9(mdo): shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcur khyab pa'i blo can zhes bya ba gang gi mthus bdag cag sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa thob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub
267a1(mdo): sems dpa' de dag gis lha'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma de dag gis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis lha'i bu zla ba
267a2(mdo): dang / nya ma de dag kyis yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di dag bka' saHlad to// sa d+ya thAM dan tsag shur da da/ tsag kU sha pa/
267a3(mdo): dU la mI thA/ ka lan za/ sid zid tha na/ sa su ra t+ya/ sa ra n+ya/ su thA sa/ in than sa/ bI la bI la/ pa ni tsa ru mu rti ni/ A rA ni/ swe rA ni/ ka li ba ni/ ka la po ni/ tu ru dri thu si/ d+hu gu ti dA su ti/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/
267a4(mdo): d+hun+ya d+ha ma/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ka sa ka sa/ sad nas/ kI li kI li/ ki sa pa ya ki sa pa ya/ d+hu su d+han+tu/ sun d+ha sum d+hu/ sin+nasu/ adan su/ e ta su/ e ta sa pa ni/ u du ra d+ha/
267a5(mdo): d+ha re/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ kurma ku ma/ ku ma/ pa ni/ ku rma pa ni/ kI lu kI lu/ kI la pa ni/ ka rka ri ka rka raM/ lu ru pa te/ lu ru b+ha d+he/ d+hu ru d+he/ ma hA d+hu ru d+he/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri
267a6(mdo): kai ri/ b+haM d+hu si/ pa hU si/ da su da su/ ha su ha su/ ha sa pa ni sre ho// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rigs kyi/
267a7(mdo): bu dag gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya bcu rtsa brgyad kyis gsungs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu dka u du 'bar ra'i me tog ni ches
267a8(mdo): rnyed par sla'i/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jig rten du byung ba ni de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni ches rnyed par sla'i/ 'di dag 'chang ba 'am/ klog pa ni de lta ma yin no//
267a9(mdo): rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni ches rnyed par sla'i/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gal te sems can mnar myed pa na 'khod pa skal par gnas pa
267b1(mdo): mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa'i sems cand de dag gi phyir/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brjod na/ de'i tshe
267b2(mdo): gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi mthus sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myed pa kha brgyar gyes par gyur pa la/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su tha rad par gyur da na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i myi rnams lta ci smos te/ gang /
267b3(mdo): dkan lam du grag par gyur pa/ de dag gis ni bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po rnams dang / byang chub sems dpal bzhi po rnams dang / zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyis yongs su zin pa yin no snyam du shes pa
267b4(mdo): kho nar bya ste/ 'di la som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis bskyed par gyi bya'o// tad ya A d+hun te/ d+hu na Ti/ ma hA d+ha ne sa?/ su mu su swA hA// shug kr-i bi no d+ha ni/ ta ra ta ra swa ha/ dzo ti she d+hi paM
267b5(mdo): tu ru tu ru swa ha/ pad ma ma li ni sad t+ya ta ra bud ti/ hu ru hu/ ru swa ha// s+yad tu bud d+hi s+yad t+ya a ba lo ka dzi/ ka ra ka ra/ ke/ ri ki ri sra ha/ d+hur na b+hud d+hi/ a pra ti ha ta/ b+hu taM/ tsu ru tsu ru
267b6(mdo): sra ha/ laka sha na mr-i ta hu ma pa ri hA re/ hu ru hu ru/ khu ru khu ru lu ru sra hA/ da ra da ra/ ma hA d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra yan tI ye swa ha/ su pra te/ su ma te/ a ba pra ti/ ha ta pud d+haM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra
267b7(mdo): yan ti ye swa ha// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od rtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsungs la phyag
267b8(mdo): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// swa ha/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rdzogs s+ho//
268a1(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA shrI na ma dAd da sha ka/ bod skad du/ dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
268a2(mdo): cig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams bad ba can na bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
268a3(mdo): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' brtsal to// dge slong ngam
268a4(mdo): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan sems can gapal la zhig gis dpal chen mo'i mying bcu gnyis po 'di shes sam/ 'dzind tam klog gam/ sgrub pa ma/ brjod na
268a5(mdo): de dbul ba dang bral te phyug por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po tham sa cad kyis de ltar gyurd cig ces smras so// de la mying bcu ka/ nyes pa ni 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang /
268a6(mdo): pad ma'i 'phreng dang / nor bdun ma dang / dkar sham ma dang / snyan pa che ldan ma dang / pad ma'i s+yar dang / grags ldan ma dang / gachen ma dang / zas sbyin ma dang / rin chen 'od ldan ma dang / dpal
268a7(mdo): chen mo'o// tad ya thA/ dza gI ni sarba kAr+ya s+ye dA ni/ saM mi si mi/ ni mi ni mi/ a lag shrI me na sha ya swa sa// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
268a8(mdo): de skad ces bka' saHla nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsalas pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu
268a9(mdo): gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dA ma sa gA ra na ma ma hA ya na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
268b1(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das ba ra na se drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
268b2(mdo): da'athabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' saHlad pa/ dge slong dka ngas ni/ chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba cha 'phra ba/ brtag par mkhas shing shes
268b3(mdo): pas reg par bya ba rtogs so// ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha rnams dang / myi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskon
268b4(mdo): to// ngas thogs pa myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir/ nges pa kho na bsgrub par bya'o// dge slong dag chos kyi rgyal tsho'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
268b5(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros kyi blo dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bstan pa/ 'i blo dang / shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/ gsung kyi mchog dang
268b6(mdo): ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyend cing gzigs pa dag gis bstand cing bshad pa yod de/ gang dag de shes pa dang gang dag de 'dzind pa de dag gis ni myur ba kho na chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro//
268b7(mdo): lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzidad pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / brjed ngas pa myed pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing / chos bzung ba rnams chung za bar myi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rnon po
268b8(mdo): pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyi rgyul lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la
268b9(mdo): mkhas par 'gyur te/ chos lnga po 'di dag ni sdod kyi bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bkal sa
269a1(mdo): pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyis sdom gyi bzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/ des na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams ni zos par 'gyur ro// thos pa'i chos rnams ni 'dzind par 'gyur ro//
269a2(mdo): bzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyams su len par 'gyur ro// nyams su blangs pa'i chos rnams ni/ gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed do// tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin
269a3(mdo): ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / bla na myed pa'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / sa nas sar brtag pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig dang brda' sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o// de la 'di
269a4(mdo): dag ni gzi byin brtan par byed pa'o// rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / ye dgas dang / sha za 'dzam bu gling du lhags pa
269a5(mdo): thams cad kyis/ gang zag de la zas kyi sna grangs rnams dang sman/ rnams sbyin par 'gyur ba'o// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos la/ sa byung ba/ gzhan dag la myi gnod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas
269a6(mdo): gsungs pa lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis gnod pa bstan pa yongs su 'dzind pa ni 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig khyod kyis phyis 'gyod
269a7(mdo): ta re/ sad ya the dan ka ma ke tan ma bud tshe/ ra di su ra ti/ gan tra ma/ thu ma na/ ne li la ta/ a sang ku la swa/ b+hu myi.a nu sma ri/ i shang ga ma/ i sha sta na/ e na a bu ka twe/ yA mu ga g+hu ma b+he/ pA
269a8(mdo): b+hi ma ku ra ba ya ba/ a s+ya bka kya s+ya/ bi lang ka pA la pa thA/ shI ba ba ri/ pan tsa ka/ pra sa te dzan/ a ba ba la/ a kra pe la/ nai sha ku mu tse dzu mA u dze/ 'dzu me/ kun dga' bo 'di ni gnod sbyin dpag
269a9(mdo): pa grub pa dang / gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ba yang bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/ rim 'gro yang byed byed pa rnams 'ching ste/ kun dga'
269b1(mdo): bo khyod kyis de gnod sbyin dbab pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zhung shig/ kun dga' bo gang las gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon myed pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa
269b2(mdo): de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo shar gyi
269b3(mdo): lus 'phags kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin pad byed ces bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo nub kyi bam yang khyod kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin cher pyod ces bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo byad kyi sgra myi snyan gyi kring na ni/ gnod sbyin
269b4(mdo): nam grags rjes gnas so// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling na ni gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas ste// kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gnod skye
269b5(mdo): de dag las gzhan ga'i byin za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par/ 'gyur ro// dad par gyur nas kyang dad pa myi phyed par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni shes bzhin gyi tshig
269b6(mdo): drang srong kyis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig gi mchog srog chags 'byung po thams cad la/ rnam par myi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung shig dang
269b7(mdo): bshad do// kun dga' bo de la ni pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang bar chad byed nus so// s+ya 'ang sa dwe dang/ ngan 'dir/ ma ha ha ra/ ha ram/ ba rA na/ rung dra dra/ ku ma ti/ ti tra/ in dra man
269b8(mdo): d+hu/ sab te/ sa ha ra/ sa d+hu sa te/ i la la pa ma te/ a bau ta/ ta ra pa ra/ yai bi nA sa da ba~M gwa r+b+hu'i bAThA/ pa ba d+ha I shu pa ta/ sad pa sta/ kra ma kra ma ti nas/ a sibA tsa/ ma la bi na hi'i ba ga su re/ dUr d+hu ra/
269b9(mdo): u kra kra sug gra/ ug pra ti/ bi ra sa kra ma ti/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / lus srul po dang / klu dang / hri
270a1(mdo): ba dang / sha ba gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang / lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag bos nas dka' bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod
270a2(mdo): kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig phyis 'gyod da re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chags su bcad pa 'di dag bka' saHsad to// gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni// gleng bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya// gsang
270a3(mdo): sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba// de'i dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'i// gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni// chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag/ nyan par gyur pa de la ston//
270a4(mdo): dpag tshad brgya phrag mang por yang // mthar kyi su ni song nas kyang // zab cing don dang ldan pa'i// tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya// 'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste// 'di dag mkhas rnams nyan par gyis// drag po dag gis
270a5(mdo): zos na yang // phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba skye// gang la bde dang // sdug bsngal myed// de la de ni dka' bar 'gyur// sa 'di chags pa/ myed pa ste/ sangs rgyas sa ni bsam myi khyab// chags pa myed par
270a6(mdo): bstan pa'o// bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas// nyi ma srin las byung ba ltar// de ni sa stengs de bzhin snang // 'odi la ske ma ched phung po rnams// bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang // dge ba
270a7(mdo): chos ni zab mo rnams// sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod// de'i thos pa tshogs rnams gang // nams kyang chung bar myi 'gyur te// sa thob chos rnams de dag pos// nyes dang nyes myin rnams la mkhas// rtogs hA/
270a8(mdo): khong du chud pa'i mchog/ myig bzangs rnams kyang dag par 'gyur// 'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags// sangs rgyas rnams ni chos rnams la// the tsom myi za bden pa gang // bden pa de/
270a9(mdo): bdag la lung mnos pa// ci yod thams cad gnas gyur da cig// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la// byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des// rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la// ston pa rab tu gnas gyu
270b1(mdo): cig/ gling bzhi gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag/ ma dad pa ni dad par bstan// kad rtogs pa myi snang ba// de la de kun dod ston 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar gtong kang yin dang // glang chen na dang khyad par stobs// drag po
270b2(mdo): dga' byed gsod byed dang // zla ba mgon myed lus gsod pa// dka' sde dang ni lag dpa' dang // srin po dang ni sa 'dzind pa// ljang bu ka dang na bzangs dang // ral gyi yu can bong bu rnams// thams cad grub par
270b3(mdo): byed pa'i tshig// gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzind pa// gnod sbyin srin po de dag ni// sro bar gyur nas 'dzum par byed// rtag tu de'i spobs pa dang // tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang // nges pa'i tshig dang chos
270b4(mdo): kun dang // yi ge rnams la mkhas par gyur // sung mnos pa yang chud myi za// rtogs pa mtha' lngas 'phel bar 'gyur/ rtag tu don dngos yi kai la// de'i shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur// su
270b5(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // myi mjed bdag po lha rnams dang // myi mjed bdag po tshangs pa yang // de'i legs bshad nyan pa/ rnams// de'i mod la dran par byed// s+yad ya the dan/ mu ku na/
270b6(mdo): mu ku na/ ha ra nai bi ha ra na/ bi da sa kra ma na/ so ma su mu khi/ ta ga Na/ a pa pr-i ya/ us+pha me ko ba ha te/ su ru pa/ pra ba na dan/ sang gra me ba ha/ dza ga re/ i sha ka re/ pra bi sha ga re/ kun d+ha ba na/ ud
270b7(mdo): ta na/ pi ku na/ i sha ku na/ a tu la tu la/ i ti bi ti/ pa'i tsa mo sha/ sa ra dza ga he/ be e ba sam pra mu khye/ e ga ba re/ tha hu sa hU/ hi ti ya dzA hu/ tsa tu ra 'di bi shA yA nA/ tha hu ma hu/ uka kra nu hU/ d+ha ra
270b8(mdo): sa rba/ sang grA ha/ a thig tA sa/ prad ta pi d+hi swe/ bsus h+ya/ kA ra ka ru/ dA sa rba// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod// de ni thos la mongs pa/
270b9(mdo): myed// de ni shes rab myed kyi 'gyur// skad bdal ci bzhin nyi ma bzhin// zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin// de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags/
271a1(mdo): kyi tshig 'di dag bka' saHlad to// s+ya ya thA dAn/ tsa ra de bi tsa ra d+ha/ a ma gu te/ a ti ma ti/ pa ra ha re/ g+ha na b+he/ haM ba ra me/ ma ha pra tiHb+ha ha ne/ dza ye dza ya/ a nu ke la ba me/ suka kra pa ti/
271a2(mdo): swa ra swa ra/ ma bi sa re/ bu gu ma te/ pra bi bar ste/ sa me a dzi ta dzi ye/ nu pa e/ su ko ma nu san d+hi/ ni khu ma no sa k+She/ nA pe tsA pe/ tsu lu tsu lu/ phu lu pu lu/ bya ba pra sa re/ ka ra ka ra ba na de/ dzaM ba bI dza/ a ba
271a3(mdo): pra ti/ san dI/ nA ha bu ma ti/ Na NA ma te/ a r-i da si/ dzaSh+Ta nu pa ni tra/ a sa gra ha ba ti/ rigs sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig lus la thogs te 'chang na/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
271a4(mdo): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / yaM dgas dang / sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur cing / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// don thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
271a5(mdo): pas gan ba bzhin du 'tsho ba'i mthar zug gi bar du 'chi bar myi 'gyur/ myed par myi 'gyur ro// de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ da// gon par 'dug la/ gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag
271a6(mdo): bdun gyi bar du brjod de/ nyin lan gsum An+da gsum dran par bya'o// de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas/
271a7(mdo): tshe 'ang sman pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
271a8(mdo): 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// rdzogs s+ho//
271a9(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ a r+ya ba na sha pa rin ma ga d+har ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ri krod ma yo ma gyod pa'i gzungs// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
271b1(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal
271b2(mdo): lo// mye 'u zung sha za mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma me'u zung ma ri krod ma lo ma gyon ma sha za mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhags pa dang dgra sta thogs pa bdag gi 'jigs pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang /
271b3(mdo): yams kyi nad gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed chen po gang dag ci yang rung ba thams cad dang / gnod pa gang dag ca yang rung ba thams cad dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ci yang rung ba thams/
271b4(mdo): cad dang / khong du gnod pa'i nad gang dag ci yang rung ba thams cad dang / 'go nad dang / 'go ba'i nad dang 'bral ba de dag thams cad ni/ byis pa kho na dag las 'byung gi/ mkhas pa dag la ni ma yin te
271b5(mdo): bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des song shig/ mkhas pas byin// kyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis bdag cag/ rnams la bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs
271b6(mdo): su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsed pa dang / dug gnan pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar
271b7(mdo): gyis shig/ tad ya thA/ au o mr-i te/ a mr-i te/ a sha ste/ a sha stang ge/ ma ma ra/ ma ma ra/ sha ma/ pra sha ma/ u pa sha ma/ du nu pi/ du lu du lu du mu le/ na mo sha ba ri nan/ na mo ma ha sha ba ri nan
271b8(mdo): pa sha tse pa nag pa raM swa ha/ paM sha tse pa rna sha pa ri sarba ma ri pra sha ma ni/ sarba du stan ban d+ha mu She ni hUM phaT sra hA// 'phags pa raM grod ma lom gyon pa'i gzungs// rdzogs s+ho//
271b9(mdo): 6/ rgya gar skad du/ bo dI man da ma lang ka ra nA ma d+hA ra ne u pa tsa la// bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga/ thams cad mkhyend pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
272a1(mdo): 'di skad bdag gis los pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bar na me'i 'khor gyi khyams dang sangs pa ma/ dge slong lnga stong ces kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dan bcom pa/
272a2(mdo): zas pa zang pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ phur bor ba rang kyi do rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pag stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' snga brgya dang sapas gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas
272a3(mdo): yang bcom ldan 'das zla la nya'i chos bco lnga la chos kyi 'breld pa'i gtas kyi slad du bzhugs pa dang / sems can bye ba zag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag 'dus par gyur te/ bral ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / gyod pa
272a4(mdo): car dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / rgyas pa pa dang / bye brag pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa pa dang / dur khrod pa dang / phyag dar thod pa dang / ba lang kyi brtul zhugs
272a5(mdo): can dang / ri zags na brtul zhugs spyod pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / sku ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
272a6(mdo): drang / myi ma yin pa mang pos yongs su bskor da cing mdun tu bdar bzhin du 'dus te// bcom ldan 'das las myi 'jigs par zhus pa'i lananyan par 'dod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi s+yan sngar 'khod
272a7(mdo): ngo/ sgra rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'khor sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong dag gis yongs su bskor pa dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dang lhan cig tu spags so//
272a8(mdo): nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / lha chen po dang / sred myed kyi bu dang / gshan rje dang / lus ngan po dang / rgyal po chen po gzhan dag dang / dpal dang /
272a9(mdo): tshig ldan ma dang / 'dud can dang / me tog gi so can ma dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang / rgya mtsho dang / dka' bo dang / nye dga' bo klu'i rgyal po stong phrag tu mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba de dag kun kyang
272b1(mdo): 'dus te 'khod do// 'khor nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / myi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po phas mo ches yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la yongs
272b2(mdo): su bskor te mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba byas nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// yang 'khor mang po de na bram ze chen po khyab 'jug spyan zhes bya ba grong khyer dmar bu can na gnas pa
272b3(mdo): phag pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ nam zos kyi bu dang 'gran pa/ mkhas pa/ bzo ba/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ dad pa can/ bsam pa dge ba/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog
272b4(mdo): sum la skyabs su song ba/ dge bsnyen dam pa zhig 'dug pa de bu myed par gyurd nas/ de nyin mtshan du 'di snyam du bdag gi khyim nas bu byung ba myed do// gzhan yang zam pa rnams kyi rang bzhin 'di sa bu
272b5(mdo): yin te/ rigs kyi bu sa bon myed par sems par byed/ rigs myed pas de'i phyir 'gro ba rnams rigs kyi sa bon myed par sems bar byed do snyam du sems so// yang bram ze chen po khyab 'jug sbyin/
272b6(mdo): de/ 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag gi pha yin/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras yin/ dam pa'i chos ni bdag gi ma yin/ 'phags pa dge 'dun ni phu nu bo yin pas/ 'jig rten 'di dang ga
272b7(mdo): du yang bdag gi skye ba shi nad tu shis pa yin no// gzhan yang bdag gis chos gang zhig gnas par bya ba bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar bya zhing / chos gcig po gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thun mong du bya ba dang / bla na
272b8(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / bdag rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang thun mong du 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi khyim nas bu btsa' bar 'gyur ba de dang ji ltar bsgrub par bya
272b9(mdo): ba/ bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu bar bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas bram ze chen po khyab 'jug sbyin grong khyer dmar bu can nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
273a1(mdo): gsum bskor ba byas ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos gcig gis dge ba'i
273a2(mdo): rtsa ba thams cad skyed cing 'di lta ste/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum dang thun mong du 'gyur ba je thog/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ bdag gis bu rnyed par 'gyur ba sags/
273a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ bram ze chen po khyod kyis zhu ba legs par zhus pa legs so legs so// bram ze chen po khyod kyis zhu ba'i gzhi bzang po zhus pa yang legs so// de lta bas na/ ngas ci tsam du yongs
273a4(mdo): su bsgrubs pa legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dpangs khyod la badzad do// bram ze chen po byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs gang gis khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /
273a5(mdo): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yod de/ bram ze chen po sngon byung ba grong khyer chen po dmar bu can gyi shar lho'i phyog/ sa shig na/ lha ma yin gyi gnas zhes bya ba'i skyed mo tshal zhig
273a6(mdo): yod de/ skyed mo tshal de'i nang na srin mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bya ba drag mo gzu lums can/ mdangs 'phrog ma/ dpag tshad stong du yang skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag gi mdangs
273a7(mdo): 'phrog par byed pa zhig gnas pa dang / grong khyer dmar bu can pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams skrag cing myi dga' nas/ bdag cag gis thabs ci zhig bya zhes brjod par byed do// de nas grong khyer dmar bu can gyi skye bo rnams kyi
273a8(mdo): nang nas/ rgan rabs zhig gis kye skye bo dag cig nyon cig/ 'a bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar thos
273a9(mdo): kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du depal yongs su zhus shig dang / bcom ldan 'das de skyob par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / de nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag gis myi rgan po de la/ bcom ldan 'das de ga la bzhugs shes
273b1(mdo): dris pa dang / yul lnga len na bzhugs so zhes smras so// de nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag 'di skad du thabs ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang / myi rgan po de na re/ kye myi rnams dpal phyogs gtsang mar 'ji ba dang / ba lang gyi spyi
273b2(mdo): bas dkyil 'khor gyis/ la/ sgo bzhi shi nad tu rnam par phye nas/ me tog sna tshogs dag bkram/ bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag/ pog phor bzhi dang / lha bshos kyi bum pa bzhi yang bzhag/ phyogs bzhir mar me'i sdo
273b3(mdo): pa yang bzhag/ bya chus bkabs steng du yang tshems shing yang bzhag nas/ sang gdugs chod la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol ba thob shig dang / bcom ldan 'das de ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba mkhyen
273b4(mdo): pa yin la/ bcom ldan 'das de ni sems can rnams srid pa'i btso na ra nas bsgral ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ma las bsgral bar bzhed cing /
273b5(mdo): brtson pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de phye de nyin par 'khor mang // po dang / rdzu 'phrul chen pos grong khyer dmar bu can 'dir byon par// 'gyur ro// de nas grong khyer dmar bu can gyi skye bo'i tshogs de dag
273b6(mdo): gcig tu 'dus nas/ sa phyogs su mthon po zhag tu dong ste/ gan sa rtsang mar 'ji ba ba lad kyi lci ba dang / ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ bum pa gang bas ni brgyan/
273b7(mdo): lha bshos kyi bum pa ni bzhag/ gdug pa mang pos ni bdugs/ phyogs bzhir yang mar me'i sdong po bzhag nas/ mar me sbar/ rol mo'i sgra chen po na bsgrags/ dkyil 'khor kyi dbus su yang gser gyi bya rin po ches
273b8(mdo): spras pa chus bkang ba/ steng du tshems shing bzhag pa bzhag nas/ ca co dang / gzha'i sgra chen po 'don cing / lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od
273b9(mdo): rab tu mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa sems nA kun la byams mdzad pa// bcom ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo// ngo mtshar 'byung ba chos nyid can// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
274a1(mdo): so// 'gro ba nyams zag 'di dag skyab tu gsol// sad kyi gdugs chod la ni spyan 'dren kyis// thub pa bcom ldan gshegs par mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan sems can thams cad dbugs phyung ste/
274a2(mdo): mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen mdzad nas ni// phongs gyur dmyi bzang 'di las bskal du gsol// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas skye bo rnams kyis cig car du tshig de brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs de yang rnam pa
274a3(mdo): drug tu g.yos/ bya'i chu de yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bo nas/ rdzing chen po chu bzang po dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba/ tshim par byed pa ro zhim pa/ ha cang yang myi grang / ha cang yang myi dro bas gang ba/ me tog ud pa la da
274a4(mdo): pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos khyebs pa/ gser kyi bye ma bdal pa/ 'bab stegs bzhi dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis sras pa/ lan kan kyis kun tu brgyan pa zhig tu red
274a5(mdo): de// chem shing de yang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa 'phang du ni dpag tshad drug pa/ rgyar na dpag tshad brgyad pa/ rin po che sna bdun kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / yal ka dang / me tog dang /
274a6(mdo): 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma can zhig du rang do// sa phyog sa da yang rgyar ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ zheng du ni 'khor gyi khyams chen po tsam du zag gru yangs par kun tu gnas shing / dga' dga' lta
274a7(mdo): bu mdzes pa zhig tu gyur da nas/ me tog skam las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa sna tshogs yang 'khrungs/ bya sna tshogs ngang pa dang / gzhad dang / ne tse dang / r-i skyegs dang / rma bya dang / shang shang de'u dang / ngur pa dang /
274a8(mdo): ka ran da dang / 'jib dang / kun la dang / gzhan yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs gser gyi chu dang / gser gyi mgo dang / rin po che sna bdun kyi 'dab ma can dag kyang sgra sgrogs par gyur da/ me tog ta ma la dang / pa ta la dang
274a9(mdo): mya ngan tshang dang / a ti muka ta ka dang / pa re sha dang / ka tam pa dang / mthon ka chen po dang / 'bra go dang / ta ra ni dang / tsaM lan tu ka dang / yu ti ka dang / sin du ba ka la sogs pa me tog ki shing sna tshogs dag gis kyang
274b1(mdo): brtsas par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od ya du sa pa'i rtog gi byin gyirlabs dang / sngon gyi spongasas kyi kyad par dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs di'i mayus mo 'gyu med pa de// nu
274b2(mdo): bar gyu ra to// se nas grong khyer dmar bu can gyi skye bo'i tshigs de dag thams cad la mtshan du ku rad nas/ cho 'phrul chen po zhin tu ngos char che ba yang snang / snga ltas chen po zhig kyang byung bar gyur pa nas/ 'dzi su'i ma
274b3(mdo): 'di su'i rnam par 'phrul pa yin zhig gu/ 'dzam bu'i gling du don chen po snang ba dang / yon tan gyi khyad par chen po byung ba dang / thun mong kyi mtshan ma chen po byung ba las 'jig rten du don chen pan// thung kor ma chag ces
274b4(mdo): brjod par byed do// de nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag phan tshun 'di skad kye khyed de bas/ bcom ldan 'das sang gdugs tshong la spyan drangs pa'i phyir/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po dag ste
274b5(mdo): gon gyis shig ces 'dze rad to// de nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag rings pa rings par rang rang gi gnas su dong ste/ de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang / btung ba mang po mang po thams cad bsdogs nas/ rang
274b6(mdo): rang gi bla re dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phre ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bud pa dang / pheg dag thogs te/ lam kar bskugs nas/
274b7(mdo): 'khor phal mo che dang / bkod pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa sdod cing / 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog 'khor mang po dang / yul lnga len na/ sems
274b8(mdo): can rnams 'dul te/ chos stond par mdzad pa'i 'dus pa chen po dar/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bya chus bkang ba zhig dang tshems shing zhig byung bar gyurd nas/ spyan snga na 'dug
274b9(mdo): go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dzum pa dang bcas shing / mkhyen bzhin du spyad pas phyag mtshan mdog bzang po brgya stong kyis brgyan cing / me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong gis brgyan pa bkang ste/ bya de yang bzhes tshems
275a1(mdo): shing de yang bzhes nas/ cang myi gsung bas gnang ba mdzad do// de nas 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa 'di ka las 'ongs snyam mo// de nas 'khor de na
275a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros shi nad tu rnam dag ces bya ba zhig gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom
275a3(mdo): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das s+yan 'dran pa'i snga ltas bya chub kyis gang ba byung ba 'di ga las mchis lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ s+yan 'dren gyi bya chus bkang ba 'di ni grod
275a4(mdo): khyer chen po dmar bu can nas 'ongs kyis/ blo gros rnam dag so la tshul shing rims shig/ gang gis grong khyer dmar bu can du 'gro 'dod pa de sang nang par rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen pos grong khyer dmar bu can du
275a5(mdo): dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung zos nas/ rings par rangs pa rings par song ste// tshul shing brims shing / nyan thos rnams dang /
275a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang zhag rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par ston da par spyod pa de tshul shing bzhes shig dang / sang gyi gdugs tshod la s+yan 'dren gyis grong khyer dmar bu can du gshegs par bgyi'o// zhes smra/
275a7(mdo): bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam dag gis tshul shing brims nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gdangs par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nang par kyi dus kyi tshe/ nam bza' mnabs te/ bkod pa
275a8(mdo): chen po dang / 'khor mang po dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i/ byin kyi rlabs chen pos nam mkha' la gshegs bzhin du/ sga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mya 'am ci dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lba
275a9(mdo): ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po mang po dza dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs len pa phal mo ches/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / bzhag pa dang / chas sna
275b1(mdo): tshogs rnams kyis/ nam aSha'i ngos na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ skad cig tsas kyi grong khyer chen po dmar bu can du/ 'khor kyi khyams bka chu chen po kan pa'i sa
275b2(mdo): phyags der byon te/ nam mkha'i ngos nas babs nas/ 'khor gyi khyams su gshegs te// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khrel bzhugs pa dang / skye bo mang po'i tshogs de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mngon
275b3(mdo): par 'du bya ba chen pos mchod// 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / 'khor lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za mang po de dag thams cad la yang mchod nas/ dus la ba
275b4(mdo): par rig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gdugs chod bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang mo// mang ba dag 'drim par byed do// bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par tshim par byas
275b5(mdo): ci bde bstabs nas/ lhung bzed bzhag/ phyag bcabs pa dang / na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ mchod pa mngon par 'du bya/ pa chen pos mchod// 'khor mang po de dag kyang mchod nas lan
275b6(mdo): gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi s+yan sngar 'khod nas tshig 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer dmar bu can 'di'i shar sgo'i phyogs zhig na/ lha ma yin gyi nags tshal
275b7(mdo): zhes bya ba'i skyed mo tshal gyi nang na srin mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bgyi ba drag mo gzu lums can gtum mo skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo la 'tshal ba/ mdangs 'phrog pa/ 'tshe bar bgyid pa/
275b8(mdo): gdugs mtshan rtag tu rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa la brtson pa zhig gnas lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs cis bzlog tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa
275b9(mdo): tog gis skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag dbugs phyung ste/ cang kyi gsung bas gnang ba mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa bstan pa des nas kyi sgo nas 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs pa
276a1(mdo): dag mngon te/ 'od gzer gyi snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang snang bar byas/ lha ma yin gyi nags tshal ces bya ba'i skyed mo chal de dang / srin mo me tog snga ma yin ce sa
276a2(mdo): pa 'khor brgya stong can kyi gnas thams cad kyang snang bar byas nas/ gnas thams cad 'bab pa gcig tu gyu ra pa dang / lha ma yin thams cad blong blong por gyur te/ rgyug rab tu rgyug kun tu chug cing phyogs bzhir 'byer bar bye
276a3(mdo): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rgyug cing nyams zag pa'i nga ros bdag cag su la skyabs su bsgrub/ su zhig ni skyob par 'gyur zhes 'dod 'bod do// de nas grong khyer de'i lha zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i
276a4(mdo): tog la skyabs su nye bar deng shika dang / de na khyed cag 'tsho bar 'gyur/ ra ro zhes smras so// de nas srin mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bya ba'i 'khor brgya stong dang rangs par rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste
276a5(mdo): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud de phyag btsal nas / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la skyabs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bskyab
276a6(mdo): tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das slan chad sems can rnams la 'tshe bar yang myi bgyid/ gnod par yang myi bgying lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog gis
276a7(mdo): srin mo la cad myi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad de/ byang chub kyi snying po rnam par 'phrul ba'i snying po rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin kyi rlabs zhe bya ba'i/ ting nge 'dzin pa la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
276a8(mdo): ma thag tu phyogs bcu la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang snang zhing 'khor dang bcas pa'i chos stond pa yang grag/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs de yang
276a9(mdo): bshad par brtsams pa dang / phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog legs so legs so// bcom
276b1(mdo): ma 'das khyod kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po bshad pa dang / srin mo me tog lha mo yi 'khor dang bcas pa btul te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lams bkod pa dang / skye bo de dag phyir/
276b2(mdo): myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod cing / dge ba'i lam la bzhag pa'i legs par bka' saHlad to// de'i chos bzhi chen po yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur da/ rin po che sna bdun kyi char yang bab ste/ 'dzam
276b3(mdo): bu kang du 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs par gyur to// bram ze chen po de'i dus kyi tshe nga tshe rabs bdud kyi bar du bram ze gzhon nur gyurd to// de'i 'og tu ngas gzungs 'di thos te phyir sangs rgyas kyi bsta da pa la/
276b4(mdo): dang pa tho'i nas/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub man par rdzogs par byang chub bo// yang bram ze de'i tshe de'i dus na rmi mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bya ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyong sa ma nyi
276b5(mdo): yid gnyis pa na de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyang / srin mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bya ba der gyur to// yang de'i tshe ro'i dus na grong khyer dmar bu can gyi skye bo'i tshogs rnams gzhan yin
276b6(mdo): du som nyi 'am/ yang gnyis pa na de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye chen
276b7(mdo): po pa'i 'khor 'dus pa 'di yin no// yang bram ze chen po de'i tshe me'i dus na/ srin mo me tog lha ma yin gyi 'khor brgya stong de dag gzhan yin no// snyam du som nyi 'am yid gnyis za ma de ltar myi blta'o// re ci'i phyir zhe na/
276b8(mdo): de dag nyid 'dus pa 'dir bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rgyub dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa dang / rgyas pa pa dang / bye zag pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / dur thong ba dang / phyag dang thod pa dang / ri brags na rtul zhugs
276b9(mdo): khyod pa lpags pa 'di dag yin no// ri nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sngon kyi gtam 'di bka' sa yang nas/ cad kyi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas 'dus pa chen po de dag gis snod kyi gtam 'di thos nas ma
277a1(mdo): cad la mtshan du gyur nas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na 'ba' dang / gdugs dang / rgyas mtshan dang / zla re dag thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der ngo/

277a3(mdo): po'i rgyan ces bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas rig pa'i rgyal po gang gis na/ sems can rnams la snang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ sems can rnams kyi reb
277a4(mdo): yongs su bskang bar 'gyur ba 'di bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po la cang myi gsung bas gnang ba mdzad nas 'dzum pa bstand to// 'dzum pa bstan ma thag tu 'od zer sna
277a5(mdo): tshogs dag mthon te/ 'od zer gyi snang ba'i des phyogs bcu'i 'jag rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi/ zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas
277a6(mdo): kyang snang la/ de dag gis bstan pa'i gsung gi tha snyad kyang grag go// sa 'di la yang rin po che sna bdun kyi shing sngon rnams skyes/ me tog sna tsho gas bkram/ 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas/
277a7(mdo): 'dzam bu'i gling du rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin kyi rlabs bzang po dka' dka' lta bu shaM nad tu mdzes pa dag snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas cho 'phrul chen po de yang mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzu/
277a8(mdo): pa bstand pa yang mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
277a9(mdo): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa sems can

277b5(mdo): gshegs pa shag kya thub pa legs so zhes bya ba bos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa legs so legs so// khyod gzungs// chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

278a1(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba bos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

280a5(mdo): rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa ga la ba der song ste phyi/ na nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon/ nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gzho nur
280a6(mdo): rangs gang zhig byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed// ku chub par byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam zhig skye bar
280a7(mdo): 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pas smras pa/ lag na rdo rje gson cig dang / don de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpa' bstan to// lag na rdo rje gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis
280a8(mdo): phyogs sam/ r-i'am/ raM khrod kyang rung / sa phyogs de thams cad skra'i rtse mo tsam du gshegs pa 'am/ lug gi spu nya ka ma kacig gis reg par byed na yang / ga pan de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi sku gdung m+b+hi bzhugs
280a9(mdo): pa'i gnas kyi sa phyogs de ni rdul phra rab tsam yang ma mthong zhing / nam mkha' la yang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung kyi ring srel dang / gdung gyi ring bsrel dang / chos kyi ring bsrel dang / yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel
280b1(mdo): gyis ma rkang ba ska'i rtse mo gzugs pa tsam yang myed la/ sems can mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po 'ga' zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel thams cad kyang bgrang bar byed/ 'jal bar byed/ dpyod par byed la 'jam
280b2(mdo): bu gling 'a gang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams kyang bgrang bar byed/ 'jal bar byed/ dpyod par byed la/ lag na rdo rje ci sems can de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin no snyam du rig par bya'am/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa
280b3(mdo): 'jam dpal de ni shond tu la mtshan tsha ba'i dang dkon pa yin no snyam du rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas smras pa/ laka na rdo rje gson cig/ de thams cad bgrang ba dang / gzhal ba dang / dpyad par nus yong
280b4(mdo): na rdo ring ba sres gang dag med pa dang / nus thar dag yi pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyu rang ba de/ dathams cad kyis bzlas pa'am/ bskas pa 'gyu ma/ stong du
280b5(mdo): gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsod nams kyi phung po brjod du zan kyang / brjod pa 'am dpe' mtshon par myi myod de/ lag na rdo rje de lta na byang chub kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di mthu che ba yin pas/ klag
280b6(mdo): pa da \u0f7f/ mchod pa dang / kun chub par byas na/ bsod nams kyi phung po skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de lta na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
280b7(mdo): ldeng dang / mya 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gnas pa'i sems can de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ de dag thams cad kyis phyir myi ldog pa'i sa 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang
280b8(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob nas/ lan gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
280b9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rmad du byung ba'i mngon par shes pa can de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rmad du byung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa chad du/
281a1(mdo): brjod pa mdzad do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pas smras pa/ lag na rdo rje don gyi dbang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
281a2(mdo): rgyas la yongs su zhus shig dang / don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyend to// des na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
281a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen gyi gzungs las/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bgyi lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje
281a4(mdo): zum gyi 'di las dge ba'i rtsa ba nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba spyod par 'dod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa'i/
281a5(mdo): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can des bsam pa dge bas/ gzungs 'di legs par bzung nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par/ bya ste/ lag na rdo rje dad pa can kyi rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
281a6(mdo): ma/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang gtsang ma gos rtsang ma bgos pa zhus legs par byas pa/ ba'i rnam lnga sten pa des/ 'ji ba dang ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi
281a7(mdo): pa byas la/ ji ltar 'byor da par 'dod pa'i me tog dgram zhing spos dang / bdug pas bdugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bsal bar bya'o// chu de la yang byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyis lan
281a8(mdo): bdun bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu tsan dan dkar pos byug par bya'o// gur kum kyis mchod par bya zhing / ci 'byor da pas mchod pa yang bya/ bskor bar yang bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi s+yan sngar gzungs kyi rgyal
281a9(mdo): po 'di yang lan cig dran par bya'o// mar me gcig kyang sbyar bar bya ste/ lag na rdo rje de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba nyon cig dang / bshad par bya'o// dpe' yang bstand par bya'o// lag na rdo rje gang zhig stong gsum gyi stong chen po
281b1(mdo): l-i 'jig rten gi khams kyi klu'i rgyal po chen por gyur nas/ char kyi rgyun gcig gis zim bu 'phra mo 'bebs par byed la/ skyes bu mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig gis zim bu dang / char gyi rgyun de dag 'grang bar byed/
281b2(mdo): dper yang byed la/ bgrang ba des zam bu thams cad bgrangs/ gzhal bsdoms nas de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge

281b4(mdo): re shig bsod nams kyi phung po 'di tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las/ lhagacig la brnyas par nus kyi/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis tshad gzung bar myi
281b5(mdo): ngo // lag na rdo rje gnyis pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba myi nyung ba zhig skye/ bar 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje sems can rnams gang gis dge ba'i/ rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur ba ni byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/
281b6(mdo): ba 'am/ ras sam/ gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig la bris la mchod rten gyi las byas la mchod rten de'i dbus su bcug na/ des na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten kyi las 'bum byas par 'a
281b7(mdo): zhing / la ka na rdo rje de snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skye bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig mdo dang rtog pa thams

281b9(mdo): yang 'jungs shing byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo po'i mchod rten ni/ dpe gong ma rdzus phra rab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsres to'i sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten bya/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i mchod rten ces bya/ de
282a1(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mchod rten ces bya'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas sung bstand pa'i mchod rtenas/
282a2(mdo): me tog gam bdug pa 'am/ 'dud pa 'am thal mo sbyor bas phyag 'tshal bar byed cing / lan cig tsam yang skor bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la de/ nI rtsa ba snga ma tsam skye bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang
282a3(mdo): bral bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur ro// phyir myi ldog pa'i rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// lus shi nad tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
282a4(mdo): nga chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba myi zad par 'gyur ro// phyin cad ma'i mngal du myi skye bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gzungs ni rnyed par dka' ba

282a8(mdo): gshegs pas dper mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bsgrags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnyed pa dang / rgya mtsho chen
282a9(mdo): bo'i thigs pa'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas par 'gyur ro// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshes
282b1(mdo): pa'i sku gzugs de la mchod pa dang / bkur bsti byed na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byas/ gus par byas/ bla mar byas par 'gyur te/ bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas gnod
282b2(mdo): skyon gyi sde dpon chen po sag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di ni phan yon che ba mthu che bsags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i mying brjod pa tsam gyis da

282b4(mdo): slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapas sa zhig pasod rnams kyi phung po 'angs su rdzogs par 'dod cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /

283a1(mdo): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ gzungs kyi mdo rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di nub par myi 'gyur bar rjes su gtad kyis sems can 'di dag kyang bsrung ba dang / yongs su sgrub par gyis la/ rang rang gyi/

283a8(mdo): brgyad bzlas brjod byas ma/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ de la lha thams cad rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa pa

284a1(mdo): thams cad du spyad par bya ste/ sungs kar tshangs par blangs nas/ klu'i gnas su gtor ma/ klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas su 'gro bar yang ster te/ thams cad rkang pa la 'dud cing gang bsgo ba de

284a9(mdo): nad thams cad la yungs kar gyi chus bkrus ya/ nad byed par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la bu ram dang bsres te/ 'dugs ma gdon thams cad las b.rad par 'gyur ro// bsang 'chi ba dang / phrugs 'chib
284b1(mdo): rab myi 'chi ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'chil la lam gyi bzhi mdor mar dang sungs kar gyis sbyin bsreg byas na/ nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rab la gtor na mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ mchod rten gnas/

284b3(mdo): gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug cing dam pa thams cad sbyin par byed/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su skong bar byed/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la mnan te yungs kar dang / gu kulnga dang mar gyis bdug cing lan
284b4(mdo): stongaH brgyad du bzlas brjod byas na/ rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs shing / rig sngags rtog pa dang ma bral ba thams cadagrub pa gsol bar mdzad/ re ba phun sum tshogs pa thams
284b5(mdo): da dang / stsol par mdzad/ bu bzhin du yongs su skyong bar mdzad do// nor bu bzang po'i bu'i rkang pa mnan te/ lan stong du bzlas brjod byas na/ nor mang po ster bar 'gyur// re ba
284b6(mdo): phun sum tshogs par mdzad/ bu bzhin du yongs su skyong bar mdzad do// nor bu bzang po'i bu'i rkang pa mnan te/ lan stong du bzlas brjod byas na/ nor mang po ster bar 'gyur/ re ba phun sum tshogs pa
284b7(mdo): thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// bu'i gzugs su mdun na 'dug cing gang bsgo ba de nyan to// rnam thos kyi bul spyi bor mnan te/ a ka rus 'dug cing lan brgya rtsa gnyis su bzlas brjod byas na/ nor bu bzang po'i bu
284b8(mdo): gter ster bar 'gyur ro// mtshon sna lngas gnod sbyin mo bris te/ de'i mdun tu sa la kyis bdug cing / lan stong rtsa nyi shur bzlas brjod byas ma/ mdun na 'dug cing mngag gzhug par 'gyur te/ gang bsgo ba de&
284b9(mdo): cing tse srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug par 'gyur ro// gzhan dag gis kyang las stong phrag dang / de bzhin du las brgya phrag dag byed cing / thams cad du dngos grub la sbyar bar 'gyur ro// de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs dam pa do/
285a1(mdo): thams cad bsgrub par byed pa bshad par bya'o// ras zhu bzhi pa kha tshar ma bcad pa skyon myed pa la/ ri mo mkhan rtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ smyung ba byas pas dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
285a2(mdo): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung na seng ge'i khril bzhugs pa br-i'o// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs shig bre'o// bcom ldan 'das na chos stond pa mdzad po pra/
285a3(mdo): lo// rin po che'i shing ljon pa po'i lo ma ni byang chub kyi shing lta bur bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa pad ma'i steng du pus mo btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la Ung
285a4(mdo): dpeng dbul ba bri'o// g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gdong bsgyur pa khros pa'i gzugs su 'dug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa pad ma'i steng du pus mo btsugs te/ rdo rje gsor bar
285a5(mdo): com ldan 'das la lta ba bri/ 'phags pa 'jam dpa/ la kyi rgyab tu mchod sdong chu zheng gab pa lan kan kyis brgyan po br-i/ 'o// mchod sdod kyi nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng ge
285a6(mdo): lo bzhugs shing dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa br-i'o// lag na rdo rje'i rgyab logs su byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyis mdo zab mo tog gi nang du bcug nas/ seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag pa br-i'o//
285a7(mdo): dang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bri'o// de'i 'og logs su rdo rje'i pho nya mo bkra bzhad lhag lhag 'don pa bri'o// mchod sdod kyi sted kyi 'og tu lha mo dpal bri'o// gnas kyi nang du rgyal po chen po bzhi ko bgos pa
285a8(mdo): pa'i gzugs su 'dug pa br-i'o// de dag gi/ 'og logs su rigs sngags 'dzin pus mo btsugs nas/ la ka na pog por thogs te/ bgrang 'phreng bgrang zhing bcom ldan 'das a lta ba br-i'o// gal ta mnar myed
285a9(mdo): kro ha dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa zhig yin yang / ri mo'i sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis mod la de thams cad yongs su gtugs par
285b1(mdo): sems can de ni phyir myi ldog pa yin par rig par bya na/ lhag par bya ba mang po byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par rig par bya'o//

286a1(mdo): tu bsrung phyir bstand par bya// dkyil 'khor du ni rab zhugs pa'i// sems can phyir myi ldog par 'gyur// yang 'di'i gsang sngags kyi le'u rigs sngags thams cad kyi don bsgrub pa bshad par bya'o//
286a2(mdo): sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te dza ya dza ya swa ha// dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// IM dza ya mi ri li dza ye swA ha/ gtor ma'i sngags so// AM sarba san d+ha re maM li dza ye sA ha// s+yan drang ba'i gsang sngags so/ au bud d+ha ku su me

286a4(mdo): a thaMd de swa ha/ gos bgo ba'i gsang sngags so// AM ku lan d+ha r-i swa ha/ slob ma'i gsang sngags so// IM d+hA ra d+ha ra mai li dza ye swa ha/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags so// IM su sam b+ha

286b5(mdo): kun kyis byin gyis brlabs// mkhas pas lag pa g.yas/ pas ni// lte ba'i thad kar bzhag nas su// gung mo yis ni gzer bya zhing // 'dzub mo yis ni bsdigs par bya// phyag rgya
